SA01vakobhau:4: tasmai namaskṛtya yathārthaśāstre śāstraṃ pravakṣyāmyabhidharmakośam // VAkK_1.1 //
SA01vakobhau:6: śāstraṃ praṇetukāmaḥ svasya śāsturmāhātmyajñāpanārthaṃ guṇākhyānapūrvakaṃ tasmai namaskāramārabhate ya iti /
SA01vakobhau:14: tacca bhagavato buddhasya pratipakṣalābhenātyantaṃ sarvathā sarvatra jñeye punaranutpattidharmatvāddhatam /
SA01vakobhau:23: tatha hyeṣāṃ buddhadharmeṣvativiprakṛṣṭadeśakāleṣu artheṣu cānantaprabhedeṣu bhavatyevākliṣṭamajñānam /
SA01vakobhau:25: ityātmahitapratipattisaṃpadā saṃstutya punastameva bhagavantaṃ parahitapratipattisaṃpadā saṃstauti saṃsārapaṅkājjagadujjahāreti /
SA01vakobhau:29_1: iti ya evamātmaparahitapratipattisaṃpadā yuktastasmai namaskṛtyeti śirasā praṇipatya /
SA01vakobhau:37: tasmai namaskṛtya kiṃ kariṣyāmī tyāha śāstraṃ pravakṣyāmi /
SA01vakobhau:59: yāpi ca śrutacintābhāvanāmayī sāsravā prajñā upapattipratilambhikā ca sānucarā /
SA01vakobhau:61: yacca śāstramasyāḥ prāptyarthamanāsravāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ tadapi tatsaṃbhārabhāvādabhidharma ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:65: tadayaṃ paramārthadharmaṃ vā nirvāṇaṃ dharmalakṣaṇaṃ vā pratyabhimukho dharma ityabhidharmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:73: sa hi śāstrasaṃjñako 'bhidharma etasminnarthato yathāpradhānamantarbhūta ityetacchāstraṃ tasya kośasthānīyaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:80: kimarthaṃ punarabhidharmopadeśaḥ kena cāyaṃ prathamata upadiṣṭo yaṭa ācāryo 'bhidharmakośaṃ vaktumādriyata iti //
SA01vakobhau:84: dharmāṇāṃ pravicayamantareṇa nāsti kleśānāṃ yata upaśāntaye 'bhyupāyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:85: kleśaiśca bhramati bhavārṇave 'tra lokastaddhetorata uditaḥ kilaiṣa śāstrā // VAkK_1.3 //
SA01vakobhau:91: atastaddhetostasya dharmapravicayasyārthe śāstrā kila buddhenābhidharma uktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:93: nahi vinā 'bhidharmopadeśena śiṣyaḥ śakto dharmān pravicetumiti /
SA01vakobhau:95: sa tu prakīrṇa ukto bhagavatā bhadantakātyāyanīputra-prabhṛtibhiḥ piṇḍīkṛtya sthapitobhadanta dharmatrāto dānavargīyakaraṇavadityāhurvaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:97: katame punaste dharmā yeṣāṃ pravicayārthamabhidharmopadeśa ityāha
SA01vakobhau:113: kāmaṃ nirodhamārgasatyālambanā api āsravā upajāyante na tinuśerate tatreti na tayoḥ sāsravatvaprasañgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:115: yathā 'tra nānuśerate tat paścādanuśayanirdeśa eva jñāpayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:145: duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāṃ pratisaṃkhyānaṃ pratisaṃkhyā prajñāviśeṣastena prāpyo nirodhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:151: kiṃ punareka eva sarveṣāṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:160: anyathā hi duḥkhadarśanaheyakleśanirodhasākṣātk karaṇāt sarvakleśanirodhasākṣātkriyā prasajyeta /
SA01vakobhau:166: nāsya kaścit sabhāgaheturasti nāsau kasyacidityayamasya vākyasyārtho na tu nāsya kaśicat sabhāgo 'stīti /
SA01vakobhau:172: anāgatānāṃ dharmāṇāmutpādasyātyantaṃ vighnabhūto visaṃyogād yo 'nyo nirodhaḥ so 'pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:178: yathaikarūpavyāsaktacakṣurmanaso yāni rūpāṇi śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni cātyayante tadālambanaiḥ pañcabhirvijñānakāyairna śakyaṃ punarutpattum /
SA01vakobhau:180: na hi te satyā atītaṃ viṣayamālambayi tulmiti /
SA01vakobhau:185: santi te dharmā yeṣāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodha eva labhyate /
SA01vakobhau:207: rūpaskandho vedanāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho vijñānaskandhaścetyete saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:209: sametya saṃbhūya pratyayaiḥ kṛtāḥ iti saṃskṛtāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:214: ta evādhvā kathāvastu saniḥsārāḥ savastukāḥ (1-7c-7d) // VAkK_1.7 //
SA01vakobhau:216: ta eva saṃskṛtā gatagacchadgamiṣyadbhāvādadhvānaḥ adyante 'nitayatyeti vā /
SA01vakobhau:242: ya upādānaskandhāḥ skandhā api te syuḥ eva nopādānaskandhāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:252: upādānāni vā tebhyaḥ saṃbhavantīti upādānaskandhāḥ puṣpaphalavṛkṣavat /
SA01vakobhau:264: duḥkhaṃ samudayo loko dṛṣṭisthānaṃ bhavaśca te (1-8c-8d) // VAkK_1.8 //
SA01vakobhau:283: pañcārthāsteṣāmevacakṣurādīnāmindriyāṇāṃ yathāsvaṃ ye pañca viṣayāḥ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyākhyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:288: tatra ya ete pañca rūpādayo 'rthā uktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:292: rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyavijñānānāmāśrayabhūtā ye pañca rūpātmakāḥ prasādāste yathākramaṃ cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyā veditavyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:294: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā “cakṣurbhikṣo ādhyātmikamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya” rūpa prasāda iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:322: tadyathā nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitamavadātaṃ dīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ vṛttaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ unnatamavanataṃ sātaṃ visātaṃ abhraṃ dhūmo rajo mahikā cchāyā ātapaḥ ālokaḥ andhakāramiti /
SA01vakobhau:337: asti rūpāyatanaṃ varṇato vidyate na saṃsthānataḥ
SA01vakobhau:378: sa tu yathaikau varṇaparamāṇurna bhūtacatuṣkadvayamupādāyeṣyate tathā naivaiṣṭavya iti /
SA01vakobhau:399: catvāri mahābhūtāni ślakṣṇatvaṃ karkaśatvaṃ gurutvaṃ laghutvaṃ śītaṃ jighatsā pipāsā ceti /
SA01vakobhau:416: sukhā saṅghasya sāmagrī samagrāṇāṃ tapaḥ sukhaṃ” // iti /
SA01vakobhau:421: yadyapi tatra vastrāṇyekaśo na tulyante sañcitāni punastulyante /
SA01vakobhau:427: yadetadbahuvidhaṃ rūpamuktaṃ tatra kadācidekena dravyeṇa cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate yadā tatprakāravyavacchedo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:431: tadyathā senāvyūhamanekavarṇasaṃsthānaṃ maṇisamūhaṃ ca dūrāt paśyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:435: kāyavijñānaṃ tu paraṃ pañcabhiḥ spraṣṭavyairutpadyata ityeke /
SA01vakobhau:441: nanu caivaṃ samastālambanatvāt sāmānyaviṣayāḥ pañca vijñānakāyāḥ prāpnuvanti na svalakṣaṇaviṣayāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:443: āyatanasvalakṣaṇaṃ pratyete svalakṣaṇaviṣayā iṣyante na dravyasvalakṣaṇamityadoṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:447: kāyajihvendriyayoryugapad viṣayaprāptau satyāṃ katarad vijñānaṃ pūrvamutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:455: uktāḥ pañācendriyārthāḥ yathā ca teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ /
SA01vakobhau:479: rūpakriyāsvabhāvāpi satī vijñaptivat paraṃ na vijñāpayatītyavijñaptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:489: ityete catvāraḥ svalakṣaṇopādāyarūpadhāraṇād dhātavaścatvāri mahābhūtāny ucyante /
SA01vakobhau:495: te punahete dhātavaḥ kasmin karmaṇi saṃsidhāḥ kiṃsvabhāvāścetyāha
SA01vakobhau:515: “vāyudhātuḥ katamo laghusamudīraṇatvam” iti prakāraṇeṣu nirdiṣṭaṃ sūtre ca /
SA01vakobhau:519: ato ya īraṇāsvabhāvo dharmaḥ sa vāyuriti karṃaṇā 'sya svabhāvo 'bhivyaktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:521: kaḥ punaḥ pṛthivyādināṃ pṛthivīdhātvādīnāṃ ca viśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:525: tathā hi pṛthivīṃ darśayanto varṇaṃ saṃsthānaṃ ca darśayanti /
SA01vakobhau:534: ya eva tu vāyudhātuḥ sa eva loke vāyuarityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:538: yathā pṛthivī varṇasaṃsthānamucyate lokasaṃjñayā tatha vāyuarapi /
SA01vakobhau:545: uktaṃ bhagavatā “rūpyate rupyata iti bhikṣavastasmādrūpopādānasdandha ityucyate //
SA01vakobhau:555: te kāmā na samṛdhyanti śalyaviddha iva rūpyate //“
SA01vakobhau:570: tadapi rūpitaṃ rūpayiṣyamāṇaṃ tajjātīyaṃ ceti rūpamindhanavat /
SA01vakobhau:586: avijñaptirhi cchāyeva vṛkṣaṃ prabheva maṇiṃ bhūtānyāśrtya varttate /
SA01vakobhau:588: na tvevaṃ cakṣurādīnyāśritya varttante cakṣurvijñānādīni kevalaṃ tūtpattinimiktamātraṃ tāni teṣāṃ bhavantīti /
SA01vakobhau:590: idaṃ tāvadavaibhāṣikīyaṃ vṛkṣamāśritya cchāyā varttate maṇiṃ cāśritya prabheti /
SA01vakobhau:597: niruddheṣvapi avijña ptyāśayeṣu mahābhūteṣu tasyā anirodho 'bhyupagamyate /
SA01vakobhau:601: anye punaratra parihāramāhuḥ cakṣurvijñānādīnāmāśrayo bhedaṃ gataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:603: kaṣcidrūpyate cakṣurādiḥ kaścinna rūpyate yathā manaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:617: dhātuvyavasthāyāṃ ta eva daśadhātavaścakṣurchātū rūpadhāturyāvat kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhāturiti /
SA01vakobhau:631: sa punarbhidyamānaḥ ṣaḍ vedanākāyāḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yāvamvanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedaneti /
SA01vakobhau:643: bhagavatā tu sūtre ṣaṭ cetanākāyā ityuktaṃ prādhānyāt /
SA01vakobhau:649: tasmāt saṃskārā upādānaskandha ity ucyata” iti
SA01vakobhau:651: anyathā hi śeṣāṇāṃ caitasikānāṃ viprayuktānāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāṃ skandhāsaṃgrahādduḥkhasamudayasatyatvaṃ na syāditi parijñāparihāṇe api na syātām/
SA01vakobhau:653: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā “nāhamekadharmamapi anabhijñāyāparijñāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāṃ vadāmīti /
SA01vakobhau:669: viṣayaṃ viṣayaṃ prati vijñaptirupalabdhirvijñāna skandha ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:671: sa punaḥ ṣaḍ vijñānakāyāḥ cakṣurvijñānaṃ yāvanmanovijñānamiti /
SA01vakobhau:687: evamatra pañca skandhā dvādaśāyatanāni aṣṭādaśa dhātavo nirddiṣṭā bhavaṇti /
SA01vakobhau:691: vedanā dayaḥ skandhāstrayo “vijñaptirasaṃskṛtāni ca dharmāyatanaṃ dharmadhātuśca vijñānaskandho mana āyatanaṃ ṣaḍ vijñānadhātavo manodhātuśceti //
SA01vakobhau:693: nanu ca ṣaḍ vijñānakāyā vijñānaskandha ityuktam /
SA01vakobhau:695: atha ko “yaṃ punastebhyo “nyo manodhātuḥ na khalu kaścidanyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:704: tadyathā sa eva putro “nyasya pitā bhavati tadeva phalamanyasya bījamiti /
SA01vakobhau:706: evaṃ tarhi dravyataḥ saptadaśa dhātavo bhavanti dvādaśa vā ṣaḍvijñānadhātumanodhātūnāmitaretarāntarbhāvāditi kasmādaṣṭādāśa vyavasthāpyante /
SA01vakobhau:720: arhatastarhi caramaṃ cittam na mano bhaviṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:738: rūpaskandhena mana āyatanena dharmadhātunā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃgraho boddhavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:740: sa khalveṣa saṃgraho yatra kvaciducyamāno veditavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:752: tadyathā cakṣurindriyaṃ rūpaskandhena cakṣurāyatanadhātubhyāṃ ca duḥkhasamudayasatyābhyāṃ ca saṃgṛhītam /
SA01vakobhau:757: yastvanyenānyasya saṃgraha ucyate yathā saṃgrahavastubhiḥ parṣadāṃ sa hi kādācitkatvāt sāṃketiko veditavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:779: ekadhātutve “pi tu cakṣurādīnaṃ dvayoḥ saṃbhava āśrayasya śobhārtham /
SA01vakobhau:785: idaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ kaḥ skandhāyatanadhātvartha iti /
SA01vakobhau:789_1: vā praṇītaṃ vā yadvā dūre antike tatsarvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya rūpaskandha iti
SA01vakobhau:789_2: saṃkhyāṃ gacchatī ti vacanāt sūtre rāśyarthaḥ skandhārtha iti siddham /
SA01vakobhau:805: yadapekṣyau dārikaṃ na jātu tadapekṣya sūkṣmaṃ pitāputravat /
SA01vakobhau:839: yathaikasmin parvate bahūnyayastāmrarūpyasuvarṇādigotrāni dhātava ucyante evam ekasminnāśraye santāne vā aṣṭādaśa gotrāṇi aṣṭādaśa dhātava ucyante /
SA01vakobhau:852: aṣṭādaśdharmāṇāṃ jātayaḥ svabhāvā aṣṭādaśa dhātava iti /
SA01vakobhau:854: yadi rāśyarthaḥ skandhārthaḥ prajñaptisantaḥ skandhāḥ prāpnuvanti /
SA01vakobhau:860: na tarhi rāśyarthaḥ skandhārtha iti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:867: tathāhi vaktāro bhavanti tribhiḥ skandhakairdeyaṃ dāsyāma iti /
SA01vakobhau:887: ekaśaḥ samagrāṇāṃ kāraṇabhāvāt viṣayasahakāritvādvā nendriyaṃ pṛthagāyatanaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:891: sa āha paramāṇurekasya dhātorekasyāyatanasyaikasya skandhasya pradeśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:898: bhavati hi pradeśe “pi pradeśivadupacāro yathā paṭṭaiakadeśe dagdhe paṭo dagdha iti /
SA01vakobhau:922: kim punaḥ kāraṇaṃ caitasikā ekatra saṃskāraskandhanikṣiptā vedanāsaṃjñe tu pṛthak skandhīkṛte ityāha
SA01vakobhau:937: yacca skandhakrame kāraṇamupadekṣyamāṇaṃ tato 'pi kramakāraṇādanayoḥ pṛthakskandhīkaraṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:960: yathā ghaṭoparamo na ghaṭa evaṃ skandhoparamo na skandho bhavitumarhatītyapare /
SA01vakobhau:973: tathā hi vyapadiśanti haste me vedanā pāde me vedaneti /
SA01vakobhau:979: athavā anādimati saṃsāre strīpuruṣā anyonyaṃ rūpābhirāmāste ca vedanāsvādagarddhāt /
SA01vakobhau:983: tadviparyāsaḥ kleśaiścittaṃ aca tatsaṃkliṣṭamiti yathāsaṃkleśaṃ ca kramaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:997: etā eva vijñānasthitayaḥ tāsu ca pratiṣṭhitaṃ vijñānamiti kṣetrabijasaṃdarśanārthaḥ skandhānukramaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:999: ata eva pañcaskandhā nālpīyāṃso na bhūyāṃsaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1001: ata eva ca kramakāraṇādvedanāsaṃjñe saṃskārebhyaḥ pṛthaka skandhīkṛte /
SA01vakobhau:1003: yata ete audārikatare saṃkleśānukramahetū bhājanavyañjanabhūte tatprabhāvitaṃ ca dhātudvayamiti //
SA01vakobhau:1040: tayorāśutaravṛttitvāt ghrāṇaṃ pūrvamuktamaprāptasyaiva jihvā bhojyasya gandhagrahaṇāt /
SA01vakobhau:1051: manaḥ punastānyeva niśritamadeśasthaṃ ceti yathāsthānameṣāṃ kramaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:1053: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ daśasvāyataneṣu rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhīteṣvekaṃ rūpāyatanamucyate /
SA01vakobhau:1062: yathā gamyeta pratyekameṣāṃ daśānāmāyatanatvaṃ viṣayaviṣayitvena vyavasthānaṃ na samastānāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:1064: cakṣurādibhiśca viśeṣitairyanna cakṣurādisaṃjñakaṃ rūpaṃ ca tadrūpakayātanaṃ jñāsyata ityasya punarnāmāntaraṃ nocyate /
SA01vakobhau:1073: idamihāmutreti nirūpaṇāt loke 'pi ca tadrūpamiti pratītaṃ nānyāni /
SA01vakobhau:1085: anyānyapi skandhāyatanadhātusaṃśabditānyupalabhyante sūtreṣu teṣāṃ kiṃebhireva saṃgraho veditavya āhosvidvyatirekaḥ
SA01vakobhau:1093: yeṣāṃ vāksvabhāvaṃ buddhavacanaṃ teṣāṃ tāni rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhītāni /
SA01vakobhau:1123: ye 'pyanye skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ sūtrāntareṣūktāste 'pyeṣveva yathokteṣu skandhādiṣu pratiopādyāḥ svaṃ svaṃ lakṣaṇameṣāṃ yathāvihitamasmiṃacchāstre saṃpradharya /
SA01vakobhau:1125: tatra tāvat pañcānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktijñānadarśanaskandhānāṃ śīlaskandho rūpaskandhena saṃgṛhītaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1149: ya ime tatra ṣaḍ dhātavaḥ uktāḥ pṛthivīdhāturabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturākāśadhāturvijñānadhāturityeṣāṃ dvayorlakṣaṇamanuktam /
SA01vakobhau:1151: tat kimākāśamevākāśadhāturveditavyaḥ sarvaṃ aca vijñānaṃ vijñānadhātuḥ/
SA01vakobhau:1174: aghaṃ ca tadanyasya rūpasya tatrāpratighātātsāmantakaṃ cānyasya rūpasyetyapare /
SA01vakobhau:1187: tadevaṃ satyeṣāṃ catvāro dhātavaḥ spraṣṭavyadhātāvantarbhūtāḥ pañcamo rūpadhātau ṣaṣṭhaḥ saptasu vijñānadhātuṣviti /
SA01vakobhau:1189: ye punarime aṣṭādaśa dhātava uktāsteṣāṃ kati sanidarśanāḥ katyanidarśanāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1202: ya ete rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhītā daśa dhātava uktāste sapratighāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1204: pratigho nāma pratighātaḥ sa ca trividhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1210: yathā hasto haste pratihanyate upale vā /
SA01vakobhau:1215: yathoktaṃ prajñaptā“vasti cakṣurjale pratihanyate na sthale /
SA01vakobhau:1246: yasmin yasya kāritraṃ sa tasya viṣayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1250: kaḥ punaḥ svasminviṣaye pravarttamānamālamvane vā pratihanyata ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:1254: nipāto vā 'tra pratighāto yā svaviṣaye pravṛttiḥ
SA01vakobhau:1258: ye dharmā viṣayapratighātena sapratighā āvaraṇapratighātenāpi ta iti catuṣkoṭikaḥ
SA01vakobhau:1260: prathamā koṭiḥ sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaśca yaḥ saṃprayuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1267: ye dharmā viśayapratighātena sapratighā ālambana pratighātenāpi ta iti /
SA01vakobhau:1348: tasmādabhyavahāravītarāgāṇāṃ gandharasau tatra niṣprayojanau na tu spraṣṭavyam /
SA01vakobhau:1356: ata eṣāmeva trayāṇāṃ dhyānopapattau saṃbhavo na gandharasayoriti /
SA01vakobhau:1365: yadyetat prayojanamadhiṣṭhānamevāstu śobhārthaṃ vacanārthaṃ ca mā bhūdindriyam /
SA01vakobhau:1402: yāni tatrendriyāṇi tairavikalā ahīnendriyā iti ko 'tra virodhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1408: sta eva tatra ghrāṇajivhendriye na tu gandharasau /
SA01vakobhau:1410: ātmabhāvamukhena hi ṣaḍāyatane tṛṣṇāsamudācāro na viṣayamukhena /
SA01vakobhau:1417: rūpavītarāgāṇāṃ tatropapattirato 'tra daśa rūpasvabhāvā dhātavastadāśrrayālambanāśca pañca vijñānadhātāvo na saṃabhavanti //
SA01vakobhau:1430: kati savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ katyavitarkā vicāramātrāḥ katyavitarkā avicārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1442: tatra manodhāturmanovijñānadhātuḥ saṃprayuktaśca dharamadhāturanyatra vitarkavicārābhyāṃ kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1452: kāmadhātau prathame dhyāne vicāra eṣu triprakāreṣu nāntarbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:1470: daśa rupiṇo dhātavaḥ śeṣā nityamavitarkā avicārā asaṃprayogitvāt //
SA01vakobhau:1472: yadi pañca vijñānakāyāḥ savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ kathamavikalpakā ityucyante /
SA01vakobhau:1493: tau prajñā mānasī vyagrā smṛtiḥ sarvaiva mānasī // VAkK_1.33 //
SA01vakobhau:1500: mānasyeva sarvā smṛtiḥ samāhitā cāsamāhitā cānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1506: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānadhātavo manodhātuśca ete sapta cittadhātavaḥ sālambanā viṣayagrahaṇāt /
SA01vakobhau:1512: śeṣā daśa rūpiṇo dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaścāsaṃprayuktako 'nālambanā it isiddham /
SA01vakobhau:1519: ye sapta sālambanā uktāḥ aṣṭamaṣyārdhena sārdham /
SA01vakobhau:1536: anye 'nupāttāstadyathā mūlavarjeṣu keśaromanakhadanteṣu viṇmūtrakheṭasiṃghāṇakaśeṇitādiṣu bhūmyudakādiṣu ca /
SA01vakobhau:1567: tacca naivaṃ bhūtānāṃ catuṣṭva khakkhaṭādilakṣaṇāvadhāraṇāt sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:1571: na hi kāṭhinyādīni cakṣurādibhirgṛhyante nāpi varṇādayaḥ kāyendriyeṇa /
SA01vakobhau:1573: uktaṃ ca sūtre “cakṣurbhikṣo ādhyātmikamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādo arupyanidarśanaṃ saprataighaṃ evaṃ yāvat kāyaḥ
SA01vakobhau:1575: rūpāṇi bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāyarupi sanidarśanaṃ sapratigham /
SA01vakobhau:1577: śabdo bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rupyanidarśanaṃ sapratigham /
SA01vakobhau:1581: spraṣṭavyāni bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpyanidarśanaṃ sapratighami“ti /
SA01vakobhau:1583: spraṣṭrvyāyatanikadeśenaiva bhūtānāṃ saṃgrahāccheṣaṃ na bhūtānīti spaṣṭamādarśitam /
SA01vakobhau:1585: yattarhi sūtre uktaṃ “yaccakṣuṣi maṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagatami“ti
SA01vakobhau:1593: na ca yuktaṃ cittameva caittā ityabhyupetum /
SA01vakobhau:1595: “saṃjñā ca vedanā ca caitasika eṣa dharmaścittānvayāccittaniśrita';
SA01vakobhau:1606: paramāṇusaṃghātatvāt śeṣā na saṃcitā iti siddhaṃ bhavati //
SA01vakobhau:1608: aṣṭādaśānaṃ dhātūnāṃ kaśchīnatti kaśiciādyate ko dahati ko dahyate kastulayati kastulyate /
SA01vakobhau:1610: chinatti cchidyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātue catuṣṭayam /
SA01vakobhau:1628: yathā cchinattī cchiyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātucatuṣṭayam /
SA01vakobhau:1638: kecidāhuḥ tadeva dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ dāhakaṃ tulyaṃ ca
SA01vakobhau:1642: kati vipākajāḥ dhātavaḥ katyaupacayikāḥ kati naihṣyandikāḥ kati dravayuktāḥ kati kṣaṇikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1648: adhyātmaṃ tāvat pañca dhātavaḥ cakṣurādayo vipākajāścaupacayikāśca /
SA01vakobhau:1664: bhavatu phalahetau phalopacāro yathā phale hetūpacāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1684: yattarhi prajñaptiśāstre uktaṃ “pāruṣyavirateḥ subhāvitatvād brahmasvaratā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ nirvartta iti /
SA01vakobhau:1688: karmabhyo hi bhūtāni bhūtebhyaḥ śabdaḥ iti /
SA01vakobhau:1691: karmabhyo hi vipākajāni mahābhūtāni tebhyaścaupacayikāni tebhyo naiḥṣyandikāni tebhyaḥ śabda iti /
SA01vakobhau:1693: evam tarhi śāhī hikyapi vedanā karmajabhūtasaṃbhūtatvānna vipākaḥ prapnoti /
SA01vakobhau:1710: te vipākajā apyaupacayikā api naiḥṣyandrikā api /
SA01vakobhau:1721: te prathamānāsrave duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntikalāpe kṣaṇamekamanaiḥṣyandikā bhavantyataḥ kṣaṇikā ityucyante /
SA01vakobhau:1736: cakṣurvijñānadhātvoḥ syāt pṛthak lābhaḥ sahāpi ca // VAkK_1.38 //
SA01vakobhau:1761: tṛtīyā kāmadhātau labdhāvihīnacakṣuḥ prathamadhyānopapanno dvitīyādidhyānopapannaśca paśyan /
SA01vakobhau:1767: etasya prasaṅgasya samuccayārthaścaśabdaḥ sahāpi ca iti /
SA01vakobhau:1777: ṣaḍ vijñānāni ṣaḍāśrayā ityete dvādaśa dhātava ādhyātmakāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1791: “cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham” iti /
SA01vakobhau:1797: evam tarhi ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava ādhyātmikā na prāpnuvanti /
SA01vakobhau:1801: yadā tadā ta eva te bhavantīti lakṣaṇaṃ nātibarttante /
SA01vakobhau:1807: yadi cānāgatapratyutpannasya vijñānasya manodhātulakṣaṇaṃ na syāt atīte 'pyadhvani manodhāturna vyavasthāpyeta /
SA01vakobhau:1818: yo hi viṣayo yasya vijñānasya niyato yadi tatra tadvijñānamutpantaṃ bhavatyutpattidharmi vā evaṃ sa viṣayaḥ sabhāga ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:1820: na ca so 'sti kaściddharmadhāturyatra nānantaṃ manovijñānamutpannamutpatsyate vā /
SA01vakobhau:1822: tathā hi sarvāryapudgalānāmidaṃ cittamavaśyamutpadyate “sarvadharmā anātmāna” iti /
SA01vakobhau:1826: sa punaścittakṣaṇo 'nyasya cittakṣaṇasyālambanamiti dvayoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ sarvadharmā hyālambanaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:1837: uktaṃ bhavati yaḥ svakarmakṛt sa sabhāga iti /
SA01vakobhau:1839: tatra yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇyapaśyat paśyati drakṣyati vā taducyate sabhāgaṃ acakṣuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1845: yad dṛṣṭvā rūpāṇi niaruddhaṃ nirudhyate nirotsyate vā yaccānutpattidharmi /
SA01vakobhau:1849: tadevānutpattidharmi dvidhā kṛtvā vijñānasamāyuktaṃ cāsamāyusktaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:1854: rūpāṇi ca yāni cakṣuṣā 'paśāyat paśyati drakṣyati vā tāni sabhāgāni /
SA01vakobhau:1858: yānyadṛṣṭānyeva niruddhāni nirudhyante nirutsyante vā yāni cānutpattidharmīṇi /
SA01vakobhau:1870: rūpaṃ tu yaḥ paśyati tasya sabhāgaṃ yo na paśyati tasya tatsabhāgam /
SA01vakobhau:1874: asti hi saṃbhavo yadrūpamekaḥ paśyati taddhavo 'pi paśyeyuryathā candranaṭmallaprekṣāsu /
SA01vakobhau:1876: natu saṃbhavo 'sti yadekena cakṣuṣā dvau paśyetām /
SA01vakobhau:1886: gandhādayastu ya ekena gṛhyante na te 'nyena prāptagṛhaṇādityasādhāraṇatvādeṣāṃ cakṣurādivadatideśo nyāyyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1890: asti hyeṣa saṃbhavo ya eva gandhādaya ekasya ghrāṇādivijñānamutpādayeyusta evānyeṣāmapi /
SA01vakobhau:1904: ye punarasabhāgāste teṣā sabhāgānāṃ jātisāmānyena sabhāgatvāt tatsabhāgāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1906: kati dhātavo darśanaheyāḥ kati bhāvanāheyāḥ katyaheyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1924: nanu cānyadapi darśanaprahātavyamasti pṛthagjanatvamāpāyikaṃ ca kāyavākkarma /
SA01vakobhau:1946: tasmādanyatra jātamaṣaṣṭhajaṃ pañcendriyajaṃ ca yattadapi nāsti darśnaprahātavyam //
SA01vakobhau:1948: aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ kati dṛṣṭiḥ kati na dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1956: pañca satkāyadṛṣṭyādikā dṛṣṭayaḥ laukikī samyag dṛṣṭiḥ śaiṅkṣī dṛṣṭiraśaikṣī dṛṣṭirityayamaṣṭaprakāro dharmadhāturdṛṣṭi ravraśiṣṭo na dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1975: ata eva cānyā 'pi kliṣṭā 'kliṣṭā vā prājñā na dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1989: savijñānakaṃ yadā bhavati tadā paśyatyanyadā neti /
SA01vakobhau:1991: evam tarhi tadeva cakṣurāśritam vijñānaṃ paśyatītyastu /
SA01vakobhau:2000: dṛśyate rūpaṃ na kilāntaritaṃ yataḥ // VAkK_1.42 //
SA01vakobhau:2002: yasmāt kila rūpaṃ kuḍyādivyavahitaṃ na dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:2004: yadi hi vijñānaṃ paśyettassyāpratighatvāt kuḍyādiṣu pratighāto nāsti ityvāṛtamapi rūpaṃ paśyet /
SA01vakobhau:2006: naiva hāvṛte cakṣurvijñānamutpadyata ityanutpannaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:2010: yasya tu cakṣuḥ paśyati tasya cakṣuṣaḥ saparatighatvādvyayavahite vṛttyabhāva iti vijñānasyānutpatti rāśrayeṇaika viṣayapravṛttatvāt yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:2012: kiṃ nu vai cakṣuḥ prāptaviṣayaṃ kāyendriyavat yata āvṛtaṃ na paśyet /
SA01vakobhau:2022: yatrālokasyāpratibandha āvṛte 'pi rupe tatropapadyata eva cakṣurvijñānam /
SA01vakobhau:2024: yatra tu pratibandhastatra notpadyata ityanutpannatvādāvṛtaṃ nekṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:2040: yathā ca sūtra uktaṃ “cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇīṣṭāni kāntāni“ti /
SA01vakobhau:2044: uktaṃ ca sūtre “cakṣurbrāhmaṇa dvāraṃ yāvadeva rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya” ityato gamyate cakṣuṣā dvāreṇa vijñānaṃ paśyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:2051: yadi vijñānaṃ kpaśyati ko vijānāti kaścānayorviśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2053: yadeva hi rūpasya vijñānaṃ tadevāsya darśnamiti /
SA01vakobhau:2055: tadyathā kācit prajñā paśyatītyapyucyate prajānātītyapyevaṃ kiñcidvijñānaṃ paśyatītyapyucyāte vijānātītyapi /
SA01vakobhau:2059: “yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati kartṛbhūtasya cakṣuṣaḥ kā 'nyā dṛśikriye“ti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:2080: tathā hi tasminnutpanne rūpaṃ dṛṣṭamityucyate na vijñātam /
SA01vakobhau:2093: tatra kaḥ paśyati ko vā dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:2101: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā “janapadaniruktiṃ nābhiniviśeta saṃjñāṃ ca lokasya nābhidhāvedi“ti /
SA01vakobhau:2105: cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti ghrāṇaṃ jighrati jihvā āsvādayati kāyaḥ spṛśati mano vijānātīti /
SA01vakobhau:2107: tadyadi cakṣuḥ paśyati kimekena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyatyāhosvidubhābhyām /
SA01vakobhau:2115: tathā hi dvayorvivṛtayoḥ paraiśāuddhataraṃ darāśanaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:2117: ekasmiṃścīnmīlite cakṣuṣi dvitīye cārdhanimīlite dvicandrādigrahaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:2121: na cāśrayavicchedād vicchedaparasaṅgo vijñānasya deśāpratiṣṭhitatvād raupavaditi /
SA01vakobhau:2123: yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti yāvanmano vijānāti kimeṣāṃ prāpto viṣaya āhosvidaprāptaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2127: tathā hi dūrādrūpaṃ paśyatyakṣisthamañjanaṃ na paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:2130: sati ca prāptaviṣayatve divyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotramiha dhyāyināṃ nopajāyeta /
SA01vakobhau:2134: yadyaprāptaviṣayaṃ cakṣuḥ kasmānna sarvamaprāptaṃ paśyati dūraṃ tiraskṛtaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:2140: kasmānna sarvaṃ prāptaṃ paśyatyañjanaṃ śalākāṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:2142: yathā ca ghrāṇādīnaṃ prāpto viṣayo na tu sarvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2177: ata eva yadi hi spṛśeyurhasto haste 'bhyāhataḥ sajyeto palaścopale /
SA01vakobhau:2183: kaścidvāyudhāturvikiraṇāya pravṛtto yathā saṃvarttanyāṃ kaścit saṃdhāraṇāya yathā vivarttanyāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:2191: evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'yamapi grantha upapanno bhavati vibhāṣāyām /
SA01vakobhau:2193: kiṃ nu spṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭamutpadyate āhosvidaspṛṣṭahetukamiti praśnayitvāha“kāraṇaṃ prati /
SA01vakobhau:2199: kadācit spṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yadā cayavatāṃ cayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2209: anyathā hi sāntarāṇāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ śūnyeṣvantareṣu gatiḥ kena pratibadhyeta /
SA01vakobhau:2215: ta eva te saṃghātāḥ paramāṇavaḥ spṛśyante yathā rūpyante /
SA01vakobhau:2217: yadi ca paramāṇordigbhāgabhedaḥ kalpyate spṛṣṭasyāspṛṣṭasya vā sāvayavatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2227: yāvanto hīndriyaparamāṇavastāvanto hi viṣayaparamāṇavaḥ sametya vijñānaṃ janayanti /
SA01vakobhau:2234: kadācit bhūyāṃso yadā mahāntaṃ parvataṃ paśyatyunmiṣitamātreṇa /
SA01vakobhau:2265: tatra cakṣurindriyaparamāṇavaḥ kadācit sarve sabhāgā bhavanti kadācittatsabhāgāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2283: ya ime ṣaḍvijñānadhātava uktāścakṣurvijñānaṃ yavanmanovijñānaṃ kimeṣāṃ yatha viṣayo varttamānaḥ pañcānāṃ caramasya trikāla evamāśrayo 'pi /
SA01vakobhau:2297: tatra cakṣurvijñānasya cakṣuḥ sahaja āśārayo yāvat kāyavijñānasya kāyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2299: atītaḥ punareṣāmāśrayo mana ityapyete pañca vijñānakāyā indriyadvayāśrayāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2320: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamubhayādhīnāyāṃ vijñānotpattau cakṣurādayaḥ evāśrayā ucyante na rūpādayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2326: cakṣurādīnāṃ hi vikāreṇa tadvijñānānāṃ vikāro bhavatyanugrahopaghātapaṭumandatānuvidhānāt na tu rūpādīnāṃ vikāreṇa tadvikāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2328: tasmāt sādhīyastadadhīnatvat ta evāśrayā na rūpādayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2330: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ rūpādayaśca tairvijñāyante cakṣurvijñānaṃ cocyate yāvanmanovijñānam /
SA01vakobhau:2345: tasmādāśrayabhāvādasādhāraṇatvācca vijñānaṃ tenaiva nirdiśyate na rūpādibhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2349: atha yatra kāye sthitaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyati kiṃ tāni kāyacakṣūrūpavijñānānyekabhūmikānyeva bhavantyāhosvidanyabhūmikānyapi /
SA01vakobhau:2354: kāmadhātūpapannasya svena cakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikam bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:2356: tasyaiva svāni rūpāṇi prathamadhyānabhūmīni paśyano rūpāṇi trīṇapi tadbhūmikāni /
SA01vakobhau:2358: dvitīyadhyānacakṣuṣā svāni rūpoāṇi paśyataḥ kāyarūpe svabhūmike cakṣustadbhūmikaṃ vijñānaṃ prathamadhyāna bhūmikam /
SA01vakobhau:2360: prathamadhyānabhūmīni paśyato vijñānarupe tadbhūmike kāyaḥ kāmāvacaraścakṣurdvitīyadyānabhūmikam /
SA01vakobhau:2362: dvitīyadhyānabhūmīni paśyataścakṣūarūpe tadbhūmike kāyaḥ kāmāvacaro vijñānaṃ prathamabhūmīkam /
SA01vakobhau:2364: evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikena cakṣuṣā tadbhūmikādharabhumikāni rūpāṇi paśyato yojayitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:2366: prathmadhyānopapannasya svena cakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikamadharāṇi paśyataḥ trayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ /
SA01vakobhau:2368: dvitīyadhyānacakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyatastrayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ cakṣustadbhūmikam /
SA01vakobhau:2370: kāmāvacarāṇi paśyataḥ kāyavijñāne svabhūmike rūpāṇyadharāṇi cakṣustadbhūmikam /
SA01vakobhau:2376: dvitīyādidhyānopapannasya svaparacakṣurbhyāṃ svaparabhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyato yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:2386: tatra yadbhūmikaḥ kāyastadbhūmikaṃ cakṣurūrdhvabhūmikaṃ vā cakṣurbhavati na tvadharabhūmikam /
SA01vakobhau:2388: yadbhūmikaṃ cakṣustadbhūmikamadharabhūmikaṃ vā rūpaṃ viṣayo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:2392: na hi kadācidūrdhrvabhūmikaṃ rūpamadhobhūmikena cakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ śakyate /
SA01vakobhau:2398: asya rūpaṃ tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ // VAkK_1.46 //
SA01vakobhau:2400: asyetyanantaroktasya cakṣurvijñānasya rūpaṃ sarvato viṣayaḥ ūrdhvamadhaḥ svabhūmau ca /
SA01vakobhau:2407: “na kāyasyādharaṃ śrotramūrdhvaṃ śabdo na ca śruteḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2408: vijñānaṃ cāsya śabdastu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ //“iti
SA01vakobhau:2420: kāyaḥ kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ ca svabhūmikānyeva nityaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:2428: kadācit kāyamanovijñānadharmaiḥ samānabhūmikaṃ mano bhavati kadācidūrdhvādhobhūmikam /
SA01vakobhau:2430: pañcabhūmike 'pi hi kāye sarvabhūmikāni mana ādīni bhavanti samāpattyupapattikāle yathāyogamiti vistareṇa samāpattinirdeśe kośasthāna etadākhyāyiṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:2434: alpaṃ ca prayojanaṃ mahāṃśca śrama iti samāpta ānuṣaṅgikaḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2438: aṣṭādaśānāṃ cdātūnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ ca vijñānānāṃ kaḥ kena vijñeyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2446: evamete pratyekaṃ dvābhyāṃ vijñānābhyāṃ vijñeyā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:2448: śeṣāstrayodaśa dhātavaḥ pañcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāmaviṣayatvādekena manovijñānena vijñeyā ityākhyātaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:2450: eṣāmaṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ madhye kati nityāḥ katyanityāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2452: na kaśct sakalo 'sti nityo dhāturapi tu
SA01vakobhau:2460: dharmārdhamindriyaṃ ye ca dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ smṛtāḥ // VAkK_1.48 //
SA01vakobhau:2464_0: cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyaṃ manaindriyaṃ
SA01vakobhau:2464_1: strīndriyaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ sukhendriyaṃ duḥkhendriyaṃ saumanasyendriyaṃ
SA01vakobhau:2464_2: daurmanasyendraiyaṃ upekṣendriyaṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ smādhīndriyaṃ
SA01vakobhau:2470: tatra dharmārdhaṃ jīvitendriyādīnyekādaśendriyāṇi trayāṇāṃ ca bhāgo dharmadhātupradeśatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:2474: sapta cittadhātavo manaindriyaṃ stripuruṣendriye kāyadhātupradeś iti paścād vakṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:2476: śeṣāḥ pañca dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaśca nendriyamiti siddham //
SA01vakobhau:2482: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
SA01vakobhau:2483: teṣāṃ ca yo nirhodha evaṃvādīu mahāśramaṇaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:2536: tathā hi tadviprayuktavikalpānāṃ ṣaṇḍha paṇḍakobhayavyañjanānāmasaṃvarānantāryakuāśalamulasamucchedā na bhavanti saṃvaraphalaprāptivairāgyāṇi ceti /
SA01vakobhau:2542: tatra punrbhavasaṃbandhe yathoktaṃ “gandharvasya tasmin samaye dvayościttayoranyatarānyataracittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaṃ bhavatyanunayasahagataṃ vā pratighasahagataṃ ve“ti /
SA01vakobhau:2544: vaśibhāvānuvarttane yathoktaṃ “cittenāyaṃ loko nīyata” iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2546: yat punaḥ sukhādīndriyapañcakaṃ yāni cāṣṭau śraddhādīni teṣāṃ
SA01vakobhau:2602: kaścidasau kāyendriyabhāga upastha pradeśo yaḥ strīpuruṣendriyākhyāṃ paratilabhate /
SA01vakobhau:2614: jīvitaṃ vedanāḥ pañca śraddhādyāścendriyaṃ matāḥ // VAkK_2.3 //
SA01vakobhau:2618: tathāhi sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśete duḥkhāyāṃ pratigho 'duḥkhāsukhāyāmavidyetyuktaṃ sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:2659: saṃbhāro vyavadānaṃ ca yāvatā tāvadindriyam // VAkK_2.5 //
SA01vakobhau:2664: tasya strīpuruṣavikalpaḥ strīpuruṣendraiyābhyāṃ sthitirjīvitendriyeṇa saṃkleśo vedanā bhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2690: ājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ prabhavaḥ sthitirājñendriyam upabhoga ājñātāvīndriyeṇetyata etāvantyevendriyāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:2698: tadeva hi tadanyathā 'nyatra cotpannamādānaṃ viharaṇaṃ cocyate /
SA01vakobhau:2706: upasthasyāpi nendriyatvamānande strīpuruṣendriyakṛtaṃ hi tat saukhyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:2710: sarvasya vā kāraṇabhūtasya svasyāṃ kariyāyāmityayukataṃ vāgādīnāmindriyatvam //
SA01vakobhau:2733: dhyāne tṛtīye tu caitasī sā sukhendriyam // VAkK_2.7 //
SA01vakobhau:2735: tṛtīye tu dhyāne saiva śātā vedanā caitasī sukhendriyam /
SA01vakobhau:2743: tṛtīyāddhyānādanyatra kāmadhātau prathame dvitīye ca dhyāne sā caiatasikī śātā vedanā saumanasyendriyam /
SA01vakobhau:2745: tṛtīye tu dhyāne prītivītarāgatvāt sukhendriyameva sā na saumanasyendriyam /
SA01vakobhau:2764: caitasikaṃ hi sukhaduḥkhaṃ prāyeṇa vikalpanādutpadyate na tu kāyikam /
SA01vakobhau:2770: upekṣā tu svarasenāvikalpayata evotpadyate kāyikī caitasikī ce tyekamindriyam kriyate /
SA01vakobhau:2776: upekṣāyāṃ tveṣa vikalpo nāstyata upekṣaṇaṃ pratyavikalpanādabhedaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2784: darśanamārge anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ bhāvanāmārge ājñendriyam aśaikṣamārge ājñātāvīndriyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:2799: “duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñātavyamiti” tathābhūtasyenriyamājñātāvīnriyam /
SA01vakobhau:2801: svabhāvanirdeśāṃ kṛtvā prakārabhedo vaktavya kati sāsravāṇi katyanāsravāṇi inriyāṇityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:2819: manaḥsukhasaumanasyopekṣāḥ śraddhādīni ca pañca etāni navendriyāṇi sāsravāṇyanāsravāṇyapi /
SA01vakobhau:2823: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā “yasyemāni pañcendriyāṇi sarveṇa srvaṃ na santi tamahaṃ bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ vadāmī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:2835: uktaṃ ca sūtre “santi ca sattvā loke jātā loke vṛddhāstīkṣṇendriyā api madhyendriyā api mṛdvindriyā apī” tyapravarttita eva dharmacakre /
SA01vakobhau:2839: punaścoktaṃ “yāvacchāhameṣāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ samudayaṃ cāstagamaṃ ca svādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ nādhyajñāsiṣaṃ na tāvadahamasmātsadevakāllokādi“ti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2848: atha yadarhan bhikṣurāyuḥsaṃskārān sthāpayati tajjīvitendriyaṃ kasya vipākaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2852_0: arhan bhikṣuḥ ṛddhimāṃścetovaśitvaṃ prāptaḥ saṃghāya va pudgalāya vā pātraḥ vā cīvaraṃ
SA01vakobhau:2852_1: vā anyatamānyatamaṃ vā śrāmaṇakaṃ jīvitapariṣkāraṃ vā dattvā tat praṇidhāya prantakoṭikam
SA01vakobhau:2854: sa tasmāt vyutthāya cittamutpādayati vācaṃ ca bhāṣate yanme bhogavipākaṃ tadāyurvipākaṃ bhavatviti /
SA01vakobhau:2866: tathaīva dānaṃ dattvā praṇidhāya prantakoṭikaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate/
SA01vakobhau:2868: yanme āyurvipākaṃ tat bhogavipākaṃ bhavatviti tasya tathā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:2872: tasminneva āśraye rūpāvacarāṇi mahābhūtāni dhyānabalena saṃmudhakarotyāyuṣo 'nukūlāni vaihodhikāni ca /
SA01vakobhau:2878: samādhiprabhāva eva sa teṣāṃ tadṛśo yena pūrvakarmajaṃ ca sthitikālāvedhamindriyamahābhūtānāṃ vyāvrttayantyapūrvaṃ ca samādhijamāvedhamākṣipanti /
SA01vakobhau:2892: alpaṃ ca parahitaṃ jīvite paśyanti rogābhibhūtaṃ cātmabhāvam /
SA01vakobhau:2899: athaitadāyuḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ sthāpanārthamutsarjanaṃ vā kva kasya vā veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:2919: yaistu kālāntaraṃ jīvati te jīvitasaṃskārā iti /
SA01vakobhau:2937: yaccāpi tat pratijñātam “evaṃbhāvitairahaṃ caturbhirṛddhi pādairākāṅkṣankalpamapi tiṣṭheyaṃ kalpāvaśeṣamapī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:2970: jīvitendriyaṃ cakṣurādīni dvādaśa hitvā śeṣāṇyavipāka iti siddham /
SA01vakobhau:2972: yadi dauarmanasyendriyaṃ na vipāka iti sūtraṃ kathaṃ nīyate “trīṇi kāryāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:2974: saumanasyavedanīyaṃ karma daurmanasyavedanīyaṃ karma upekṣā vedanīyaṃ karme“ti saṃprayogavedanīyatāmadhikṛtyoktam /
SA01vakobhau:2980: saumanasyopekṣāvedanīye api tarhi karmaṇī evaṃ bhaviṣyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2984: saṃprayoge 'pi na doṣaḥ vipāke 'pi na doṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2988: kā punratra yuktirdaurmanasyaṃ na vipāka iti /
SA01vakobhau:2990: daurmanasyaṃ hi parikalpaviśeṣairutpādyate ca vyupaśāmyate ca /
SA01vakobhau:2996: yadi tarhi daumanasyaṃ vipākaḥ syādānantaryakāriṇāṃ tannimittaṃ daurmanasyotpādāttatkarma vipakvaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:3000: yadi saumanasyaṃ vipākaḥ syāt puṇyakāriṇāṃ tannimittaṃ saumanasyotpādāttatkarma vipakvaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:3009: sati tu saṃbhave saumanasyasyāsti vipākāvakāśī na dauarmanasyasya /
SA01vakobhau:3011: sarvathā 'samudācārāditi nāstyevaṃ daurmanasyaṃ vipāka iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3013: tatra jīvitendriyāṣṭamāni sugatau kuśalasya vipāko durgatāvakuśalasya /
SA01vakobhau:3051: tatra manaḥsukhasaumanasyopekṣā akuāśalāḥ kuśalāḥ sāsravāśca savipākāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3101: tatra maithunadharmavairāgyādaśobhākaratvācca rūpadhātau strīpuruṣendriye na staḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3113: anyaḥ puruṣabhāvo yaḥ kāmachātau puruṣāṇāṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:3119: ārūpyāptaṃ sukhe cāpohya rūpi ca // VAkK_2.12 //
SA01vakobhau:3203: sūtre 'pyuktaṃ “ye 'pi te bhikṣavaḥ śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇyārupyā” iti /
SA01vakobhau:3205: tatra rūpadhātau ṣaḍḍindriyāṇi vipākaḥ parathamato labhyante /
SA01vakobhau:3214: tasmin ekameva jīvitendriyaṃ vipākaḥ prathamato labhyate nānyat /
SA01vakobhau:3228: sarve hyupapādukāḥ samagrendriyā upapadyante mriyante ca /
SA01vakobhau:3246: eṣa ca nyāyaḥ kliṣṭāvyākṛtacittasya maraṇe veditavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3248: yadā tu kuśale cetasi sthito mriyate tadā
SA01vakobhau:3252: kuśale cetasi mriyamāṇaḥ sarvatra yathoktamindriyāṇi nirodhayati /
SA01vakobhau:3258: evamārūpyeṣvaṣṭau nirodhayati rūpeṣu trayodaśāeti vistareṇa gaṇanīyam /
SA01vakobhau:3287: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ tāvadyadyānupūrvikaḥ prāpnoti sa ca laukikena mārgeṇa tasya saptabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3295: atha bhūyovītarāgaḥ prāpnoti tasya navabhiryeneva srota āpattiphalasya /
SA01vakobhau:3297: anāgāmiphalaṃ yadyānupūrvikaḥ prāpnoti sa ca laukikena mārgeṇa tasya saptabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3313: yadāpyayamānupūrviko navame vimūktimārge tīkṣṇenriyatvā ddhyānaṃ praviśāti laukikena mārgeṇa tadāpyaṣṭābhirindriyairanāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:3317: bhavatyānantaryamārge tūpekṣendriyameva nityamubhābhyāṃ ca tasya prāptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3319: atha lokottareṇa praviśāti tasya navabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3331: asti saṃbhavo yadekaḥ pudgalaḥ parihāya parihāya sukhasaumanasyīpekṣābhirarhattvaṃ prāpnuyādata ekādaśabhirityuktam /
SA01vakobhau:3337: nahyasau parihīṇaḥ kadācitsukhendriyeṇa prāpnnoti na ca vītarāgapūrvī parihīyate /
SA01vakobhau:3342: katamenendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ katibhiḥ avaśyaṃ samanvāgato bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:3348: ya eṣāmupekṣādīnāmanyatamena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ tribhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgato bhavatyebhireva /
SA01vakobhau:3386: yaḥ sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ caturbhirindriyaistaiśca tribhirupekṣādibhiḥ sukhendriyeṇa ca /
SA01vakobhau:3388: yaḥ kāyendriyeṇa so 'pi caturbhistaiśca tribhiḥ kāyendriyeṇa ca /
SA01vakobhau:3412: yaḥ strīndriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyamaṣṭabhiḥ taiśca saptabhiḥ strīndriyeṇaca /
SA01vakobhau:3438: atha yaḥ srvālpaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kiyadbhirindriyaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3449: vedanā hi vit vedayata iti kṛtvā /
SA01vakobhau:3471: atha yaḥ sarvabahubhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kiyadbhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3496: kimete saṃskṛtā dharmā yathā bhinnalakṣaṇā evaṃ bhinnotpādā utāho niyatasahotpādā api kecitsanti /
SA01vakobhau:3502: rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikāścttaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārā asaṃskṛtaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:3509: sarvasūkṣmo hi rūpasaṃghātaḥ paramāṇur ity ucyāte /
SA01vakobhau:3512: sa kāma ghātāvaśabdako 'nindriyaścāṣṭadravyaka utpadyate nānyatamena hīnaḥ/
SA01vakobhau:3514: aṣṭo dravyāṇicatvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri copādāyarūpāṇi rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni /
SA01vakobhau:3516: sendriyastu paramāṇuraśabdako navadravyaka utpadyate daśadravyako vā /
SA01vakobhau:3528: aparamindriyaṃ yatra paramāṇau tatra daśa dravyāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:3532: saśabdā punarete paramāṇava utpadyamānā yathākramaṃ navadaśaikādaśa dravyakā utpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:3536: kathamihāvinirbhāge bhūtānāṃ kaścideva saṃghātaḥ kaṭhina utpadyate kaścideva drava uṣṇo vā samudīraṇo vā /
SA01vakobhau:3538: yadyatra paṭutamaṃ prabhāvata udbhūtaṃ tasya tatropalabdhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3546: pratyayalābhe ca sati kaṭhinādīnāṃ dravaṇā dibhāvāt apsu śaityātiśayādauṣṇyaṃ gamyata ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:3552: bījatas teṣu teṣāṃ bhāvo na svarūpata ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:3562: rūpadhātau gandharasayorabhāva uktastena tatratyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ ṣaṭsaptāṣṭadravyakā ityuktarūpatvāt na punarucyante /
SA01vakobhau:3564: kiṃ punaratra dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate āhosvidāyatanam /
SA01vakobhau:3567: yadi dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate atyalpamidamucyate aṣṭadravyako navadaśādravyaka iti /
SA01vakobhau:3579: caturdravyako hi vaktavyo yāvatā bhūtānyapi spraṣṭavyāyatanam /
SA01vakobhau:3581: kiñcidatra dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate yadāśrayabhūtaṃ kiñcidatrāyatanaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhyate yadāśritabhūtam /
SA01vakobhau:3583: evamapi bhūyāṃsi bhūtadravyāṇi bhavantyupādāyarūpāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ bhūtacatuṣkāśritatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:3603: yatkiṃ cidutpadyate rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikā viprayuktā vā sarvaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaiḥ sārdhamutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:3607: prāptyā saha satvākhyamevotpadyate nānyaditi vikalpārtho vāśabdaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3614: pañca prakārāścaittā mahābhūmikāḥ kuśalamahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ akuśalamahābhūmikāḥ parīttakleśamahābhūmikāśca /
SA01vakobhau:3618: yo hi yasya gativiśayaḥ sa tasya bhūmirityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:3620: tatra mahatī bhūmireśāmiti mahābhūmikāḥ ye sarvatra cetasi bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:3624: vedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśo matiḥ smṛtiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3627: ime kila daśa dharmāḥ sarvatra cittakṣaṇe samagrā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:3650: sa eva duḥparicchedaḥ pravāheṣvapi tāvat kiṃ punaḥ kṣaṇeṣu /
SA01vakobhau:3652: rūpiṇīnāmapi tāvadoṣadhīnāṃ bahurasānāṃ kāsaṃcidindriyagrāhyā rasaviśeṣā duravadhārā bhavanti kiṃ punarye dharmā arūpiṇo buddhigrāhyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3654: kuśalā mahābhūmireṣāṃ ta ime kuśala mahābhūmikā ye sarvadā kuśale cetasibhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:3659: mūladvayamahiṃsā ca vīryaṃ ca kuśale sadā // VAkK_2.25 //
SA01vakobhau:3661: ime daśa dharmā kuśale cetasi nityaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:3679: sā tu yathā kāyikī vedanā tathā veditavyā /
SA01vakobhau:3694: tadyathā prītiḥ prītisthānīyāśca dharmāḥ prītisaṃbodhyaṅgamuktaṃ bhagavatā /
SA01vakobhau:3700: naca saṃkalpavyāyāmau prajñāsvabhāvau tasyāstvanuguṇāviti tāsyātvanuguṇāviti tācchaydyaṃ labhete /
SA01vakobhau:3727: prajñā ca mahābhūmiketi nāsau kuśalamahābhūmika evocyate /
SA01vakobhau:3736: kleśā mahābhūmireṣāṃ ta ime kleśamahābhūmikā ye dharmāḥ sadaiva kliṣṭe cetasi bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:3738: ke punaste sadaiva kliṣṭe cetasi bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:3767: “āśraddhyaṃ kauśīdyaṃ muṣitasmṛtitā cetaso vikṣepaḥ avidyā asaṃprajanyamayoniśomanaskāro mithyādhimokṣa auddhatyaṃ pramādaśce” ti /
SA01vakobhau:3779: ata evocyate “ye mahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikā api ta” iti /
SA01vakobhau:3782: prathamā koṭirvedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśaśca /
SA01vakobhau:3794: styānaṃ punariṣyate sarvakleśasaṃprayogīti kleśamahābhūmikeṣu tasyāpāṭhe kasyāparādhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3796: evaṃ tvāhuḥ paṭhitavyaṃ bhavetsamādhyanuguṇatvāttu na paṭhitam /
SA01vakobhau:3800: kaḥ punaḥ styānacarito yo nauddhatyacaritaḥ ko vā auddhatyacarito yo na styānacaritaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3808: ete hi sadā kleṣṭa eva cetasi bhavanti nānyatra //
SA01vakobhau:3812: akuśale tu cetasyāhrīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ ca nityaṃ bhavata ityetau dvau dharmāvakuśalamahābhūmikāvucyete /
SA01vakobhau:3819: parīttakleśā bhūmireṣāṃ ta ime parīttakleśabhūmikā avidyāmātreṇa bhāvanāheyena manobhūmikenaiva ca saṃprayogāt /
SA01vakobhau:3827: tatra vaktavyaṃ kasmiṃścitte kati caittā avaśyaṃ bhavantīti /
SA01vakobhau:3844: daśa mahābhūmikā daśa kuśalamahābhūmikā vitarko vicāraśca /
SA01vakobhau:3850: yatra tvasti tatra tadevādhikaṃ kṛtvā trayoviṃśatiścaittā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:3855: iha tu punaḥ kaukṛtyālambano dharmaḥ kaukṛtyamucyate cetaso vipratisāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3857: tadyathā śūnyatālalmvanaṃ vimokṣamukhṃ śūnyatetyucyate aśubhālambanaścālobho 'śubha iti /
SA01vakobhau:3859: loke 'pi ca dṛṣṭaḥ sthānena sthānināmatideśaḥ sarvo grāma āgataḥ sarvo deśa āgata iti /
SA01vakobhau:3870: na mayā sādhu kṛtaṃ yanna kṛtamiti /
SA01vakobhau:3883: daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleāśamahābhūmikā dvāvakuśalamahābhūmikau vitarkovicāraśca /
SA01vakobhau:3885: āveṇikaṃ nāma cittaṃ yatrāvidyaiva kevalā nānyaḥ kleśo 'sti rāgādiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3894: tatrākuśalaṃ dṛṣṭiyuktaṃ yatra mithyādṛṣṭirvā dṛṣṭiparāmarśo vā śīlavrataparāmarśo vā /
SA01vakobhau:3898: yatra punaścaturbhiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃprayuktamakuśalaṃ cittaṃ rāgeṇa va pratighena vā mānena vā vicikitsayā vā tatraikaviṃśatirbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:3902: krodhādibhirapyupakleśairyathoktaiḥ saṃprayukte citte ete ca viṃśatiḥ sa copakleśa ityekaviṃśatirbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:3908: samāsata āveṇike cetasyakuśale dṛṣṭiyukte ca viṃśatiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3918: daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ vitarkavicārau ca /
SA01vakobhau:3933: middhaṃ sarvāvirodhitvādyatra syādadhikam hi tat // VAkK_2.30 //
SA01vakobhau:3941: ya eva kāmadhātau caittānāṃ niyama uktaḥ
SA01vakobhau:3945: ato yathoktāt kaukṛtyaṃ middhaṃ ca sarvathā nāsti prathame dhyāne yat kiñcidakuśalam /
SA01vakobhau:3950: ya eva prathame dhyāne na santi ta eva
SA01vakobhau:3959: dhyānāntarāt pareṇa dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣvārūpyeṣu ca yathāpratiṣiddhaṃ nāsti vicāraśca /
SA01vakobhau:3966: sa hi svasyāṃ parṣadyaśvajitā bhikṣuṇā praśnaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ “kutremāni brahman catavāri mahābhūtānyapariśeṣaṃ nirudhyante” iti /
SA01vakobhau:3970: “ahamasmin brahmā īśvaraḥ kartā nirmātā sraṣṭā sṛjaḥ pitṛbhūto bhūtānāmi“ti /
SA01vakobhau:3974: idānīṃ keṣāñcideva caittānāṃ tantravihitaṃ nānākāraṇaṃ vakṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:3980: guṇeṣu guṇavatsu cāgauravatā apratīśatā abhayamavaśavartitā āhrīkyaṃ gauravapratidvandvo dharmaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:3989: kathamidaṃ vijñātavyam abhayasya darśanamabhayadarśitā āhosvit bhayasyādarśanam /
SA01vakobhau:3993: abhayasya darśanaṃ cet prajñā vijñāsyate bhayasyādarśanaṃ cedavidyā vijñāsyate /
SA01vakobhau:4004: evamapi dve apekṣe yugapat kathaṃ setsyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4006: na khalūcyate yugapadātmānaṃ paraṃ cāpekṣata ityapi tvastyasau kadācidalajjā yā ātmānamapekṣamāṇasyāpi pravartate sā āhrīkyam /
SA01vakobhau:4012: pratahamena tāvat kalpena sagauravatā sapratīśatā na bhayavaśavrtitā hrīḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4038: pudgaleṣu tu prema na gauravaṃ putradārasārdhaṃ vihāryantevāsiṣu /
SA01vakobhau:4061: nanu ca śraddhā hrīśca kuśalamahābhūmikatvāttatrāpi vidyete /
SA01vakobhau:4063: dvividhā hi śraddhā dharmeṣu pudgaleṣu ca /
SA01vakobhau:4066: tatra ye pudgalālambane śraddhāhriyau te tatra na staḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4083_1: evaṃvitarkavicārayogāccittaṃ nātisūkṣmaṃ bhavati nātyodārika mityubhayorapi tatrāsti vyāpāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4085: evaṃ tarhi nimiṭtabhūtau vitarkavicārāvaudārika sūkṣmatayoḥ prāpnuto yathā payaścā tapaścasarpiṣaḥ śyānatva vilīnatvayornatu punastatsvabhāvau /
SA01vakobhau:4097: tatra ye audārikāste vitarkāḥ ye sūkṣmāste vicārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4099: yadi caikatra citte 'nyo dharma audāriko 'nyaḥ sūkṣmaḥ ko 'tra virodha iti /
SA01vakobhau:4112: naiva hi vitarkavicārāvekatra citte bhavata ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:4121: madaḥ svadharme raktasya paryādānaṃ tu cetasaḥ // VAkK_2.33 //
SA01vakobhau:4123: yena kenacit parato viśeṣaparikalpena cetasa unnatiḥ mānaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4131: uktāḥ saha cittena caittāḥ prakāraśa steṣāṃ punarimāḥ saṃjñāḥ paribhāṣyante /
SA01vakobhau:4155: ta eva hi cittacaittāḥ sāśrayā ucyante indriyāśritatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:4170: yathaiva hyekaṃ cittamevaṃ caittā apyekaikā iti /
SA01vakobhau:4175: āsaṃjñikaṃ samāpattī jīvitaṃ lakṣaṇāni ca // VAkK_2.35 //
SA01vakobhau:4179: ime saṃskārā na cittena asaṃprayuktā naca rūpasvabhāvā iti cittaviprayuktāucyante /
SA01vakobhau:4185: dvividhā hi prāptiraprāptavihīnasya ca lābhaḥ pratilabdhena ca samanvāgamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4204: ata eva hi cottamabhidharme “anāsravairdharmaḥ kaḥ samanvāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4210: pratisaṃkhyānirodhena sakalabandhanādikṣaṇasthavarjyāḥ sarva āryāḥ pṛthagjanāśca kecitsamanvāgatāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4216: yasya ca nāsti prāptistastasyāprāptirapi nāstīti siddhāntaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4223: sūtre hyustaṃ “sa eṣāṃ daśānāmaśaikṣāṇāṃ dharmaṇāmutpādāt pratilambhātsamanvāgamādaryo bhavati pañcāṅgaviprahīṇa” iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4225: tena tarhi asattvākhyairapi samanvāgamaḥ prāpnoti parasattvaiśca /
SA01vakobhau:4229: “rājā bhikṣavaścakravarti saptabhī ratnaiḥ samanvāgata” iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4232: tasya teṣu ratneṣu vaśitvaṃ kāmacāra iti /
SA01vakobhau:4237: ayam ayogaḥ yad asyā naiva svabhāvaḥ prajñāyate rūpaśabdādivad rāgadveṣādivad vā na cāpi kṛtyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrādivat /
SA01vakobhau:4245: ye ca dharmā aprāptā ye ca tyaktā bhūmisaṃcāravaiarāgyatasteṣāṃ kathamutpattiḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:4251: sakalabandhanānāṃ khalvapi mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśotpattibhedo na syāt prāptyabhedāt /
SA01vakobhau:4253: yato vā sa bhedastata evāstu tadutpattiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4262: asatyāṃ hi prāptau laukikamānasānāmāryapṛthagjanānāmāryā ime pṛthagjanā ima iti na syād vyavasthānam /
SA01vakobhau:4266: etaccaiva kathaṃ bhaviṣyatyeṣāṃ prahīṇaḥ kleśa eṣāmaprahīṇa iti /
SA01vakobhau:4271: āśrayo hi sa āryāṇāṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgasāmarthyāttathā parāvṛtto bhavati yathā na punastatpraheyāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prarohasamartho bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:4279: yaścāprahīṇastena samanvāgato yaḥ prahīṇastenā samanvāgata iti prajñapyate /
SA01vakobhau:4281: kuśalā api dharmā dviprakārā ayatnabhāvino yatnabhāvinaśca ye ta ucyante utpattipratilambhikāḥ prāyogikāśceti /
SA01vakobhau:4283: tatrāyatnabhāvibhirāśrayasya tadvījabhāvānupaghātāt samanvāgata upaghātādasamanvāgata ucyate samucchinnakuāśalamūlaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4287: na tu khalu kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vījabhāvasyātyantaṃ santatau samudghātaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4291: tasmādvījamevātrānapoddhṛtamanupahatam paripṛṣṭaṃ ca vāśiatvakāle samanvāgamākhyāṃ tabhate nānyad dravyam /
SA01vakobhau:4295: yannāmarūpaṃ phalotpattau samartha sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa vā /
SA01vakobhau:4309: yāvaddhi tasyādhivāsako 'vinodako bhavati tāvat bhavyastāni bhāvayitum /
SA01vakobhau:4311: evamayaṃ samanvāgamaḥ sarvāthā prajñaptidharmo na tu dravyadharmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4342: tatrāpraptiṃsaṃṅkhyānirodhasya traidhātukī pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya rūpārūpyāvacarī cānāsravā ca /
SA01vakobhau:4353: naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣā dharmā ucyante sāsravā dharmā asaṃskāṛtaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:4361: tasyaiva śaikṣeṇa mārgeṇa praptasya śaikṣī aśaikṣeṇāśaikṣī /
SA01vakobhau:4371: teṣāmapratisaṃkhyānirodhasya bhāvanāheyā prāptiḥ anāryaprāptasya ca pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya /
SA01vakobhau:4390: dve abhijñe avyākṛte nirmāṇacittaṃ ca varjayitvā /
SA01vakobhau:4392: teṣāṃ hi balavattvāt prayogaviśeṣaniṣpatteḥ pūrva paścāt sahajā prāptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4403: yathā 'vyākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāmayaṃ praptibhedaḥ kimevaṃ kuśalākuśalānāmapikaścit prāptibhedo 'sti /
SA01vakobhau:4453: anyathā hi cuddho 'pi śrāvakapratyekabuddhagotrakai rasamanvāgamādanāryaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:4486: yathā tāvadāryamārgasyālābhaḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ tasya lābhāttadvihīyate bhūmisaṃcārācca /
SA01vakobhau:4505: tatra prāptyutpādāttena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bhavati prāptiprāptyā ca /
SA01vakobhau:4507: prāptiprāptyutpādāt punaḥ prāptyaiva samanvāgato bhavatyato nānavsthā /
SA01vakobhau:4509: evaṃ ca kṛtva ātmanā tṛtīyasya dharmasya kuśalasya kliṣṭasya kliṣṭasya vā dvitīye kṣaṇe tisraḥ prāptayo jāyante /
SA01vakobhau:4511: tāsāṃ ca punastisro 'nuprāptaya iti ṣaḍ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:4513: tṛtīye kṣaṇe prathamadvitīyakṣaṇotpannānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ nava prāptayaḥ sārdhamanuprāptibhirityaṣṭādāśa bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:4515_2: ekasya prāṇinaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe upajāyante ityanantadravyāḥ pratisantānamātmabhāvakṣaṇāḥ
SA01vakobhau:4521: itarathā hyākāśe 'pyava kāśo na syāt dvitīyasya prāṇinaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:4528: sattvānāṃ sākṛśyaṃ nikāyasa bhāga ityasyāḥ śāstre saṃjñā /
SA01vakobhau:4535: bhinnā punasteṣāmeva sattvānāṃ dhātubhūmigatiyonijātistrīpuruṣopāsakabhikṣuśaikṣā śaikṣyādibhedena pratiniyatā dharmasabhāgatā /
SA01vakobhau:4537: punaḥ skndhāyatanadhātutaḥ yadi satvasabhāgatā dravyamaviśiṣtaṃ na syāt anyonyaviśeṣabhinneṣu sattveṣu sattvasttva ityabhedena buddhirna syāt prajñaptiśca /
SA01vakobhau:4541: syāccyavetopapadyeta na ca sattvasabhāgatāṃ vijahyānna ca pratilabheteti /
SA01vakobhau:4553: yadi pṛthagjanasabhāgatā nāma dravyamasti kiṃ punaḥ pṛthagjanatvena /
SA01vakobhau:4557: naiva ca lokaḥ sabhāgatāṃ paśyatyarūpiṇītvāt nacaināṃ prajñayā paricchinatti pratipadyate ca satvānāṃ jātyabhedamiti satyā api tasyāḥ kathaṃ tatra vyāpāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4561: śāliyavamudgamāsāmrapanasalohakāñcanādīnāṃ svajātisādṛśyāt tāsāṃ ca sabhāgatānāmanyonyabhinnānāṃ kathamabhedena sabhāgatā prajñaptiḥ kriyate /
SA01vakobhau:4571: sa eko 'pyanekasmin varttate yadi dyotitā yadi na dyotitā /
SA01vakobhau:4573: astyeṣā tu sabhāgatā sūtre vacanāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4575: ustaṃ hi bhagavatā “sa ceditthantvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāmi“ti /
SA01vakobhau:4580: ta eva hi tathābhūtāḥ saṃskārā yeṣu manuṣyādiprajñaptiḥ śālyādiṣu sabhāgatāvat /
SA01vakobhau:4590: asaṃjñisattveṣu devepūpapannānāṃ yaścittacaittānāṃ nirodhastadāsaṃjñikaṃnāma dravyaṃ yena cittacaittā anāgate 'dhvani kālāntaraṃ saṃnirudhyante notpattuṃ labhante /
SA01vakobhau:4604: bṛhatphalā nāma devā yeṣāṃ kecidasaṃjñisattvāḥ pradeśe bhavanti dhyānāntarikāvat /
SA01vakobhau:4609: “prakṛṣṭamapi kālaṃ sthitvā saha saṃjñotpādātteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tatsthānāt cyutirbhavatī“ti sūtre pāthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4611: te ca tato dīrghasvapnavyutthitā iva cyutvā kāmadhātāvupapadyante nānyatra /
SA01vakobhau:4613: pūrvasamāpattisaṃskāraparikṣayāt apūrvānupacayācca kṣiptā iva kṣīṇavegā iṣavaḥ pṛthivīṃ patanti /
SA01vakobhau:4615: yena ca tatropapattavyaṃ tasyāvaśyaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ karmāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:4619: atha samāpattī iti yaduktaṃ katame te samāpattī /
SA01vakobhau:4661: yo 'pyenāmutpādya parihīyate so 'pi kilāvaśyaṃ punarutpādyāsaṃjñisattveṣūpapadyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:4687: labdhayā tu dvitaīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣvatītayā 'pi samanvāgato bhavati yāvanna tyajati /
SA01vakobhau:4725: aniyatā ca vipākaṃ prati kadācinna vipacyate /
SA01vakobhau:4727: yadīha pariniarvāyāt tasyā hi bhavāgre catuḥskandhako vipākaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4733: nahi pṛthagjanā nirodhasamāpattimutpādayituṃ śaknuvantyucchedabhīrutvādāryamārgabalena cotpādanāddṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇasya tadadhimuktitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4751: kṣayajñānasamanaṃ kālaṃ buddhā bhagavanta enāṃ labhante nāsti kiñcidbuddhānāṃ prāyogikaṃ nāma /
SA01vakobhau:4757: kathaṃ khalvi dānīmanutpāditāyāṃ nirodhasamāpattau kṣayajñānakāle bhagavānubhayotobhāgavimuktaḥ sidhyati /
SA01vakobhau:4759: sidhyatyutpāditāyāmiva tasyāṃ vaśitvāt prāgeva tāṃ bodhisattvaḥ śaikṣyāvasthāyāmutpādayatīti pāścattyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4763: evaṃ ca sthaviropaguptasyāpīdaṃ netrīpadaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:4769: nahi pūrvaṃ tasyā utapādanaṃ yujyata iti kāśmīrakāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4776: satyābhisamaye ṣoḍaśabhirbhavāgravairāgye cāṣṭādaśabhirnavaprakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya navānantaryavimuktimārgotpādanāt /
SA01vakobhau:4790: kathaṃ tarhi “na tāvat bhetsyāmi paryaṅkamaprāpte āsravakṣaya” iti /
SA01vakobhau:4800: ubhe api tvete asaṃjñinirodhasamāpattī kāmadhātau rūpadhātau cotpatsyete /
SA01vakobhau:4802: ye tvasaṃjñisamāpattiṃ rūpadhātau necchanti teṣāmayaṃ grantho virudhyate /
SA01vakobhau:4806_0: syādrūpāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃjñināṃ devānāṃ visabhāge citte sthitānāmasaṃjñisamāpattiṃ
SA01vakobhau:4806_1: nirodhasamāparttiṃ ca samāpannānāmasaṃjñināṃ ca devānāmāsaṃjñike pratilabdhe yo bhava” iti /
SA01vakobhau:4823_0: so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāvedayita nirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate cāsti caitat sthānamiti
SA01vakobhau:4823_1: yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti sa na haiva dṛṣṭa eva dharme pratipattye vājñāmārāgayati nāpi
SA01vakobhau:4823_2: maraṇakālasamaye bhedācca kāyasyātikramya devān kavaḍīkārāhāra bhakṣānanyatarasmin
SA01vakobhau:4825: sa tatropapanno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭahate cāsti caitat sthānamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:4827: atra hi divyo manomayaḥ kāyo rūpāvacara ukto bhagavatā /
SA01vakobhau:4869: kathamidānīṃ bahukālaṃ niruddhāccittāt punarapi cittaṃ jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:4875: kathaṃ tāvad rūpopapannānāṃ ciraniruddhe 'pi rūpe punarapi rūpaṃ jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:4877: cittād eva hi taj jāyate na rūpāt /
SA01vakobhau:4879: evaṃ cittam apy asmād eva sendriyāt kāyāj jāyate na cittāt /
SA01vakobhau:4881: anyonyabījakaṃ hy etadubhayaṃ yaduta cittaṃ ca sendriyaśca kāya iti pūrvācāryāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4883: bhadantavasumitrastvāha paripṛcchāyāṃ “yasyācittikā nirodhasamāpattistasyaiṣa doṣo mama tu sacittikā samāpattiri“ti /
SA01vakobhau:4890: sparśapratyayā ca vedanā saṃjñā cetan''etyuktaṃ bhagavatā /
SA01vakobhau:4897: satyāmapi tu vedanāyāmarhato na tṛṣṇotpattirevaṃ satyapi sparśe vedannādayo na syuriti /
SA01vakobhau:4901: avidyāsaṃsparśajaṃ hi veditaṃ pratītyotpannā tṛṣṇetyuktaṃ natu vedanotpattau sparśo viśeṣita ityasamānametat /
SA01vakobhau:4909: samāpatticittena ca tāṃ samāpadyante samāgacchantīti samāpattiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4911: kiṃ punarete samāpattī dravyataḥ sta utāho prajñaptitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4918: samāpatticittameva hi taccittāntaraviruddhamutpadyate yena kālāntaraṃ cittasyā pravṛttimātraṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:4922: yā 'sau samāpattiriti prajñapyate taccāpravṛttimātraṃ na pūrvamāsīnna paścāt bhavati vyutthitasyeti saṃskṛtā 'sau samāpattiḥ prajñapyate /
SA01vakobhau:4928: cittamevāsau tatra cittapravṛttiviruddhaṃ labhate taccāpravṛttimātramāsaṃjñikaṃ prajñapyata iti tadetanna varṇayanti /
SA01vakobhau:4939: etaccaiva na jñāyate āyurnāma ka eṣa dharma iti /
SA01vakobhau:4948: tad ya ūṣmaṇo vijñānasya cādhārabhūto dharmaḥ sthitihetustadāyuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4952: evaṃ tarhi parasparāpekṣyavṛttitvādeṣāṃ kaḥ pūrvaṃ nivartiṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:4962: ūṣmaṇastarhi karmādhārbhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati ūṣmā ca vijñānasya /
SA01vakobhau:4968: na vai labhyate kāmacāro yat kvacidevoṣmā vijñānasyādhāro bhaviṣyati kvacideva karmeti /
SA01vakobhau:4982: yāvaddhi karmaṇā nikāyasabhāgasyāvedhaḥ kṛto bhavatyetāvantaṃ kālamavasthātavyamiti tāvat so 'vatiṣṭhate tadāyurityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:4986: yastu manyate saṃskāro nāma kaścin guṇaviśeṣa iṣau jāyate yadvaśādgamanamāpatanād bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:4988: tasya tadekatvāt pratipannābhāvācca deśāntaraiḥ śīghra taratamaprāptikālabhedā nupapattiḥ patanānupapattiśca /
SA01vakobhau:5015: kṣīṇe tvāyuṣi puṇyakṣayasya maraṇe nāsti sāmarthyam /
SA01vakobhau:5025: kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃjñisamāparttiṃ nirodhasamāparttiṃ ca samāpannānāṃ santatyupanibaddhaṃ varttata iti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:5027: samāpannānāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca sattvānāṃ sakrdutpannaṃ tiṣṭhatīti vaktavyam” /
SA01vakobhau:5033: yasya tvāśrayopaghāta eva nāsti tadyatho tpannāvasthānāt dvitīyam /
SA01vakobhau:5045: ātmasaṃcetanaiva kramate kāmadhātau krīḍāpramoṣkāṇāṃ devānāṃ manaḥpradūṣakāṇāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:5047: teṣāṃ hi praharṣamanaḥopradoṣābhyāṃ tasmāt sthānāccyutirbhavati nānyathā/
SA01vakobhau:5058: atha kasmātsūtra uktaṃ katame te bhadanta sattvā yeṣāṃ nātmasaṃcetanā kramate na parasaṃacetanā /
SA01vakobhau:5062: anyeṣu kila dhyānarūpyedhvātmasaṃcetanāsvabhūmika āryamārgaḥ parasaṃcetanā uttarabhūmisāmantakastatra cobhayaṃ nāstīti /
SA01vakobhau:5064: nanu caivaṃ tatrāpi parabhūmika āryamārgaḥ parasaṃcetanā prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:5080: ayamatra tadyathāśabdo dṛṣṭāntavācaka iti yukta etasmāccheṣasaṃ pratyayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5082: eṣa hi dṛṣṭāntadharmo yadekamapi tajjātīyakaṃ dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:5086: yadyayaṃ tadyathāśabdo dṛṣṭāntavācakaḥ syādiha na prāpnuyāt /
SA01vakobhau:5088: santi sattvā nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathā manuṣyastadekatyāścadevā iti /
SA01vakobhau:5098: yatraitāni bhavanti sa dharmaḥ saṃskṛto lakṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:5102: tatra jātistaṃ dharmaṃ janayati sthitiḥ sthapayati jarā jarayati anityatā vināśayati /
SA01vakobhau:5113: jarāyā eṣa paryāyastadyathā jāterutpāda ityanityatāyāśca vyaya iti /
SA01vakobhau:5115: ye hi dharmāḥ saṃskārāṇāmadhvasaṃcārāya pravṛttāsta eva sūtre lakṣaṇānyuktānyudvejanārtham /
SA01vakobhau:5121: tadyathā kila gahanapraviṣṭasya puruṣasya trayaḥ śatravaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5123: tata eka enaṃ gahanādākarṣet dvau punarjīvitādvacyaparopayetāṃ tadvaditi /
SA01vakobhau:5131: anye punaḥ kalpayanti sthitiṃ jarāṃ cābhisamasya sthityanyathātvamityekaṃ lakṣaṇamuktaṃ sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:5135: eṣā hyeṣu saṅgāspadamataḥ śriyamivaināṃ kālakarṇīsahitāṃ darśayāmāsa tasyāmanāsaṅgārthamiti /
SA01vakobhau:5161: jātijātyādīnāṃ caikatra dharme kathaṃ kṛtvā ātmanā navamo hi dharma utpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:5169: tadyathā kila kācit kukkuṭī bahūnya patyāni prajāyate kācidalpāni /
SA01vakobhau:5171: tadvat sthitirapyātmānaṃ varjayitvā 'nyānaṣṭau dharmān sthāpayati sthitisthitistu tāmeva sthitim /
SA01vakobhau:5179: nahyete jātyādayo dharmā dravyataḥ saṃvidyante yathā 'bhivyajyante /
SA01vakobhau:5184: nahyeṣāṃ dravyato 'stitve kiñcidapi pramāṇamasti pratyakṣamanumānamāptāgamo vā yathā rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:5186: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ “saṃskṛtasyotpādo 'pi prajñāyate vyayo 'pi sthityanyathātvamapī” ti /
SA01vakobhau:5193: avidyāndhā hi bālāḥ saṃskārapravāhamātmāta ātmīyataścādhimuktā abhiṣvajante /
SA01vakobhau:5195: tasya mithyādhimokṣasya vyāvarttanārthaṃ bhagavāṃstasya saṃskārapravāhasyasaṃskṛtatvaṃ pratītyasamutpannatāṃ dyotayitukāma idamāha “triṇīmāni saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni” /
SA01vakobhau:5204: punaḥ saṃskṛtagrahaṇaṃ saṃskṛtatve lakṣaṇānīti yathā vijñāye ta /
SA01vakobhau:5206: maivaṃ vijñāyi saṃskṛtasya vastuno 'stitve lakṣaṇāni jalavalākāvat sādhvasādutve vā kanyālakṣaṇavaditi /
SA01vakobhau:5214: evaṃ ca kṛtvoktaṃ “viditā eva nandasya kulaputrasya vedanā utpadyante viditā ava tiṣṭhante viditā astaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchantī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:5224: “kṣaṇikasya hi dharmasya vinā sthityā vyayo bhavet /
SA01vakobhau:5225: na ca vyetyeva tenāsya vṛthā tatparikalpanā //“
SA01vakobhau:5235: yadapi ca jñānaprasthāna uktam “ekasmiṃścitte ka utpādaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5244: pratikṣaṇaṃ cāpi saṃskṛtasyaitāni lakṣaṇāni yujyante vinā 'pi dravyāntarakalpanayā /
SA01vakobhau:5262: nātivahuviśeṣabhinnāstu saṃskārāḥ satyapyanyathātve sadṛśā eva dṛśyante /
SA01vakobhau:5264: antimasya tarhi śabdārciḥkṣaṇasya parinirvāṇakāle ca ṣaḍāyatanasyottarakṣaṇābhāvāt sthityahnyanyathātvaṃ nāstītyavyāpinī lakṣaṇavyavasthā prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:5270: ato yasyāsti sthitistasyāvaśyamanyathātvaṃ bhavatīti nāsti lakṣaṇavyavasthābhedaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5272_0: samāsatastvatra sūtre saṃskṛtasyedaṃ lakṣaṇamiti dyotitaṃ bhagavatā “saṃskṛtaṃ nāma
SA01vakobhau:5272_1: yadbhūtavā bhavati bhūtvā ca punarna bhavati yaścāsya sthitisaṃjñakaḥ prabandhaḥ
SA01vakobhau:5274: kim atra dravyāntarair jātyādibhiḥ katham idānīṃ sa eva dharmo lakṣyas tasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ yokṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:5276_0: kathaṃ tāvan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni mahāpuruṣān nānyāni sāsnā-lāṅgūla-kakuda-śapha-viṣāṇādīni
SA01vakobhau:5276_1: ca gotvalakṣaṇāni gor nānyāni kāṭhinyādīni ca pṛthivīdhātvādīnāṃ lakṣaṇāni tebhyo nānyāni /
SA01vakobhau:5278: yathā codhrvagamanena dūrāddhūmasya dhūmatvaṃ lakṣyate naca tattasmādanyat /
SA01vakobhau:5282: naca saṃskṛtānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ tāvat saṃskṛtatvaṃ lakṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:5284: gṛhṇatāpi svabhāvaṃ yāvat prāgabhāvo na jñāyate paścācca santateśca viśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5286: tasmānna tenaiva tallakṣitaṃ bhavati naca tebhyo dravyāntarāṇyeva jātyādīni vidyante /
SA01vakobhau:5292: eko dharmaḥ ekasminneva kāle jātaḥ sthito jīrṇo naṣṭaḥ syādeṣāṃ sahabhūtvāt /
SA01vakobhau:5295: anāgatā hi jātiḥ kāritraṃ hi karoti /
SA01vakobhau:5297: yasmānna jātaṃ janyate janite tu dharme varttamānāḥ kṣityādayaḥ kāritraṃ kurvantīti na yadā jāyate tadā tiṣṭati jīryati vinaśyati vā /
SA01vakobhau:5301: kimanāgataṃ dravyato 'sti nāstīti paścājjanayati vā naveti sidhyet /
SA01vakobhau:5303: satyapi tu tasmin jātiḥ kāritaraṃ kurvatī kathamanāgatā sidhyatītyanāgata lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:5305: uparatakāritrā cotpannā kathaṃ varttamānā sidhyatīti varttamānalakṣāṇaṃ vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:5307: sthityādayo 'pi ca yugapat kāritre varttamānā ekakṣaṇa eva dharmasya sthitajīrṇavinaṣṭatāṃ prasañjeyuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5309: yadaiva hyenaṃ sthitiḥ sthāpayati tadaiva jrā jarayati anityatā vināśayatīti /
SA01vakobhau:5311: kimayaṃ tatra kāle tiṣṭatvāhosvijjīryatu vinaśyatu vā yo 'pi hi brūyāt sthityādīnāmapi kāritraṃ krameṇeti tasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ bādhyate /
SA01vakobhau:5313: athāpyevaṃ brūyāt eṣa eva hi naḥ kṣaṇo yāvataitat sarvaṃ samāpyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:5315: evamapoi tābhyāṃ sahotpannā sthitistāvat sthāpayati na jrā jarayati anityatā vā vināśyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:5329: śakyaṃ tu khalu sthityā sthāpyamatyantamapi sthāpayitum /
SA01vakobhau:5336: yadi hi te balīyasyau syātāṃ pūrvameva syātām /
SA01vakobhau:5338: nivṛttakāritrāyāṃ khalvapi sthitau ta cāpi na tiṣṭataḥ sa cāpi dharma iti kathaṃ kutra vā kāritraṃ karttumutsahiṣyete kiṃ vā punastābhyāṃ karttavyam /
SA01vakobhau:5340: sthitiparigrahāddhi sa dharma utpannamātro na vyanaśyat /
SA01vakobhau:5342: sa tu tayā vyupekṣyamāṇo niyataṃ na sthāsyatyayamevāsya vināśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5346: jarā tu khalu sarvathātvena na tathā /
SA01vakobhau:5356: yo 'pyāha nikāyāntarīyo “vināśa kāraṇaṃ prāpyānityatā vināśāyatī“ti tasya harītakīṃ prāpya devatā virecayatītyāpannaṃ bhavati kiṃ punastāṃ kalpayitvā /
SA01vakobhau:5358_0: tat evāstu vināśakāraṇādvināśaḥ cittacaittānāṃ ca kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamāttadanityatāyā
SA01vakobhau:5360: tasmāt pravāhaṃ pratyetāni saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānyuktānītyevametatsūtraṃ sūnītaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:5362: apica yadyanāgatā jātirjanyasya janikā kimarthaṃ sarvamanāgataṃ yugapannotpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:5371: sati sāmargya bhāvādasati cābhāvānna jāteriti hetupratyayā eva jana kāḥsantaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5377: jātamityeva tu na syādasatyāṃ jātau ṣaṣṭhivacanaṃ ca rūpasyotpādaḥ iti yathā rūpasya rūpamiti /
SA01vakobhau:5381: tena tarhy anātmatvam apy eṣṭavyam anātmabuddhi-siddhyartham /
SA01vakobhau:5395: tasya viśeṣaṇārthaṃ rūpasyotpāda iti ṣaṣṭīṃ kurvanti yathā rupasaṃjñaka evotpādaḥ pratīyeta mā 'nyaḥ pratyāyīti /
SA01vakobhau:5401: yadi jātyā vinā jāyate kasmādasaṃskṛtamapyākāśādikaṃ na jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:5406: yathā ca dharmatayā na sarvaṃ jātimadiṣyate tathā na sarvaṃ jāyata ityeṣṭavyam /
SA01vakobhau:5408: yathā ca tulye jātimattve tadanye pratyayāstadanyasyotpādane na samarthā bhavantyevamevāsaṃskṛtasyotpādane sarve 'pyasamarthāḥ syuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5410: siddhā eva tu dravyabhāvena jātyādaya iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5412: nahi dūṣakāḥ santītyāgamā apāsyante nahi mṛgāḥ santīti yavā noṣyante nahi makṣikāḥ patantīti modakā na bhakṣyante /
SA01vakobhau:5427: vākyaṃ padaṃ yāvatā 'rthaparisamāptistadyathā “anityā vata saṃskārā” ityevamādi yena kriyāguṇakālasaṃbandhaviśeṣā gamyante /
SA01vakobhau:5433: na vai lipyavayavānāṃ pratyāyanārthamakṣārāṇi praṇītānyakṣarāṇāmeva tu pratyāyanārthaṃ lipyavayavāḥ praṇītāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5446: padakāyaḥ tadyathā “sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ sarvadharma anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇami” tyevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:5448: vyañjanakāyastadyathā ka kha ga gha ñetyevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:5450: nanu caite vāksvabhāvatvācchabdātmakā iti rūpasvabhāvā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:5455: ghoṣo hi vāk naca ghoṣāmātrenārthāḥ pratīyante /
SA01vakobhau:5459: vāṅnāmni pravrttate nāmārthaṃ dyotayati naiva ghoṣamātraṃ vāg yena tu ghoṣeṇārthaḥ pratīyate sa ghoṣo vāk /
SA01vakobhau:5468: yo 'pi hi manyate nāmārthaṃ dyotayatīti tenāpyetadavaśyamabhyupagantavyaṃ yadi pratīpadārthakaṃ bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:5470: taccaita cchabdamātrādeva pratītapadārthakāt sidhyatīti kimartharaṃ nāma kalpayitvā /
SA01vakobhau:5472: idaṃ cāpi na jñāyate kathaṃ vāṅnāmni pravarttata iti /
SA01vakobhau:5478: ghoṣasvavatvādvācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāmotpādayiṣyati yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviāśeṣa iṣyate nāmna utpādakaḥ sa evārthasya dyotako bhaviṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:5482: ghoṣasvabhāvatvādvācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāma prakaśayiṣyati yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviśeṣa iṣyate nāmnaḥ parakāśakaḥ sa evārthasya dyotako bhaviṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:5486: na caikasya bhāgaśa utpādo yukta iti kathamutpādayantī vāṅnāmotpādayet /
SA01vakobhau:5490: evaṃ tarhi paścima eva de nāmna utpādādyo 'pi tamevaikam śṛṇoti so 'pyarthaṃ pratipadyeta /
SA01vakobhau:5492: athāpyevaṃ kalpyeta vāgvyañjanaṃ janayati vyañjanaṃ tu nāmeti /
SA01vakobhau:5494: atrāpi sa eva prasaṅgo vyañjanāṃ sāmargyābhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:5496: eṣa eva ca prasaṅgo nāmnaḥ prakāśakatve vācaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5498: vyañjanāṃ pi vāgviśiṣṭaprajñā apyavahitacetaskā lakṣaṇataḥ paricchettum notsahanta iti vyañjayāpi vāk naivotpādikā na prakāśikā yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:5502: evaṃ satyatītānāgatasyārthasya varttamānaṃ nāma na syād /
SA01vakobhau:5504: apatyānāṃ pitṛbhiryatheṣṭaṃ nāmāni kalpyanta iti katamannāma tatsahajaṃ syāt asaṃskṛtānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ kena sahajaṃ nāma syādityaniṣṭireveyam /
SA01vakobhau:5510: atrārtheṣu kṛtāvadhiḥ śabdo nāma nāmnā ca racanāviśeṣo gātheti nāmasaṃnitābhavati racanāviśeṣāśca dravyāntaraṃ nopapadyate /
SA01vakobhau:5518: santyeva tu viprayuktasaṃskārabhāvanā nāmakāyā dravyata iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5522: atha kiṃpratisaṃyuktā ete nāmakāyādayaḥ sattvākhyā asattvākhyā vipākajā aupacayikā naiḥṣyandikāḥ kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā iti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:5529: ārupyāptā api santi te tvanabhilāpyā ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:5532: yaśca dyotayati sa taiḥ samanvāgato na yo dyotyate /
SA01vakobhau:5536: yathā caite nāmakāyādayaḥ sattvākhyā naiḥṣyandikā anivṛtāvyākṛtāśca /
SA01vakobhau:5564: yaktūktaṃ “janyasya janikā jātirna hetupratyayairvinā” iti ka ime hetavaḥ keca pratyayāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5571: kāraṇahetuḥ sahabhūhetuḥ sabhāgahetuḥ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ sarvatragahetuḥ vipākaheturiti /
SA01vakobhau:5577: saṃskṛtasya hi dharmasya svabhāvavrjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ kāraṇaheturutpādayati /
SA01vakobhau:5581_0: nanu ca ye 'syājānata udapatsyantāsravā jānato 'sya te notpadyanta iti jñānameṣāṃ
SA01vakobhau:5581_1: vighnamuatpattau karoti sūryaprabhāvajjyotiṣāṃ darśanasyeti kathaṃ svabhāvavarjyāḥ
SA01vakobhau:5587: tadyathā anupadrotāraṃ bhojakamadhikṛtya grāmīṇā bhavanti vaktāraḥ svāminā smaḥ sukhitā iti /
SA01vakobhau:5589: yasya punarnāstyeva śaktirvighnayituṃ tasya kathaṃ hetubhāvastadyathā nirvāṇasyānutpattidharmakāṇāṃ ca sarvotpattau nārakādīnāṃ carūpyasattva skandhotpattau /
SA01vakobhau:5591: asanto 'pi hyete tathaiva vidhnaṃ karttumasamarthaḥ syuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5593: asamarthe 'pi hi bhojake tathā vaktāro bhavantīti sa evātra dṛṣṭāntaḥ sāmānyenaiva nirdeśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5595: yastu pradhānaḥ kāraṇahetuḥ sa utpādane 'pi samartho yathā cakṣūrūpe cakṣurvijñānasya āhāraḥ śarīrasya vījādayo 'ṅkurādīnāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:5597: yastvevaṃ codayati anāvaraṇabhāvena cetsarva dharmahetavo bhavanti kasmānā sarvasyotpādo yugapadbhavati prāṇātipātena ca ghātakavat sarve tadbhājo bhavantīti /
SA01vakobhau:5601: yasmādanāvaraṇabhāvena sarvadharmāḥ hetuḥ pratijñāyante na kārakabhāveneti /
SA01vakobhau:5609: tena hyālambanāt manovijñānamutpadyate kuśalākuśālaṃ yataḥ krameṇa paścāccakṣurvijñānamiti kāraṇaparaparayā tasyāpi pratyayībhāvādasti sāmarthyam /
SA01vakobhau:5618: mithaḥ pāraṃparyeṇa ye dharmāḥ parasparaphalāste parasparaḥ sahabhūheturyathā /
SA01vakobhau:5628: evaṃ ca kṛtvā sarvameva saṃskṛtaṃ sahabhūheturyathāyogam /
SA01vakobhau:5630: vināpi cānyonyaphalatvena dharmo 'nulakṣaṇānāṃ sahabhūheturna tāni tasyetyupasaṃkhyātavyam //
SA01vakobhau:5634: caittā dvau saṃvarau teṣāṃ cetaso lakṣaṇāni ca /
SA01vakobhau:5675: satkāyadṛṣṭestatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitimanityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerhetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5679: ye tarhi “tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇā mi” tyetanna pathanti tairapyetat pathitavyam arthato vaivaṃ boddhavyamiti kāśmīrāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5688_0: anuparivarttyanulakṣanāni caivaṃ cittasya tāni cānyonyaṃ sapratighaṃ copādāyarūpamanyonyamapratighaṃ
SA01vakobhau:5688_1: ca kiñcit sarvaṃ ca bhūtaiḥ prāptayaśca sahajāḥ prāptimataḥ sahabhuvo na sahabhūheturanekaphalavipāka niṣyandatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:5694: kiṃ tu prasiddhahetuphalabhāvānāṃ bījādīnāmeṣa nyāyo na dṛṣṭa iti vaktavyametat kathaṃ sahotpannānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ hetuphalabhāva iti /
SA01vakobhau:5698: saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvadetatkiṃ prabhāyāḥ pradīpo heturāhosvit pūrvotpannaiva sāmagrī saprabhasya pradīpasya sacchāyasyāṅdurasyotpattau heturiti /
SA01vakobhau:5704: yasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ yasya bhāvābhāvau niyamataḥ sa heturitaro hetumāniti /
SA01vakobhau:5706: sahabhuvām ca dharmāṇāmekasya bhāve sarveṣāṃ bhāva ekasyābhāve sarveṣāmabhāva iti yukto hetuphalabhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5710: atha evāha evaṃ tarhyavinirbhāviṇo 'pyupādāyarūpasyānyonyameṣa prasaṅgaḥ bhūtaiśca sārdhaṃ cittānulakṣaṇādīnāṃ ce cittādibhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5716: kimeṣāṃ sahotpannabalenāvasthānamāhosvit pūrvasāmagrīvaśāttathaivotpāda iti annyadapi ca tatra kiñcidbhavati sūtrakaṃ śaṅkuko vā pṛthivī vā dhārikā /
SA01vakobhau:5718: eṣāmapi nāmānye 'pi sabhāgahetutvādayo bhavantīti siddhaḥ sahabhūhetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5724: sadṛśā dharmāḥ sadṛśānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sabhāgahetustadyathā kuśalāḥ pañca skandhāḥ kuśalānāmanyoyyaṃ kliṣṭāḥ kliṣṭānāmavyākṛtā avyākṛtānāṃ rūpamavyākṛtaṃ pañcānām /
SA01vakobhau:5733: bāhyeṣvapi yavo yavasya śāliḥ śāleriti vistareṇa yojyam /
SA01vakobhau:5735: ye tu rūpaṃ rūpasya necchanti sabhāgahetuṃ teṣāmeṣa granthaḥ icchāvighātāyasaṃpravarttate “atītāni mahābhūtānyanāgatānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ heturadhipati” riti /
SA01vakobhau:5743: svo nikāyo bhūścaiṣāṃ ta ime svanikāyabhuvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5755: te 'pi kāmāvacarāḥ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikāḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ yāvat bhavāgrabhūmikāstadbhūmikānāmevaṇānyaṣām /
SA01vakobhau:5769: pūrvotpannāni kuśalamūlānipaścādutpannānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ svadhātau sabhāgahetunā hetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5775: idapi śāstraṃ “yo dharmo yasya dharmasya hetuḥ kadācitsa dharmastasya na hetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5781: yastu manyate anāgato 'pi sa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāṃ sabhāgahetutve niyatībhūto bhavatyatastāṃ caramāvasthāmabhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ “na kadācinna heturi“ti /
SA01vakobhau:5783: tasyā yamaparihāro yasmātsa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāḥ pūrvaṃ sabhāgaheturabhūtvā paścāt bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:5785: ihapi ca praśne yo dharmo yasya dharmasya samanantaraḥ kadācit sa dharmastasya dharmasya na samanantara iti śakyamanayā kalpanayā vaktuṃ syānna kadāciditi /
SA01vakobhau:5789: yadi sa dharmo notpanno bhavatīti dvimukhasaṃdarśanārthaṃ yathā tatra tathehāpi karttavyam /
SA01vakobhau:5793: evaṃ sati ko guṇo labhyata ityakauśala mevātra śāstrakārasyaiva saṃbhāvyeta /
SA01vakobhau:5797_0: yattarhīdamuktam “anāgatānāṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvā
SA01vakobhau:5797_1: yattadanyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ tatsatkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerheturyattu
SA01vakobhau:5799: anāgatasatkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvetyevametat karttavyamarthato 'pi caivaṃ boddhavyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:5801: idaṃ tarhi prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate “sarvadharmāścatuṣke niyatā hetauphale āśraye ālamvane niyatā” iti /
SA01vakobhau:5809: nanu caivaṃ sati sabhāga heturabhūtvā heturbhavatīti prāptam /
SA01vakobhau:5815: kiṃ punaḥ syādyadi vipākahetuvadanāgato 'pi sabhāgahetuḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:5835: vīpākaphalasya pūrvaṃ saha cāyogādanāgate cādhvati pūrvapaścimatā 'bhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:5849: yaduktaṃ svabhūmikaḥ sabhāgaheturbhavatīti kimeṣa niyamaḥ sarvasya sāsravasyaiṣa niyamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5855: anāgamye dhyānāntarikāyāṃ caturṣuraneṣu triṣu cārūpyeṣu mārgasatyamanyo 'nyaṃ sabhāgahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5859: āgantuko hyasau tāsu bhūmiṣu na taddhātupatitastadbhami kābhistṛṣṇābhirasvīkṛtatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:5869: tadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntistasyā evānāgatāyāḥ sabhāgahetuviśiṣṭasyaca yāvadanutpādajñānasya /
SA01vakobhau:5883: kathaṃ punarūrdhvaṃbhūmikasyādhobhūmmikomārgaḥ samo vā bhavati viśiṣṭo vā /
SA01vakobhau:5891: kiṃ punaḥ mārga eva samaviśiṣṭayoḥ sabhāgaheturbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:5903: ete hi prāyogikāḥ śrutacintābhāvanāmayā guṇāḥ samaviśiṣṭayoreva heturnanyūnānām /
SA01vakobhau:5915: teṣāmapi navaprakārabhedāt mṛdumṛdavaḥ sarveṣāṃ mṛdumadhyā aṣṭānāmityeṣānītiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5917: upapattipratilambhikāstu kuśalā dharmāḥ sarve navaprakārāḥ paraspara sabhāgahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5925: te yathākramaṃ catustrīdvekeṣāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ nirmāṇacittamapoi kāmāvacara caturdhyanaphalam /
SA01vakobhau:5931: tadyathā śāliryavādīnāṃ mā bhūnniṣphalaḥ prayatna iti /
SA01vakobhau:5933: ata eva cāhuḥ syādutpanno 'nāsravo 'nutpannasyāsravasya na hetuḥ syāttadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpanāmanutpannānāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntīnām/
SA01vakobhau:5935: sarvaṃ ca viśiṣṭaṃ nyūnasya na hetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5939: syādanāgatāḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntayo duḥkhe dharmajñānasyayasmānna pūrvataraṃ phalamastyanāgato vā sabhāgahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5941: syāt pūrvotpanno 'nāsravo dharmaḥ paścādutpannasyānāsravasya na hetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5945: tadyathottaraphalaparihīṇasyāvara phalasaṃmukhībhāve duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptiścottarottara kṣaṇa sahotpannānāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptīnāṃ nyūnatvāditi /
SA01vakobhau:5958: evaṃ tarhi sati bhinnasantānajānāmapi prasaṅgo navacandrādīni paśyatām /
SA01vakobhau:5964: samāna āśrayo yeṣāṃ te cittacaittāḥ anyonyaṃ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5966: samāna ityabhinnastatadyathā ya eva cakṣurindriyakṣaṇaścakṣurvijñānasyāśrayaḥ sa eva tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ vedanādīnāmeva yāvanmanaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5981: ekenāpi hi vinā sarveṇa na saṃprayujyanta ityayameṣāṃ hetubhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5989: svabhūmikāḥ pūrvotpannāḥ sarvatragā dharmāḥ paścimānāṃ kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sarvatragahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5995: nikāyāntarīyāṇāmapi hetutvādeṣāṃ hi prabhāveṇānyanaikāyikā api kleśā upajāyante /
SA01vakobhau:5999: sarva eva kliṣṭā dharmā darśanaprahātavyahetukā iti kāśmīrāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6003: kliṣṭā dharmāḥ yaśca darśanaprahātavyānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vipāka iti /
SA01vakobhau:6009_0: duḥkhasatyaṃ syāt satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerheturiti vistaro yāvanna satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ
SA01vakobhau:6009_1: teṣāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitimanityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭam duḥkhasatya“miti /
SA01vakobhau:6011: idaṃ tarhi prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate “syāddharmo 'kuśalo 'kuśalahetuka eva /
SA01vakobhau:6013: syādāryapudgalaḥ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo yāṃ tatprathamataḥ klilṣṭāñcetanāṃ saṃmukhīkarotī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:6043: kathamidaṃ vijñātavyaṃ vipākasya heturvipākaheturāhosvidvipāka eva heturvipākahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6047: yadi vipākasya heturvipākahetuḥ “vīpākajaṃ cakṣuri“ti etanna prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:6049: atha vipāka eva heturvipākahetuḥ “karmaṇo vipāka” ityetanna prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:6079: dviskandhaka ekaphalaḥ prathame dhyāne vijñaptiḥ saha jātyādibhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6089: asti karma yasyaikameva dharmāyatanaṃ vīpāko vipacyate jīvitendriyam /
SA01vakobhau:6091: yasya mana āyatanaṃ tasya dve manodharmāyatane /
SA01vakobhau:6093: evaṃ yasya spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ yasya kāyāyatanaṃ tasya trīṇi kāyaspraṣṭavyadharmāyatanāni /
SA01vakobhau:6101: asti tat karma yasya pañca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau nava daśaikādaśāyatanāni vipāko vipacyate /
SA01vakobhau:6113: na tu dvaiyadhvikasyāpyekādhviko mā bhūdatinyūnaṃ hetoḥ phalamiti /
SA01vakobhau:6117: na ca karmaṇā saha vipāko vipacyate nāpyanantaraṃ samanantarapratyayākṛṣṭatvāt samanantarakṣaṇasya /
SA01vakobhau:6123: ukta eṣāmarthato 'dhvaniyamaḥ natu sūtrita ityataḥ sūtryate /
SA01vakobhau:6146: evaṃ tarhi phalatvādasaṃskṛtasya hetunā bhavitavyaṃ yasya tat phalaṃ hetutvācca phalena bhavitavyaṃ yasya taddhetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6157: yāsmāt sa utpādāvighnabhāvena vyavasthāpito na cāsaṃskṛtamutpattimat /
SA01vakobhau:6159: kasyedānīṃ tatphalaṃ kathaṃ vā mārgasya phalam /
SA01vakobhau:6191: anityān khalu hetupratyayān pratītyotpannaṃ rūpaṃ kuto nityam bhaviṣyati“
SA01vakobhau:6202: ityuktaṃ natūktaṃ ye vijñānasya pratyayāḥ tepyanityā iti /
SA01vakobhau:6204: nanu ca hetavo 'pi ya utpādāya ta evānityā iti vacanādasaṃskṛtasyānāvaraṇabhāvamātreṇa kāraṇahetutvāpratiṣedhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6206: ukta ālambanapratyayaḥ sūtre na tvanāvaraṇaheturiti na sūtre sidhyatyasaṃskṛtasya hetubhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6210: sūtrāṇi ca bahūnyantarhitānīti kathametannirdhāryate nokta iti /
SA01vakobhau:6215: tadānīṃ “pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ katamo yo visaṃyoga” ityuktamidānīṃ isaṃyogaḥkathamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6225: etāvaktu śakyate vaktum nityaṃ kuśalaṃ cāsti dravyāntaram /
SA01vakobhau:6248: yastu punaḥ duḥkhasyānutpādaḥ saḥ utpādakāraṇānuśayavaikalyādeveti na tasminprajñāyāḥ sāmarthyamastyato 'sāvapratisaṃkhyānirodha iti /
SA01vakobhau:6250: so 'pi tu nāntareṇa pratisaṃkhyāṃ sidhyatīti pratisamkhyānirodha evāsau /
SA01vakobhau:6252: ya evotpannasya paścādabhāvaḥ sa eva svarasa nirodhādapratisaṃkhyānirodha ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:6260: na vai sa pratisaṃkhyāpūrvako nahi poūrvaṃ pratisaṃkhyā paścādanutpannānāmanutpādaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6266: vinā tu pratisaṃkhyayā ye dharmā utpatsyante tadutpannāyāṃ pratisaṃkhyāyāṃ punarnopapadyanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:6270: yadi narhi anutpāda eva nirvāṇamidaṃ sūtrapadaṃ kathaṃ nīyate “pañcemānīndriyāṇi āsevitāni bhāvitāni bahulīkṛtānyatītānāgatapratyūtpannasya duḥkhasya prahāṇāya saṃvarttanta” iti /
SA01vakobhau:6276: kiṃ tu tadālambanakleśaprahāṇāt duḥkhasya prahāṇamuktaṃ bhagavatā “yo rūpe cchandarāgastaṃ prajahīta /
SA01vakobhau:6278: cchandarāge prahīṇe evaṃ vastadrūpaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pārijñātaṃ vistareṇa yāvad vijñānami“ti /
SA01vakobhau:6285_0: athavā 'yamabhiprāyo bhavedatītaḥ kleśaḥ paurvajanmikaḥ pratyutpannaḥ kleśa aihajanmiko
SA01vakobhau:6287: tenā ca kleśadvayenāsyāṃ santatau bījabhāva āhito 'nāgatasyotpattaye /
SA01vakobhau:6293: anāgatasya punarduḥkhasya kleśasya vā bījābhāvāt atyantamanutpādaḥ prahāṇam /
SA01vakobhau:6297: nahi niruddhe nirodhābhimukhe ca yatnaḥ sārthako bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:6300: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā “ye keciddharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā 'saṃskṛtā vā virāgasteṣāmagra ākhyāyate” iti kathamasatāmasannagro bhavitumarhati /
SA01vakobhau:6306: tadyathā asti śabdasya prāgabhāvo 'sti paścādabhāva ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:6312: abhāvo 'pi ca kaścit praśasyatamo bhavati yaḥ sakalasyopadravasyātyantamabhāva ityanyeṣāṃ so 'gra iti praśaṃsāṃ labdhumarhati /
SA01vakobhau:6322: ubhayamapi caitadaviparītaṃ dṛṣṭamāryairyaduta duḥkhaṃ ca duḥkhameveti duḥkhābhāvaścābhāva eveti ko 'syāryasatyatve virodhaḥ kathamabhāvaśca nāma tṛtīyaṃ cāryasatyaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:6324: ustaṃ yathāryasatyaṃ dvitīyasyānantaraṃ dṛṣṭamuddṛṣṭaṃ ceti tṛtīyaṃ bhavati /
