SA01vakobhau:6336: devatā enaṃ pālayiṣyanti pālanīyaṃ cet maṃsyate /
SA01vakobhau:6341: nahi tasya rūpavedanādivat svabhāva upalabhyate nacāpi cakṣurādivatkarma /
SA01vakobhau:6343: amuṣya ca vastuno 'yaṃ nirogha iti ṣaṣṭhīvyavasthā kathaṃ prakalpyate /
SA01vakobhau:6345: nahi tasya tena sārdhaṃ kaścitsaṃbandho hetuphalādibhāvāsaṃbhavāt /
SA01vakobhau:6349: bhāvāntaratve 'pi yasya kleśasya prāptivicchedāydyo nirodhaḥ prāpyate sa tasyeti vyavadiśyate /
SA01vakobhau:6363: “yat svalpasya duḥkhasyāśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupakṣamo 'staṅgamaḥ anyasya ca duḥkhasyāprati sandhiranutpādo 'prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6365: etatkāntametatpraṇītaṃ yaduta srvopādhipraniniḥ sargastṛṣṇākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇa” miti /
SA01vakobhau:6372: nāsminprādurbhavatīti yadi satītyabhisaṃbadhyate nityamevāprādurbhāvaprasaṅgo nirvāṇasya nityatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:6374: atha prāpta ityabhisaṃbadhyate yata eva tatprāptiḥ parikalpyate tasminneva saṃmukhībhūte prāpte vā duḥkhasyeṣyatāmaprādurbhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6376: ayaṃ ca dṛṣṭānta evaṃ sūpanīto bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:6380: yathā pradyotasya nirvāṇamabhāva evaṃ bhagavato 'pi cetaso vimokṣa iti /
SA01vakobhau:6394: svabhāvavastu yathoktaṃ “yadvastu pratilabdhaṃ samanvāgataḥ sa tena vastune“ti /
SA01vakobhau:6402: yathoktaṃ “yasmin vastuni anunayaḥ saṃyojanena saṃprayuktaḥ pratighasaṃyojanenāpi tasminni“ti /
SA01vakobhau:6413: tasya tu hetuphale na vidyete iti /
SA01vakobhau:6416: athaiṣāṃ phalānāṃ katamat phalaṃ kasya hetoḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6430: etadeva aṅgībhāvo 'pi cāsti kāraṇahetostadyathā “pañcasu vijñānakāyeṣudaśānāmāyatanānāṃ bhājanaloke ca karmaṇām /
SA01vakobhau:6456: yasmātsahotpannaṃ vā samanantarotpannaṃ vā puruṣakāraphalaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:6463: kiṃ punaridaṃ vipākaphalaṃ nāma kiṃ yāvadadhipatiphalam /
SA01vakobhau:6478: tasmādya utarakālaṃ bhavati na saha nāntaraṃ sa vipākaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6499: yadi sarvatragahetorapi samānaṃ phalaṃ kasmānna sabhāgahetoreveṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:6501: yasmāt bhūmitaḥ kliṣṭatayā cāsya sādṛśyaṃ natu prakārataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6503: yasya tu prakārato 'pi sādṛśyaṃ so 'bhyupagamyata eva sabhāgahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6505: atha eva yo yasya sabhāgahetuḥ sarvatragaheturapi sa tasyeti catuṣkoṭikaḥ kriyate /
SA01vakobhau:6523: tadyathā adharabhūmikasya prayogacittasyoparibhūmikaḥ samādhiḥ sāsravasyānāsravo dhyānacittasya nirmāṇacittamityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:6539: athaiṣāṃ hetūnāṃ katammo hetuḥ kasminkāle phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti dadāti vā /
SA01vakobhau:6546: sa tu nāvaśyaṃ saphala iti nocyate /
SA01vakobhau:6563: nivṛtte tu phale tau cābhyatītau bhavataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6565: phalaṃ cāpi dattaṃ na punastadeva dattaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6567: asti kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti na dadātīti catuṣkoṭikaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6569: prathamā koṭiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchindan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścādvijahāti /
SA01vakobhau:6571: dvitīyā kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdadhāno yāḥ sarvaprathamaṃ pratilabhate /
SA01vakobhau:6575: syāttā eva pratisaṃdadhānasya tṛtīyā asamucchinnakuśalamūlasya śeṣāsvavasthāsu /
SA01vakobhau:6581: kāmavairāgyamanuprāpnuvan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścādvijahāti dvitīyā kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo yāḥ sarvaprathamaṃ pratilabhate /
SA01vakobhau:6601: kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhlāti na dadātīti /
SA01vakobhau:6604: prathamā koṭiḥ kuśalacittānantaraṃ kliṣṭamavyākṛtaṃ vā cittaṃ saṃmukhīkarotīti /
SA01vakobhau:6619: yasmānna saha vā samanantaro vā 'sti vipākaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6639: tatra katame dharmāḥ katibhiḥ hetubhirutpadyanta ityāha samāsata ime caturvidhā dharmāstadyathā kliṣṭā dharmā vipākajāḥ prathamānāsravāstebhyaśca śeṣāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6648: vipākaṃ sarvagaṃ hitvā tau sabhāgaṃ ca śeṣajāḥ // VAkK_2.60 //
SA01vakobhau:6650: kliṣṭā dharmā vipākahetuṃ hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ pañcabhyo jāyante /
SA01vakobhau:6652: vipākajā sarvatragahetuṃ hetvā śeṣebhyaḥ pañcabhya eva /
SA01vakobhau:6654: śeṣā dharmāstau vipākasarvatragahetū hitvā śeṣebhyaścaturbhryo jāyante /
SA01vakobhau:6656: prathamānāsravāstau ca vipākasarvatragahetū sabhāgahetuṃ ca hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ tribhyo jāyante /
SA01vakobhau:6662: atha ye cittaviprayuktā rūpiṇaśca dharmāste kathamityāha /
SA01vakobhau:6666: prayuktakahetunaikena varjitāḥ anye 'pi kliṣṭādayo dharmāstathaivotpadyante yathā cittacaīttāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6698: ata eva rūpaṃ na samanantarapratyayo viṣamotpatteḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6700: tathāhi kāmāvacarasya rūpasyānantaraṃ kadācit kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ cāvijñaptirūpamutpadyate kadācitkāmāvacaraṃ cānāsravaṃ ceti vyākulo rūpasaṃmukhībhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6702: avyākulastu samanantarapratyayaḥ aniruddha evaikasminnaupa cayikarūpasantāne dvitīyotpatteriti bhadantavasumitraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6711: tadyathā vaṭanikāyāḥ krameṇa yāvadanekaśākhāvaroho nyagrodha iti /
SA01vakobhau:6725: sakala eva kalāpaḥ sakalasya kalāpāntarasya samanantarapratyayo natvalpakādvedanādidravyāt prabhūtaṃ vedanādi dravyamutpadyata ityetāvadevātrottam /
SA01vakobhau:6729: tadyathā cittaṃ cittasyaiva vedanā vedanāyā eve“ti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6731: yadā tvakliṣṭāntaraṃ kliṣṭamutpadyate tasya kleśasya pūrvaniruddhaḥ kleśaḥ samanantarapratyayastadyathā nirodhasamāpatticittaṃ vyutthānacittasyeti /
SA01vakobhau:6743: kathaṃ tarhi bhagavān jānāti amuṣyānāgatattyānantaramidamanāgataṃ bhāvīti /
SA01vakobhau:6747: atītaṃ kilādhvānaṃ paśyati bhagavānevañjātīyakātkarmaṇaḥ evañjātīyako vīpākaḥ utpanno dharmādvā dharmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6751: tasmādato 'pyevañjātīyako vipāka utpatsyate dharmādvā dharma iti jānāti /
SA01vakobhau:6755: yasmādatītasāṃpratānumānena bhagavān vikīrṇānyanāgatāni dravyāṇi pratyakṣamīkṣitvā jānātyanena pudgalenaivaṃvidhaṃ karma kurvatedamanāgataṃ phalaṃ parigṛhītamiti /
SA01vakobhau:6757: evaṃ tarhi bhagavān pūrvāntamadṛṣṭvā 'parāntaṃ na jānīyāt /
SA01vakobhau:6761: phalacihnabhūtaḥ sattvānāṃ santatau cittaviprayuktaḥ saṃskāraviśeṣo 'sti yaṃ vyavalokya bhagavānanāgataṃ jānātyasaṃmukhīkṛtvāpi dhyānamabhijñāṃ ceti /
SA01vakobhau:6763: naimiktiko hi nāma bhagavān syādevaṃ sati na punaḥ sākṣātkārī /
SA01vakobhau:6769: atha asatyanāgatasya kramaniyamāvasthāne kasmādagradharmānantaraṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirevotpadyate nānyo dharmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6771: evaṃ yāvadvarjo pamānantaraṃ kṣayajñānamevotpadyate nānyo dharma iti /
SA01vakobhau:6781: nanu caivaṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ cittaṃ mano bhavatītyanantara vijñānābhāvāt mano 'pi caramaṃ cittaṃ na prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:6787: kāritraprabhāvitastu samanantarapratyayastena yo dharmaḥ phalaṃ kpratigṛhītaḥ sa sarvairapi dharmaīḥ sarvaprāṇibhirvā na śakyaṃ pratibnddhuṃ yathā notpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:6793: prathamā koṭiracittakāyāḥ samāpattervyutthāna cittaṃ dvitīyādayaśca samāpattikṣaṇāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6795: dvitīyā koṭiḥ prathamasya samāpattikṣaṇasya sacittakāyāścāvasthāyā jātyādayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6797: tṛtīyā koṭiḥ prathamaḥ samāpattikṣaṇaḥ sacittikā cāvasthā /
SA01vakobhau:6799: caturthī koṭi dvīrtīyādīnāṃ samāpattikṣaṇānāṃ jātyādayo vyutthānacittasya ca /
SA01vakobhau:6805: ye tṛtīyāvaturthyau te prathamādvitīye ye prathamādvitīye te tṛtīyācaturthyau karttavye /
SA01vakobhau:6824: yo dharmo yasya dharmasyālambanaṃ na kadācitsa dharmastaddharmasya nālambanam/
SA01vakobhau:6830: ta ete cittacaitā dharmā āyatanadravyalakṣaṇaniyamenālambane yathāsvaṃ niyatāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6843: ya eva kāraṇahetuḥ sa evā dhipatipratyayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6849: na jātu sahabhuvo dharmā ālambanaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:6863: athaite pratyayāḥ kāritraṃ kurvantaḥ kimavasthe dharme kurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:6905: tatra hetupratyaya eṣāṃ sarve pañca hetavaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6909: ālambanapratyayo yathāyogaṃ pañca viṣayāḥ sarve dharmāśca /
SA01vakobhau:6920: sahabhūhetuśca jātyādayaḥ sabhāgahetuśca pūrvotpannā samānabhūmikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6932: anye tu viprayuktā rūpiṇaśca dharmā hetvadhipatipratyayābhyāṃ jāyante yathāvihitameva /
SA01vakobhau:6934: āha tu “pratyayebhyo bhāvā upajāyante na punaḥ sarvasyaiva jagataḥ īśvarapuruṣapradhānādikaṃ kāraṇamiti /
SA01vakobhau:6939: nanu ca atha evāsya vādasya vyudāsaḥ prāpnotyekaṃ kāraṇamīśvarādikaṃ sarvasyeti /
SA01vakobhau:6945: yadi hyekameva kāraṇamīśvaraḥ syādanyadvā yugapatsarveṇa jagatā bhavitavyaṃsyāt /
SA01vakobhau:6949: sa tarhi cchandavaśā dīśvarasya syādayamidānīmutpadyatāmayaṃ nirudhyatāmayaṃ paścāditi /
SA01vakobhau:6955: kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣaṇe vā neśvara eva kāraṇaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:6968: yadi prītistāṃ tarhi nāntareṇopāye śaktaḥ kartumiti na tasyāmīśvaraḥ syāttathaiva cānyasmin /
SA01vakobhau:6970: yadi ceśvaro narakādiṣu prajāṃ bahubhiścetibhirūpasṛṣṭāṃ sṛṣṭvā tena prīyate namo 'stu tasmai tādṛśāyeśvrāya /
SA01vakobhau:6978: ekaṃ khalvapi jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ parigṛhṇatā 'nyeṣāmarthānāṃ pratyakṣaḥ puruṣakāro nihgṛhṇtaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:6980: sahāpi ca kāraṇaiḥ kāraka mīśvaraṃ kalpayatā kevalo bhaktivādaḥ syat /
SA01vakobhau:6994: svānyevaiṣāṃ karmāṇi tasyāṃ tasyāṃ jātau janayanti /
SA01vakobhau:6996: akṛtabuddhayastu varākāḥ svaṃ svaṃ vipākaphalaṃ cānubhavanta īśvaramaparaṃ mithyā parikalpayanti /
SA01vakobhau:6998: gatametadyattu khalu taduktaṃ “dvābhyāmanye tu jāyanta” iti /
SA01vakobhau:7041: bhūtānāṃ tu tadbhūtikaṃ rūpaṃ vipākahetureva yasya kāyavākkarmaṇo bhūtāni vipākāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7043: abhedena cittacaittāḥ samanantarapratyaya uktā niyamastu noktaḥ kasya cittasyānantaraṃ kasyotpaktiriti /
SA01vakobhau:7075: kāmadhātau yatkuśalaṃ cittaṃ tasmādanantaraṃ nava cittānyutpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:7094: tatra punaḥ kāmāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ cittamaṣṭābhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:7106: śaikṣāśaikṣe hitvā kāmadhātau hi pratisandhimukhataḥ sarvebhyo rūpārūpyacittebhyaḥ samanantaramakuśalaṃ cittamutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:7139: rūpe dhātau yatkukśalaṃ cittaṃ tasmādanantaramekādaśa cittānyutpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:7145: rūpāvacaraṃ tu kuśalaṃ cittaṃ navabhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:7191: ārūpyāvacaraṃ kukśalaṃ svebhyastribhyo rūpāvacarāt kukśalācchaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:7195: ārūpyāvacarānnivṛtātsvabhūmikāni trīṇi rūpāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ nivṛtaṃ ca kāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭadvayam /
SA01vakobhau:7228: prāyogikopapattyāptaṃ śubhaṃ bhittvā triṣu dvidhā // VAkK_2.71 //
SA01vakobhau:7230: triṣu dhātuṣu kuśalaṃ cittaṃ dvidhā bhidyate /
SA01vakobhau:7271: svebhyaḥ kuśalakliṣṭebhyaḥ rūpāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogika kliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:7279: svebhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ pūrvavat rūpāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikakliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:7292: svabhūmikāni ṣaḍanyatra prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāṃ rūpārupyāvacāre ca kliṣṭe /
SA01vakobhau:7294: te punaḥ saptacittānantaraṃ svebhya eva pūrvavat /
SA01vakobhau:7310: kāmāvacare kuśale abhijñāphalaṃ ca svāni ṣaṭ ārupyāvacaraṃ ca prāyogikaṃśaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:7314: kāmāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāṃ svebhyaścaturbhyo 'nyatreryāpathikavipākajābhyāmārūpyāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikakliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:7318: kāmāvacare kliṣṭe svāni pañcānyatrābhijñāphalāt ārupyāvacaraṃ kliṣṭam/
SA01vakobhau:7328: kāmāvacarebhya utpattipratilambhikairyāpathika vipākajebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ pañcabhyo 'nyatrābhijñāphalāt ārūpyāvacarebhyastribhyo 'nyatra prāyogikāt /
SA01vakobhau:7332: kāmāvacare kliṣṭe svāni catvāryanyatra prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāmārūpyāvacaraṃ ca kliṣṭam /
SA01vakobhau:7346: rūpāvacaraṃ prāyogikaṃ svāni catvāri śaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:7360: svāni catvāri rūpāvacare prāyogikakliṣṭe kāmāvacāre kliṣṭe /
SA01vakobhau:7387: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prāyogikacittānantaraṃ vīpākajaiyāpathikaśailpasthānikānicittānyutpadyante na punrebhyaḥ prāyogikam /
SA01vakobhau:7421: trividhamanaskārānantaramāryamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti tasmādapi trividhaṃ māskāram evaṃ sati yutamidaṃ bhavati “aśubhāsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅga bhāvayatī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:7426: aśubhayā tu cittaṃ damayitvā sāmānyamanaskārānantaraṃ mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti /
SA01vakobhau:7432: syāttāvadanāgamyāditribhūmisaṃniḥśrayeṇa niyāmāvakrāntau tanmārgānantaraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ sāmānyamanaskāraṃ saṃmukhīkuryād /
SA01vakobhau:7442: nahi prāptaphalasya tatprayogasaṃmukhībhāvo yukta iti anyo 'pyasya tajjātīyaḥ sāmānyamanaskāro bhāvanāṃ gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:7444: tadyathā “sarvasaṃkārā anityāḥ sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇa“miti tatsaṃmukhī kariṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:7448: anāgamyaṃ niśrityārhattvaṃ prāpnuvataḥ tadbhūmikaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ vā vyutthānaṃ cittam /
SA01vakobhau:7473: yāni dvādaśa cittāni uktānyeṣāṃ katamasmiṃścitte katīnāṃ lābhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7475: kliṣṭe traidhātuke lābhaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dvayoḥ
SA01vakobhau:7477: kāmāvacare kliṣṭe citte saṃmukhībhūte ṣaṇṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7481: akuśalanivṛtāvyākṛtayoḥ rūpāvacarasya ca kliṣṭasya dhātupratyāgamanāt parihāṇitaśca /
SA01vakobhau:7499: rūpāvacare kuśale trayāṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābhastasyaiva kuśalasya kāmarūpāvacarayoścānivṛtāvyākṛtayoḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7511: yatra citte lābhho na vyākhyātastatra tasyaiva lābho draṣṭavyo nānyasya /
SA01vakobhau:7515: “kliṣṭe citte navānāṃ hi lābhaḥ ityucyate budhaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7516: ṣaṇṇāṃ tu kuśale citte tasyaivā vyākṛṭe khalu //“
SA01vakobhau:7518: tatra saptānāṃ kuśale citta iti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:7557: ṣaṭ ca devanikāyāstadyathā cāturmahārājakāyikā strāyastriṃśā yāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavarttinaścetyeṣa kāmadhātuḥ saha bhājanalokena /
SA01vakobhau:7566: saṃjīvaḥ kālasūtraḥ saṃghāto rauravo mahārauravastapanaḥ pratāpano 'vīciśceti /
SA01vakobhau:7572: ṣaṭ cānantaroktā devanikāyāḥ tiryaścaḥ pretāśca viṃśatiḥ sthānāni /
SA01vakobhau:7574: kāmadhātuḥ paranirmitavaśavartibhyo yāvadavīciḥ sabhājanagrahaṇena tu yāvadvāyumaṇḍalam /
SA01vakobhau:7596: caturthamanabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavāḥ bṛhatphalā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā ityetāni saptadaśa sthānāni rūpadhātuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7600: brahmapurohiteṣveva kila sthānamutkṛṣṭataraṃ mahābrahmaṇaḥ parigaṇa ivābhinirvṛttamekanāyakaṃ natu bhūmyantaramiti /
SA01vakobhau:7606: atītānāgatāvijñaptyarūpiṇo hi dharmā ādeśasthā iti niyamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7618: yatraiva hi deśe tatsmāpattilābhinaścyavante tatraivopapadyante iti /
SA01vakobhau:7622: yathā rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpaṃ niśritya pravarttate cittasaṃtatirevamārūpyeṣu kiṃ niśritya pravrttate /
SA01vakobhau:7624: nikāyaṃ jīvitaṃ cātra niśritā cittasantatiḥ // VAkK_3.3 //
SA01vakobhau:7628: rupiṇāmapi tarhi sattvānāṃ kimartha na tadeva dvayaṃ niśritya pravarttate cittasantatiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7636: tata eva tarhi balavattvāt pravarttiṣyate kim punarniśrayeṇa /
SA01vakobhau:7640: yathā rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpaṃ niśritya pravarttate nikāyasabhāgo jīvitendriyaṃ ca evamarūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ kiṃ niśritya pravarttate /
SA01vakobhau:7644: rūpiṇāmapi tarhi kimarthaṃ na tadeva dvayamanyonyam /
SA01vakobhau:7653: tasmānnāstyarūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ cittasantateranyonyam niśraya iti sautrāntikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7655: api tu yasyāścittasantaterākṣepaheturavītatṛṣṇo rūpe tasyāḥ saha rūpeṇa saṃbhavādrūpaṃ niśritya pravṛttiryasyāstu heturvītatṛṣṇo rūpe tasyā anapekṣya rūpaṃ pravṛttiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7662: kāmapratisaṃyuktodhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ rūpapratisaṃyukto dhātū rūpadhāturmadhyapadalopādvajrabālakavat maricapānakavacca /
SA01vakobhau:7673: kāmānāṃ dhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ kāmān yo dadhāti /
SA01vakobhau:7680: “na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgaḥ puruṣasya kāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7681: tiṣṭhanti citrāṇi tathaiva loke aṭhātra dhīrā vinayanti kāmam” //
SA01vakobhau:7687: “na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgaṃ vadasīha kāmam /
SA01vakobhau:7692: te cetkāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgo yadi te na kāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7693: śāstā 'pi te bhavitā kāmabhogī dṛṣṭvaiva rūpāṇi manoramāṇi”//
SA01vakobhau:7695: kiṃ punarye kecana dharmāḥ kāmarūpārupyadhātuṣu samudācaranti sarve te kāmarūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7742: pratibuddhotpādaṃ cāsaṃkhyeyasattvaparinirvāṇe 'pi nāsti sattvānāṃ parikṣaya ākāśavat /
SA01vakobhau:7746: tiryaksūtra uktaṃ tadyathā “īṣādhāre deve varṣati nāsti vīcirvā antarikā va antarīkṣādvāridhārāṇāṃ prapatantīnām /
SA01vakobhau:7748: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi nāsti vīcirvā antarikā vā lokadhātūnāṃ saṃvarttamānānāṃ vivarttamānāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:7750: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇāsyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāmi“ti /
SA01vakobhau:7763: yaśca prathamadhyānasaṃniśrayāddhi utpādayati sa yatra lokadhātau jāta utpādayati tatratyameva brahmalokamupāgacchati nānyam /
SA01vakobhau:7777: kiṃ punargatinirmuktāḥ santi dhātavo yata dhātuṣvityucyante /
SA01vakobhau:7791: prajñyaptipūktam “catasṛbhiryonibhiḥ pañca gatayaḥ saṃgṛhītā natu pañcabhirgatibhiścatasro yonayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7798: catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya yo rūpaprasādaścakṣuścakṣurindriyaṃ cakṣurāyatanaṃ cakṣurdhātunarikastairyagyonikaṃ paitṛviṣayiko devyo mānuṣyako bhāvanāmayo 'ntarābhavikaśce“ti /
SA01vakobhau:7804: “sapta bhavā narakabhavastiryagbhavaḥ pretabhavo devabhavo manuṣyabhavaḥ karmabhavo 'ntarābhava” iti /
SA01vakobhau:7806: atra hi pañca gatayaḥ sahetukāḥ sahāgamanāścoktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7815: teṣāmāyuṣman kāyavāṅmanovaṅkānāṃ kāyavāṅmanodoṣakaṣāyāṇā narakeṣu rūpaṃ saṃjñā vedanā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ vipāko vipacyate /
SA01vakobhau:7817: nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:7825: pratisaṃdhicittāni hi gatīnāṃ pañcaprakārāṇi santyataḥ sapraveśagatigrahaṇādadoṣa eva /
SA01vakobhau:7855: yadi hi gatiḥ syādantarābhava ityeva na syāt /
SA01vakobhau:7857: yatarhi sthaviraśāriputreṇoktaṃ “nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:7859: nirvṛtte vīpāka ityuktaḥ natu vipāka eveti /
SA01vakobhau:7863: gatigāminaḥ pudgaladravyasya pratiṣedhaṃ karoti nānyatra skandhebhya upalabhyate nāraka iti na tu skandhāntarapratiṣedham /
SA01vakobhau:7865: avyākṛtā eva tu gatayo varṇyante vaibhāṣikaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7879: sūtre uktaḥ “rupiṇaḥ santi sattvā nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathāmanuṣyāstadekatyāśca devāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7896: rūpiṇaḥ santi nānātvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñinastadyathā devā brahmakāyikā ye tatprathamābhinirvṛttāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7900: te hi prathamābhinirvṛttāḥ sarva ekaikasaṃjñino bhavanti anena vayaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā iti /
SA01vakobhau:7904: anyathaiva tu mahābrahmaṇa ārohapariṇāha ākṛtivigraho vāgbhāṣā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ ca anyathā tatparṣada iti nānātvakāyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7906: yadidamuktaṃ sūtre “teṣāmevaṃ bhavati imaṃ vayaṃ sattvamadrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ yāvadaho vatānye 'pi sattvā ihopapadyeranmama sabhāmatāyāmi“ti /
SA01vakobhau:7908: asya ca sattvasyaivañcetasaḥ praṇidhirvayaṃ cehopapannā iti /
SA01vakobhau:7914: tato hi te pracyutāḥ kathamidānīmalabdhāyāṃ dvitīyadhyānasamāpattau tadbhūmikaṃ pūrvenivāsamasmārṣuḥ labdhāyāṃ vā kathaṃ mahābrahmālambanāṃ śīlavrataparāmarśadṛṣṭiṃ niviṣṭāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7920: kathaṃ teṣāmevaṃ bhavati sma “imaṃ vayaṃ sattvamadrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantami“ti /
SA01vakobhau:7922: tasmāttatrasthā eva te tasya pūrvavṛttāntaṃ samanusmaranta eva dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ dṛṣṭavanto dṛṣṭvā ca paścādadrākṣmetyeṣāṃ babhūva /
SA01vakobhau:7924: rupiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathā devā ābhāsvarāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7930: anyathā hi parīttābhā apramāṇābhāśca kasyāṃ vijñānasthitau vyavasthāpyeran /
SA01vakobhau:7936: te kila maulyāṃ bhūmau saumanasyendriyaparikhinnāḥ sāmantakādupekṣendriyaṃ saṃmukhībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:7938: sāmantake copekṣendriyaparikhinnāḥ punamaulyā bhumeḥ saumanasyendriyaṃ saṃmukhīkurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:7940: yathā kāmaratiparikhinnā īśvarā dharmaratiṃ pratyanubhavanti dharmaratiparikhinnāḥ kāmaratimiti /
SA01vakobhau:7948: śāntaṃ hi tatsukhamaśāntaṃ ca saumanasyaṃ cetasa utplāvakatvāditi sautrāntikā vyācakṣate /
SA01vakobhau:7952: tatra ye sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāye 'ciropapannā bhavanti naiva saṃvarttanīkuśalā na vivarttanīkuśalā asya lokasya te tāmarciṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītāḥ santa udvijante saṃvegamāpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:7956: tatra ye sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāye ciropapannāḥ saṃvarttanīkuśalā vivarttanīkuśalāścāsya lokasya te tān sattvān bhītānāśvāsayanti /
SA01vakobhau:7958: mā bhaiṣṭa māṛṣāḥ mā bhaiṣṭa mārṣāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7962: ato 'rciṣa āgamavyapagamasaṃjñitvāt bhītā bhītasaṃjñitvācca te nānātvasaṃjñino na sukhāduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñitvāditi /
SA01vakobhau:7964: rūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñinastadyathā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7972: tatra prathame dhyāne kliṣṭayā saṃjñayā ekatvasaṃjñinaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7974: dvitīye kuśalayā saṃjñayā nānātvasaṃjñinastṛtīye vipākajayā saṃjñayāekatvasaṃjñinaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7991: atra hi vijñānaparibhedāḥ santyata eva na vijñānasthitiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7993: kaḥ punaḥ paribhedaḥ yena vijñānaṃ paribhidyate
SA01vakobhau:8006: caturthe dhyāne sattvā uccalitamānasāḥ pṛthagjanā āsaṃjñikaṃ praveṣṭukāmā āryāḥ śuddhāvāsān bhavāgrānapaṭupracāratvānna vijñānasthitiriti /
SA01vakobhau:8023: anyatra sūtre sapta vijñānasthitaya uktāḥ anyatra
SA01vakobhau:8028: rūpopagā vijñāna sthitirvedanopagā saṃjñopagā saṃskāropagā iti /
SA01vakobhau:8043: na ca visabhāgabhūmikeṣu skanheṣu vijñānaṃ tṛṣṇāvaśāt pratitiṣṭhatīti /
SA01vakobhau:8045: kasmānna vijñānaṃ vijñānasthitirucyate yathā saptasu vijñānasthitiṣu pañca skandhā iti /
SA01vakobhau:8053: yāṃśca dharmānabhiruhya vijñānaṃ vāhayati naunāvikanyāyena te dharmā vijñānasthitaya uktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8055: natu vijñānaṃ vijñānamevāruhya vāhayatyato noktamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8057: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ “vijñāne āhāre asti nandī asti rāga iti /
SA01vakobhau:8059: yatrāsti nandī asti rāgaḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ tatra vijñānamadhirūḍhami“ti /
SA01vakobhau:8065: evaṃ tarhyabhedenopapattyāyatanasaṃgṛhīteṣu skandheṣu sābhirāmāyāṃ vijñānapravṛttau vijñānaṃ vijñānasthitiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8067: pratyekaṃ tu yathā rūpādayo vijñānasya saṃkleśāya bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:8075: api ca kṣetrabhāvena bhagavatā catasro vijñānasthitayo deśitāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8077: vījabhāvena ca sopādānaṃ vijñānaṃ kṛtsnameveti na punarbījaṃ bījasya kṣetrabhāvena vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvetyabhiprāyaṃ parikalapayāmāsa /
SA01vakobhau:8079: ye dharmāḥ sahavarttino vijñānasya te 'sya kṣetrabhāvena sādhīyāṃso bhavantīti ta evāsya sthitaya uktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8081: atha kathaṃ saptabhirvijñānasthitibhiścatasro vijñānasthitayaḥ saṃgṛhītāścātasṛbhirvā sapta /
SA01vakobhau:8083: naiva hi saptabhiścatasro nāpi catasṛbhiḥ sapta /
SA01vakobhau:8093: dvitīyā apāyeṣu caturthe dhyāne bhavāgre ca vijñānavarjyāḥ skandhāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8122: ye sattvā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetāḥ sakṛdupajāyante /
SA01vakobhau:8129: atha kasyāṃ gatau kati yonayaḥ saṃvidyanta ityāha
SA01vakobhau:8135: aṇḍajāstāvadyathā kroñcīniryātau śailopaśailau sthavirau mṛgāramātuśca dvātriṃśat putrāḥ pañcālarājasya ca pañca putraśatāni /
SA01vakobhau:8159: “pañca putrānahaṃ rātrau divā paña tathā parān /
SA01vakobhau:8161: bhakṣayāmi janitvā tān nāsti tṛptistathāpi me //“
SA01vakobhau:8166: atha kimarthaṃ caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ prāptopapattivaśitve 'pi jarāyurjāṃ yorni bhajate /
SA01vakobhau:8170_1: cānyeṣāṃ bahumānādarāvarjanārthaṃ manuṣyabhūtā api caināṃ siddhiṃ gacchantīti vineyānā mutsāhārtham /
SA01vakobhau:8172_0: itarathā hyaprajñāyamānakulagotraḥ ko 'pyayaṃ māyāpuruṣa ityevaṃ parikalpayeyurdevaḥ
SA01vakobhau:8172_1: piśāca iti vā yathā 'nyatīrthyā apabhāṣante kalpaśatasyātyayādevaṃvidho māyāvī loke
SA01vakobhau:8176_0: śarīradhātūnāmavasthāpanārthaṃ yeṣumanuṣyā anye ca prajāṃ vijñāya sahasraśaḥ svargaṃ
SA01vakobhau:8176_1: ca prāptā apavargaṃ ceti upapādukānāṃ hi sattvānāṃ bāhyabījābhāvān mṛtānāṃ kāyo nāvatiṣṭhate
SA01vakobhau:8178: ādhiṣṭhānikīmṛddhiṃ bhagavata icchatāṃ na yukta ekṣa parihāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8182: yadyapyupapādukānāṃ kāyanidhanaṃ na prajñayate kathamuktaṃ sūtre “upapādukaḥ suparṇī upapādukaṃ nāgamuddharati bhakṣārthami“ti /
SA01vakobhau:8186: bhakṣayati vā yāvanna mṛto bhavati na pounrmṛtasyāsya tṛṣyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:8191: sā hi dvigatī tisṛṇāṃ ca pradeśaḥ sarve cāntarābhāvikā iti /
SA01vakobhau:8197: maraṇabhavasyopapattibhavasya cāntarā ya ātmabhāvo 'bhinirvarttate deśāntaropapattisamprāptaye so 'ntarābhava ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:8224: santānavarttināṃ hi dharmāṇāmavicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāvo dṛṣṭastadyathā vrīhisantānasya /
SA01vakobhau:8228: vicchinno 'pi dṛṣṭaḥ prādurbhāvastadyathā ādarśādiṣu bimbāt pratibimbasya /
SA01vakobhau:8242: tatraiva hi deśe ādarśarūpaṃ dṛśyate pratibimbaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:8244: na caikatra deśe rūpadvayasyāsti sahabhāva āśrayabhūtabhedāt /
SA01vakobhau:8246_1: 'nyaṃ pratibimbakamupalabhyate natvekatra rūpe dvayoḥ paśyatoḥ sahadarśanaṃ na bhavatīti
SA01vakobhau:8250: upalabhyate ca chāyāstha ādarśe sūryasya prativimbakamiti na yukto 'sya tatra prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8256: anyatraiva hi deśe ādarśatalaṃ bhavatyanyatraivāntargataṃ candrapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate kūpa ivodakam /
SA01vakobhau:8262: sāmagryāstu sa tasyāstādṛśaḥ prabhāvo yattathā darśanaṃ bhavati //
SA01vakobhau:8264: acintyo hi dharmāṇāṃ hi dharmāṇāṃ śaktibhedaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8276: santānaṃ ca pratyavicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāva udāhṛato nāsantānamityasāmyaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya pratibimbasya ca /
SA01vakobhau:8282: bimbāccādarśā cceti yat prādhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadāśrityotpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:8284: nacaivamupapattibhavasyāpi dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ saṃbhavo maraṇabhavāccānyataśca pradhānabhūtādityato 'pyayamasamāno dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8286: na ca yuktamuktaṃ bāhyameva cetanaṃ śukraśoṇitaṃ pradhānakāraṇamiti /
SA01vakobhau:8288: yatra cāndhakāṇa eva prādurbhāva upapādukānāṃ tatra kiṃ parikalpyate /
SA01vakobhau:8299: narakabhavastiryagbhavaḥ pretabhavo devabhavo manuṣyabhavaḥ karmabhavo 'ntarābhava iti /
SA01vakobhau:8308: mātā kalyā spi bhavati ṛtumatī ca /
SA01vakobhau:8323: kṣatriyo vā 'sau brāhmaṇo vā vaiśyo vā śūdro vā /
SA01vakobhau:8325: yadi vā pūrvasyā diśa āgato yadi vā dakṣiṇasyā paścimāyā uttrasyā” iti /
SA01vakobhau:8341: upapadyādayo 'pi hi nāma devā evaṃ sati prasajyate /
SA01vakobhau:8353: tadyathā parīttaḥ sakalikāgnirabhinivarttamāna eva parinirvāyādevaṃ prathamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8359: nacaivamantarā nāma devāstriprakārāḥ kāladeśaprakarṣabhinnāḥ santīti kalpanaiveyaṃ kevalā //
SA01vakobhau:8363: āyupramāṇāntare vā devasamīpāntare vā yaḥ kleśān prajahāti so 'ntarāparinirvāyī /
SA01vakobhau:8365: sa punardhātugato vā parinirvāti saṃjñāgato vā vitarkagato vā /
SA01vakobhau:8369: prathamo vā rūpadhātau nikāyasabhāgaparigrahaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāti /
SA01vakobhau:8375: upapadyaparinirvāyī punaḥ prakarṣayuktāṃ saṃgītimanupraviśya parinirvāti bhūyasā vā āyurūpahatya nopapannamātra eveti ta ete sarve 'pi śakalikādidṛṣṭāntairna saṃvadhyante /
SA01vakobhau:8384: saṃjñayā ṣaṭṭikāṃ kṛtvā vargo bhavati samuditaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:8391: kimidānīṃ kurmo yacchāstā ca parinirvṛtaḥ śāsanaṃ cedamanāyakaṃ bahudhā bhinnaṃ bhidyate cādyāpi yathecchaṃ granthataścārthataśca /
SA01vakobhau:8393: yeṣāṃ tu tāvadayamāgamaḥ pramāṇaṃ teṣāmāgamato 'pi siddho 'ntarābhavaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8395: yattarhi sūtra uttam “atha ca punardūṣī māraḥ svaśarīreṇāvicau mahānarake prapatita” iti /
SA01vakobhau:8403: atyudīrṇaparipūrṇāni hi karmāṇi kāyasya nikṣepaṃ na pratīkṣante /
SA01vakobhau:8405: ato 'sya dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma pūrvaṃ vīpakvaṃ paścādupapadyavedanīyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:8407: idamidānīṃ kathaṃ nīyate “pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi yāni kṛtvopacitya samanantaraṃ narakeṣūpapadyata” iti /
SA01vakobhau:8418: na kālāntaraṃ jīvitvā ko vā 'ntarābhavasyopapadyamānatvaṃ necchati /
SA01vakobhau:8429: vāso 'pi hi nāsti te 'ntarā pātheyaṃ ca na vidyate tave” ti //
SA01vakobhau:8449: ato yāṃ gatiṃ gantā bhavati tasyāṃ gatau ya āgamiṣyatpūrvakālabhavastasyaivāsyākṛtirbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:8451: evaṃ tarhi śunīprabṛtīnāmekasmin kukṣau pāñcagatiko 'ntarābhavo 'bhinirvarttate iti nārako 'ntarābhavaḥ kukṣiṃ nirdahet /
SA01vakobhau:8453: pūrvakālabhave 'pi tāvannārakā na nityaṃ prajvalitā bhavantyutsadeṣu bhramantaḥ kiṃ punarantarābhavikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8457: sa tu yathā na draṣṭuṃ śasyate tathā na spraṣṭumapyacchatvādātmabhāvasyetyacodyametat /
SA01vakobhau:8461: pramāṇaṃ tu yathā pañcaṣaḍvarṣasya dārakasya sa tu ṣaṭindriyo bhavati bodhisattvasya punaryathā saṃpūrṇayūnaḥ salakṣaṇānuvyañjanaśca /
SA01vakobhau:8463: ata evāntarābhavasthena mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśatā koṭīśataścāturdvīpikānāmavabhāsitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8465: yattarhi mātā bodhisatvasya svapne gajapotaṃ pāṇḍaraṃ kukṣiṃ praviśantamadrākṣīt /
SA01vakobhau:8472: aśucikapiḥ paṭakalahāviti daśa dṛṣṭā nṛpeṇa kṛkiṇā svapnāḥ” //
SA01vakobhau:8474: naiva cāntarābhavikaḥ kukṣiṃ bhittvā praviśatyapi tu māturyonidvāreṇa /
SA01vakobhau:8476: ata eva yamalayoryaḥ paścāt prajāyate sa jyāyānucyate yaḥ pūrvaṃ sa kanīyāniti /
SA01vakobhau:8487: kavīnāṃ ca kāvyaṃ samāyojayatāṃ kecit bhāvāḥ samāropitā gacchanti /
SA01vakobhau:8491: yathā 'sya mātā svapne taṃ praviśantamadrākṣittathā so 'pi gāthāmakārṣīditi /
SA01vakobhau:8497: bodhisattvasya savastraḥ śuklāyāśca bhikṣuṇyāḥ praṇidhānavaśādhyāvantameva pariveṣṭitā nirdagdhā /
SA01vakobhau:8513: tasmāt pareṇa maraṇakṣaṇaṃ paryudasyānyaḥ sarvo bhavaḥ pūrvakālabhavaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8515: caramakṣaṇo maraṇabhabo yata ūrdhvamantarābhavo bhavati rūpiṣu cetsattveṣūpapadyate /
SA01vakobhau:8523: yeṣāṃ ca divyaṃ cakṣuḥ suviśuddhamabhijñāmayaṃ ta enaṃ paśyanti /
SA01vakobhau:8555: tathā hi pradīptāyaḥpiṇdabhede tanmadhyasaṃbhūtaḥ krimirūpalabdhaḥ śrūyate /
SA01vakobhau:8557: yasyāṃ ca gatau sa utpatsyamānastasyāḥ sarvathā /
SA01vakobhau:8582: yāvadupapattisāmagrīṃ na labhate nahi tasyāyuṣaḥ pṛthagevākṣepaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8587: yadyāsumeroḥ sthalaṃ māṃsasya syāttatsarva varṣāsu krimīṇāṃ pūryeta /
SA01vakobhau:8589: kimidānīṃ tatpratīkṣā eva teṣāmantarābhavā āsan kuto yā tadā tebhyo gatā iti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:8597: te taṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā gandharasābhigṛddhāḥ kālaṃ kurvantaḥ krimibhāvasaṃvarttanīyaṃ karma pravodhya tayā tṛṣṇayā krimiṣūpapadyanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:8599: athavā nūnaṃ tatpratyayapracūra eva kāle tatsaṃvarttanīyāni karmāṇi vīpākābhinirvṛttau vṛttiṃ labhnte nānyatra /
SA01vakobhau:8601: tathāhi cakravarttisaṃvarttanīyāni karmaṇi aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ vahutarāyuṣi vā cakravarttino jāyante nānyasyām /
SA01vakobhau:8603: ata eva coktaṃ bhagavatā “acintyaḥ sattvānāṃ karmavipāka” iti /
SA01vakobhau:8607: yadi tāvatā sāmagrīṃ na labhate tatraiva punaścyutyā jāyante /
SA01vakobhau:8613: sa hi saṃbhavaiṣitvātsamdhāvagatvā samdhiṃ badhnātīti yathātvasamagrāḥ pratyayā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:8615: niyataṃ cānena tasmin deśe tasyāṃ jātau janitavyaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:8619: athāniyātaṃ tato 'nyatra deśe tasyāṃ jātau jāyate sadṛśyā mityapare /
SA01vakobhau:8621: tadyathā gavāmūṣmasu maithunasya prācuryaṃ śaradi śunāṃ ṛkṣānāṃ hemante cākṣvānām /
SA01vakobhau:8623_0: gavayaśṛgālakharatarakṣāṇāṃ punaḥ kālo nāstīti yenānyatra kāle goṣūpapattavyaṃ sa
SA01vakobhau:8623_1: gavayeṣūpapadyate yena śvas sa śṛgāleṣu yenāśvesu sa gardabheṣu yena ṛkṣeṣu sa tarakṣeṣūpapadyate iti /
SA01vakobhau:8625: na tvasya nikāyasabhāgāntarābhavo nānyatra nikāyasabhāge śakyamutpattumekakāmākṣepāditi vaktavyametat /
SA01vakobhau:8631: sa hi karmaprabhāvasaṃbhūtena cakṣuṣā sudūrastho 'pi svamupapattideśaṃ prekṣate /
SA01vakobhau:8633: tatrāsya mātāpitrostāṃ vipratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā puṃsaḥ sataḥ pauṃsno rāga utpadyate mātari stryā satyā straiṇo rāgāḥ udpadyate pitari /
SA01vakobhau:8637: evaṃ paṭhacyate prajñaptau “gandharvasya tasmin samaye dvayościttayoranyatarānyataraccittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaṃ bhavatyanunayasahagataṃ vā pratighasahagataṃ veti /
SA01vakobhau:8639: sa tābhyāṃ viparyasto rantukāmatayā tam deśamāśliṣya tāmavasthāmātmanyadhimucyate /
SA01vakobhau:8645: sa cetpumān bhavati māturdakṣiṇakukṣimāśritya pṛṣṭhābhimukha utkeṭukaḥ saṃbhavatyatha strī tato vāmakukṣimāśrityodarābhimukhī /
SA01vakobhau:8647: athedānīṃ napuṃsakaṃ tadyena rāgeṇāśliṣṭaṃ tathā tiṣṭhati /
SA01vakobhau:8651: athaḥ strībhūtaḥ puruṣabhūto vā 'nupraviśya yathāsthānaṃ tiṣṭhati paścāt garbha āpyāyamāno napuṃsakaṃ bhavatīti” /
SA01vakobhau:8660: anindriyaṃ hi śukraśoṇitamantarābhavena sārdhaṃ nirudhyate sendriyaṃ prādurbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:8664: evaṃ ca kṛtvedaṃ sūtrapadaṃ sūtre sūnītaṃ bhavati “mātāpitraśucikalalasaṃbhutasye“ti /
SA01vakobhau:8666: tathā “dīrgharātraṃ yuṣmābhirbhikṣivaḥ katasiḥ saṃvarddhitā rudhiravindurūpātta” iti /
SA01vakobhau:8673: evaṃ tāvadaṇḍajāṃ jarāyujāṃ ca yorni pratipadyate /
SA01vakobhau:8681: saṃsvedajāṃ yoniṃ pratipadyamāna upapattisthānaṃ gatvābhilāṣāt gacchatyamedhyaṃ medhyaṃ vā yathākramam /
SA01vakobhau:8689: sa hi śītavātavarṣābhiṣekairātmānaṃ bādhyamānaṃ paśyati narakeṣu cāgniṃ dīpyamānam /
SA01vakobhau:8693: punastaptavātātapāgnisaṃtāpairātmānaṃ bādhyamānamanupaśyan śaityaṃ ca narakeṣu śītābhilāṣāddhāvati /
SA01vakobhau:8695: yad avasthas tad upapattisaṃvarttanīyaṃ karmākārṣīt tadavasthātmānaṃ tāśca sattvān paśyan dhāvatīti pūrvācāryāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8697: tatra punardevāntarābhava ūrdhvaṃ gacchatyā sanādivottiṣṭhan manuṣyatiryakpretānāṃ manuṣyādivat /
SA01vakobhau:8732: kaścit punaḥ sarvāṇyevāsaṃprajānan karoti praviśatyasaṃprajānan tiṣṭhati niṣkrāmatyapi /
SA01vakobhau:8740: aṇḍajaḥ sattvo nityaṃ mūḍha eva sarvāṇi karoti /
SA01vakobhau:8746: tadyathā “saṃkṛtamabhisaṃskarotī“ti sūtre odanaṃ pacatīti saktum pinaṣṭīti loke /
SA01vakobhau:8750: kathaṃ punarasaṃprajānan mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśati yāvanniṣkrāmati kathaṃ vā saṃprajānan /
SA01vakobhau:8752: alpeśākhyasya tāvatsattvasya mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśataḥ evaṃ vīparītau saṃjñādhimokṣau pravarttete /
SA01vakobhau:8756: śītaṃ durdinaṃ mahato vā janakāyasya kolāhalaṃ hnta tṛṇagahanaṃ vā praviśāmi vanagahanaṃ vā tṛṇakuṭīṃ vā parṇakuṭīṃ vā vṛkṣamūlaṃ vā sarpāmi kuṇḍayamūlaṃ veti /
SA01vakobhau:8760: maheśākhyasya tu sattvasyārāmaṃ vā praviśāmyudyānaṃ vāprāsādaṃ vā 'bhirohāmi kūṭāgāraṃ vā paryaṅka veti /
SA01vakobhau:8766: saṃprajānaṃstu samyak prajānāti mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśāmyatraiva tiṣṭhāmi ata eva niryāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:8779: sa hi praviśatyeva saṃprajānan na tiṣṭhati nāpi niṣkrāmati /
SA01vakobhau:8793: ta eva tvete cakravarttyādaya evaṃbhūtā yujyante yathākramam /
SA01vakobhau:8799: yadi sattvo lokāntaraṃ saṃcaratīti pratijñāyate siddha ātmā bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:8805: kīdṛśa ātmā ya imān nikṣipatyanyāśca skndhān pratisaṃdadhātīti parikalpyate /
SA01vakobhau:8809: evaṃ tūktaṃ bhagavatā “asti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhān pratisaṃdadhātyanyatra dharmasaṃketāt /
SA01vakobhau:8811: tatrāyaṃ dharmasaṃketo yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇa pratītyasamutpādaḥ ”/
SA01vakobhau:8819: evaṃ tarhi skandhā eva lokāntaraṃ saṃcarantīti prāptaṃ skandhamātraṃ tu nātra saṃcaratīti /
SA01vakobhau:8825: kṣaṇikā hi skandhāsteṣāṃ saṃcarituṃ nāsti śaktiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8827: kleśaistu paribhāvitaṃ karmabhiśca kleśamātramantarābhāsaṃjñikayā saṃtatyā mātuḥ kukṣimāyāti /
SA01vakobhau:8829: tadyathā pradīpaḥ kṣaṇiko 'pi saṃtatyā deśāntaramiti nāstyeṣa doṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8831: tasmātsiddhametadasatyapyātmani kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛṭaḥ skandhānāṃ saṃtāno mātuḥ kukṣimāpadyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:8839: nahi sarvasya skandhasantānasyākṣepastulyo bhavatyāyupyasya karmaṇo bhedāt /
SA01vakobhau:8841: ato yasya yāvānākṣpastasya tāvatī vṛddhiḥ krameṇa bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:8855_0: tasya khalu kālāntareṇa paripākaprāptasya garbhaśatlasyābhyantarāt mātuḥ kukṣau karmavipākajā
SA01vakobhau:8855_1: vāyavo vānti ye taṃ garbhaśalyaṃ saṃparivarttya mātuḥ kāyāvakṣaradvārābhimukhamavasthāpayanti /
SA01vakobhau:8857: sakrūrapurīṣapiṇḍa ivātimātraṃ sthānāt pracyuto duḥkhaṃ saṃparivarttyate /
SA01vakobhau:8859_0: yadi punaḥ kadācinmāturāhāravihārakriyāpacāreṇa ca pūrvakarmāparādhena garbha eva
SA01vakobhau:8859_1: vyāpādaṃ prāpnoti tata enaṃ tajjñāstriyaḥ kumārabhṛtyakā vā sukhoṣṇena sarpistailena
SA01vakobhau:8859_2: supiṣṭena śālmalīkalkenānyena vā hastamabhyajya tīkṣṇaṃ tanukaṃ cātra śastrakamupanivadhya
SA01vakobhau:8861: sa cāpyaparaparyāyavedanīyena karmaṇā pūrvakeṇa kāmapi gatiṃ nīyate /
SA01vakobhau:8863_0: atha punaḥ svasti prajāyate tata enaṃ mātā putrābhilāṣiṇī tatparikā vā striyaḥ sadyojātakaṃ
SA01vakobhau:8863_1: taruṇavrṇāyamānātmānaṃ śastrakṣārā yamāṇasaṃsparśābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ parigṛhya snāpayanti
SA01vakobhau:8863_2: stanyena sarpipā vāpyāyayanti audārikaṃ cāhāramāhartuṃ krameṇābhyāsayanti /
SA01vakobhau:8865: tasya vṛddheranvayādindriyāṇāṃ paripākānpunarapi kleśāḥ samudācaranti karmaṇi copacayaṃ gacchanti /
SA01vakobhau:8867: saḥ taiḥ kāyasya bhedādantarābhavasaṃtatyā pūrvavat paralokaṃ punaryāti /
SA01vakobhau:8871: etena prakāreṇa kleśakarmahetukaṃ janma taddhetukāni punaḥ kleśakarmāṇi tebhyaḥ punarjanmetyanādibhavacakrakaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:8873: ādau hi parikalpyamāne tsyāhetukatvameteṣu sajyeta sati cāhetukatve sarvamevedamahetukaṃ prāduḥsyāt /
SA01vakobhau:8875: dṛṣṭaṃ cāṅkurādīṣu vījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ deśakālapratiniyamādagnyādīnāṃ ca pākajādiṣviti nāsti nirhetukaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8888: tatra dvādaśāṅgāni avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavo jātirjarāmaraṇaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:8906: parīpūro 'syāstīti paripūro ya etāni sarvāṇyevāvasthāntarāṇi spṛśati so 'tra pudgalo 'bhipreto na tu yo 'ntarāla eva mriyate /
SA01vakobhau:8910: tathā hi mahānidānaparyāye kāmāvacara eva pudgalo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8914: yadā tu dvividhaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ucyate paurvāntikaścāparāntikaśceti tadā saptāṅgāni paurvāntiko yāvadvedanāntaḥ pañcāparāntikaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8932: pūrvajanmanyeva yā puṇyādikarmāvasthā seha saṃskārā ityucyante yasya karmaṇa iha vipākaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8936: mātuḥ kukṣī pratisaṃdhikṣaṇe pañca skandhā vijñānam /
SA01vakobhau:8942: saṃdhicittāt pareṇa yāvat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ notpadyate sā 'vasthā nāmarūpaṃ tāvat ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:8948: utpanne ṣaḍāyatane sāvasthā tāvat ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate yāvadindriyaviṣayavijñānatrikasaṃnipātaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8954: sa yāvadvedanātrayakāraṇaparicchedena samartho bhavati sā 'vasthā sparśa ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:8966: upādānaṃ tu bhogānāṃ prāptaye paridhāvataḥ // VAkK_3.23 //
SA01vakobhau:8968: yasyāmavasthāyāṃ viṣayaprāptaye paryeṣṭimāpannaḥ sarvato dhāvatyasāvavasthā upādānamityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:8972: sa bhaviṣyat bhavaphalaṃ kurute karma tat bhavaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8974: sa viṣayāṇāṃ prāptihetoḥ paridhāvan paunarbhavikaṃ karmopacinoti so 'sya bhavaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8976: tena hi karmaṇā punaritaḥ pracyutasyāyatyāṃ pratisaṃdhirbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:9016: teṣāṃ dharmāṇāmutsarjanaṃ jātiḥ parīpāko jarā bhaṅgo maraṇamiti /
SA01vakobhau:9031: yadyaṅgamaṅgaṃ pañca skandhāḥ kiṃ kāraṇamavidyādīneva dharmān kīrttayati sma /
SA01vakobhau:9037: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sūtre dvādaśāṅga uktaḥ prakaraṇeṣvanyathā “pratītyasamutpādaḥ katamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9043: tathāvasthikaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ prākarṣikaḥ sāṃbandhikaḥ sattvākhyo 'sattvākhyaśceti bhedaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9051: tatra pūrvāntasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicikitsā kiṃ nva hamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani āhosvinnābhūvaṃ ko nvahamabhūvaṃ kathaṃ nvahamabhūvamiti /
SA01vakobhau:9053: aparāntasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicicitsā kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvanīti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9055: madhyasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicikitsā kimsvididaṃ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāma iti /
SA01vakobhau:9057_0: etasya trividhasya saṃmohasya vyāvarttanārthaṃ sattvākhya eva trikāṇḍaśca pratītyasamutpāda
SA01vakobhau:9057_1: upadiṣṭaḥ sūtre yathākramamavidyā saṃskārāśca jātirjarāmaraṇaṃ ca vijñānaṃ yāvat bhavaśca /
SA01vakobhau:9059: tathāhi sūtra evoktaṃ “yataśca bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā pratītyasamutpādaśca pratītyasamutpannāśca dharmā evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā dṛṣṭā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:9061: sa na pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati kiṃ nvahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvanī“ti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9065: tasyaiva hyete hetava iti sa punareṣa dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādastrisvabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9092: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ madhye phalahetū viśālitau /
SA01vakobhau:9103: madhyenaiva hi pūrvāntāparāntayorapi hetuphalavistaraḥ śakyo 'numānumiti noktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9107: yadi khalu dvādaśāṅga eva pratītyasamutpāda evaṃ satyavidyāyā anupadiṣṭahetukatvādādimān saṃsāraḥ prāpnoti jarāmaraṇasya cānupadiṣṭaphalatvādantavān /
SA01vakobhau:9114: kleśāt kleśaḥ kriyā caiva tato vastu tataḥ punaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9124: vastuno vastuvijñānānāmarūpaṃ yāvat sparśādvedanā jāteśca jarāmaraṇam /
SA01vakobhau:9128: yasmādeṣa nayo vyavasthito bhavāṅgānāṃ tasmādavidyā 'pi kleśasvabhāvā vastunaḥ kleśādveti jñāpitaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:9130: vedanāvaśācca jarāmaraṇavastunaḥ punaḥ kleśo bhāvīti nātra punaḥ kiñcidupasaṃkhyeyam /
SA01vakobhau:9132: “evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatī“ti vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:9146: satyapi cāntarbhāve kathamatredaṃ jñāpitaṃ bhavatyayoniśomanaskārahetukā avidyeti /
SA01vakobhau:9148: yadi tarhyantarbhāvenaiva hetuphalabhāvo vijñāyate tṛṣṇā 'vidyayorapi tarhi tatrāntarbhāvā daṅgantaratvaṃ śakyamakarttum /
SA01vakobhau:9156: “cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate āvilo manaskāro mohaja” iti /
SA01vakobhau:9162: ataḥ sparśakāle bhavannayoniśomanaskāro vedanāsahavarttinyā avidyāyāḥ pratyayabhāvena siddha iti nāstyahetukatvamavidyāyā na cāṅgāntaramupasaṃkhyeyam /
SA01vakobhau:9175: nahi niravadyā vedanā tṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayībhavatyarhatāṃ na cāvīparītaḥ sparśaḥ kliṣṭāyā vedanāyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9177: naca punarniravadyasyārhataḥ sparśo viparīta ityanayā yuktyā /
SA01vakobhau:9181: yauvat yuktyā saṃbhavati tāvadanuktam gamyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:9192: pravṛttisaṃmūḍebhyo vineyebhyaḥ kathaṃ paralokādihaloka ihalokācca punaḥ paralokaḥ saṃbadhyata ityetāvato 'trārthasya vivakṣitatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:9198: uktaṃ bhagavatā “pratītyasamutpādaṃ vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi pratītyasamutpannāṃśca dharmānityathaka eṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9202: ubhyaṃ hi sarve saṃskṛtā dharmā iti /
SA01vakobhau:9212: te 'pi cetitāḥ kuśalayā cetanayā prāptiṃ prati /
SA01vakobhau:9215: tajjātīyatvāttattatraivātideśo yathā naca tāvadrūpyate rūpaṃ cocyate tajjātīyatvādityadoṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9228: yadapakṣaya pratītyasamutpādo na tadevāpekṣya pratītyasamutpannaṃ hetuphalavat pitṛputravacca /
SA01vakobhau:9230: sthavirapūrṇāśaḥ kilāha syāt pratīyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpannā dharmā iti /
SA01vakobhau:9242: kiṃ khalvetā iṣṭaya ucyante yā yasyeṣṭirāhosvitsūtrārthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9250: yattāvaduktamā “vasthika eṣa pratītyasamutpādo dvādaśa pañcaskandhikā avasthā dvādaśaṅgānī” tyetadutsūtram /
SA01vakobhau:9257: yacca nītārthaṃ na tat punarneyaṃ bhavatīti naiṣa sūtrārthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9259: na vai sarvaṃ nirdeśato nītārthaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:9271: yata eṣāmaparipūrṇo nirdeśaḥ syādapi tu keśādibhireva pṛthivīdhātuḥ tatra nirdeśyate /
SA01vakobhau:9273: na ca keśādīnabhyatītyāpyasti pṛthivīdhāturiti saṃpūrṇa evāsya nirdeśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9275: evamihāpyavidyādīnāṃ paripūrṇa eva nirdeśo na sāvaśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9277: nanu cābhyatītyāpi keśādīnaśrukheṭa śiṅghāṇakā diṣvasti pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9281: yadva “punaranyadapyasmin kāye khakūkhaṭaṃ kharagatamiti vacanāt bhavatu vā tathaivāvidyāvaśeṣo yadi śakyate darśayitum /
SA01vakobhau:9285: yadyapi ca tāsvavasthāsu pañca skandhā vidyante yasya tu bhāvābhāvayoryasya bhāvābhāvaniyamaḥ tadevāṅgaṃ vyavasthāpayitum /
SA01vakobhau:9287: satyapi ca pañcaskandhake 'rhataḥ saṃskārā na bhavanti pañcaskandhahetukāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9292: tathā puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyopagaṃ ca vijñānaṃ tṛṣṇā dayaśceti /
SA01vakobhau:9296: yadapyuktaṃ “heturatra samutpādaḥ samutpannaṃ phalaṃ yāvaccatuṣkoṭika” iti /
SA01vakobhau:9302: yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇoktvā iti yā 'tra dharmatā dharmasthititā yāvadaviparyastatā ayamucyate pratītyasamutpāda” iti /
SA01vakobhau:9304: dhrmatā ca nāma dharmajātiḥ dharmāṇāṃ śailiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9306: ato yeyaṃ dharmatā ya eṣa niyamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9311: yadapi catuṣkoṭikamuktaṃ tatra yadyanāgatāḥ dharmā na pratītyasamutpannāḥ sūtraṃ virudhyate /
SA01vakobhau:9327: yadyayamabhiprāya utpādadvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā nityamavidyādīn pratītya saṃskārādīnāmanutpādo na kadācidapratītyānyadvā pratītyāto nitya iti evametaditi pratigrāhyam /
SA01vakobhau:9329: athāyamabhiprāyaḥ pratītyasamutpādo nāma kiñcit bhāvāntaraṃ nityamastīti /
SA01vakobhau:9336: na ca nityaṃ bhāvāntaramanityasya lakṣaṇaṃ yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:9338: utpādaśca nāmotpatturbhavatīti ko 'syāvidyādibhirabhisambandho yatasteṣāṃ pratītyasamutpāda ityucyeta /
SA01vakobhau:9346: upasargavaśena dhātvarthapariṇāmāt prāpyeti yo 'rthaḥ so'rthaḥ pratītyeti /
SA01vakobhau:9355: ekasya hi kartturdvayoḥ kriyayoḥ pūrvakālāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ ktvāvidhirbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:9359: nacāsau pūrvamutpādāt kaścidasti yaḥ pūrvaṃ pratītyottarakālamutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:9366: saha cet ktvā na siddho 'tra pūrvakālavidhānata” iti //
SA01vakobhau:9371: kimavastho dharmaḥ utpadyate varttamāna utāho 'nāgate iti /
SA01vakobhau:9380: athānāgata utpadyate kathamasataḥ kartṛtvaṃ siddhatyakartṛkā vā kriyeti /
SA01vakobhau:9382: ato yadavastha utpadyate tadavastha eva pratyeti /
SA01vakobhau:9389: aniṣpannaṃ cedaṃ yaduta śābdikīyaṃ kartṛkriyāvyavasthānaṃ bhavatītyeṣa karttā bhūtirityeṣā kriyā /
SA01vakobhau:9391: na cātra bhaviturarthāt bhūtimanyāṃ kriyāṃ paśyāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9396: asmin satyasya bhāvaḥ asyotpādādidamutpadyata iti yo 'rthaḥ so 'rthaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti /
SA01vakobhau:9402: sahakāle 'pi ca ktvā 'sti dīpaṃ prāpya tamo gatam /
SA01vakobhau:9403: āsyaṃ vyādāya śete ca paścāccetkiṃ na saṃvṛte //“
SA01vakobhau:9412: tāṃ tāṃ kāraṇa sāmagrīṃ prati ityānāṃ samavāyenotpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti /
SA01vakobhau:9416: iha kathaṃ bhaviṣyati “cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānamiti“ti /
SA01vakobhau:9418: kimarthaṃ punarbhagavān paryāyadvayamāha “asmin satīdaṃ bhavati asyotpādādidamutpadyate” iti /
SA01vakobhau:9422: yathā 'nyatrāha “avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃskārā bhavanti nānyatrāvidyāyāḥ saṃskārā” iti /
SA01vakobhau:9426: asminnaṅge satīdaṃ bhavati asya punaraṅgasyotpādādidamutpadyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:9430: pūrvānte sati madhyānto bhavati madhyāntasyotpādādaparānta utpadyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:9434: kadāciddhi samanantaramavidyāyāḥ saṃskārā bhavanti kadācit pāraṃparyeṇeti /
SA01vakobhau:9438: nāsati heto bhāvo bhavati na cānutpattimato nityāt prakṛtipuruṣādikātkiñcidutpadyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:9440: asyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ pūrvapadasya grahaṇamanarthakaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:9444: santi tarhi kecidya ātmani satyāśrayabhūte saṃskārādīnāṃ bhāvaṃ parikalpayanti avidyādīnāṃ cotpādāttadutpattim /
SA01vakobhau:9446: atastām kalpanāṃ paryudāsayitumidaṃ nirdhārayāṃvabhūva yasyaivotpādādyadutpadyate tasminneva sati tat bhavati nānyasmin /
SA01vakobhau:9448: yadutā “vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati“ti /
SA01vakobhau:9461: utpāde tvadhikṛte kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ sthitivacanasya bhinnakramaṃ ca bhagavān kimarthamācakṣita prāk sthitiṃ paścādutpoādam /
SA01vakobhau:9463: punarāha “asmin satīdaṃ bhavatī“ti “kārye sati kāraṇasya vināśo bhavatī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:9465: syānmata mahetukaṃ tarhi kāryamutpadyata ityata āha nāhetukam /
SA01vakobhau:9471: pūrvaṃ ca tāvat kāryasyotpādāne vācakṣata paścādasmin satīdaṃ na bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:9475: itarathā tu pratītyasamutpādaḥ katama ityāderarthe kaḥ prakramo vināśavacanasya /
SA01vakobhau:9479: kathaṃ puna “rvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvat jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇāmi“ti /
SA01vakobhau:9483_1: ātmanaḥ sukhārthamaduḥkhārthaṃ vā kāyādibhistrividhaṃ karmārabhate āyati sukhārthaṃ
SA01vakobhau:9489: evaṃ ca kṛtvā tadupapannaṃ bhavati vijñānāṅganirdeśe “vijñānaṃ katamat /
SA01vakobhau:9493: vijñānapūrvakaṃ punastasyāṃ tasyāṃ gatau nāmarūpaṃ jāyate pañcaskandhakaṃ kṛtsnajanmānugatam /
SA01vakobhau:9520: yathā ca nirgranthādīnāṃ nagno ghavatyacelaka iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9537: yathokta “mātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito natvatrātmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā” iti /
SA01vakobhau:9554: jātau satyāṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ yathā niriṣṭaṃ sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:9562: sa eva tu vaibhāṣikanyāyo yaḥ pūrvamuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9578: yathā mitraviparyayeṇa tadvipakṣabhūtaḥ kaścidamitro bhavati na tu yaḥ kaścidanyo mitrānnāpi mitrābhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9608: sā ca dṛṣṭisvabhāvā iti nāvidyā yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:9610: yā tarhi na dṛṣṭiḥ sā bhaviṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:9617: avidyā cet prajñā 'bhaviṣyanna dṛṣṭistayā yujyate saṃprāyokṣyata /
SA01vakobhau:9625: “rāgopakliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ nāvamucyate avidyopakliṣṭā prajñā na viśudhyatī“tyuktam sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:9627: na ca saiva prajñā tasyāḥ prajñāyā upakleśo yukta iti /
SA01vakobhau:9629: yathā cittasyānyo bhinnajātīya upakleśo rāga evaṃ prajñāyā avidyā /
SA01vakobhau:9633: kliṣṭayā prajñayā kuśalā prajñā vyavkīryamāṇā na viśudhyati /
SA01vakobhau:9641: uapahataṃ tu tattathā rāgeṇa bhavati yanna vimucyate /
SA01vakobhau:9650: yo 'pi manyate “sarvakleśā avidye“ti tasyāpyata eva vyudāsaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9652: sarvakleśasvabhāvā 'pi satī saṃyojanādiṣu pṛthagnocyeta dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyeta /
SA01vakobhau:9654: anyena vā kleśena dṛṣṭyādīnāṃ paraṃparāsaṃprayogāt cittamapi cāvidyopakleṣṭamevoktaṃ bhavet /
SA01vakobhau:9666: yadi yanna saṃprakhyānaṃ saṃprakhyānābhāve 'pi tathaiva doṣo yathā avidyāyām /
SA01vakobhau:9670: tadidaṃ tathaiva na jñāyate kiṃ taditi /
SA01vakobhau:9680_0: yā 'sau sūtra uktā “so 'hamevaṃ jñātvā evaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvāsāṃ tṛṣṇānāṃ sarvāsāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ
SA01vakobhau:9680_1: sarvāsāṃ mayatānāṃ sarveṣāmahaṅkāramamakārāsmimānābhiniveśānuśayānāṃ prahāṇāt parijñānānniśchāyo nivṛta” iti /
SA01vakobhau:9685: yata eṣā nānyaḥ kleśaḥ śakyate vaktum /
SA01vakobhau:9701: yadidaṃ loke pratītaṃ teṣāṃ teṣāmarthānāṃ pratyāyakaṃ gauraśvo rūpaṃ rasa ityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:9704: teṣu teṣv artheṣu tasya nāmno namanāt /
SA01vakobhau:9706: iha nikṣipte kāya upapattyantare namanānnāmarupiṇaḥ skandhā ityapare //
SA01vakobhau:9731: sarve ca te trayo 'pi sparśotpattau praguṇā bhavantīti /
SA01vakobhau:9735: keciddhi sakṛnnipātameva sparśa vyācakṣate sūtraṃ cātra jñāpakamānayanti “iti ya eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃgatiḥ saṃnipātaḥ samavāyaḥ sa sparśaḥ” iti /
SA01vakobhau:9737: kecitpunaścittasaṃprayuktaṃ dharmāntarameva sparśa vyācakṣate sūtraṃ cātra jñāpakamānayanti “ṣaṭṣaṭko dharmaparyāyaḥ katamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9750: tatra ye saṃnipātameva sparśamāhusta evaṃ kparihāramāhuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9758: na caivaṃ sparśabhūtāttrayādanyattrayamasti yasya śeṣasyātra grahaṇaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:9760: yadyapi hīndriyārthau syātāmavijñānakau na tu punrvijñānamanindriyārthakam /
SA01vakobhau:9762: tasmāttriṣu nirdiṣṭeṣu punaḥ sparśasya grahaṇamanarthakaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:9764: na khalu sarve cakṣurūpe sarvasya cakṣurvijñānasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi sarvaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ sarvayoścakṣurūpayoḥ kāryam /
SA01vakobhau:9766: ato yeṣāṃ kāryakāraṇābhāvaste sparśabhāve vyavasthāpitā ityeke /
SA01vakobhau:9768: ye punaḥ saṃnipātādanyaṃ sparśamāhusta etatsūtra kathaṃ pariharanti “iti ya eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃgatiḥ saṃnipātaḥ samavāyaḥ sa sparśa” iti /
SA01vakobhau:9774: saṃgateḥ saṃnipātāt samavāyāditi paṭhanti kāraṇe va kāryopacāro 'yamiti bruvanti /
SA01vakobhau:9794: yathoktaṃ “cakṣurvijñānena nīlaṃ vijānāti no tu nīlaṃ manovijñānena nīlaṃ vijānāti nīlamiti ca vijānātī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:9803: tena saṃprayuktaḥ sparśo 'dhivacanasaṃsparśa ityeka āśrayaprabhāvito dvitīyaḥ saṃprayogaprabhāvitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9816: anāsravaḥ sparśo vidyāsaṃsparśaḥ kliṣṭo 'vidyāsaṃsparśo vidyā 'vidyābhyāṃ saṃprayuktatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:9835: athavā vedyate tadvedayituṃ vā śakyamiti vedanīyam /
SA01vakobhau:9839: sukhaṃ vedanīyamasminniti sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśo yatra sukhaṃ veditamasti
SA01vakobhau:9847: tatra yaḥ pūrvaṃ ṣaḍvidhaḥ sparśa uktaḥ
SA01vakobhau:9863: atha kiṃ sparśāduttarakālaṃ vedanā bhavatyāhosvit samānakālam /
SA01vakobhau:9876: yadeva hīdaṃ sahotpannayorjanyajanakabhāvo nāstīti tadevedaṃ jāte dharme dharmasya nāstīti /
SA01vakobhau:9885: “cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa pratītya utpadyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā na tu cakṣuḥpaṃsparśajāṃ vedanāṃ pratītyotpadyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa” iti vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:9889: yo hi dharmo yasya dharmasya janakaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa tasmāt bhinnakālaḥ prasiddhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9891: tadyathā pūrvaṃ vījaṃ paścādaṅkuraḥ pūrvaṃ kṣīraṃ paścāddadhi pūrvamabhighātaḥ paścācchandaḥ pūrvaṃ manaḥ paścāt manovijñānamityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:9893: anyathā paraṃparāpekṣatvāt kāryakāraṇayoḥ sarvaṃ vā yugapadutpadyate na vā kadācit paścādviśeṣābhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:9899: tadyathā cakṣurvajñānādīnāṃ cakṣurūpādibhirbhūtabhautikānāṃ ca tatrāpi pūrvamindriyārthau paścādvijñānam /
SA01vakobhau:9901: pūrvakācca bhūtabhautikasamudāyāduttara utpadyata itīṣyamāṇe kaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:9903: yathā tarhi cchāyāṅkurayorevaṃ sparśavedanayo riti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9908: so 'sau trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayātpaścādvedanā tṛtīyakṣaṇa iti /
SA01vakobhau:9910: evaṃ tarhi na sarvantravajñāne vedanā prāpnoti na ca sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ sparśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9914: pūrvasparśahetukā hyuttaratra sparśe vedanā sarve ca sparśāḥ sarvavedanakāḥ sarvaṃ ca vijñānaṃ sparśa iti /
SA01vakobhau:9921: kathaṃ nāmānyajātīyālambanasparśasaṃbhūtā vedanā 'nyālambanā bhaviṣyati yena vā cittena saṃprayuktā tato bhinnālambaneti /
SA01vakobhau:9925: tasmācca yat pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ savedanakaṃ tanna sparśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9938: na vā eṣa mahābhūmikārthaḥ sarvatra citte daśa mahābhūmikāḥ saṃbhavantīti /
SA01vakobhau:9943: savitarkā savicārā bhumiḥ avitarkā vicāramātrā avitarkā vicārā bhūmiḥ
SA01vakobhau:9950: tadya etasyāṃ sarvasyāṃ bhūmau bhavanti te mahābhūmikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9962: yadi tarhi sparśāduttarakālalṃ vedanā sūtraṃ parihāryaṃ “cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sahajātā vedanā saṃjñā cetane“ti /
SA01vakobhau:9964: sahajātā ityucyate na sparśasahajātā iti kimatra parihāryam /
SA01vakobhau:9966: samanantare 'pi cāyaṃ sahaśabdo dṛṣṭastadyathā “maitrīsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃvodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayatī” tyajñāpakametat /
SA01vakobhau:9968: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ “yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā yā ca cetanā yacca vijñānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā ime dharmā nāsaṃsṛṣṭā” ityato nāsti vedanābhirasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ vijñānam /
SA01vakobhau:9972: tatra hi sūtra evamuktaṃ “yadvedayate taccetayate yaccetayate tastsaṃprajānīte yatsaṃprajānīte tadvijānātī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:9974: tanna vijñāyate kim tāvadayameṣāmālambananiyama ukta utāho kṣaṇaniyama iti /
SA01vakobhau:9978: yaccāpi sūtra uktaṃ “trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ” iti /
SA01vakobhau:9980: tat kathaṃ vijñānaṃ cāsti na ca trayāṇāṃ saṃnipāto na ca sparśa iti /
SA01vakobhau:9982: tasmādavaśyaṃ sarvatra vijñāne sparśaḥ sparśasahajā ca vedanaiṣṭavyā /
SA01vakobhau:9991: saiva caitasikī vedanā punarāṣṭadaśa manopavicāravyavasthānādaṣṭādadhā bhidyate /
SA01vakobhau:10038: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ “cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇyupavicarantītyevamādiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10051: itrathā hi kāmadhātau rūpadhātvālambanā rūpādyupavicārā na syuḥ kāmadhātbalamvanāśca rūpadhātau gandharasaspraṣṭavyopavicārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10053: yathā tu yaktataraṃ tathoktaṃ yo 'pi rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā śabdānupavicarati so 'pi manopavicāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10061: athaiṣāṃ manopavicārāṇāṃ kati kāmapratisaṃyuktāsteṣāṃ ca kati kimālambanā evaṃ yāvadārūpyapratisaṃyuktā vaktavyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10067: āmadhātau sarve 'ṣṭādaśa santi sa ca teṣāṃ sarveṣāmālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:10145: yeṣāṃ tat vyavacchinnālambanamasti yeṣāṃ punaḥ paripiṇḍitālambanaṃ teṣāṃ tatraika eva saṃbhinnālambano dharmopavicāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10169_0: kāmadhātūpapanno rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyālābhī kāmāvacaraiḥ sarvaiḥ prathamadvitīyadhyānabhūmikairaṣṭābhiḥ
SA01vakobhau:10169_2: kliṣṭenaivālābhī rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyā vitarāgaḥ sarvaiḥ kāmāvacaraiḥ
SA01vakobhau:10186: nahi yo yasmādvītarāgaḥ sa tadālambanamupavicaratīti yuktam /
SA01vakobhau:10188: ataḥ sāsravā api na sarve saumanasyādayo manopavicārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10195: anunīyate ca pratihanyate cāpratisṅkhyāya copekṣate yeṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ṣaṭ sātatā vihārā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:10197: cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā naiva sumanā bhavati na durmanā upekṣako viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan evaṃ yāvanmanasā dharmān vijñāyeti /
SA01vakobhau:10199: nahyarhato laukikaṃ nāsti kuśalaṃ dharmālambanaṃ saumanasyaṃ yattu tatsāṃkleśikaṃ manasa upavicārabhutaṃ tasyaiva pratiṣedho lakṣyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:10230: sa caiṣa pratītyasamutpādaḥ samāsataḥ kleśakarmavastūnīti prāk jñāpitam /
SA01vakobhau:10238: tadyathā vījādaṅkurakāṇḍapatrādīnāṃ prabhavo bhavatyevaṃ kleśāt kleśakarmavastūnām /
SA01vakobhau:10240: yathā nāgādhiṣṭitaṃ saro na śuṣyatyevaṃ kleśanāgādhiṣṭhitaṃ janmasaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10242: yathā cānapoddhṛtamūlā vanaspatayaśchinnāśchinnāḥ punarapi prarohantyevamanapoddhṛtakleśamūlā gatayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10244: yathā ca vṛkṣāḥ kālena kālalṃ puṣpaphalānāṃ prasotāro bhavantyevaṃ kleśā apyasakṛt kleśakarmavastūnāṃ heturbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:10246_0: yathā ca tuṣāvanaddhāstaṇḍulāḥ prarohaṇasamarthā bhavanti na kevalā evaṃ kleśaprāptatuṣāvanaddhaṃ
SA01vakobhau:10246_1: karma janmāntaravirohaṇe samarthaṃ bhavati na kevalamityevaṃ tāvat kleśo bījādivadveditavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10255: santyoṣadhayaḥ phalapākāntā evaṃ karmāṇi vipacya punarvipākānabhinirvarttayante /
SA01vakobhau:10257: yathā ca puṣpaṃ phalotpattavāsannaṃ kāraṇamevaṃ karmāṇi vipākotpatto veditavyāni /
SA01vakobhau:10261: pathā siddhamannaṃ pānaṃ ca kevalaṃ paribhogāya kalpyate na punarvirohāya evaṃ vipākākhyaṃ vastu /
SA01vakobhau:10265: yadi hi pravardheta mokṣo na syāt /
SA01vakobhau:10267: na khalveṣa janmasaṃtāna evaṃ pratītyasamutpadyamāno bhavacatuṣṭayaṃ nātikrāmati /
SA01vakobhau:10284: nahi sa kleśo 'sti yena pratisamdhibandhaḥ pratividyate ityābhidharmikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10288: yadyapi sā 'vasthā mandikā yastu yatrābhīkṣṇaṃ carita āsannaśca tasya tadānīṃ sa eva kleśa upatiṣṭhate /
SA01vakobhau:10306: kāmarūpadhātvoraparisaṃkhyānāt sarva eva catvāro bhavāḥ santītyanujñāpitaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:10314: eko dharmo bhagavatā svayamabhijñāyābhisaṃbadhyākhyāto “yaduta sarvasttvā āhārasthitikā” iti sūtrapadam /
SA01vakobhau:10355: yānyapi tu nābhyavahniyante sthitiṃ cāharanti tānyapi sūkṣma āhāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10365: āhāro hi nāma ya indriyamahābhūtānāmanugrahāya saṃvarttate /
SA01vakobhau:10367: rūpāyatanaṃ cābhyavaharaṇakāle svamindriyaṃ tanmahābhūtāni vā nānugṛhṇāti /
SA01vakobhau:10371: yadāpi ca dṛśyamāne sukhasaumanasye ādadhāti tadāpi tadālambanaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśa āhāro bhavati na rūpam /
SA01vakobhau:10379: cetanā manaskarma vijñānaṃ ca sāsravāṇyevāhārāḥ triṣvapi dhātuṣu saṃvidyante /
SA01vakobhau:10387: api tu sūtra uktaṃ “catvāra ime āhārā bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai saṃbhavaiṣiṇāṃ cānugrahāye“ti /
SA01vakobhau:10391: bhūtā hi tāvatsattvā upapannā iti vijñāyante /
SA01vakobhau:10411: “tathāsti pudgalo yasyābhinirvṛttisaṃyojanaṃ prahīṇaṃ nopapattisaṃyojanam” iti sūtra catuḥkoṭikāt /
SA01vakobhau:10422: atha katyāhārāḥ sattvānāṃ sthitaye kati saṃbhavaiṣiṇāmanugrahāya /
SA01vakobhau:10429: bhagavatā “atvāra ime āhārā rogasya mūlalṃ gaṇḍasya śalyasya jarāmaraṇasya pratyaya” iti /
SA01vakobhau:10433: evaṃ hi varṇayanti durbhikṣābhyāhatena kīla pitrā putrakau saktava iti bhasmanā bhastrāṃ paripūrya kīlake āsajyāśvāsitau /
SA01vakobhau:10435: tau ca tāṃ parikalpayantau ciramapyāsitau kenāpi codghāṭitāyāṃ bhasmeti nairāśyamāpannau vyāpannāviti /
SA01vakobhau:10437: punaśca mahāsamudre bhagnayānapātrāḥ puruṣāḥ sthalamiti mahāntaṃ phenapiṇḍaṃ pradrutāḥ āmṛśya cainaṃ nirāśā uparemuriti /
SA01vakobhau:10439: saṃgītiparyāye coktaṃ mahāsamudrādaudārikāḥ prāṇino jalāt sthalamabhiruhya sikatāsthale 'ṇḍāni sthāpayitvā sikatābhiravaṣṭabhya punarapi mahāsamudre 'vataranti /
SA01vakobhau:10441: tatra yāsāṃ mātṛṇāmaṇḍānyārabhya smṛtirna muṣyate tānyaṇḍāni na pūtībhavanti yāsāṃ tu muṣyate tāni pūtībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:10449: yeṣāmaṇḍānāṃ mātaramārabhya smṛtirna muṣyate tāni na pūtībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:10457: nanu ca sarva eva sāsravā dharmā bhavānāṃ poṣakāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10472: manaḥsaṃcetanayā punarbhavasyākṣepaḥ ākṣiptasya punaḥ karmaparibhāvitādvijñānavījādabhinirvṛttirityanayoranutpannasya bhavasyākaraṇe prādhānyam /
SA01vakobhau:10476: pūrvakau hi dvau dhātrīsthānīyau jātasya poṣakatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:10480: yaḥ kaścit kavaḍīkāraḥ sarvaḥ sa āhāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10484: prathamā koṭiryaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmapacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ ca paribhedaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10488: tṛtīyā yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10494: syāt sparśādīn pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhirna ca ta āhārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10498: yo 'pi hi paribhukto bhokturbādhāmādadhāti so 'pyāhāra eva /
SA01vakobhau:10502: dvayorhi kālayorāhāra āhārakṛtyaṃ karoti paribhujyamāno jīryaṃśceti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10512: yadyūpaghātako 'pyāhāro bhavati catuḥkoṭikaṃ bādhyate prakaraṇagranthaśca “kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ katamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10514: yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo bhavati mahābhutānāṃ ca vṛddhiryāpanā 'nuyāpaneti vistareṇa yāvadvijñānam /“
SA01vakobhau:10520: so 'pi hi jighatsāṃ pipāsāṃ hantuṃ samartha iti /
SA01vakobhau:10524: uktaṃ bhagavatā “yaśca bāhyakānāmṛṣīṇāṃ kāmebhyo vītarāgāṇāṃ śataṃ bhojayedyaścaikaṃ jambūṣaṇḍagataṃ pṛthagajanam /
SA01vakobhau:10536: syādyadi bhūyasaḥ pṛthagjanān bhojayitvā bhūyaḥ puṇyaṃ syāt nālpīyaso vītarāgāniti /
SA01vakobhau:10540: tadetanna varṇayanti “bahutaraṃ hi tasmai datvā puṇyaṃ nārhatkoṭibhya” iti /
SA01vakobhau:10542: ato nirvedhabhāgīyalābhī pṛthagjana eṣo'bhipretaḥ iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10544: natviyamanvarthā saṃjñā nāpikvacitparibhāṣitā sūtre śāstre vā /
SA01vakobhau:10548: bodhisattva eva tveṣu jambūdvīpaṣaṇḍeṣu niṣaṇṇo yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:10550: sa hi pṛthagjana kāmavairāgyasaṃbandhena tadānīṃ tebhyo viśiṣyamāṇa ukta iti /
SA01vakobhau:10556: itthaṃ caitadevaṃ yadevaṃ paryudasya bāhyakebhya eva srotāpatti phalapratipannakaṃ viśeṣayāṃbabhūva /
SA01vakobhau:10560: ukto yathā sattvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādo yathāvasthitiścyutirapyuktā yathāyuḥkṣayādibhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10563: katamasmin vijñāne vartamāne cyutyupapattī bhavata ityāha
SA01vakobhau:10571: ete ṣaṭ dharmā manovijñāna eveṣyante nānyatra /
SA01vakobhau:10597: yadā cāsyāśrayo vipariṇantumārabhate tadāvaśyamasya tadāśrayapratibaddhaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūya paścāt pracyaveta nānyathā /
SA01vakobhau:10615: atha mriyamāṇasya kasmin śarīrapradeśe vijñānaṃ nirudhyate /
SA01vakobhau:10630: teṣāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pādayornābhyāṃ hṛdaye ca vijñānaṃ saṃnirudhyate /
SA01vakobhau:10637: kāyendriyasya teṣu nirodhāt kāyendriyaṃ hi mriyamāṇasya tapta ivopale jalaṃ niṣṭhyūtaṃ saṃkocamāpadyamānaṃ pādādiṣvantardhīyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:10649_1: chidyanta iva na ca punastāni kāṣṭhādivacchidyante chinnabadvā punarna ceṣṭanta iti cchinnānyucyante /
SA01vakobhau:10662: kiṃ tu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputrasya pañcopanimittāni prādurbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:10664_0: vastrāṇāmābharaṇānāṃ ca manojñaḥ śabdo niścarati śarīraprabhā mandībhavati snātasyodabindavaḥ
SA01vakobhau:10664_1: kāye saṃtiṣṭhante capalātmanā 'pyekatra viṣaye buddhiravatiṣṭhate unmeṣanimeṣau cākṣṇoḥ saṃbhavataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10670: vāsāṃsi kliśyanti mālā mlāyanti kakṣābhyāṃ svedo mucyate daurgandhyaṃ kāye'vakrāmati sve cāsane devaputro nābhiramate /
SA01vakobhau:10672: so'yaṃ sattvaloka evamutpadyamānastiṣṭhan cyavamanaśca triṣu rāśiṣu sthāpito bhagavatā /
SA01vakobhau:10684: yattatparyādāya rāgaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya dveṣaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya mohaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya sarvakleśaprahāṇamidamucyate samyaktva“miti sūtram /
SA01vakobhau:10693: ete hi kleśakṣaye niyatatvāt samyaktvaniyatāḥ mokṣabhāgīyalābhino 'pyavaśyaṃ parinirvāṇadharmāṇa iti /
SA01vakobhau:10699: na ca te kālaniyamena samyaktve niyatā yathā saptakṛtvaḥ paramādayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10720: karmādhipatyena tasya yojanalakṣāṇāṃ ṣoḍaśakamudvedhaḥ pariṇāhenāsaṃkhyaṃ tathā ca dṛḍhaṃṃ yanmahālagno'pi vajreṇa bhettumaśaktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10738: yathā hi bhuktaṃ pītamannaṃ pānaṃ ca nāpakvaṃ pakvāśayamāpatatī tyeke /
SA01vakobhau:10751: sā kāñcanamayī mahī bhavatyapāmupariṣṭāt ukto jalakāñcanamaṇḍalocchrāyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10760: samantataḥ parikṣepeṇa tu parigaṇyamānaṃ triguṇaṃ jāyate ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣā daśasahasrāṇi sārdhāni ca trīṇi śatāni yojanānām /
SA01vakobhau:10794: suvarṇamayo rūpyamayo vaidūryamayaḥ sphaṭikamayaśca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ caturṣu pārśveṣu /
SA01vakobhau:10796: yacca yanmayaṃ pārśvaṃ sumerostasyānubhāvena tadvarṇa tasyāṃ diśi nabho dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:10800: tasyeha prabhānurāgeṇa vaidūryamayaṃ nabho dṛśyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:10806: tā hyāpo nānāvidhabījagarbhā bahuvidhaprabhāvabhinnairvāyubhirmathyamānāstāṃ tāṃ jātiṃ pariṇamayanti /
SA01vakobhau:10808: evaṃ ca punaḥ pariṇamayanti yadbhinnajātīyasya kāryaviśeṣotpattāvasamavadhānena pratyayībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:10810: na tu khalu yathā sāṃkhyānāṃ pariṇāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10818: sa eva hi dharmī na saṃvidyate yasyāvasthitasya dharmāṇāṃ pariṇāmaḥ kaspyeta /
SA01vakobhau:10827: tadeva cedaṃ na cedaṃ tatheti apūrvaiṣā vāyo yuktiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10829: evaṃ ca punaḥ saṃbhūtāḥ suvarṇādayaḥ karmaprabhāvāt preritairvāyubhiḥ samāhṛtya rāśīkriyante /
SA01vakobhau:10839: kāñcanamayyāḥ pṛthivyā uparyaśītiyyojanasahasrāṇyudakaṃ tatra te magnāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10843: iti hi meroḥ ṣaṣṭi yojanaśatasahasraṃ samucchrayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10849: tato 'rdhena īśādhara ityevamanyeṣvapyardhārdhahānirveditavyā yāvannimindharārdhenārdhatrayodaśottarāṇi trīṇi yojanaśatāni cakravāḍaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10853: yāvāneva caiṣāṃ jalādūrdhvaṃ samucchrāyastāvāneva ghano vistāra ityarthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10857: eṣāṃ ca nimindharāntanāṃ parvatānāṃ saptāntarāṇi sapta śītā ucyante pūrṇā aṣṭāṅgopetasya pānīyasya /
SA01vakobhau:10859: taddhi pānīyaṃ śītalaṃ ca svādu ca laghu ca mṛdu cācchaṃ ca niṣpratikaṃ ca pibataśca kaṇṭhaṃ na kṣiṇoti pītaṃ ca kukṣiṃ na vyābādhate /
SA01vakobhau:10877: pārśvatasriguṇo bhavati yugandharatīreṇa gaṇyamānaḥ catvāriṃśat sahasrāṇi lakṣadvayaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:10881: yugandharasyeṣādhārasya cāntaraṃ dvitīyā śītā ardhena prathamāyāścatvāriṃśat yojanasahasrāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:10894: taddhi bāhyo mahāsamudro lavaṇaṃ pūrṇaḥ hṣārodakasya /
SA01vakobhau:10908: tasya ca madhye kāñcanamayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ vajrāsanamabhinirvṛttaṃ yasminniṣadya sarve bodhisattvā vajropamaṃ samādhimutpādayanti //
SA01vakobhau:10910: nahi tamanya āśrayaḥ pradeśo vā soḍhuṃ samarthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10919: itaḥ pūrveṇa sumerupārśve pūrvaṃ videho dvīpaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10934: itaḥ paścimena sumerupārśve 'paragodānīyo dvīpaḥ sārdhāni sapta yojanasahasrāṇi sākalyena /
SA01vakobhau:10950: sarveṣu ca pārśveṣu samo yathaikaṃ pārśvaṃ dviyojanasahasre /
SA01vakobhau:10954: yaśca dvīpo yadākṛtistadākṛtīnyeva tatra manuṣyāṇāṃ mukhāni /
SA01vakobhau:10975: ihaiva jambūdvīpe uttareṇāsya jambūdvīpasya kṛṣṇaparvatāstrayastānatikramyāpare trayaḥ punaśca traya iti navabhyaḥ kīṭaparvatebhyaḥ pareṇa himavān parvataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10981: tasmāddhimavataḥ pareṇānavataptaṃ nāma saro gandhamādanādarvāk yataścatasro nadyaḥ sravnti gaṅga sindhuḥ śītā vakṣuśca /
SA01vakobhau:10989: tasyaiva cāntike jambūrabhinirvṛttā madhurasvādūni yasyāḥ phalāni tasyā adhikāreṇāyaṃ jambūdvīpa iti khyātaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10997: asyaiva jambūdvīpasyādho viṃśatyā yojanasahasrairavīcirmahānarako viṃśatisahasrapramāṇa evodvedhavistārābhyāmevamasyādharatalamitaścatvāriṃśatā yojanasahasrairbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:11001: anyeṣu sāntaraṃ duḥkham taddyathā saṃjīve cchinnāvabhinnasaṃpiṣṭaśarīrāṇāṃ śītalā vāyavo vānti punarapi tān sattvān saṃjīvayanti /
SA01vakobhau:11015: pratāpanastāpano mahārauravo rauravaḥ saṃghātaḥ kālasūtraḥ saṃjīvaśca /
SA01vakobhau:11042: yatra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nikṣipte saṃśīryate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitamutkṣipte pāde punarapi saṃjāyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitam /
SA01vakobhau:11044: kuṇapaṃ gūthamṛttikā yatra nyaṅkuṭā nāma prāṇinaḥ prativasanti sarvaśvetāḥ kṛṣṇaśirasaḥ sūcimukhāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yāvadasthīni bhindanti /
SA01vakobhau:11046: kṣuradhārācito mahāpathaḥ yatra teṣāṃ sattvānā manvākrāmatāṃ nikṣipte pāde saṃchidyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitamiti pūrvavat /
SA01vakobhau:11048: asipatravanaṃ yatra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tīkṣṇā asayaḥ saṃnipatanti aṅgapratyaṅgānyavakṛntanti śyāmaśabalāśca śvāno bhakṣayanti /
SA01vakobhau:11052: teṣāṃ sattvānāmabhirohatāṃ kaṇṭakā avāṅmukhībhavantaḥ kāyaṃ bhindanti avataratāṃ cordhvībhavantaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11058_0: caturtha utsado nadī vaitaraṇi pūrṇa taptasya kṣārodakasya yasyāṃ te sattvā asiśaktiprāsahastaiḥ
SA01vakobhau:11058_1: puruṣairubhābhyāṃ tīrābhyāṃ prativāryamāṇā ūrdhvamapi gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante
SA01vakobhau:11064: ta ete catvāra utsadā digbhedena ṣoḍaśocyante /
SA01vakobhau:11073: kiṃ te narakapālāḥ sattvasaṃkhyātā utāho neti /
SA01vakobhau:11083: duḥkhiteṣu ca nandanti jāyante yamarākṣasā” iti //
SA01vakobhau:11085: ye te yamenānuśiṣṭāḥ sattvān narakeṣu prakṣipanti ta ete yamarākṣasā uktā na tu ye kāraṇāḥ kārayantīti /
SA01vakobhau:11090: teṣveva narakeṣu hi ānantaryakāriṇāṃ vipākāvakāśastatra teṣāṃ ko vipratibandhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11103: tadyathā arvudo nirarvudaḥ aṭato hahavaḥ huhuvaḥ utpalaḥ padmo mahāpadmaśca /
SA01vakobhau:11121: teṣāmanekaprakalpo bhedaḥ sthānaṃ cāniyataṃ nadīparvatamarupradeśeṣvanyeṣu vā 'dhaśca bhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:11127: teṣāṃ kila mūlaṃ sthānaṃ mahāsamudrastato 'nyatra visṛtā iti /
SA01vakobhau:11131: tasya jambūdvīpasyādhastāt pañcayojanaśatāntaraparicchinnā rājadhānī teṣāṃ mūlasthānaṃ tato 'nyatra visṛtāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11161: sūryavimānasyādhastāt vahiḥ sphaṭikamaṇḍalaṃ taijasamabhinirvṛttaṃ tāpanaṃ prakāśanaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:11169: kiṃ punaścaturdvīpeṣu sūryo yugapat kṛtyaṃ karoti /
SA01vakobhau:11177: yadottarakurāvardharātraṃ tadā pūrvavidehe sūryasyāstaṅgamanaṃ jambūdvīpe madhyāhno godānīye udayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11186: varṣāṇāṃ dvitīye māse bhādrapade dvitīyasya pakṣasya navamyāṃ vardhate rātriḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11209: jambūdvipasya dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ gacchati bhāskare rātrivṛddhiḥ uttaraṃ gacchatyaharvṛddhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11216: yadā hi saurasya vimānasyāsanne cāndramasaṃ vimānaṃ vahati tadā kila sauryo bhāsastasmin vimāne patanti /
SA01vakobhau:11218: tato 'parapārśve chāyā patantī vikalaṃ maṇḍalaṃ darśayatīti prājñaptiko nirdeśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11220: vāhayogaḥ sa tādṛśo bhavati yatkadācidvimānasyārdhaṃ dṛśyata iti pūrvācāryāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11240: ṣoḍaśāṣṭau sahasrāṇi catvāri dve ca nirgatāḥ // VAkK_3.63 //
SA01vakobhau:11242: prathamā pariṣaṇḍā ṣoḍaśa sahasrāṇi yojanānāṃ sumerornirgatā /
SA01vakobhau:11250: prathamāyāṃ pariṣaṇḍāyāṃ karoṭapāṇayo nāma yakṣāḥ prativasanti /
SA01vakobhau:11256: caturthyāṃ tu catvāro mahārājāḥ svayaṃ prativasanti tatparicārāśca /
SA01vakobhau:11289: tāsu pañcayojanaśatapramāṇāścatvāraḥ kūṭā abhyudgatā yeṣu vajrapāṇayo nāma yakṣāḥ prativasanti /
SA01vakobhau:11294: puraṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma haimaṃ citratalaṃ mṛdu // VAkK_3.66 //
SA01vakobhau:11296: sumerutalasya madhye sudarśanaṃ nāma nagaram dairdhye sārdhatṛtīyayojanasahasre ekaikaṃ parśvamucchrāyeṇādhyardhayojanam /
SA01vakobhau:11300: tacca bhūmitalaṃ tūlapicuvat mṛdusaṃsparśaṃ pādakṣepotkṣepābhyāṃ natonnataṃ śakrasya devānāmindrasya rājadhānī /
SA01vakobhau:11304: śakrasya devānāmindrasya vaijayanto nāma prāsādo nagarasya madhye nānāratnasthānavidhānasaṃpadā sarvānyabhavanaśrīmahimnā hrepaṇo dairdhyeṇārdhatṛtīye yojanaśate pārśvaṃ pārśvam /
SA01vakobhau:11312: tasya hi nagarasya bahiścaturṣu pārśveṣu catvāryudyānādīni devānāṃ kriḍābhūmayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11319: eṣāṃ codyānānāṃ caturdiśaṃ catvāri sumūmīni viṃśatiyojanāntaritāni krīḍāsthānānyeva devānāṃ parasparaspardhayaiva śobhāṃ vitanvanti /
SA01vakobhau:11331: tasya khalu sarvapariphullasya yojanaśatamanuvātaṃ gandho vāti pañcāśadyojana yojanāni prativātam /
SA01vakobhau:11341: tasyaiva tu sā gandhasya tādṛśo prabhāvasaṃpadeṣṭavyā yāt pratibadhyamāno'pi divyairmṛdumārutairgandhāntaraṃ saṃtanoti /
SA01vakobhau:11343: mandataratamasamārambhāttu saṃtāna āśveva samucchidyate yato na tathā viprakṛṣṭamadhvānaṃ prasarpati /
SA01vakobhau:11345: kiṃ punaḥ svabhūtāśrita evamapuṣpagandhasaṃtāno vartate utāho vāyuradhivāsito jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:11353: satāṃ tu gandhaḥ prativātameti sarvā diśaḥ satpuruṣaḥ pravātī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:11358: na ca tasya tādṛśī śaktiḥ mahīsāsakāstu pathanti “yojanaśatamanuvātaṃ gandho vāti pañcāśadyojanāni prativātamiti /
SA01vakobhau:11360: sudharmā nāma devasabhā dakṣiṇapaścime digbhāge yasyāṃ niṣadya devāḥ kṛtyākṛtyaṃ samarthayanti /
SA01vakobhau:11368: te punaryāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaśca brahmakāyikādayaśca pūrvoktāḥ ṣoḍaśasthānāntaragatāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11370: ityete dvāviṃśatidevanikāyāḥ samāsena yeṣāṃ bhājanaṃ prajñāyate /
SA01vakobhau:11374: teṣāṃ tu ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā devanikāyāḥ kāmān paribhuñjate na śeṣāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11390: pāṇisaṃprāptyā tuṣitānāṃ hasitena nirmāṇaratīnāṃ prekṣitena paranirmitavaśavartinām /
SA01vakobhau:11398: yasya devasya devyā vā utsaṅge devakumāro devakanyā vā jāyate sa tayoḥ putro bhavati sā ca duhitā /
SA01vakobhau:11411: rūpāvacarā devāḥ saṃpūrṇakāyāḥ vastreṇa saṃvītā upapadyante /
SA01vakobhau:11421: santi sattvāḥ pratyupasthitakāmāḥ pratyupasthiteṣu kāmeṣvaiśvaryaṃ vaśe vartayanti /
SA01vakobhau:11426: santi sattvā nirmitakāmā nirmāya kāmānaiśvarya vaśe vartayanti /
SA01vakobhau:11430: santi sattvāḥ paranirmitakāmāḥ paranirmiteṣu kāmeṣvaiśvarya vaśe varttayanti /
SA01vakobhau:11434: tā etā yathot pannaparibhogitvāt yathecchātmanirmitaparibhogitvādyathecchātmapara nirmitaparibhogitvācca tisraḥ kāmopapattaya ityucyante /
SA01vakobhau:11440: triṣu dhyāneṣu yā nava bhūmayaḥ tāstisraḥ sukhopapattayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11442: te hi devā vivekajena samādhijena ca prītisukhena ca niṣprītikena ca sukhena sukhaṃ viharanto dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhanti /
SA01vakobhau:11455: jambūdvīpāt prabhṛti yaduttaraṃ sthānaṃ tasmādyāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvat punastasmādūrdhvaṃ sthānāntaram /
SA01vakobhau:11457: tadyathā caturthī pariṣaṇḍā caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ mūlasthānamitaścatvāriṃśadyojanasahasrāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:11459: tasmādyāvadadhojambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃ tridaśānāṃ sthānam tasmādapi yāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃ yāmānāṃ sthānam /
SA01vakobhau:11463: evaṃ vistareṇa sarvamanukramya sudarśanebhyo yāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃmakaniṣṭhānāṃ sthānam /
SA01vakobhau:11472: kiṃ punaradharasthānopapannā urdhvāni vimānāni gatvā paśyanti
SA01vakobhau:11479: parāśrayeṇa vā yadvṛddhimatā nīyeran devena vā tatratyena /
SA01vakobhau:11489: kiṃ tarhi nirmitenādharabhūmikena tadicchayā paśyedihatyamiveti nikāyāntarīyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11508: atha ko'yaṃ sāhasraścūḍiko lokadhātuḥ ko dvisāhasrastrisāhasro vā /
SA01vakobhau:11513_1: candrāṇāṃ sumerūṇāṃ sahasraṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināṃ
SA01vakobhau:11517: teṣāṃ cūḍikānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sahasraṃ dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11521: teṣāṃ dvisāhasrāṇāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sahasraṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11530: kiṃ khalu yathā bhājanānāṃ pramāṇabheda evaṃ tadvāsināmapi sattvānāṃ pramāṇabhedo'sti /
SA01vakobhau:11541: pūrvavidehakā godānīkā uttarakauravāśca manuṣyā aṣṭaṣoḍaśadvātriṃśaddhastakā yathākramam /
SA01vakobhau:11549: tanmātraṃ śarīraṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ dvau pādau trāyastriṃśānāṃ trayo yāmānāṃ catvārastuṣitānāṃ pañca nirmāṇaratīnāṃ adhyardhaḥ krośaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinām /
SA01vakobhau:11553: rūpiṇāṃ devānāṃ prathame sthāne brahmakāyikānāmardhayojanamātraṃ śarīram /
SA01vakobhau:11559: triṣu sthānesu brahmapurohitānāṃ yojanaṃ mahābrahmaṇo 'dhyardhaṃ parīttābhānāṃ dve yojane /
SA01vakobhau:11569: anabhrakāṇāṃ tato yojanatrayeṇa hīnaṃ dviguṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatiyojana śatam /
SA01vakobhau:11571: tasmāt pareṇa punaḥ puṇyaprasavānāṃ dviguṇaṃ dviguṇaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhānāṃ ṣoḍaśayojanasahasrāṇi śarīram /
SA01vakobhau:11588: jambūdvīpe nāstyāyuṣo niyamaḥ kadācit bhūyo bhavati kadācidalpīyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11603: taccāhorātraṃ vyavasthāpya śakyaṃ vaktumiti sa eva caiṣāṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA01vakobhau:11608: yāni manuṣyāṇāṃ pañcāśadvarṣāṇi tāni kāmadhātāvadharāṇāṃ devānāṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāmekaṃ rātrindivam /
SA01vakobhau:11612: tena tatastenāhorātreṇa teṣāṃ triṃśadrātrakeṇa māsena dvādaśamāsakena saṃvatsareṇa divyāni pañcavarṣaśatānyāyuḥ pramāṇam /
SA01vakobhau:11625: mānuṣyakāṇi dve catvāryaṣṭau ṣoḍaśa varṣaśatānyekaṃ rātrindivam /
SA01vakobhau:11627: tena rātrindevena dve catvāryaṣṭau ṣoḍaśa divyāni varṣasahasrāṇyāyuṣaḥ pramāṇam /
SA01vakobhau:11633: puṣpāṇāṃ saṃkocavikāsātkumudabandhu vat śakunīnāṃ kūjanākūjanāt middhāpagamāgamācca ālokakṛtyaṃ svayaṃprabhatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:11644: evaṃ yasya yāvadyojanamāśrayastasya tāvatkalpamāyuryavadakaniṣṭhānāṃ ṣoḍaśakalpasahasrāṇyāyuḥ pramāṇam /
SA01vakobhau:11656: evaṃ teṣāṃ yathākramaṃ viṃśatiścatvāriṃśat ṣaṣṭiraśītiḥ kalpasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇam /
SA01vakobhau:11658: katamo'tra kalpo veditavyaḥ kimantarakalpo'tha saṃvartakalpo'tha vivarttakalpo'tha mahākalpaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11668_0: yacca loko viṃśatimantarakalpān vivartate yacca loko viṃśatimantarakalpānvivarta
SA01vakobhau:11668_1: āste yacca viṃśatimantarakalpānsaṃvartate ime ṣaṣṭirantarakalpā mahābrahmaṇo'dhyardhaḥ kalpaḥ uktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11670: evaṃ ca kṛtvā mahākalpasyārdhaṃ catvāriṃśadantarakalpān kalpīkṛtya teṣāmāyuḥ pramāṇamuktam /
SA01vakobhau:11680: yāvat ṣaṇṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devanikāyānāmāyuruktaṃ tena tulyā ahorātrāḥ ṣaṭṣu narakeṣu yathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11682: saṃjīve kālasūtre saṃghāte raurave mahāraurave tāpane ca /
SA01vakobhau:11686: tairidānīṃ svairahorātraisteṣāṃ yathā ṣaṇṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāmāyustathaiva yathākramaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:11690: yaddhi cāturmahārājakāyikānāmāyuḥ pramāṇaṃ tatsaṃjīvane mahānarake ekaṃ rātrindivaṃ /
SA01vakobhau:11692: tena yāvat dvādaśamāsakena saṃvatsareṇa tatratyāni pañcavarṣaśatānyāyuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11694: yattrāyastriṃśānāmāyuḥ pramāṇaṃ tat kālasūtre mahānarake ekaṃ rātrindivam /
SA01vakobhau:11698: evamanyeṣvapi yathāyogaṃ yojyaṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināmāyuḥpramāṇaṃ tattulyenāhorātreṇa tāpane ṣoḍaśa varṣasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇam /
SA01vakobhau:11714: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā “aṣṭāvime bhikṣavo nāgā mahānāgāḥ kalpasthā dharaṇidharā” iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11727: upamānamātreṇa teṣvāyurākhyātaṃ bhagavatā “tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ iha syādviṃśatikhārīko māgadhakastilavāhaḥ pūrṇastilānāṃ cūḍikāvaddhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11729: tataḥ kaścideva varṣaśatasyātyayādekaṃ tilamapanayate kṣiprataraṃ bhikṣavaḥ saviṃśatikhārīko māgadhastilavāho'nenopakrameṇa parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet /
SA01vakobhau:11733: yathā khalu bhikṣavo viṃśatirvudā evameko nirarvudo vistareṇa yathā khalu bhikṣavo viṃśatiḥ padyā evameko mahāpadma” iti /
SA01vakobhau:11746: tuṣitastharsyakajātibaddhasya bodhisattvasya caramabhavikasattvasya jinādiṣṭasya jinabhutasya śraddhādharmānusāriṇo bodhisattvacakravarttimātrośca tadgarbhayorityevamādinām /
SA01vakobhau:11748: yojanapramaṇena sthānāni śarīrāṇi cotkāni varṣapramāṇenāyuruktaṃ tayośca pramāṇaṃ noktamiti vaktavyaṃ nānā ca sarveṣāṃ vavasthānamatastasyāpi paryanto vaktavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11758: kālasya paryantaḥ kṣaṇo nāmnaḥ paryanto'kṣaraṃ tadyathā gauriti /
SA01vakobhau:11762: samagreṣu pratyayeṣu yāvatā dharmasyātmalābhaḥ gacchanvā dharmo yāvatā paramāṇoḥ paramāṇvantaraṃ gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:11778: tāni sapta gorajaḥ tāni sapta vātāyanacchidrarajaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11784: sapta yavā aṅgulīparva trīṇi parvāṇyaṅgurīti prasiddhameveti noktam /
SA01vakobhau:11794: pañcaśatānyeṣāṃ krośo raṇyaṃ ca tanmatam // VAkK_3.87 //
SA01vakobhau:11828: catvāro māsā hemantānāṃ catvāro grīṣmāṇāṃ catvāro varṣāṇāmityete dvādaśa māsā saṃvatsaraḥ sārdhamūnarātraiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11847: narakeṣu hi sattvāsaṃbhavāt prabhṛti yāvat bhājanasaṃkṣayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11855: bhavati sa kālo yannarakeṣu sattvāścyavante nopapadyante /
SA01vakobhau:11858: yadayaṃ loko viṃśatyantarakalpān vivṛtto'sthāt tanniryātaṃ vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:11862: yadā narakeṣvekasattvo nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā 'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:11864: yaduta narakasaṃvarttanyā yasya tadānīṃ niyataṃ narakavedanīyaṃ karma ghriyate sa lokadhātvantaranarakeṣu kṣipyate /
SA01vakobhau:11872_0: sa kālo yanmanuṣyeṣvanyatamaḥ sattvaḥ svayamanācāryakaṃ dharmatāprātilambhikaṃ prathamaṃ
SA01vakobhau:11872_1: dhyānaṃ samāpadyate sa tasmāt vyutthāya vācaṃ bhāṣate sukhaṃ vata vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ
SA01vakobhau:11874: taṃ ca śabdaṃ śrutvā anye'pi sattvāḥ samāpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:11878: yadā jambūdvīpa ekasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta jambūdvīpasaṃvartanyā /
SA01vakobhau:11882: yadā manuṣyeṣvekasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta manuṣyagatisaṃvarttanyā /
SA01vakobhau:11888: evaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikeṣvapi deveṣu prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya brahmaloka upapadyante /
SA01vakobhau:11890: yadā tatraikasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta cāturmahārājakāyikasaṃvartanyā /
SA01vakobhau:11894: yadaikasattvo'pi kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta kāmadhātusaṃvartanyā /
SA01vakobhau:11896: brahmaloke'pyanyatamaḥ sattvo dharmatāprātilambhikaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyotthāya vācaṃ bhāṣate sukhaṃ vata samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ śāntaṃ vata samādhijaṃ prītisukhamiti /
SA01vakobhau:11898: taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā'nye'pi sattvāḥ samāpadyante kālaṃ ca kṛtvā ābhāsvareṣu deveṣūpapadyante /
