SA01vakobhau:11900: yadā brahmaloka ekasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta sattvasaṃvartanyā /
SA01vakobhau:11902: tataḥ śūnye bhājane ita eva sāmantakāt sattvānāṃ tadākṣepake karmaṇi parikṣīṇe sapta sūryāḥ prādurbhūya krameṇa yāvat pṛthivīṃ sumeruṃ ca niḥśeṣaṃ dahanti /
SA01vakobhau:11904: tasmādevaṃ prajvalitādarcirvāyunā kṣiptaṃ śūnyaṃ brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ nirdahat paraiti /
SA01vakobhau:11916: narakeṣu sattvānāṃ cyutyanutpādāt prabhṛti yāvat bhājanānāṃ saṃkṣaya eṣa kālaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11920: thamādvāyoḥ prabhṛti yāvannarakeṣu sattvasambhavaḥ eṣa kālo vivartakalpa ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:11922: tathā saṃvṛte hi loka ākāśamātrāvaśeṣaścira kālaṃ tiṣṭhati yāvat punarapi sattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena bhājanānāṃ pūrvanimittabhūtā ākāśe mandamandā vāyavaḥ syandante /
SA01vakobhau:11924: tadā yadayaṃ loko viṃśatimantarakalpān saṃvṛtto'sthāttanniryātaṃ vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:11928: tataste vāyavo vardhamānā yathoktaṃ vāyumaṇḍalaṃ jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:11930: tataḥ śanairyathoktakramavidhānaṃ sarvaṃ jāyate apmaṇḍalaṃ kāñcanamayī mahāpṛthivī dvīpāḥ sumervādayaśca /
SA01vakobhau:11936: iyatā'yaṃ loko vivṛtto bhavati yaduta bhājanavivartanyā /
SA01vakobhau:11938: athānyataraḥ sattva ābhāsvarebhyaścyutvā śūnye brāhme vimāna utpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:11944: krameṇa yāvaduttarakurau godānīye pūrvavidehe jambūdvīpe preteṣu tiryakṣu narakeṣūpapadyante /
SA01vakobhau:11946: dharmatā hyeṣā yat paścāt saṃvartate tat pūrvaṃ vivarttate /
SA01vakobhau:11948: yadā narakeṣvekaḥ sattvo'pi prādurbhūto bhavati tadā yadayaṃ loko viṃśatimantarakalpān vivartate tanniryātaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:11954: vivartamāne loke ekānna viṃśatirantarakalpā aparimitāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmatikrāmanti /
SA01vakobhau:11967: tebhyo hi daśavarṣāyuṣkebhya utkarṣaṃ gacchantaḥ krameṇāśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣo bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:11984: nātaḥ pareṇa vardhante yāvāneva cānyeṣāmantarakalpānāmutkarṣāpakarṣakālastāvāneva prathamasyāpakarṣakālaḥ paścimasya cotkarṣakāla iti samānakālāḥ sarve bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:11986: iti loko vivṛtto'yaṃ kalpāṃstiṣṭhati viṃśatim // VAkK_3.92 //
SA01vakobhau:11994: viṃśatimevāntarakalpān vivartate viṃśatiṃ saṃvartate viṃśatiṃ saṃvṛtta āste /
SA01vakobhau:11996: yadyapi tadānīmutkarṣā apakarṣāśca na pravartante kālastu samānaḥ parisaṃkhyāyate /
SA01vakobhau:11998: tatraikenāntara kalpena bhājanānyabhinivartante ekānnaviṃśatyā 'ntarakalpairāvāsyante ekenāntarakalpena bhājanāni vidhvasyante ekānnaviṃśatyā śūnyī bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:12008: yaducyate tribhirasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpānāṃ budhatvaṃ prāpyata” iti /
SA01vakobhau:12116: na tu naiva parisaṃkhyātuṃ śakyanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:12118: kintu khalu kālaprakarṣeṇaiva kṛtapraṇidhānā bodhisattvā bodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
SA01vakobhau:12122: mahatāṃ hi puṇyajñānasaṃbhāreṇa ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ bahubhirduṣkaraśatasahasraistribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante bodhisattvāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12124: yadyapyanyathā'pyasti mokṣāvakāśaḥ kimarthaṃ ta iyantaṃ yatnamārabhante /
SA01vakobhau:12126: parārthaṃ ta iyantaṃ yatnamārabhante kathaṃ parānapi mahato duḥkhaughāt paritrātuṃ śaknuyāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:12130: eṣa eva teṣāṃ svārtho yaḥ parārthastasyābhimatatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:12136: kāruṇikaistu śraddhitamevaitat yathā ceha kecidabhyastanairdhṛṇyā asatyapi svārthe paravyasanābhiratā upalabhyante /
SA01vakobhau:12138: tathā punarabhyastakāruṇyā asatyapi svārthe parahitakriyābhirāmāḥ santīti saṃbhāvyam /
SA01vakobhau:12140_1: niveśya taddhetorduḥkhānyudvahanti evaṃ punarabhyāsavaśādātmasnehaṃ tebhyo nirvartya
SA01vakobhau:12142: gotrāntarameva hi tattathājātīyaṃ nirvartate yat pareṣāṃ duḥkhena duḥkhāyate sukhena sukhāyate nātmana iti /
SA01vakobhau:12148: madhyo duḥkhanivṛttimeva na sukhaṃ duḥkhāspadaṃ tadyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12156: aśītivarṣaśatāyupi prajāyāmapakarṣe ārabdhe yāvadvarṣaśatāyuṣo manuṣyā bhavantyetasminnantare buddhā utpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:12163: tadā hi pañca kaṣāyā abhyutsadā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:12167: apakarṣasyādhastāt pratyavarā āyurādayaḥ kiṭabhūtatvāt kaṣāyā ucyante /
SA01vakobhau:12191_0: tathāhi pūrvayogaṃ paṭhanti “parvate kila pañcaśatāni tāpasānāṃ kaṣṭāni tapāṃsi tapyante
SA01vakobhau:12191_1: sma yāvat pratyekabuddhasahoṣitena markaṭenāgamya tadīryāpathasaṃdarśanāt pratyekabodhimabhisaṃbanddhā” iti /
SA01vakobhau:12201: mahākalpānāṃ śataṃ bodhisaṃbhāreṣu caritaḥ khaḍgaṃ viṣāṇakalpo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:12211: śakyaṃ ca taiḥ pūrvabuddhānāṃ śāsanamanusmṛtyāpi dharmaṃ deśayitum /
SA01vakobhau:12223: anusroto gāminīnāṃ hi prajānāṃ duṣkaraṃ pratisroto nayanam /
SA01vakobhau:12231: amite cāyuṣi manuṣyāṇāṃ yāvadaśītisahasrake cotpattiścakravarttināṃ nādhaḥ /

SA01vakobhau:12259_2: sahasrāraṃ sanābhikaṃ sanemikaṃ sarvākāraparipūrṇaṃ śubhakarmārakṛtaṃ divyaṃ sarvasauvarṇaṃ
SA01vakobhau:12265: sūtra ukta” masthānamanavakāśo yadapūrvācaramau dvau tathāgatāvarhantau samyaksaṃbuddhau loka utpadyeyātāṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate sthānametadvidyate yadaikastathāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12271: kimatra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturloka iṣṭa utāho sarvalokadhātava iti /
SA01vakobhau:12279: eka eva hi bhagavān sarvatra śaktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12281: yatra buddha eko na śaktaḥ syād vineyān vinetuṃ tatrā'nyo'pi na śakta iti /
SA01vakobhau:12283: uktaṃ ca sūtre “sa cettvāṃ śāriputra kaścidupasaṃkramyaivaṃ pṛcchet asti kaścidetarhi śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā samasamaḥ śramaṇena gotamena yadutābhisaṃbodhāya /
SA01vakobhau:12287: sa cenmāṃ bhadanta kaścidupasaṃkramyevaṃ pṛcchettasyāhaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vyākuryā nāsti kaścidetarhhi śṛamaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā samasamo bhagavatā yadutābhisaṃbodhāya /
SA01vakobhau:12291: saṃmukhaṃ me bhagavato'ntikācchrutaṃ saṃmukhamudgṛhītaṃ asthānamanavakāso yadapūrvācaramau tathāgatau loka utpadyeyātāṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata” iti /
SA01vakobhau:12293: yattarhi bhagavatoktaṃ brahmasūtre “yāvattrisāhasramahāsāhasrako loko vaśe me'tra vartata” iti /
SA01vakobhau:12304: bahavo hi samaṃ saṃbhāreṣu pravartamānā dṛśyante /
SA01vakobhau:12306: na caikatra bahūnāṃ buddhānāṃ yugapat yoga utpattuṃ na cāsti tadut pattau kakścit pratibandhaḥ iti niyataṃ lokadhātvantareṣūtpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:12308: anantā lokadhātava iti na śakyaṃ bhagavatā kalpamapyāyurvirbhratā yitheha tathā'nyeṣvapi ananteṣu lokadhātuṣu vyāpartuṃ kiṃ punaḥ puruṣāyuṣam /
SA01vakobhau:12312_0: asya pudgalasyedamindriyam iyatā kālelāmuṣmin deśe amuṃ pudgalamāgamyāsya doṣasya
SA01vakobhau:12312_1: parihārādasyāṅgasyopasaṃhārādanena prayogeṇānutpannaṃ votpatsyate aparipūrṇaṃ vā paripūrayiṣyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:12314_1: loka utpadyeyātāmi“ti tadevedaṃ saṃpradhāryate kimidamekaṃ lokadhātumadhikṛtyoktamāhosvit sarvāniti /
SA01vakobhau:12320: athaitat kṣamyate idaṃ tu kasmānna kṣamyate “puṇyastu buddhānāṃ loka utpāda” iti /
SA01vakobhau:12322: yadi bahūnāṃ bahuṣu syānna doṣaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:12326: athaiṅkasminnapi kasmāt dvau tathāgatau na sahotpadyete /
SA01vakobhau:12330: evaṃ hi bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhānaṃ kurvanti aho vatāhamandhe loke 'pariṇāyake buddho loka utpadyeyamanāthānāṃ nātha iti /
SA01vakobhau:12334: ekasminhi buddhe sutarāmādriyante durlabha īdṛśo'nya iti manyamānāḥ sutarāṃ cābhitvarante śāsanapratipattau mā'smin gate parinirvṛte vā 'nāthā bhūmeti /
SA01vakobhau:12336: athaite cakravartinaḥ suvarṇādimayaiścakraiḥ pṛthivīṃ jayantaḥ kathaṃ jayanti /
SA01vakobhau:12341: yasya sauvarṇa cakraṃ bhavati taṃ koṭarājānaḥ svayaṃ pratyudgacchanti /
SA01vakobhau:12343: ime devasya janapadāḥ ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāśca subhikṣāścākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca /
SA01vakobhau:12349: yasya rūpyamayaṃ sa svayameva teṣāmantikaṃ yāti paścādasya prahvībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:12351: yasya tāmramayaṃ sa teṣāmantikaṃ gatvā kalahāyate paścāt prahvībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:12353: yasya śastramayaṃ sa teṣāmantikaṃ gacchati anyonyaṃ śastrāṇyāvahanti paścānnamanti /
SA01vakobhau:12359: śastreṇāpi jayatāṃ badho na pravartate nirjitya ca sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti /
SA01vakobhau:12363: sūtra uktaṃ “rājñaścakravartino loke prādurbhāvātsaptānāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:12365: tadyathā cakraratnasya hastiratnasyāśvaratnasya maṇiratnasya strīratnasya gṛhapatiratnasya pariṇāyakaratnasye“ti /
SA01vakobhau:12371: yena tu sattvena tatsaṃbandha saṃvartanīyaṃ karmopacitaṃ tasminnutpanne svānyevainaṃ karmāṇyutpādayanti /
SA01vakobhau:12387: kiṃ khalu prāthamakalpikā api manuṣyāḥ sarājakā āsan /

SA01vakobhau:12396_1: śubhā varṇasthāyinaḥ svayaṃ prabhā vihāyasaṃgamāḥ prītibhakṣaḥ prītyāhārā dīrghāyuṣo
SA01vakobhau:12404: tasyānyatamo lolupajātīyaḥ sattvo gandhaṃ ghrātvā rasaṃ svāditavān bhakṣitavāṃśca /
SA01vakobhau:12410: teṣāṃ tadāhārābhyāsāt kharatvaṃ gurutvaṃ ca kāye'vakrāntaṃ prabhāvā antarhitāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12414: so'pyeṣāṃ bhūmirasa āsvādagṛddhānāṃ krameṇāntarhito bhūmiparpaṭakaṃ prādurbhūtam /
SA01vakobhau:12423: tasyedānīmaudārikatvānniḥsyandanirvāhārthaṃ sattvānāṃ mūtrapurīṣamārgau saha strīpuruṣendriyābhyāṃ prādurbhūtau saṃsthānaṃ ca bhinnam /
SA01vakobhau:12425: teṣāmanyonyaṃ paśyatāṃ pūrvābhyāsavaśādayoniśomanaskāragrāhagrāsatāṃ gatānāṃ kāmarāga udīrṇo yato vipratipannāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12429: te ca khalu taṃ śāliṃ sāyaṃ ca sāyamāśārthaṃ prātaśca prātarāśārthaṃ praveśayanti sma /
SA01vakobhau:12435: teṣāṃ tatra mamakāra utpanne sa śālirlūno lūno na punarjāyate sma /
SA01vakobhau:12437: tataḥ kṣetrāṇi pravibhajya sveṣvāgrahaṃ kṛtvā parakīyaṃ hartumārabdhāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12441: taisteṣāmaṅkuśārthaṃ sametyānyatamaḥ puruṣaviśeṣaḥ kṣetrāṇi pālayituṃ ṣaṣṭhabhāgena bhṛtaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12443: tasya kṣetrāṇāmadhipatiḥ kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriya iti saṃjñotpannā /
SA01vakobhau:12445: mahājanakāyasya saṃmataḥ prajāṃ ca rañjayatīti mahāsaṃmato rājeti samjñotpannā /
SA01vakobhau:12449: tatra ye gṛhebhyo vahirmanasaḥ saṃvṛttāsteṣāṃ brāhmaṇā iti saṃjñotpannā /
SA01vakobhau:12451: athānyatamasya rājño lobhāt samvibhāgamakurvantaḥ sattvānāṃ tāskaryaṃ prācuryamāpannaṃ sa tān śastreṇopasaṃkramate sma /
SA01vakobhau:12453: tato'nye naivaṅkārakāḥ sma iti mṛṣā vācaṃ vaktumārabdhāḥ iti
SA01vakobhau:12457: tata evaṃ karmapathānāṃ vṛddhau satyāṃ krameṇa hrasatāṃ manusyāṇāṃ daśavarṣāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ saṃbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:12459: ato'sya kṛtsnasyānarthaughasya dvau dharmau mūlayoniḥ rasarāga ālasyaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:12469: antarakalpasya niryāṇakāle daśavarṣāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ adharmarāgaraktā bhavanti viṣamalobhāvibhūtā mithyādharmaparītāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12471: teṣāṃ vyāpāda utkarṣa gato'nyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tīvramāghātacittaṃ vadhakacittaṃ ca pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:12473: tadyathedānīṃ mṛgalubdhakasyāraṇyakaṃ mṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā te yadyadeva gṛhṇanti kāṣṭham vā loṣṭaṃ vā tatteṣāṃ tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ prādurbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:12477: punaḥ kalpasya niryāṇakāle daśavarṣāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taireva doṣairamanuṣyā īti mutsṛjanti /
SA01vakobhau:12481: punardaśavarṣāyuṣāṃ taireva doṣairdevā varṣaṃ notsṛjanti yato durbhikṣaṃ jāyate cañcaḥ śvetāsthi śalākāvṛttiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12486: ya idānīṃ samavāyaḥ sa tadānīṃ cañca ityucyate /

SA01vakobhau:12497: teṣāṃ hi śuṣkarukṣakāyānāṃ kālaṃ kurvatāmāśvevāsthīni śvetāni bhavanti bubhukṣāhatāśca śvetānyasthīni saṃhṛtya kvāthayitvā pivanti /
SA01vakobhau:12502_0: te hi sattvāḥ śalākoddeśikayā gṛheṣvāmirṣaṃ samvibhajante adya gṛhasvāmī bhokṣyate
SA01vakobhau:12502_1: śvo gṛhasvāminītyevamādi dhānyasthānavivarebhyaśca śalākayā dhānyaphalāni niṣkṛṣya
SA01vakobhau:12506: yenaikāhamapi prāṇātīpātaviratiḥ samrakṣitā bhavati ekaharītakī vā saṃghāyaikapiṇḍapāto vā satkṛtyānupradatto bhavati sa teṣu śastrarogadurbhikṣāntarakalpeṣu notpadyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:12508: atha kiyantaṃ kālametāni śastrāghātarogadurbhikṣāṇi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bhavanti
SA01vakobhau:12510: divasān sapta māsāṃśca varṣāṇi ca ythākramam // VAkK_3.99 //
SA01vakobhau:12515: durbhikṣaṃ saptavarṣāṇi ca māsāṃśca divasāmśceti samuccayārthaścakāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12519: vyāpāda udrekaprāpto bhavati vaivastryadaurbalye jighatsāpipāse ca /
SA01vakobhau:12527: ekatra dhyāne sattvāḥ samaṃ saṃvartante etasyāmiti saṃvartanī /
SA01vakobhau:12529: saptabhiḥ sūryaistejaḥ saṃvartanī bhavati varṣodakenāpsaṃvartanī vāyuprakopādvāyusaṃvartanī /
SA01vakobhau:12540: nanu ca sattvānāṃ karmajaḥ prabhāvaviśiṣṭo vāyurbījamuktam /
SA01vakobhau:12544: “vāyunā lokāntarebhyo bījānyāhriyanta” iti mahīśāsakāḥ sūtre paṭhanti /
SA01vakobhau:12568: citro hi guṇadharmo dravyaṃ tu naivam /
SA01vakobhau:12570: samānajātīyebhyaḥ eva hi dravyebhyaḥ samānajātīyānāṃ dṛṣṭa utpādastadyathā vīraṇebhyaḥ kaṭasya tantubhyaḥ paṭasyeti /
SA01vakobhau:12578: anyo vīraṇebhyaḥ kaṭo'nyaśca tantubhyaḥ paṭa iti /
SA01vakobhau:12580: ta eva hi te yathāsaṃniviṣṭāstāṃ tāṃ saṃjñāṃ labhnte /
SA01vakobhau:12587: ko hi tadā sataḥ paṭasyopalabdhau pratibandhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12594: anekā śrayasaṃyogāpekṣaṇe daśāmātrasaṃyoge paṭopalabdhiḥ syānna vā kadācit /
SA01vakobhau:12604: citrarūpāditve vijātīyārambho'pi syāt acitre ca pārśvāntare paṭasyādarśanaṃ citradarśanaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:12610: paramāṇvatīndriyatve'pi samastānāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ yathā teṣāṃ kāryārambhakatvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ ca taimirikāṇāṃ ca vikīrṇakeśopalabdhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12614: rūpādiṣveva ca paramāṇusaṃjñāniveśā ttadvināśe siddhaḥ paramāṇuvināśaḥ /
