SA01vakobhau:12618: ayuktamasyānyatvaṃ yāvatā na nirdhāryate kenacit imāni pṛthivyaptejāṃsi ima eṣāṃ rūpādaya iti /
SA01vakobhau:12620: cakṣuḥsparśanagrāhyāṇi ca prajñāyante dagdheṣu corṇākarpāsakusumbhakuṅkumādiṣu tadbuddhyabhāvādrūpādibhedeṣveva tadbuddhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12626: ko vā bālapralāpeṣvādaraḥ iti tiṣṭhatu tāvadevāpratiṣedhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12630: dhyānatrayaṃ dvitīyādi śīrṣa tāsām yathākramam // VAkK_3.100 //
SA01vakobhau:12633: tejaḥsaṃvartanyā dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ śīrṣaṃ bhavatyadho dahyate /
SA01vakobhau:12651: ata evatasmin kṛtsnakāyakrauryāpagamāt duḥkhendriyasya nirodha uktaḥ sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:12656: iti yasyāṃ dhyānasamāpattau yathābhuta ādhyātmiko'pakṣālastasyām dhyānopapattau tathābhūto bāhya iti /
SA01vakobhau:12660: pṛthivyeva hi bhājanākhyā tasyāṃ tejojalavāyubhirvirodho na pṛthhivyeti /
SA01vakobhau:12668: ato'tra bāhyo'pakṣālo na pravartata iti nāstyatra saṃvartanī /
SA01vakobhau:12672: nahi taiḥ śakyamārupyān praveṣṭuṃ nāpyanyatra gantumiti /
SA01vakobhau:12676: na nityaṃ saha sattvena tadvimānodayavyayāt // VAkK_3.101 //
SA01vakobhau:12703: etena krameṇāpsaṃvartanīnāṃ gate saptake punaḥ tejaḥsaṃvartanīnāṃ saptako bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:12710: yathiva hi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ samāpattiviśeṣādātmabhāvānāṃ sthitiviśeṣastathā bhājanānāmapāmiti tā etā bhavanti ṣaṭpañcāśattejaḥ saṃvartanyaḥ saptāpsaṃvarttanyaḥ ekā vāyusaṃvarttanī /
SA01vakobhau:12712: evaṃ ca prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ sunītaṃ bhavati “catuḥṣaṣṭi kalpāḥ śubhakṛtsnānāṃ devānāmāyuḥpramāṇami“ti /
SA01vakobhau:12715: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇa” // iti /
SA01vakobhau:12725: atha yadetatsattvabhājanalokasya bahudhā vaicitryamukta tat kena kṛtam /
SA01vakobhau:12734: yadi karmajaṃ kasmātsattvānāṃ karmabhiḥ kuṅkumacandanādayo ramyatarā jāyante na teṣāṃ śarīrāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:12736: karmāṇyeva tānyevañjātīyāti vyābhiśrakāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ yadāśrayāśca vraṇabhūtā jāyante bhogāśca ramyāstatpratīkārabhūtāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12744: sūtra uktaṃ “dve karmaṇī cetanā karma cetayitvā ce“ti /
SA01vakobhau:12748: te ete dve karmaṇī trīṇi bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:12773: yattaccetanājanitaṃ cetayitvā karmetyuktaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇī te veditavye /
SA01vakobhau:12777: te tu kāyavākkarmaṇī pratyekaṃ vijñaptyavijñaptisvabhāve veditavye /
SA01vakobhau:12784: cittavaśena kāyasya tathā tathā saṃsthānaṃ kāyavijñaptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12798: sarva hi saṃskṛtamātmalābhā dūrdhvaṃ na bhavatīti yatraiva jātaṃ tatraiva dhvasyate /
SA01vakobhau:12818: so 'sāvākasmikok vināśo yadi bhāvasyotpannamātrasya na syāt paścādapi na syādbhāvasya tulyatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:12824: na hi sa eva tasmādvilakṣaṇo yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:12830: na ca sarvasyākasmiko vināśaḥ kathaṃ tāvat bhavān kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogādvināśaṃ paśyāmīti manyate /
SA01vakobhau:12836: kimagnisaṃyogātkāṣṭhādayo vinaṣṭā ato na dṛśyante utāho svayaṃ vinaṣṭā anye ca punarnotpannā ato na dṛśyante /
SA01vakobhau:12851: kṣaṇikānāṃ ca buddhiśabdārciṣāṃ dṛṣṭa ākasmiko vināśa iti nāyaṃ hetumapekṣate /
SA01vakobhau:12858: na hi śaṃsayaniścayajñānayoryuktaṃ samavadhānaṃ sukhaduḥkhayo rāgadveṣayorvā /
SA01vakobhau:12860: yadā ca paṭubuddhiśabdānantaramapaṭubuddhiśabdāvutpadyete tadā kathamapaṭuḥ samānajātīyo dharmaḥ paṭīyāṃsaṃ hiṃsyāt /
SA01vakobhau:12862: antyayośca kathaṃ yo 'pyarciṣāmavasthānahetvabhāvāddharmādharmavaśādvā vināśaṃ manyate tadapyayuktam /
SA01vakobhau:12866: na cāpyutpādavināśahetvordharmārdharmayoḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe vṛttilābhapratibandhau bhavitumarhataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12868: sakyaṣcaiṣa kāraṇa parikalpaḥ sarvatra samskṛte kartumityalaṃ vivādena /
SA01vakobhau:12870: yadi ca kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogahetuko vināśaḥ syādevaṃ sati pākajānāṃ guṇānāṃ pakvataratamotpattau
SA01vakobhau:12877: ghāsādyagnisaṃbandhā guṇāḥ pākajā utpannāstata eva tādṛśādvā punaḥ pakvataratamotpattau teṣāṃ vināśa iti hetureva teṣāṃ vināśakaḥ syāddhetvaviśiṣṭo vā /
SA01vakobhau:12879: na ca yuktaṃ yata eva tādṛśāddvā teṣāṃ bhāvastata eva tādṛśācca teṣāṃ punarabhāva iti /
SA01vakobhau:12885: yattarhyāpaḥ kvāthyamānāḥ kṣīyante kiṃ tatrāgnisaṃyogāḥ kurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:12887: tejodhātuṃ prabhāvato vardhayanti yasya prābhāvādapāṃ saṃghātaḥ kṣāmakṣāmo jāyate yāvadatikṣāmatāṃ gato 'nte na punaḥ saṃtānaṃ saṃtanoti /
SA01vakobhau:12891: tasmānnāsti bhāvānāṃ vināśahetuḥ svayameva tu bhaṅguratvādvinaśyanta utpannamātrā vinaśyantīti siddha eṣāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgācca gatyabhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12899: ekadiṅmukhe hi bhūyasi varṇa utpanne dīrghaṃ rūpamiti prajñapyate /
SA01vakobhau:12909: tadyathā 'lātamekasyāṃ diśi deśāntareṣvanantareṣu nirantaramāśu dṛśyamānaṃ dīrghamiti pratīyate sarvato dṛśyamānaṃ maṇḍalamiti /
SA01vakobhau:12917: cakṣuṣā hi dṛṣṭvā dīrghamityavasīyate kāyendriyeṇāpi spṛṣṭveti dvābhyāmasya grahaṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /
SA01vakobhau:12921: yathā vā spraṣṭavye dīrghādigrahaṇaṃ tathā varṇe saṃbhāvyatām /
SA01vakobhau:12925: sa tu sāhacaryāt bhavati na tu sākṣāt grahaṇam /
SA01vakobhau:12927: yathā 'gnirūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyoṣṇatāyāṃ smṛtirbhavati puṣpagandhaṃ ca ghrātvā tadvarṇa iti /
SA01vakobhau:12929: yuktamatrāvyabhicāratvādanyenānyasya smaraṇaṃ natu kiñcit spraṣṭavyaṃ kvacit saṃsthāne niyataṃ yatastatra smaraṇaṃ niyamena syāt /
SA01vakobhau:12945: yaccāpi kiñcit sapratighaṃ rūpamasti tadavaśyaṃ paramāṇau vidyate /
SA01vakobhau:12949: na ca saṃsthānaṃ paramāṇau vidyate dīrghādi /
SA01vakobhau:12953: atha mattaṃ saṃsthānaparamāṇava eva tathā saṃniviṣṭā dīrghādisaṃjñāṃ labhanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:12959: na ca saṃsthānāvayavānāṃ varṇādivat svabhāvaḥ siddha iti kuta eṣāṃ saṃcayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12961: yattarhi varṇaścābhinno bhavati saṃsthānaṃ ca bhinnaṃ dṛśyate mṛdbhājanānām /
SA01vakobhau:12963: nanu coktaṃ yathā kṛtvā varṇe dīrghādisaṃjñā prajñapyate tathā ca pipīlikādīnāmabhede paṅkticakrādīnāṃ bhedaḥ prajñāyate tathā saṃsthānasyāpi /
SA01vakobhau:12965: yattarhi tamapi dūrādvā varṇamapaśyantaḥ sthāṇvādīnāṃ dairghyādīni paśyanti varṇameva te tatrāvyaktaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīrghādiparikalpaṃ kurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:12972: athedānīṃ kāyasya gatiṃ nirākṛṭya samsthānaṃ ca tatra bhavantaḥ sautrāntikāḥ kāṃ kāyavijñarptiṃ prajñapayanti /
SA01vakobhau:12977: tāṃ ca prajñapayantaḥ kathaṃ kāyakarma prajñapayanti /
SA01vakobhau:12979: kāyādhiṣṭhānaṃ karma kāyakarma yā cetanā kāyasya tatra tatra praṇetrī /
SA01vakobhau:12983: yattarhi “cetanā karma cetayitvā ce“tyuktaṃ saṃkalpacetanā pūrvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ saṃkalpacetanā pūrvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ caivaṃ ca kariṣyāmīti /
SA01vakobhau:12987: yayā kāyaḥ preryate sā 'sau cetayitvā karmetyucyate /
SA01vakobhau:12989: evaṃ tarhi vijñaptyabhāvādavijñaptirapi kāmāvacarī nāstīti mahānto doṣā anuṣajyante /
SA01vakobhau:12999: sā 'pi ca vijñaptiḥ satī tadākṣepe cetanāyā balaṃ nibhālayate /
SA01vakobhau:13003: dravyameva tu saṃsthānaṃ vaibhāṣikā varṇayanti saṃsthānātmikāṃ tu kāyavijñaptim /
SA01vakobhau:13034: yasmin rūpe 'tītānāgatapratyutpanno notpadyate 'nunayo vā pratigho vā yāvadyasminvijñāne /
SA01vakobhau:13038: na cā vijñaptiṃ virahayyāsti rūpamanidarśanamapratighaṃ nāpyanā sravam /
SA01vakobhau:13042_1: kuladuhiturvā carato vā svapato vā tiṣṭhato vā jāgrato vā satatasamitamabhivardhata
SA01vakobhau:13048: akurvataśca svayaṃ paraiḥ kārayataḥ karmapathā na sidhyeyurasatyāmavijñaptau /
SA01vakobhau:13059: tatra kiṃ prayojanaṃ syādyadi dharmāyatanāntargatamavijñaptirūpaṃ naśyeta /
SA01vakobhau:13065: yattarhīdamuktaṃ “tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyataḥ samyagdṛṣṭirbhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati samyak saṃkalpaḥ samyak vyāyāmaḥ samyak smṛtiḥ samyak samādhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13067: pūrvameva cāsya samyak vāvakrmāntājīvāḥ pariśuddhā bhavanti paryavadātā” iti /
SA01vakobhau:13073: na hi samādānādurdhvaṃ tadasti yenānyamanasko 'pyayaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt bhikṣuṇī veti /
SA01vakobhau:13097: yadapyuktamanāsravarūpokteriti tad eva samādhiprabhāvasaṃbhūtaṃ rūpamanāsrave samādhāvanāsravaṃ varṇayanti yogācārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13108: paryāyeṇa tarhi tadeva sāsravaṃ cānāsravaṃ ca syāt /
SA01vakobhau:13113: yathā tat sāsravaṃ tathā na kadācidanāsravamiti ko 'tra saṃkaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13115: yadi ca rūpāyatanādīni ekāntena sāsravāṇi syuriha sūtre kimartha viśeṣitāni syu“ryāni rūpāṇi sāsravāṇi sopādānīyāni cetaḥkhilamrakṣavastvi“ti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13117_1: yathā dātṝṇāṃ dāyāḥ paribhujyante tathā tathā bhoktṝṇāṃ guṇaviśeṣādanugrahaviśeṣāccānyamanasāmapi
SA01vakobhau:13117_2: dātṝṇāṃ tadālambanadānacetanā bhāvitāḥ saṃtatayaḥ sūkṣmaṃ pariṇāmaviśeṣaṃ prāpnuvanti
SA01vakobhau:13119: “idamabhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ” bhavedabhivardhata eva puṇyamupajāyata eva puṇyam iti /
SA01vakobhau:13121: atha mataṃ kathamidānīṃ saṃtānāntaraviśeṣādanyamanaso 'pi saṃtānāntarasya pariṇāmaḥ setsyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:13125: kathamidānīṃ saṃtānāntaraviśeṣātsaṃtānāntare dharmāntaramavijñaptiḥ setsyatīti nirūpadhikeṣvidānīṃ puṇyakriyāvastuṣu kathaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:13129: avijñaptivādinastu niraupadhike yatra vijñaptirnāsti tatra kathāmavijñaptiḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:13133_0: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ “yasyograbhikṣuḥ śīlavān kalyāṇadharmā piṇḍakaṃ paribhujyāpramāṇaṃ
SA01vakobhau:13133_2: puṇyābhiṣyandaḥ kuśalābhiṣyandaḥ sukhāsvādadhāraḥ pratikāṅkṣitavya” ityatra tadānīṃ
SA01vakobhau:13137: yadapyuktaṃ “kārayataḥ kathaṃ karmapathāḥ setsyantī“ti tatrāpyevaṃ varṇayanti /
SA01vakobhau:13139_0: tatprayogeṇa pareṣāmupaghātaviśeṣātprayoktuḥ sūkṣmaḥ saṃtatipariṇāma viśeṣo jāyate
SA01vakobhau:13139_1: yata āyatyāṃ samante 'pi bahutaraphalābhinirvarttanasamarthā bhavatīti svayamapi
SA01vakobhau:13139_2: ca kurvataḥ kriyāphalaparisamāptāveṣa eva nyāyo veditavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13147: upātteṣu skandheṣu trikālayā cetanayā prāṇātipātāvadhvena spṛśyata iti bhadantaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13149: haniṣyāmi hanmi hatamiti cāsya yadā bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:13155: svayaṃ tu ghnata etāvāṃścetanāsamudācāra ityayamatrābhiprāyo yuktarūpaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:13157: ka idānīmeṣa pradveṣo yadavijñaptiḥ prakṣipyate saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣaścābhyupagamyate tathaivāprajñāyamānaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13161: kintu cittānvayakāyaprayogeṇa kriyāparisamāptau tābhyāṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ dharmāntaraṃ prayojayiturutpadyata iti notpadyate paritoṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13163: yatkṛtaprayogasaṃbhūtā tu kriyāparisamāptistasyaiva tannimittaḥ saṃtatipariṇāmo bhavatīti bhavati paritoṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13182: kimasau vācaṃ bhāṣyate kriyāṃ vā karoti cīvarādīn vā paryeṣate /
SA01vakobhau:13189: yasyāḥ pratilambhādvyutthito 'pi na punarmithyāvāgādiṣu pravartate samyagvāgādiṣu ca pravartate /
SA01vakobhau:13193_0: yadyevamihāpyevaṃ kiṃ na gṛhyate mārgasamāpanno vināpyavijñaptyā tadrūpamāśayaṃ ca
SA01vakobhau:13193_1: āśrayaṃ ca pratilabhate yasya pratilambhāt vyutthito 'pi na punarmithyāvāgādiṣu pravartate
SA01vakobhau:13195: ato nimitte naimittikopacāraṃ kṛtvā aṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:13204: tadyāthā 'ṣṭau lokadharmāḥ lābho 'lābhaḥ yaśo 'yaśaḥ nindā praśaṃsā sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti /
SA01vakobhau:13208: prātimokṣasaṃvaro 'pi syāt yayā cetanayā vidhipūrvaṃ kṛtvā 'bhyupagamaḥ pratiṣiddhātkarmaṇaḥ kāyavācau saṃvṛṇoti /
SA01vakobhau:13213: tadbhāvanayā kriyākāle smarataḥ tatpratyupasthānāt setubhāvo 'pi syādakriyāṃ pratijñāṃ saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya lajjito dauḥśīlyākaraṇāt ityarthameva ca tasyāḥ samādānam /
SA01vakobhau:13215: yadi punaravijñaptereva dauḥsīlyaṃ pratibadhnīyāt na kaścitmuṣitasmṛtiḥ śikṣāṃ bhindyāt /
SA01vakobhau:13219: yadyasti tacca mahābhūtānyupādāyetyuktam tat kim vijñaptimahābhūtānyevopādāyāvijñaptirutpadyate athānyāni /
SA01vakobhau:13223: na hi saiva sāmagrī sukṣmaphalā caudārikaphālā ca yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:13225: kiṃ khalu yadātanī vijñaptistadātanānyeva sā mahābhūtānyupādāya vartate /
SA01vakobhau:13227: sarvamupādāyarūpaṃ prāyeṇaivaṃ kiñcittu vartamānamanāgataṃ cātītāni mahābhūtānyupādāya /
SA01vakobhau:13246: kāmāvacaraṃ kāyavākkarmaṃ kāmāvacarāṇyeva mahābhūtānyupādāya evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmikaṃ tadbhūmikānyevopādāya /
SA01vakobhau:13250: asravaṃ tu kāyavākkarma yasyāṃ bhūmau jātastadutpādayati tadbhūmikānyupādāya tadveditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:13272: sā samādhisaṃbhūtānyaupacayikānyanupātāni ca mahābhūtānyupādāyotpadyate abhinnāni ca yānyeva ca bhūtānyupādāya prāṇātipātādviratirutpadyate tānyeva yāvat saṃbhinnapralāpāt /
SA01vakobhau:13283: kiṃ punariyaṃ vijñaptirutpadyamānā pūrvakasya saṃsthānasya saṃtānaṃ bādhitvotpadyate utāho na /
SA01vakobhau:13294: anyānyeva tāni naiḥṣyandikāni tadānīmupajāyante yānyupādāya vijñaptirbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:13296: evaṃ tarhi yadyadevāṅgaṃ niśrityotpadyate vijñaptistena tenāṅgena mahīyasā bhavitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:13300: anabhivyāpane ca punaḥ kathaṃ kṛtsnāṅgena vijñapayet /
SA01vakobhau:13304: tat khalvetat karma paryāyeṇa dvividhaṃ trividhaṃ pañcavidhaṃ cottam /
SA01vakobhau:13313: evaṃ vākkarma cetanā ceti pañcavidhaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:13322: avyākṛtaṃ hi cittaṃ durbalamato na śaktaṃ balavatkarmākṣeptuṃ yanniruddhe 'pi tasminnanuvadhnīyāt /
SA01vakobhau:13371: kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne na tata ūrdhvam /
SA01vakobhau:13380: sa hi svaparṣanmadhye āyuṣmato 'śvajitaḥ kṣepārthamātmānaṃ kṣiptavāt /
SA01vakobhau:13382: tata ūrdhvamasatyāṃ vāgvijñaptau kathaṃ tatra śabdāyatanaṃ bāhyamahābhūtahetukam /
SA01vakobhau:13391: na hi teṣūpapannastajjātīyamadhobhūmikaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti yena tāṃ vijñaptiṃ samutthāpayet /
SA01vakobhau:13396: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamūrdhvaṃ brahmalokānnāsti vijñaptiḥ kāmadhātau ca nivṛktāvyākṛtā nāsti /
SA01vakobhau:13402: tacca dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu nāsti bhāvanāprahātavyena cotthāpyate /
SA01vakobhau:13408: kiṃ khalu samutthānavaśādevaṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalatvaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:13412: caturbhiḥ prakāraiḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvataḥ saṃprayogataḥ samutthānataśca /
SA01vakobhau:13431: taireva kuśalamūlahyar patrāpyaiḥ saṃprayuktā dharmāḥ saṃprayogeṇa kuśalāstairasaṃprayuktānāṃ kuśalatvābhāvādauṣadhamiśrapānīyavat /
SA01vakobhau:13435: kāyavāvakkarmaṇi cittaviprayuktāśca saṃskārajātyādayaḥ prāptinirodhāsaṃjñisamāpattayastaireva kuśalamūlādisaṃprayuktai dharmaḥ samupasthāpitāḥ samutthānena kuśalāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13439: prāptīnāṃ tu visabhāgacittasamutthāpitānāṃ kathaṃ kuśalatvamiti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:13456: evaṃ tarhi na kiñcitsāsravamavyākṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati kuśalaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:13459: paramārthata evamuktaṃ vipākaṃ tu prati yatsāsravaṃ na vyākriyate tadavyākṛtamityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:13471: yadi samutthānavaśātkuśalākuśalatvaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇaḥ kiṃ na mahābhūtānām /
SA01vakobhau:13475: samāhitasyāvijñaptau nāstyabhiprāyo na cāsamāhitaṃ cittaṃ tasyāḥ samutthāpakaṃ visabhāgabhūmikatvāditi kathaṃ tasyāḥ kuśalatvam /
SA01vakobhau:13482: kiṃ tarhi bhagavatoktaṃ “tato 'pi mithyādṛṣṭermithyāsaṃkalpaḥ prabhavati mithyā vāgmithyākarmānta” mityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:13498: tena hi vinā 'sau mṛtasyeva na syādā kṣiptā 'pi satī /
SA01vakobhau:13528: naivaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā na kuśalākuśalāni bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:13558: kiṃ khalu yathā pravartakaṃ tathaivānuvartakaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:13577: na tu kadācit kuślaṃ pravartakamanuvartakaṃ cāvyākṛtaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:13583: kuśalaikatānā hi buddhānāṃ saṃtatayo nityaṃ samāhitatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:13588: svapan samāhito nāgo niṣaṇṇo 'pi samāhita” iti /
SA01vakobhau:13590: anicchayā 'sya cittasyāvisaraṇādevamuktaṃ na tu na santyavyākṛtāni vipākajairyā pathikanirmāṇacittāni buddhānāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13598: vipākajaṃ tu cittaṃ naiva pravartakaṃ nānuvartakaṃ nirabhisaṃskāravāhitvāt /
SA01vakobhau:13610: na vā sarvaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ pravartakamiti viśeṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:13612: yathānuvartakaṃ cet akukśalāvyākṛtacittasya prātimokṣavijñaptiḥ kuśalā na prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:13614: yathā pravartakaṃ tathā vijñaptirnatu yathā darśanaprahātavyam /
SA01vakobhau:13618: yadi nānuvartakavaśādvijñapteḥ kuśalāditvaṃ na tarhīdaṃ vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:13652: bhikṣusaṃvaro bhikṣuṇīsaṃvaraḥ śikṣamāṇāsaṃvara śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerīsaṃvaraḥ upāsakasaṃvara upāsikāsaṃvara upavāsasaṃvaraśca /
SA01vakobhau:13680: parivṛtte hi vyañjane bhikṣurbhikṣuṇītyucyate bhikṣuṇī ca punarbhikṣuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13682: śrāmaṇerītyucyate śrāmaṇerī ca punaḥ śikṣamāṇā ca śrāmaṇeraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13684: upāsaka upāsiketyucyate upāsikā ca punarūpāsaka iti /
SA01vakobhau:13686: na ca vyañjanaparivṛttau pūrvasaṃvaratyāge kāraṇamasti nāpyapūrvasaṃvarapratilambhe /
SA01vakobhau:13688: tasmādabhinna eṣāṃ caturṇā saṃvarāṇāṃ tribhyaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13690_0: ya upāsakasaṃvarācchrāmaṇerasaṃvaraṃ samādatte tasmācca punarbhikṣusaṃvaraṃ kiṃ te
SA01vakobhau:13690_1: saṃvarā virativṛddhiyogādanyo 'nya ucyante pañcadaśa viṃśativat dīnāraśateravacca
SA01vakobhau:13707_0: yathā yathā hi vahutarāṇi śikṣāpadāni samāditsate tathā tathā bahutarebhyo maddapramādapadebhyo
SA01vakobhau:13707_1: nivartamāno bahutarebhyaḥ prāṇātipātādīnāṃ nidānebhyo nivartate viratīnāṃ ca nidāneṣu
SA01vakobhau:13709: evaṃ cāsati bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ pratyācakṣāṇastrīnapi saṃvarānvijahyāddayorapi tatrāntarbhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:13721: kathaṃ cāyamupāsako bhavati kathamupavāsastho yāvat bhikṣuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13742: sarvebhya eva varjanīyebhyaḥ kāyavākkarmabhyaḥ viratisamādānāt bhikṣurityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:13761: na kurvanti tayā samāttayā lajjinaḥ pāpamityakriyetyucyate /
SA01vakobhau:13763: sāpi tu vijñapticittābhyāṃ kriyata iti kriyā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:13784: dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣui prātimokṣasaṃvara eva na prātimokṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13838: tābhyāṃ dauḥśīlyasya tatsamutthāpakānāṃ ca kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt /
SA01vakobhau:13840: ata eva syāddhyānasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate //
SA01vakobhau:13850: evaṃ syādanāsravasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ yathāyogaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:13855: manasā saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu sarvatra saṃvaraḥ / iti /
SA01vakobhau:13866: pratyekaṃ dvisvabhāvajñapanārthaṃ punardvigrahaṇaṃ mā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ vijñāyīti manaḥsaṃvaro 'pi smṛtisaṃprajñānasvabhāva iti /
SA01vakobhau:13872: kaḥ katamayā vijñaptyā 'vijñaptyā vā kiyantaṃ kālaṃ samanvāgata iti /
SA01vakobhau:13880: yaḥ prātimokṣāsaṃvarasthaḥ pudgala uktaḥ sa yāvattāmavijñaptir na tyajati tāvattayā vartamānayā nityaṃ samanvāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13892: asaṃvarastho 'pi yāvadasaṃvaraṃ na tyajati tāvannityamavijñaptyā vartamānayā samanvāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13902: prathame hi kṣaṇe sa janmāntaratyaktaṃ dhyānasaṃvaramatītaṃ labhate /
SA01vakobhau:13909: sa prathame kṣaṇe nātītayā samanvāgato mārgasya pūrvamanutpāditatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:13913: tau dhyānānāsravasaṃvarānvitau samāhitaryamārgasamāpannau vartamānayā avijñaptyā samanvāgatau yathākramaṃ na tu vyutthitau /
SA01vakobhau:13921: yo naiva saṃvare nāsaṃvare sthitaḥ sa madhyasthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13925: yasya tvasti dauḥśīlyaśīlāṅgādisaṃgṛhītā sa ādau madhyayā samanvāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13934: kimasaṃvarasthaḥ kadācitkuśalayā vijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavati saṃvarastho vā punarakuśalayā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:13941_1: kurvataḥ yena ca kleśavegena saṃvarasthasyākuśalā 'vijñaptirutpadyate vadhabandhanatāḍanādikriyāṃ
SA01vakobhau:13943: sa ādye kṣaṇe vartamānayaivāvijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavatyanyeṣvatītayā 'pi /
SA01vakobhau:13947: vijñaptyā tu punaḥ sarve kurvanto madhyayānvitāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13949: sarve saṃvarāsaṃvaramadhyasthā yāvadijñaptiṃ kurvanti tāvattayā vartamānayā samanvāgatāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13957: anāgatayā tu vijñaptyā na kaścit samanvāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:13963: durbalasya hi dharmasya prāptirapi durbalā nānubandhībhavati /
SA01vakobhau:13979: asaṃvaro duścaritaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ karmaṃ tatpathaḥ // VAkK_4.24 //
SA01vakobhau:13996: mṛdvyā cetanayā kuśalamakukśalaṃ vā kurvannaivasaṃvaranāsaṃvarasthito vijñaptyaiva samanvāgato bhavati nāvijñaptyā prāgevāvyākṛte anyatraupadhikapuṇyakriyāvastukarmapathebhyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14000: avijñaptyaiva samanvāgato na vijñaptyā yenāryapudgalena janmāntaraparivṛttau na tāvadvijñaptaṃ vā punarvihīnam /
SA01vakobhau:14008: yadā dhyānabhūmikaṃ cittaṃ pratilabhyate maulīyaṃ sāmantakīyaṃ vā sāsravaṃ tadā dhyānasaṃvaro 'pi sahabhūtatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:14016: tatra ṣaṭ dhyānabhūmayo 'nāsravā bhavanti catvāri dhyānāni anāgamyasyānantaraṃ ceti paścātpravedayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14021: yadyenaṃ paro vijñapayati asau ca param /
SA01vakobhau:14029_0: svayaṃbhūtvena buddhānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca niyāmāvakrāntyā pañcakānām ehibhikṣukayā
SA01vakobhau:14029_2: mahāprajāpatyāḥ dūtena dharmadinnāyāḥ vinayaddharapañcamena pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu
SA01vakobhau:14029_3: daśavargeṇa madhyeṣu janapadeṣu śaraṇagamanaṃ traivācikena ṣaṣṭibhadravargapūgopasaṃpāditānāmiti
SA01vakobhau:14031: sa punareṣa prātimokṣāsaṃvaraḥ samādīyamānaḥ kiyantaṃ kālaṃ samādātavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14035: saptanaikāyikasya prātimokṣasaṃvarasya yāvajjīvaṃ samādānam upavāsasaṃvarasyāhorātramityeṣa niyamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14053: athāhorātrādūrdhvaṃ pañcarātraṃ daśarātraṃ vā upavāsasamādānasya kaḥ pratibandho bahūnāmupavāsasaṃvarāṇāmutpattau /
SA01vakobhau:14059: kiṃ tāvadahorātrādūrdhvaṃ saṃvarasyānutpartti paśyatā tathāgatenāhorātrika upavāso deśita utāho durbalendriyāṇāmahorātrake 'pi saṃvarasamādānena saṃniyojanārthamiti /
SA01vakobhau:14076: na kila kaścidevamasaṃvaraṃ samādatte yathopavāsaṃ kaccidahamahorātramasaṃvṛtaḥ syāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:14080: evaṃ caiva na kaścidādatte kaccidahaṃ yāvajīvamasaṃvṛtaḥ syāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:14084: yadyapi naivamādatte tathāpyatyantavipannenāśayena tāṃ kriyāṃ prakurvannasaṃvaraṃ pratilabhate na kālāntaravipannena /
SA01vakobhau:14090: yadi punaḥ kaścidasaṃvareṇāpyarthī kālāntaramasaṃvaraṃ samādadīta so 'vaśyaṃ labheta /
SA01vakobhau:14109: yastu pūrvakṛtasamādāno nityamaṣṭabhyāmupaceṣyāmīti sa bhuktvāpi gṛhṇīyāt /
SA01vakobhau:14111: anyataśca grahītavyo na svayamevāparāpekṣayā satsvapi pratyayeṣvanatikramārtham /
SA01vakobhau:14113: nīcaiḥ sthitenotkuṭṭakena vā jānupātena vā kapotakamañjaliṃ kṛtvā 'nyatra sthāsyāt /
SA01vakobhau:14135: evaṃ ca kṛtvā aurabhrikapāradārikayo rātridivasopavāsakayoḥ sāphalyaṃ prayujyate /
SA01vakobhau:14143: “poṣaṃ dadhāti manasaḥ kuśalasya yasmāduktastato bhagavatā kila poṣadho 'yami“ti /
SA01vakobhau:14166: madyaṃ hi pivataḥ kāryā kāryasmṛtireva naśyet /
SA01vakobhau:14182: evaṃ tu sati sūtrapāṭho na yujyeta /
SA01vakobhau:14184: akālabhojanādvirati muktvā “anenāhamaṣṭamāṅgena teṣāmāryāṇāmarhatāṃ śikṣāyāmanuśikṣe anuvidhīya” iti /
SA01vakobhau:14189: yathā sthasyāṅgāni caturaṅgo balakāyaḥ pañcāṅgaṃ tūryaṃ tathā 'ṣṭāṅga upavāso draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14191: akālabhojanāt prativiratirūpavāsa upavāsāṅgaṃ ca yathā samyagdṛṣṭirmārgo mārgāṅgaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:14193: dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bodhirvodhyaṅgaṃ samādhirdhyānaṃ dhyānāṅgaṃ ceti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14195: natu teṣāmeva samyagdṛṣṭyādīnāṃ ta evāṅgatvāya kalpanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:14197: pūrvakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭyādaya uttareṣāmaṅgaṃ yadi syuḥ prathamakṣaṇotpanna āryamārgo nāṣṭāṅgaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:14203: anupavāsako 'pi yastamahorātraṃ buddhadharmasaṃghān śaraṇaṃ gatvopavāsaṃ gṛhṇāti tasyotpadyate upavāsasaṃvaro nānyathā /
SA01vakobhau:14207_0: sūtra uktaṃ “yataśca mahānāman gṛhī avadātavasanaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato
SA01vakobhau:14207_1: buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati vācaṃ ca bhāṣate upavāsakaṃ ca māṃ dharaya /
SA01vakobhau:14231: yathaivaṃ bhikṣurlabdhasaṃvaro 'pi punaḥ śikṣāpadāni grāhyate śrāmaṇeraśca vyutpādanārthamita ścāmutaśca te saṃvara iti tathopavāsako 'pi na tu vinā saṃvareṇopāsako 'sti /
SA01vakobhau:14235: yadi sarva evopāsakā upāsakasaṃvarasthāḥ kathaṃ bhagavatā ekadeśakārī pradeśakārī yadbhūyaḥkārī pūripūrṇakārī copāsaka uktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14239: yo hi yacchikṣāpadaṃ pālayati sa tatkārītyuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14247: na hyevaṃ sūtrapāṭhaḥ ukto yathā mahānāmasūtre pāṭhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14253: tatra te dṛṣṭasatyā “avetyaprasādānvayaṃ prāṇairapi saddharmopagamanaṃ darśayanti sma /
SA01vakobhau:14263: ekadeśakāryādīṃstu khaṇḍitaśikṣānadhikṛtya praśna eva na yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:14267: ko hyapāsakasaṃvaraṃ jānan etanna jñāsyate yo hi yacchikṣāpadaṃ na khaṇḍayati sa tatkārī bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:14269: upāsakasaṃvarasya tu parimāṇānabhijñāṃstanmātraśikṣākṣamān pratyeṣa praśno yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:14271: “kiyatā bhadantopāsaka ekadeśakārī bhavati yāvat paripūrṇakārī bhavati /“
SA01vakobhau:14273: yadi tarhi vinā saṃvareṇopāsakaḥ syādvikalena vā bhikṣuśrāmaṇerāvapi syātām /
SA01vakobhau:14281: vināpi hi saṃvareṇopāsakaḥ prajñaptito na tu bhikṣuśrāmaṇerāviti te tvetannecchanti kāśmīrāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14289: evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'rhato 'pi mṛduḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ syāt pṛthagjanasyādhimātraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14295: yo buddhadharmasaṃghāñcharaṇaṃ gacchati kimasau śaraṇaṃ gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:14298: nirvāṇaṃ ceti śaraṇaṃ yo yāti śāraṇatrayam // VAkK_4.32 //
SA01vakobhau:14300: yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati aśaikṣānasau budhakarakāndharmāñcharaṇaṃ gacchati yeṣāṃ prādhānyena sa ātmabhāvo budhā ityucyate yeṣāṃ vā lābhena sarvāvabodhasāmarthyādbuddho bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:14312: yaḥ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati śaikṣāśaikṣānasausaṃghakarakānharmān gacchati yeṣāṃ lābhenāṣṭau pudgalāḥ saṃghībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:14319: yattu sūtra uktaṃ “yo 'pyasau bhaviṣyatyanāgate 'dhvani saṃgho nāma tamapi śaraṇaṃ gacchatami “ti /
SA01vakobhau:14323: yo dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati asau nirvāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati pratisaṃkhyānirodham /
SA01vakobhau:14327: yadyaśaikṣā dharmā eva buddhaḥ kathaṃ tathāgatasyāntike dukṣṭacittarudhirotpādanādānantaryaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:14331: śāstraṃ tu naivaṃ vācakamaśaikṣā dharmā eva buddha iti /
SA01vakobhau:14338: anyathā hi laukikacittastho na buddhaḥ syānna saṃghaḥ śīlameva ca bhikṣukarakaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:14340: yathā tu yo bhikṣūn pūjayati bhikṣukarakamasau śīlaṃ pūjayati /
SA01vakobhau:14342: evaṃ yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchatyaśaikṣānasau buddhakarakāndharmān śaraṇaṃ gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:14362: yastu buddhaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14373: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamanyeṣu saṃvareṣvabrahmacaryādviratiḥ śikṣāpadaṃ vyavasthāpitam upāsakasya tu kāmamithyācārāt /
SA01vakobhau:14382: sukarā ca kāmamithyācārādviratirgṛhānadhyāvasatāṃ duṣkarātvabrahmacaryāditi duṣkaraṃ karttuṃ notsaheran /
SA01vakobhau:14386: janmāntareṣvapyanadhyācaraṇānnatvabrahmacryādityupāsakasyāpi tasmādeva viratiḥ śikṣāpadaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ mā bhūt parivṛttajanmāntaraḥ śaikṣa upāsakasaṃvarāṅgeṣvasaṃvṛta iti /
SA01vakobhau:14390: ya upāsakāḥ santo bhāryāḥ pariṇayanti kiṃ taistābhyo 'pi saṃvaraḥ pratilabdho 'tha na /
SA01vakobhau:14398: yathābhyupagamaṃ lābhaḥ saṃvarasya na saṃtateḥ // VAkK_4.33 //
SA01vakobhau:14405: na tvatra saṃtāne mayā brahmacaryaṃ na kartavyamityata evaiṣāṃ tadadhiṣṭhātkāmamithyācārāṅgādeva saṃvaralābho nābrahmacaryāditi nāsti bhāryībhūtāyāṃ saṃvarakṣobhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14407: atha kasmāt mṛṣāvādād viratirevopāsakasaṃvaraśikṣāpadaṃ na paiśunyādiviratiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14415_0: sarvatra hi śikṣātikrame samanuyujyamānasyopasthitamidaṃ bhavati nāhamevamahārṣamiti
SA01vakobhau:14415_1: mṛṣāvādasya prasaṅgo bhavatyato mṛṣāvādādviratirvidhīyate kathaṃ kṛtātikramo 'pyātmani māviṣkuryāditi /
SA01vakobhau:14417: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyācchikṣāpadasya na vyavasthāpitam /
SA01vakobhau:14433: śakyaṃ tu madyaṃ pratīkārabuddhyaiva pātuṃ yāvanna madayet /
SA01vakobhau:14437: na tat kliṣṭaṃ yadamadanīyamātrāṃ viditvā pibati /
SA01vakobhau:14447: idaṃ coktaṃ māṃ bhikṣavaḥ śāstāramuddiśadbhiḥ kuśāgreṇāpi madyaṃ na pātavyami” tyataḥ prakṛtisāvadyamiti jñāyate /
SA01vakobhau:14455: utsargavihitasyāpi glāneṣu prajñaptisāvadyasya punarmadyasyāpavādaḥ prasaṅgaparihārārthaṃ madnīyamātrānīyamanāt/
SA01vakobhau:14465: ata evātra pramādasthānagrahaṇaṃ nānyeṣu teṣāṃ prakṛtisāvadyatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:14476: te ca kadācidaprāptacyutamadyabhāve bhavataḥ ityato madyagrahaṇam /
SA01vakobhau:14484: ya ime trayaḥ prātimokṣadhyānānāsravasaṃvarāḥ kimeṣāṃ yata eko labhyate tataḥ śeṣau /
SA01vakobhau:14491: vartamānebhya eva skandhāyatana dhātubhyaḥ kāmāpta iti prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14495: ubhayebhya iti sattvāsattvākhyebhyaḥ prakṛtipratikṣepaṇasāvadyebhyaśca vartamānebhya eva skandhāyatanadhātubhyo labhyate /
SA01vakobhau:14502_0: maulebhya eva karmapathebhyo dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau labhyete na prayogapṛṣṭhebhyaḥ
SA01vakobhau:14502_1: kuta eva prajñaptisāvadyebhyaḥ sarvakālebhyaśca skandhāyatanadhātubhyo labhyete atītānāgatebhyo 'pi /
SA01vakobhau:14506: santi tāni skandha dhātvāyatanāti yebhyaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ eva labhyate na dhyānānāsravasaṃvarāviti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14516: natu saṃvarakāle vartamānāḥ karmapathāḥ santīti vartamānādhiṣṭhānebhyaḥ iti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:14520: atha kiṃ saṃvarāsaṃvarau sarvasattvebhya eva labhyete sarvāṅgebhyaḥ sarvakāraṇaiśca āhosvidasti bhedaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14526: sarvasattvebhya eva saṃvaro labhyate kebhyaścit aṅgebhyastu vibhāṣā /
SA01vakobhau:14544: paścimaṃ paryāyaṃ niyamayyocyate asti saṃvarasthāyī sarvasattveṣu saṃvṛto na sarvāṅgaiḥ na sarvakāraṇaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14546: yo mṛdunā cittena madhyenādhimātreṇa vā upāsakovāsa śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraṃ samādatte /
SA01vakobhau:14548: asti sarvasattveṣu saṃvṛtaḥ sarvaṅgaiśca na tu sarakāraṇaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14550: yo mṛdunā cittena madhyenādhimātreṇa vā bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ samādatte /
SA01vakobhau:14556: asti sarvasattveṣu sarvakāraṇaiśca na tu sarvāṅgaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14562: yasmātsarvasattvānugate kalyāṇāśaye sthitaḥ saṃvaraṃ pratilabhate nānyathā pāpāśayasyānuparatatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:14582: yadi punaḥ śakyebhya eva saṃvaro labhyate cayāpacayayuktaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:14586: evaṃ ca sati vināpi lābhatyāgakāraṇābhyāṃ saṃvarasya lābhatyāgau syātāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14590: yathā hyapūrvatṛṇādyutpattau śoṣe vā saṃvarasya vṛddhihlāsau na bhavatastathā śakyāśakyasaṃcāre 'pi na syātām /
SA01vakobhau:14592: na sattvānāṃ pūrvaṃ paścācca bhāvāttṛṇādīnāṃ tvabhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:14594: ko nvatra viśeṣo na vā bhavedasatsu tṛṇādiṣu saṃvarastadvadaśakyo vā bhavet /
SA01vakobhau:14596: yadā ca parinirvṛtā na bhavantyeva tadā kathaṃ saṃvarahlāso na syāditi naiṣa yuktaḥ parihāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14600: evaṃ tarhi pūrvabuddhaparinirvṛtebhya uttareṣāṃ buddhānāṃ pratimokṣasaṃvarasyā lābhātkathaṃ śīlanyūnatā na prasajyeta /
SA01vakobhau:14608: asamvarastu sarvebhyaḥ sarvāṅgebhyo na kāraṇaiḥ // VAkK_4.36 //
SA01vakobhau:14616: yo mṛdunā cittenāsaṃvaraṃ pratilabhate so 'dhimātreṇāpi cittena prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayanmṛdunaivā saṃvareṇa samanvāgato bhavatyadhimātrayā tu prāṇātipātavijñaptyā /
SA01vakobhau:14620: tatreme āsaṃvarikāstadyathā aurabhrikāḥ kaukkuṭikāḥ saukarikāḥ śākunikā mātsikā mṛgalubdhakāścaurā vadhyaghātakā bandhanapālakā nāgabandhakāḥ śvapākā vāgurikāśca /
SA01vakobhau:14622: rājāno daṇḍanetāro vyāvahārikāścārthata āsaṃvarikāḥ asaṃvare bhavatvāt tatrashatayā asaṃvara eṣāmastīti āsaṃvarikā vā /
SA01vakobhau:14632: aurabhrikādīnāṃ tu mātāpitṛputradārādiṣvavipannāśayānāṃ jīvitahetorapyahantukāmānāṃ kathamasaṃvaraḥ sarvasattvebhyo yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:14636: na hi tāvatte ta eva iti vidvāṃso hanyuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14638: āryībhūtānāṃ ca punaḥ paśu bhavituṃ nāstyavakāśa iti tebhyaḥ kathaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:14640: yadi cā nāgatātmabhāvāpekṣayā varttamānādasaṃvṛtaḥ syādurabhrādīnapi te putrībhūtāt sarvathā na hanyuriti ina syāttebhyyo 'saṃvaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14642: kathaṃ hi nāma jighāṃsatāmeva tebhyo na syādasaṃvaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14646: kathaṃ hi nāmājighāṃsatāmeva tebhyaḥ syādasaṃvara iti /
SA01vakobhau:14653: mūko 'pi ca vākprāpaṇīyamarthaṃ kāyena prāpayituṃ śakta iti /
SA01vakobhau:14655: yastarhi dve trīṇi vā śikṣāpadāni samādatte /
SA01vakobhau:14657: sarvathā nāsti vikalaḥ prādeśikaścāsaṃvarika iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14659: yathā bhyupagamaṃ vikalo 'pi syāt prādeśiko 'pyasaṃvaraḥ saṃvaraścānyatrāṣṭavidhāditi sautrāntikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14681: athavā samādānamādatte buddhamavanditvā na bhokṣye tithimāsārdhamāsabhaktāni vā nityaṃ kariṣyāmītyādi /
SA01vakobhau:14683: ādareṇa tadrūpeṇa kriyāmīhate kuśalāmakuśalāṃ vā yato 'syāvijñaptirutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:14699: śikṣāpadānāṃ vijñapuruṣasyāntike pratyākhyānadāśayataḥ nikāyasabhāgatyāgāt yugapadu bhayavyañjanaprādurbhāvāt kuśalamūlasamucchedācca /
SA01vakobhau:14726: na hyekadeśakṣobhāt kṛtsna saṃvaratyāgo yukta iti /
SA01vakobhau:14735: āviṣkṛtāyāṃ tu tasyāmāpattau śīlavānbhavati na duḥśīlo yathā ṛṇaṃ śodhayitvā dhanavānbhavati na tvṛṇavāniti /
SA01vakobhau:14739: katamasya bhavati śrāmaṇyaṃ dhvastaṃ patitaṃ parājitamiti /
SA01vakobhau:14759_0: na cāsau pūrvaṃ paramārthabhikṣurāsīdyataḥ paścādabhikṣurbhavet yaccoktamekadeśakṣobhāditi
SA01vakobhau:14759_2: abhavyo viruḍhiṃ vṛddhiṃ vipulatāmāptu” mityupamāṃ kurvatā /
SA01vakobhau:14763: evamekadeśa syāpi mūlabhūtasya cchedādabhavyaḥ saṃvaraśeṣo viroḍumiti /
SA01vakobhau:14765: sa ca gurvīṃ bhikṣubhāvamaryādābhedinīṃ maulīmāpattimāpadyamānastīvrānapatrāpyayogātsaṃvarasya mūlaṃ cchinattīti yuktaḥ kṛtsnasaṃvaratyāgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14767: yasya caikagrāsaparibhogo 'pyekapāda pārṣṇirpradeśaparibhogo 'pi ca nābhyanujñāyate sāṃghikayorāhāravihārayoḥ sarvabhikṣusaṃbhogabahiṣkṛtaśca śāstrā yaṃ cādhikṛtyoktaṃ /
SA01vakobhau:14780: “mārgajino mārgadeśiko mārge jīvati yaśca mārgadūṣī” astyetaduktam /
SA01vakobhau:14782: sa tveṣa ākṛtimātrāvaśeṣatvācchamaṇa ukto dagdhakāṣṭhaśuṣkahladaśukanāśā pūtivījālātacakramṛtasattvavat /
SA01vakobhau:14784: yadi hi dauḥśīlyādabhikṣuḥ syāt śikṣādattako na syāt /
SA01vakobhau:14786: na vayaṃ brūmaḥ sahādhyāpattyā sarvaḥ pārājikaḥ iti /
SA01vakobhau:14790: kaścittu saṃtānaviśeṣānna pārājika ekacittenāpyapraticchādanāditi vyavasthāpitaṃ dharmasvāminā /
SA01vakobhau:14792: yadi tarhi pārājiko na bhikṣuḥ kiṃ punarna pravrājyate /
SA01vakobhau:14794: tīvrānapatrāpyavipāditatvāt saṃtateḥ saṃvarābhavyatvānna tu khalu bhikṣubhāvāpekṣayā /
SA01vakobhau:14798: kaścāyamanarthe nirbandho yadyasau tathābhūto 'pi bhikṣurnamo 'stu tasmai tādṛśāya bhikṣutvāya /
SA01vakobhau:14808: sarvameva dhyānāptaṃ kuśalaṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parityajyate /
SA01vakobhau:14810: upapattito vā bhūmisaṃcārādūrdhvaṃ cāvaśyaṃ parihāṇito vā samāpatternikāyasabhāgatvācca kiñcit /
SA01vakobhau:14812: yathā ca rūpāptaṃ kuśalaṃ bhūmisaṃcārahānibhyāṃ tyajyate
SA01vakobhau:14816: anāsravaṃ tu kuśalaṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ parityakṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:14832: yadi saṃvaraṃ samādatte dhyānasaṃvaraṃ vā labhate /
SA01vakobhau:14848: ya āsaṃvarika upavāsaṃ gṛhṇāti kimasau tasmātsaṃvarātpunarasaṃvaraṃ gacchatyāhosvinnaivasaṃvaraṃ nāsaṃvaram /
SA01vakobhau:14861: yena hyasau prasādakleśavegenāvijñaptirākṣiptā bhavati tasya cchedātsā 'pi cchidyate /
SA01vakobhau:14877: yadā kuśalamūlāni samucchettumārabhata ityebhiḥ ṣadbhiḥ kāraṇairavijñaptirmadhyamā tyajyate /
SA01vakobhau:14889: yasyopakleśaprakārasya yaḥ prahāṇamārgastenāsau saparivāraḥ parityajyate nānyathā /
SA01vakobhau:14891: atha keṣāṃ sattvānāmasaṃvaro bhavati keṣāṃ saṃvaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14903: saṃvaro hi manuṣyāṇāmeva yathoktaṃ hitvā devānāṃ ceti gatidvaye saṃvaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14909: sūtra uktaṃ yataśca mahānāma gṛhī avadātavasanaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati yāvadvācaṃ bhāṣate upāsakaṃ māṃ dhāraya iyatā copāsako bhavatī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:14925: āpāyikānāmapi tīvraṃ hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ nāsti yadyogād yadvipādanācca saṃvarāsaṃvarau syātām /
SA01vakobhau:14927_0: api khalvāśraya eva sa teṣāṃ tādṛśa ūṣarakṣetrabhūtaḥ śaṇḍapaṇḍakobhayavyañjanottarakauravāpāyikānāṃ
SA01vakobhau:14927_1: yatrāśraye saṃvaro pi na virohatyasaṃvaro 'pyūṣara iva kṣetre sasyamapyatimātraṃ kakvamapīti /
SA01vakobhau:14929: yattarhi sūtra uktam “aṇḍajo bhikṣavo nāgo 'ṣṭamyāṃ pakṣasya bhāvanādabhyudgamyāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatamupavāsamupavasatī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:14949: ārūpyopapannānāmapi teṣāṃ tu samanvāgamato 'sti na saṃmukhībhāvataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14951: ataḥ paramidānīṃ karmanirdeśādhikārātsūtrīddiṣṭānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nirdeṣa ārapsyate /
SA01vakobhau:14961: kṣemaṃ karma kuśalaṃ yadiṣṭavipākaṃ nirvāṇaprāpakaṃ ca duḥkhaparitrāṇāt /
SA01vakobhau:14963: tatkālamatyantaṃ ca akṣemamakuśalaṃ kṣemapratidvandvabhāvena yasyāniṣṭo vipākaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14965: tābhyāmitaratkarma naiva kṣemaṃ nākṣemaṃ yattatkuśalākuśalābhyāmitarat veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:14970: puṇyāpuṇyamaviñjaṃ ca sukhavedyādi ca trayam // VAkK_4.45 //
SA01vakobhau:14984: nanu ca trīṇi dhyānāni señjitānyuktāni bhagavatā /
SA01vakobhau:14996: tadbhūmiṣu yataḥ karmavipākaṃ prati neñjati // VAkK_4.46 //
SA01vakobhau:15006: yadeva hi pramāṇabalavarṇakarmānyabhūmika sukhabhogādi saṃvartanīyaṃ karma deveṣu vipacyate tadeva kadācidanyapratyayavaśānmanuṣyatiryakapreteṣu vipacyate /
SA01vakobhau:15008: rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ tu karmānyabhūmikamanyasyāṃ bhūmau vipaktuṃ na jātūtsahate /
SA01vakobhau:15014: yaśca lokato 'rthaḥ prasiddhaḥ kiṃ tatra yatnena /
SA01vakobhau:15024: eṣā hi bhūmiḥ sukhāyā vedanāyā yaduta kāmadhātustrīṇi ca dhyānāni /
SA01vakobhau:15052: itarathā hi dhyānāntarakarmaṇo vipāko na syāddhyānāntaraṃ vā kasyacitkarmaṇaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15056: dhyānāntarakarmaṇo dhyāna eva sukhendrīyaṃ vipāka ityeke /
SA01vakobhau:15062: śāstre hi paṭhitaṃ “syātkarmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipāko vipacyeta /
SA01vakobhau:15080: evaṃ tarhi “sukhavedyaṃ śubhaṃ dhyānādātṛtīyā” “diṣṭa-vipākaṃ ca kuśala” mityasya virodhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15086: sukhavedanāyai hitaṃ sukhavedanoyaṃ sukho 'sya vedanīya iti vā /
SA01vakobhau:15091: sa hyasau vidyate sukhasya vā vedanīyaṃ yena sukhaṃ vedayate /
SA01vakobhau:15110: yathoktaṃ “cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā rūpapratisaṃvedī bhavati notu rūparāgapratisaṃvedī“tyevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:15119: yathoktaṃ “yasmin samaye sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate dve asya vedane tasminsamaye niruddhe bhavata” iti /
SA01vakobhau:15121: nahi yasminsamaye sukhā vedanā vartate tasminpunaranyā vedanā 'sti sa yāṃ tāṃ vedayate /
SA01vakobhau:15129: taccaitatsukhavedanīyādi trividhaṃ karma niyataṃ cāniyataṃ ca veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:15137: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyamupapadyavedanīyamaparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ cetyetattrividhaṃ karma niyatamityetaccaturvidhaṃ karma bhavati sahāniyatavedanīyena /
SA01vakobhau:15146: tatra dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ yatra janmani kṛtaṃ tatraiva vipacyate /
SA01vakobhau:15158: asti hi karma saṃnikṛṣṭaphalaṃ na viprakṛṣṭaphalamasti viparyayādbāhyabījavat /
SA01vakobhau:15160: yathā tripakṣā suvarcalā tribhiḥ pakṣaiḥ phalaṃ dadhāti yavagodhūmādayaḥ ṣaḍbhirmāsairiti /
SA01vakobhau:15183: syāttriṣu paraṃ prayojya kāmamithyācāre svayaṃ prayuktasteṣāṃ yugapatsamāptau /
SA01vakobhau:15191: katamasmindhātau katividhaṃ karmākṣipyate kasyāṃ vā gatau /
SA01vakobhau:15195: sarveṣu triṣu dhātuṣu sarvāsu ca gatiṣu caturṇāṃ karmaṇāmākṣepaḥ kuśalānāmakuśalānāṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam /
SA01vakobhau:15201: narakeṣu kuśalasya karmaṇastrividhasyā kṣepo na dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyasya /
SA01vakobhau:15207: yato bhūmeḥ vītarāgapṛthagjano bhavatyasau ca sthiro bhavatyaparihāṇadharmā sa tatropapadyavedanīyaṃ karma na karoti /
SA01vakobhau:15215: āryapudgalastu yato vītarāgo na ca parihāṇadharmā sa tatropapadyadanīyaṃ cāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ ca karma na karoti /
SA01vakobhau:15217: na hyasau bhavyaḥ punarādhastanīṃ bhūmimāyātumaniyataṃ kuryāddṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ cātropapannaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15221: parihāṇadharmāpi tvāryapudgalaḥ kāmadhātorbhavāgrā dvītarāgaḥ tayorūpapadyāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ karmābhavyaḥ karttum /
SA01vakobhau:15255: eka eva hyasau nikāyasabhāga ekakarmākṣipto yaścāntarābhavo yāśca tadanvayā daśāvasthāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15264: guṇakṣetre ca niyataṃ tatpitrorghātakaṃ ca yat // VAkK_4.54 //
SA01vakobhau:15266: yaddhi karma tīvreṇa kleśena kṛtaṃ yacca tīvreṇa prasādena yacca sātatyena gunakṣetre ca tanniyataṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:15272: tatra hyantareṇāpi tīvrakleśaprasādānāṃ sātatyaṃ ca kuśalamakuśalaṃ ca karma niyataṃ saṃpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:15276: tayoścāpi yatra ghātikaṃ karma yathā tathā vā tanniyataṃ saṃpadyate nānyat /
SA01vakobhau:15294: tasya vā karmaṇo yā bhūmiḥ kuśalasyākuśalasya vā tato 'tyantavairāgyāttatkarma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:15300: yaddhi karma niyataṃ vipāke na tvavasthāyāṃ nāpyaniyataṃ tatyaiṣa niyamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15306: kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kṣetraṃ yatrāvaśyaṃ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:15327: ata eteṣu kṛtānāṃ kārāpakārāṇāṃ phalaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme niyataṃ prāpyate /
SA01vakobhau:15329: śeṣasya tu bhāvanāmārgasyāparipūrṇasvabhāvaphalatvācca tadvyutthitānāṃ na tathā pratyagrāśrayaparivṛttiśuddhāśayasaṃtatirvartata iti na te tathā puṇyakṣetraṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:15334: syāt karmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipāko vipacyeta na kāyikī /
SA01vakobhau:15341: avitarkaṃ karma dhyānāntarāt prabhṛti yāvat bhavāgre /
SA01vakobhau:15354: tasya hi duḥkhā vedanā vipākaścaitasikī ca duḥkhā vedanā daurmanasyaṃ na ca daurmanasyaṃ vipāka iti vyākhyātametat /
SA01vakobhau:15357: katamasminnasau citte bhavati kena vā kāraṇena /
SA01vakobhau:15369_0: ye hi dravyamantraprayogeṇa vā pareṣāṃ cittaṃ kṣepayanti akāmakaṃ vā viṣaṃ madyaṃ
SA01vakobhau:15369_1: vā pāyayanti trāsayanti vā mṛgayādiṣvagnim vā dāveṣutsṛjanti prapātādvā pātayantyanyena
SA01vakobhau:15369_2: vā kenacitpareṣāṃ smṛtiṃ bhraṃśayanti teṣāṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenāyatyāṃ cittaṃ kṣipyate /
SA01vakobhau:15380: amanuṣyā eva kupitā manuṣyāṇāṃ marmasu praharanti /
SA01vakobhau:15391: kathaṃ na caitasikī vedanā vipākaḥ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:15393: nahi brūmastadeva cittavipāka ityapi tu yo mahābhūtānāṃ prakopaḥ sa vipākaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15397: karmajena hi dhātunā vaiṣamyeṇa vyākulamavaśaṃ bhraṣṭasmṛtikaṃ cittaṃ vartata iti kṣiptamityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:15401: asti cittaṃ kṣiptaṃ na vikṣiptamiti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15405: kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ na kṣiptaṃ svasthacittasya kliṣṭam /
SA01vakobhau:15421: te hi vividhayātanāsahasravyatibhinnamarmāṇastīrvābhirvedanābhirabhitunnā ātmānamapi tāvannābhicetayanti kiṃ punaḥ kāryamakāryaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:15478: aśubhaṃ karma ekāntena kṛṣṇaṃ kliṣṭatvāt kṛṣṇavipākaṃ cāmanojñavipākatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:15486: yatra kila dvividho 'sti vipāka āntarābhavika aupapattibhavikaśca /
SA01vakobhau:15496: na hyevañjātīyakamekaṃ karmāsti vipāko vā yat kṛṣṇaṃ ca syāt śuklaṃ cānyonyavirodhāt /
SA01vakobhau:15498: nanu caivamakuśalasyāpi karmaṇaḥ kuśalavyavakīrṇatvāt kṛṣṇaśuklatvaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:15506: anasravaṃ karmaiṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ kṣayāya prahāṇāya saṃvartate /
SA01vakobhau:15512: uktaṃ tu bhagavatā mahatyāṃ śunyatāyā maśaikṣān dharmānārabhya “ime te ānanda dharmā ekāntakuśalā ekāntānavadyā” iti /
SA01vakobhau:15522: kiṃ punaḥ sarvamanāsravaṃ karma sarvasyāsya trividhasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayāya saṃvartate /
SA01vakobhau:15528: yā cetanā dvādaśadhā karma kṛṣṇakṣayāya tat // VAkK_4.61 //
SA01vakobhau:15530: darśanamārge catasṛṣu dharmajñānakṣāntiṣu kāmavairāgye cāṣṭāsvānantaryamārgeṣu yā cetanā seyaṃ dvādaśavidhā cetanā kṛṣṇasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇāya karma /
SA01vakobhau:15532: navame cetanā yā sā kṛṣṇaśuklakṣayāya ca /
SA01vakobhau:15534: navame kāmavairāgyānantaryamārge yā cetanā sā kṛṣṇaśuklasya kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇasya cākuśalasya navamasya prakārasya prahāṇāya /
SA01vakobhau:15538: dhyānādvyānādvairāgyaṃ kurvato yo 'ntyo navama ānantaryamārgastatra yā cetanā iyaṃ caturvidhā cetanā śuklasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇāya /
SA01vakobhau:15540: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamantyenaivānantaryamārgeṇa kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇaṃ nānyena /
SA01vakobhau:15547: ato yāvadeko 'pi tadālambanakleśaprakāra āste tāvadasya prahāṇaṃ nopapadyate /
SA01vakobhau:15551: anye punarācāryāḥ paśyanti narakavedanīyaṃ narakāccānyakāmadhātuvedanīyaṃ karma yathākrama kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ ceti /
SA01vakobhau:15553: narake hyakuśalasyaiva karmaṇo vipākastena tadvedanīyaṃ kṛṣṇamityucyate ato 'nya kāmadhātau kuśalākuśalasya karmaṇo vipākastena tadvedanīyaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklamityuktam /
SA01vakobhau:15567: sūtra uktaṃ trīṇi mauneyāni kāyamauneyaṃ vāṅmauneyaṃ manomauneyaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:15576: aśaikṣaṃ tu mana eva manomauneyaṃ na manaskarmeti /
SA01vakobhau:15583: api khalu kāyavākkarmaṇī viratisvabhāvena na manaskarma /
SA01vakobhau:15607: eṣā ca deśanā mithyāmauna śaucādhimuktikānāṃ vivecānārtham /
SA01vakobhau:15618: akarmasvabhāvamapyasti trividhaṃ manoduścaritaṃ cetanārthāntarabhūtamabhidhyā vyāpādo mithyādṛṣṭiśca /
SA01vakobhau:15626: kim syādyadi kaścit kleśo 'pi karma syāt /
SA01vakobhau:15631: sūtre tu cetanāyāstanmukhena pravṛttestaistāṃ darśayatīti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15645: daśa karmapathā uktā yathāyogaṃ śubhāśubhāḥ // VAkK_4.66 //
SA01vakobhau:15647: teṣāmeva sucaritaduścaritānāṃ caudārikasaṃgraheṇa daśa karmapathāḥ sūtra uktāḥ yathāyogaṃ kuśalāḥ sucaritebhyo 'kuśalā duścaritebhyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15651: akukśaleṣu tatkarmapathesu kāyaduścaritasya pradeśo na saṃgṛhītaḥ prayogapṛṣṭhabhūtaḥ kliṣṭaścānyo 'pi bandhānādiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15655: yaddhi kāyaduścaritaṃ pareṣāṃ jīvitabhogadārebhyaścyāvakaṃ tatkarmapatha uktaṃ tato vivecanārtham /
SA01vakobhau:15657: vāgduścaritamapi yadeva praśādaṃ tatkarmapatha uktaṃ tadarthameva /
SA01vakobhau:15661: kuśaleṣvapi kāyasucaritasya pradeśaḥ prayogapṛṣṭhamadyādiviratidānejyādiko vāksucaritasya priyavacanādiko manaḥ sucaritasya cetanā /
SA01vakobhau:15679: te 'pi ṣaṭ karmapathāḥ svayaṃ kurvato dvividhā bhavanti vijñaptiravijñaptiśca tatkālamaraṇe paścāt maraṇe tvavijñaptireva /
SA01vakobhau:15685: kuśalāḥ sapta rūpiṇaḥ karmapathā avaśyaṃ dviprakārā vijñaptiravijñaptiśca /
SA01vakobhau:15701: yadi tīvreṇa paryavasthānena pramādena vā ghanarasena prayogamārabheta syādavijñaptiranyathā na syāt /
SA01vakobhau:15711: yadi karmapathaṃ kṛṭvā punastasyānudharmaṃ ceṣṭeta tasya syāt vijñaptiranyathā na syāt /
SA01vakobhau:15715_0: yadā tāvadiha kaścit paśuṃ hantukāmo mañcakāduttiṣṭhati mūlyaṃ gṛhlāti gacchatyāmṛśati
SA01vakobhau:15715_1: paśuṃ krīṇātyānayati puṣṇāti praveśayati nihantuṃ śāstramādatte prahāramekaṃ dadāti
SA01vakobhau:15715_2: dvau vā yāvanna jīvitā dvacyaparopayati tāvat prayogaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15717: yena tu prahāreṇa jīvitādvyaparopayati tatra yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā vā 'vijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15719: dvābhyāṃ hi kāraṇābhyāṃ prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate prayogataḥ mṛte sati phalaparipūritaśca /
SA01vakobhau:15723: yāvacca taṃ paśuṃ kuṣṇāti śodhayati vikrīṇīte pacati khādayatyanukīrtayati vā tāvadasya vijñaptikṣaṇā api pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:15727: abhidhyādīnāṃ nāsti prayogo na pṛṣṭhaṃ saṃmukhībhāvamātrātkarmapathaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15731: kiṃ tāvat maraṇabhavasthe tasmin prāṇini ye vijñaptyavijñaptī te karmapatha āhosvinmṛte /
SA01vakobhau:15735: yadi tāvanmaraṇabhavasthe sahamṛṭasyāpio anturghātayiturvā prāṇātipātāvadyena yogaḥ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:15741: yaduktaṃ “yena tu prahāreṇa jīvitādvacyaparopayati tatra yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā vā 'vijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapatha” iti tanā vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:15743: yaccāpīdaṃ śāstra uktaṃ “syāt prāṇī hataḥ prāṇātipātaścāniruddhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15745: syādyathā hi tatprāṇī jīvitādvyaparopito bhavati prayogaścāpratiprasragdha” ityatra pṛṣṭhaṃ prayogaśabdenoktamiti vaibhāṣikīyo 'rthavirodho maulasyaiva tadānīmaniruddhatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:15752: vijñaptistarhi tadā kathaṃ maulaḥ karmapatho bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:15759: tasmāt prayogaphalaparipūrikāle tadubhayaṃ karmapathaḥ syāt karmatpatho 'pyanyasya prayogaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ ca bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:15763_0: yathā ca śatrorvadhārthaṃ kṛtyaṃ samupasthāpayan paśunā valiṃ kuryāt parakīyaṃ kṛtvā
SA01vakobhau:15763_1: dāreṣu cāsya vipratipadyeta taireva tadghātanārtham anṛtapiśunaparuṣasāntavaiścāsya
SA01vakobhau:15763_2: mitrabhedaṃ kuryādyānyasya paritrāṇāya kalperan abhidhyāṃ ca tatsva kuryāttatraiva
SA01vakobhau:15763_3: ca vyāpādaṃ tadvadhārthaṃ ca mithyādṛṣṭiṃ vṛṃhayediti /
SA01vakobhau:15772: sūtra uktaṃ “prāṇātipāto bhikṣavastrividho lobhajo dveṣajo mohajo yāvanmithyādṛṣṭi“riti /
SA01vakobhau:15774: tatra kīdṛśaḥ prāṇātipāto lobhaja ityevamādi vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:15782: tatra lobhajapraṇātipāto yathā taccharīrāvayavārthamarthārthaṃ krītārthaṃ ca prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayati ātmasuhṛtparitrāṇāya /
SA01vakobhau:15786: mohajo yathā yājñikānāṃ dharmabuddhyā rājñāṃ ca dharmapāṭhakaprāmāṇyāddhiṃsatām /
SA01vakobhau:15788: duṣṭānāṃ kila nigrahaṃ kurvanto rājānaḥ puṇyabhājo bhavantīti /
SA01vakobhau:15799: lobhajamadattādānaṃ yo yenārthi sa tadvarati anyalābhasatkārayaśo 'rthaṃ vā ātmasukṛtaparitrāṇāya vā /
SA01vakobhau:15805: duṣṭanigrahārthaṃ yathā brāhmaṇā āhuḥ “sarvamidaṃ brahmaṇā brāhmaṇebhyo dattaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ daurbalyādvṛṣlāḥ paribhuñjate /
SA01vakobhau:15807: tasmādapaharan brāhmaṇaḥ sumādatte svameva brāhmaṇo bhuṅkte svaṃ vaste svaṃ dadāti ce” ti /
SA01vakobhau:15816: mohajo yathā pārasīkānāṃ mātrādigamanaṃ gosave ca yajñe /
SA01vakobhau:15820: upahā udakaṃ cūṣati tṛṇāni cchinatti upaiti mātaramupasvasāramupa sagotrā“miti /
SA01vakobhau:15842: lobhādanantaramutpannā lobhajāḥ dveṣādanantaraṃ dveṣajā mohādanantaraṃ mohajāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15854: tasya ca avaśya malobhādibhiḥ saṃprayogāt tatrākuśala karmapathaprayogādviratiḥ kuśalakarmapathaprayogaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15860: tadyathā śrāmaṇera upasaṃpādyamāno nānāvāsaṃ praviśati bhikṣūnvandate upādhyāyaṃ yācate yāvadekaṃ karmavācanaṃ kriyate dvitīyaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:15864: tṛtīya karmavācane yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā cāvijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15866: tata ūrdhvaṃ yāvanniśrayā ārocyante tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ ca vijñapayati avijñaptica yāvadatuvartate idaṃ pṛṣṭham /
SA01vakobhau:15868: yaduktaṃ “na sarveṣāṃ karmapathānāṃ lobhādibhirniṣṭhe“tyatha kasya kena niṣṭhā /
SA01vakobhau:15891: eṣāṃ tribhirapi niṣṭhā lobhena dveṣeṇa mohena vā
SA01vakobhau:15893: ya ete karmapathāścaturbhiḥ kāṇḍairuktāstrayastraya ekastrayaśca eṣāṃ yathākramaṃ
SA01vakobhau:15895: sattvabhogāvadhiṣṭhānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ca nāma ca // VAkK_4.71 //
SA01vakobhau:15904: yaḥ paraṃ maraṇānniyamayya samaṃ tena pūrvaṃ vā mriyate kimasya maulaḥ karmapatho bhavatyutāho na /
SA01vakobhau:15906: samaṃ prāk ca mṛtasyāsti na maulaḥ
SA01vakobhau:15908: ata evocyate “syāt prayogaṃ kuryāt phalaṃ ca paripūrayenna ca prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:15912: syāt yathāpi tadvyaparopavaḥ pūrvaṃ saha vā kālaṃ kuryā“diti kiṃ punastatkāraṇam nahi vadhye jīvati hantuḥ prāṇātipātāvadyenāsti yogo nāpi sahamṛtasya hantuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15916: thenāśrayeṇa tatprayogaḥ kṛtaḥ sa ucchinno 'nya evāśrayo nikāyasabhāgabhinna utpannaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15918: tasya prayoktṛtvāt karmapathena yogo na yuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15920: yatsenāpātamṛgayāvaskandheṣu pareṣāṃ vadhārthaṃ bahavaḥ samagrāḥ patantyekaśca prāṇātipātaṃ karoti kastena samanvāgato bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:15924: yathaiva hi karttā tathā sarve samanvāgatā bhavantyekakāryatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:15928: yastarhi balānnīyate so'pi samanvāgato bhavatyanyatra ya evaṃ naścitya yāyāt yāvajjīvitahetorapi prāṇinaṃ na haniṣyāmīti /
SA01vakobhau:15930: kiyatā punaḥ prāṇātipātaṃ svayaṃ kurvataḥ karmapatho bhavati kiyatā yāvanmithyādṛṣṭiḥ karmapathaḥ iti lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ taducyate /
SA01vakobhau:15934: yadi mārayiṣyāmyenamiti saṃjñāya paraṃ mārayati tameva ca mārayati nānyaṃ bhramitvā /
SA01vakobhau:15938: yastarhi saṃdigdho mārayati kimayaṃ prāṇī na prāṇīti sa evānyo veti so 'pyavaśyametaṃ niścayaṃ labdhvā tatra praharati /
SA01vakobhau:15951: yadyekasyāpi jīvitakṣaṇasyotpadyamānasyāntarāyaṃ karoti prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate nānyathā /
SA01vakobhau:15962: tasmātsendriyaḥ kāyo jīvatītyucyate anindriyo mṛta iti /
SA01vakobhau:15964: abuddhipūrvādapi prāṇivadhāt karturadharmo yathā 'gnisaṃyogāddāha iti nirgranthāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15968: nirgranthaśiroluñcane ca kaṣṭatapodeśane ca śāstuḥ tadvisūcikāmaraṇe ca dāturvaidyānāṃ cāturapīḍane maraṇe ca mātṛgabhasthayoścānyonyaṃ duḥkhanimittatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:15976: acetanānāṃ ca kāṣṭhādīnāṃ gṛhapāte prāṇivadhāt pāpaprasaṅgo na vā dṛṣṭāntamātrātsiddhiriti /
SA01vakobhau:15984: yadi balādvā cauryeṇa vā parasvaṃ svīkaroti yatraiva ca balacauryābhiprāyeṇānyatra saṃjñāvibhramāt iyatā 'dattādānaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:15992: asvāmikaṃ ca nidhimuddharato viṣayasvāmikāt parivartakaṃ harataḥ kṛte karmaṇi sīmāprāptebhyaḥ akṛte sarvabuddhaśaikṣyebhyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15998: agamyāṃ gacchati paraparigṛhītāṃ vā mātaraṃ duhitaraṃ vā mātṛpitṛsaṃbandhinīṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:16000: anaṅge vā gacchati svāmapi bhāryām apāne mukhe vā /
SA01vakobhau:16002: adeśe vā gacchati prakāśe caitye vihāre vā /
SA01vakobhau:16007: garbhiṇīṃ vā gacchati pāyayantīṃ vā saniyamāṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:16012: yadi svasaṃjñī parastriyaṃ yāyāt na syāt karmapathaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16023: tasyāpi saniyamā svabhāryeva tu sā na gamyā /
SA01vakobhau:16025: kumārīṃ gacchato yasya nisṛṣṭā no cedyasya rakṣā 'ntato rājñaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16029: yadi yamarthaṃ bravīti tasminnanyathāsamjñī bhavati yaṃ cādhikṛtya bravīti sa tasya vākyasyārthābhijño bhavati tadvākyaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16037: kadācicca bahavo varṇā vākyaṃ bhavantīti katamaḥ tatra karmapathaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16044: ki tāvadabhijñātārthe śrotari āhosvit abhijñātuṃ samarthe /
SA01vakobhau:16048: yadyabhijñātārthe manovijñānaviṣayatvādvākyārthasya śrotravijñānena saha nirodhācca vāgvijñapteravijñaptireva syāt karmapathaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16060: “adṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā aśrute 'mate 'vijñāte vijñātavāditā dṛṣṭe adṛṣṭavāditā yāvad vijñāte 'vijñātavāditā itīme 'nāryā aṣṭau vyavahārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16062: dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā yāvadvijñāte vijñātavāditā adṛṣṭ 'dṛṣṭavāditā yāvadavijñāte avijñātavāditā itīme āryā aṣṭau vyavahārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16083: sūtraṃ tāvat “tatkiṃ manyase māhakīmātaḥ yāni tvayā cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi na dṛṣṭāni na dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi na paśyasi nāpi te evaṃ bhavati paśyeyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:16085: api nu te tannidānamutpannaśchando vā rāgo vā sneho vā yena vā ālayo vā nīyatiradhyavasānaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:16089: ye tvayā śrotreṇa śabdā na śrutā na śrutapūrvā vistareṇa yāvanmanasā dharmā na vijñātā vistareṇa yāvanno bhadanta /
SA01vakobhau:16091: atra ca te māhakīmātardṛṣṭe dṛṣṭamātraṃ bhaviṣyati śrute mate vijñāte vijñātapātramityu“ktam /
SA01vakobhau:16095: ata evaṃ cāniṣyamāṇe dṛṣṭādibhāvabāhyatvāt gandhādiṣu vyavahāro na syādityeṣā yuktiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16099: na hyatra sūtre bhagavān vyavahārānāṃ lakṣāṇaṃ śāsti sma /
SA01vakobhau:16103: atra ca te ṣaḍvidhe viṣaye caturṣu vyavahāreṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāramātraṃ bhaviṣyati na priyāpriyanimittādhyāropa ityayamatra sūtrārtho dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:16116: ete ca pañca viṣayāḥ pratyekaṃ dṛṣṭā iti vā kṛtvā vyavahrilyante /
SA01vakobhau:16139: syādvācā parākrameta syānna vācā parākrameta mṛṣāvādāvadyena ca spṛśyeta /
SA01vakobhau:16141: syāt kāyena parākrameta syānna kāyena na vācā parākrakmeta ubhayāvadyena ca spṛśyeta /
SA01vakobhau:16145: yadyubhayathā 'pi na parākrameta na cāvijñaptikāstyavijñaptiḥ kāmāvacarī kathaṃ tayoḥ karmapathaḥ siddhyati /
SA01vakobhau:16152: yat kliṣṭacittasya pareṣāṃ bhedāya vacanamaprītaye tat paiśunyam /
SA01vakobhau:16162: yat kliṣṭacittasya pareṣāmapriyavacanamarthābhijñe tatraiva ca yat vivakṣitaṃ tat pāruṣyam /
SA01vakobhau:16175: ato mṛṣāvādādikādvākkarmaṇo yadanyat kliṣṭaṃ vacanaṃ tatsaṃbhinnapralāpa ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:16181: tadyathā bhikṣurmithyājīvī lapanāṃ karoti raktāśca kecit gāyanti nāṭacye ca naṭāḥ pareṣāṃ rañjanārthaṃ pralapanti /
SA01vakobhau:16185: evaṃ paridevasaṃgaṇikādikamapi yadanyanmṛṣāvādādibhyaḥ kliṣṭaṃ vākkarma tatsaṃbhinnapralāpaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16187: kathaṃ cakravartikāle gītaṃ cāsti na ca saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16189: naiṣkramyopasaṃhitāni hi tadānīṃ giyante sma na grāmyarasopasaṃhitāni /
SA01vakobhau:16195: aho vata yat pareṣāṃ tanmama syāditi parasvebhyo yā viṣameṇānyāyena spṛhā svīkaranecchā balādvā copāyādvā sā 'bhidhyā karmapathaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16199: tathā hi nivaraṇādhikāre kāmacchandamadhikṛtyoktaṃ sūtre “so 'bhidhyāṃ loke prahāye” tyevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:16201: yadyapi sarvābhidhyā natu sarvā karmapatha audārikaduṣcaritasaṃgrahādityapare /
SA01vakobhau:16213: śubhe cāśubhe ca karmaṇi yā nāstīti dṛṣṭiḥ sā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16215: tadyathā “nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ nāsti hutaṃ nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamityevamādi yāvanna santi loke 'hanta” iti /
SA01vakobhau:16224: trayo hyatra panthānaḥ sapta karma ca // VAkK_4.78 //
SA01vakobhau:16226: abhidhyādayo hi trayaḥ karmaṇaḥ panthāna iti karmapathāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16228: tatsaṃprayogiṇī hi cetanā teṣāṃ vāhena vahati teṣāṃ gatyā gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:16232: sapta tu prāṇātipātādayaḥ karma ca kāyavākkarmatvāt karmaṇaśca panthāna iti karmapathāstatsamutthānacetanāyāstānadhiṣṭhāya pravṛtteriti /
SA01vakobhau:16240: prayogapṛṣṭāni karmāṇi karmapathāḥ yasmāttadarthaṃ tanmūlikā ca teṣāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16246: ye tarhi dārṣṭāntikā abhidhyādīneva manaskarmecchanti teṣāṃ te kathaṃ karmapathāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16250: api tu śakyaṃ vaktuṃ karma ca te panthānaśca sugatidurgatīnāmiti karmapathāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16254: ya ete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ sarve ete kuśalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ samudācāravirodhinaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16262: yairakuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchinatti kāmavairāgyaṃ cānuprāpnuvan yāni tatprathamata upalikhatī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:16264: akuśalamūlādhyāhṛtatvāt mithyādṛṣṭesteṣveva tatkarmāpadeśa eṣa kriyate tadyathāgnireva grāmaṃ dahani caurāstu tasyādhyāhārakā iti caurairgrāmo dagdha ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:16290: yā ca hetumapavadate nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamiti yā ca phalaṃ nāsti sucaritaduścaritānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka iti /
SA01vakobhau:16294: sāsravālambanayaiva nānāsravālambanayā sabhāgadhātvālambanayaiva ca na visabhāgadhātvālambanayā /
SA01vakobhau:16318: yairakuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalāni samucchinnāni sarvapaścāt vijahāti yaiḥ vikīrṇaiḥ samucchinna kuśalamūla iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:16329: eko 'pi hi prakāra steṣāmasamucchinnaḥ sarveṣāṃ punarutpattau hetuḥ syāditi /
SA01vakobhau:16335: pūrvaṃ saṃvaraṃ vijahāti paścāt kuśalamūlāni samucchinattītyeke /
SA01vakobhau:16385: yadā hi kuśalamūlānāṃ prāptirna punarutpadyate aprāptirapyutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:16398: navaprakārāṇāṃ yugapat pratisaṃdhānaṃ krameṇa tu saṃmukhībhāva ārogyabalalābhavat /
SA01vakobhau:16406: tameva saṃdhāyoktam “abhavyo'yaṃ pudgalo dṛṣṭa eva dharme kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdhātuṃ niyatamayaṃ navakebhyaścyavamāno vā upapadyamāno vā kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdhāsyati” iti /
SA01vakobhau:16408: upapadyamāno 'ntarābhavasthaścyavamānaścyutyabhimukhastatra punaryo hetubalena samucchinatti sa cyavamānaḥ pratisaṃdadhāti yaḥ pratyayabalena sa upapadyamānaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16414: ya āśayavipannaḥ samucchinatti sa dṛṣṭe dharme pratisaṃdadhāti /
SA01vakobhau:16418: evaṃ yo dṛṣṭivipanno dṛṣṭi śīlavipanna iti /
SA01vakobhau:16431: ānantaryakāriṇāṃ tu tatra vā 'nyatra vā narake /
SA01vakobhau:16435: tatra vaktavyaṃ katibhiḥ karmapathaiḥ saha cetanā yugapadutpannā vartata iti /
SA01vakobhau:16447: vyāpannacittasya prāṇivadhe abhidhyāviṣṭasya vā 'dattādāne kāmamithyācāre saṃbhinnapralāpe vā /
SA01vakobhau:16470: ṣaṭsu prayoggaṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ kāmabhithyācāraṃ kurvataḥ samaṃ niṣṭhāgamane /
SA01vakobhau:16476: kuśalaiḥ punaḥ karmapatharyāvat daśabhiḥ saha cetanā vartata ityutsargaṃ kṛtvā 'pavādaṃ karoti
SA01vakobhau:16480: ekenāṣṭābhi pañcabhiśca karmapathaiḥ saha na vartate /
SA01vakobhau:16493: saptabhiḥ kuśale manovijñāne tatsamādāna eva akuśalāvyākṛtacittasya ca bhikṣusaṃvarasamādāne /
SA01vakobhau:16497: tatsamādāne kṣayānutpādajñānasaṃprayukte ca manovijñāne tasminneva ca dhyānasaṃgṛhīte /
SA01vakobhau:16501: sarvā ca dhyānānāsrava saṃvarasahavartinī cetanā 'nyatra kṣayānutpādajñānābhyām saṃvaranirmuktena tvekenāpi saha syādanya cittasyaikāṅgaviratisamādāne /
SA01vakobhau:16505: kasyāṃ gatau kati karmapathā akuśalā kuśalā vā saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamato vā /
SA01vakobhau:16509: ityete trayaḥ karmapathā narake dvābhyāṃ saprakārābhyāṃ santi /
SA01vakobhau:16547: te khalu yayā striyā sārdhaṃ rantukāmā bhavanti tāṃ bāhau gṛhītvā vṛkṣamūlamupasarpanti /
SA01vakobhau:16549: gamyā cet vṛkṣaśchādayati tāṃ te gacchanti /
SA01vakobhau:16551: agamyā cenna chādayati tāṃ te na gacchanti /
SA01vakobhau:16557: narakottarakurubhyāmanyatra kāmadhātau daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃmukhībhāvato 'pi vidyante /
SA01vakobhau:16563: yadyapi devo devaṃ na mārayati anyagatisthaṃ tu mārayati /
SA01vakobhau:16571: pañcasu gatiṣu traidhātuke sarvatrānabhidhyā 'vyāpādasamyagdṛṣṭyaḥ saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamataśca vidyante /
SA01vakobhau:16575: kāyikavācikāḥ sapta kuśalā ārūpyeṣvasaṃjñisattveṣu samanvāgamata eva /
SA01vakobhau:16581: yadbhūmyā śrayamāryeṇānāsravaṃ śīlamutpāditaṃ nirodhitaṃ bhavati tenārūpyeṣvatītena samanvāgato bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:16592: tatraite sapta kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃmukhībhāvato 'pi saṃvidyante 'nyatra narakottarakurubhyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16594: te punastiryakpreteṣu saṃvaranirmuktā rūpadhātau tu saṃvarasaṃgṛhītā anyatrobhayathā /
SA01vakobhau:16603_0: sa ceditthaṃ tvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ praṇātipātenālpāyurbhavati adattādānena
SA01vakobhau:16603_3: abhidhyayā tīvrarāgaḥ vyāpādena tīvradveṣaḥ mithyādṛṣṭyā tīvramohaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16621_2: viṣamartupariṇāmāḥ abhidhyayā śuṣkaphalāḥ vyāpādena kaṭukaphalā mithyādṛṣṭyā 'lpaphalā aphalā vā /
SA01vakobhau:16640: prāṇātipātaṃ hi tāvatkurvatā māryamāṇasya duḥkhamutpāditaṃ māritamojo nāśimato 'sya
SA01vakobhau:16652: evaṃ kuśalānāmapi karmapathānāṃ phalatrayaṃ veditavyam prāṇātipātaviratyā āsevitayā bhāvitayā bahulīkṛtayā deveṣupapadyate /
SA01vakobhau:16654: sa ceditthantvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ dīrghāyurbhavatītyakuśalaviparyayeṇa sarvaṃ yojayitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:16673: ata ājīvo duḥkhaśodha ityādarotpādanārthaṃ tatrāsau pṛthagnirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16688: śīlaskandhikāyāṃ hi bhagavatā hastiyuddha darśanādīnyapi mithyājīve nyastāni /
SA01vakobhau:16694: yāni pūrvaṃ pañca phalānyuktāni teṣāṃ katamat karma katibhiḥ phalaiḥ prahāṇam /
SA01vakobhau:16698: prahāṇārthaṃ mārgaḥ prahīyante vā 'nena kleśā iti prahāṇamārgaḥ ānantaryamārgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16700: tasminsāsrave yat karma tat pañcabhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalam /
SA01vakobhau:16718: anāsrave prahāṇamārge yatkarma taccaturbhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalaṃ vipākaphalaṃ hitvā /
SA01vakobhau:16722: yaccānyat prahāṇamārgātsāsravaṃ kuśalaṃ karmaṃ yaccākuśalaṃ tadapi caturbhirvisaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā /
SA01vakobhau:16724: anāsravaṃ punaḥ śeṣāṃ tribhiravyākṛtaṃ ca yat /
SA01vakobhau:16726: prahāṇamārgādanyadanāsravaṃ karma avyākṛtaṃ ca karma tribhirvipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā /
SA01vakobhau:16728: catvāri dve tathā trīṇi kuśalasya śubhādayaḥ // VAkK_4.88 //
SA01vakobhau:16732: kuśalsya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmāścatvāri phalāni vipākaphalaṃ hitvā /
SA01vakobhau:16741: akuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale /
SA01vakobhau:16747: avyākṛte hi satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭī akuśalānāṃ sarvatragāṇāṃ duḥkhadarśana heyānāṃ ca niḥṣyandaphalam /
SA01vakobhau:16749: avyākṛtasya dve trīṇi trīṇi caite śubhādayaḥ // VAkK_4.89 //
SA01vakobhau:16751: avyākṛtasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphalel /
SA01vakobhau:16782: svabhūmikasya karmaṇaḥ svabhūmikā dharmāścatvāri phalāni visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā /
SA01vakobhau:16794: śaikṣasya karmaṇaḥ śaikṣā dharmāstrīṇi phalāni vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā /
SA01vakobhau:16802: dharmāḥ śaikṣādikā ekaṃ phalaṃ trīṇyapi ca dvayam /
SA01vakobhau:16810: tābhyāmanyasya śaikṣādyā dve dve pañca phalāni ca // VAkK_4.92 //
SA01vakobhau:16812: śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāmanyasya karmaṇo naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣasya śaikṣā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale /
SA01vakobhau:16817: trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛgdheyasya tadādayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16824: te dve catvāryatha trīṇi bhāvanāheyakarmaṇaḥ // VAkK_4.93 //
SA01vakobhau:16826: bhāvanāheyasya karmaṇo darśanaheyā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale /
SA01vakobhau:16832: apraheyasya te tvekaṃ dve catvāri yathākramam /
SA01vakobhau:16851: ayogavihitaṃ kliṣṭaṃ vidhibhraṣṭaṃ ca kecana // VAkK_4.94 //
SA01vakobhau:16857: yena yathā gantavyaṃ sthātavyaṃ bhoktavyaṃ pravicaritavyamityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:16868: kimekaṃ karma ekameva janmākṣipati atha naikamapi /
SA01vakobhau:16876: ekameva janmākṣipatyekameva ca karma nānekaṃ janmeti nikāyasabhāgasyākhyā /
SA01vakobhau:16880: yattarhi sthavirāniruddhenoktaṃ “so 'haṃ tasyaikapiṇḍapātasya vipākena saptakṛtvastrayastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapanno yāvadetahyrādye śākyakule jāta” iti /
SA01vakobhau:16882: tena hyasau samṛdviṃ labdvā jātismaraḥ punaranyat puṇyaṃ kṛtavān /
SA01vakobhau:16886: yathā manuṣyo dīnārottho 'nena sahasraṃ nirviśyāha ekena dīnāreṇāhamaita dīśvaryaṃ prāpta iti /
SA01vakobhau:16890: tasya taṃ piṇḍapātamadhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā dānacetanānāṃ pravāho mahānutpannaḥ kayācit kiñcitphalaṃ parigṛhītamiti /
SA01vakobhau:16892: anekenāpyekamākṣipyate mā bhūt khaṇḍaśo nikāyasabhāgasyākṣepa iti /
SA01vakobhau:16894: ekena tu karmaṇā kliṣṭasya nikāyasabhāgasyeṣyate karma /
SA01vakobhau:16898: yathā citrakara ekayā vartyā rūpamālikhya vahvībhiḥ paripūrayati /
SA01vakobhau:16900: tathā hi tulye mānuṣye kaścit sakalendriyāṅgapratyaṅgo bhavativarṇakṛtipramāṇabalasaṃpadā vibhrājamānaḥ kaścideṣāṃ kenacidvikalaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16908: nākṣepike samāpattī acitte prāptayo na ca // VAkK_4.95 //
SA01vakobhau:16926: tadyathā mātṛvadhaḥ pitṛvadho 'rhadvadhaḥ saṃghabhedaḥ tathāgataśrīre duṣṭacittarudhirotpādanam /
SA01vakobhau:16936: śakto hyadhimatravego 'pi kleśaḥ kādācitko nihantuṃ natu samūho 'pyājasrikaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16938: ājasrike he kleśe tannirghātāya parākramakālaṃ na labhate /
SA01vakobhau:16943: tasmāt evāvaraṇaṃ trividhā durgatiḥ vipākāvaraṇaṃ sugateśca pradeśaḥ auttarakauravā asaṃjñisattvāśca /
SA01vakobhau:16947: āryamārgasyāryamārgaprāyogikāṇāṃ ca kuśalamūlānām anyānyapi hyapāyādiniyatāni aṇḍajasaṃsvedajastrītvāṣṭamabhavayatāni karmāṇi vaktavyāni syuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16949: yānyeva tu pañcabhiḥkāraṇaiḥ sudarśakāni pajñakāni adhiṣṭhānataḥ phalato gatitaḥ upapattitaḥ pudgalataśca tānyevoktāni nānyāni /
SA01vakobhau:16954: tāmyāṃ hi dvitīye 'pi janmanyacikitso bhavatyuttarottarāvāhanāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16958: nāntarāyituṃ śakyāni vipākaṃ prati janmāntaraphalena karmāntareṇetyānantaryāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:16962: na vā tatkāriṇaḥ pudgalasyetaścyutasyāntaramasti narakopapattigamanaṃ pratītyanantaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:16991: teṣāmapi na tīvraṃ hyapatrāpyaṃ mātāpitrorantike pratyupasthitaṃ yadvipādanādānantaryeṇa spṛśyeran /
SA01vakobhau:17011: catvāri kāyakarma ekaṃ vākkarma trīṇi prāṇātipāta ekaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ ekaṃ prāṇātipātaprayogaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:17025: sa kimānantaryaṃ bhaviṣyati naiva ca tena bhettā samanvāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:17031: yo hi bhinnastasya bhedo na bhettuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:17048: atha yena bahunyānantaryāṇi kṛtāni bhavanti anantarameva tāni vipacyante /
SA01vakobhau:17054: sahi bhūyobhirānantaryaistasminnavīcau ghanataraṃ sukumārataraṃ cāśrayaṃ labhate kāraṇāśca bahutarāstīvratarāśca yena dvitricatuṣpañcaguṇāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate /
SA01vakobhau:17061: sa ca dṛṣṭicarita eva na tṛṣṇācaritaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:17084: yadā tebhyastathāgatādanyaḥ śāstā kṣamate tadupadiṣṭācca mārgādanyo mārga iyatā bhinnaḥ saṃgho vaktavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:17091: aparyuṣita eva hi saṃghabhede saṃgho 'vaśyaṃ pratisaṃdhīyate /
SA01vakobhau:17096: dharmacakraṃ hi tadā bhagavato bhinnaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:17135: sīmāyāṃ cāpyabaddhāyāṃ cakrabhedo na jāyate // VAkK_4.102 //
SA01vakobhau:17142: madhye 'pyarbudāt pūrvaṃ na bhidyate yāvacchāsane śīlārbudaṃ dṛṣṭyarbudaṃ ca notpannaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:17144: yugācca pūrvaṃ na bhidyate yāvacchrāvakāgrayugaṃ notpannaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:17150: sīmāyāmabaddhāyāṃ yāvat sīmā na baddhā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:17152: ekasīmāyāṃ hi pakṣadvayāvasthānātsaṃghabheda ityeṣu kālesu cakrabhedona bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:17154: na ca punaḥ sarveṣāṃ baddhānāṃ cakrabhedaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:17170: yadi punarmāturvyañjanaṃ parivṛttaṃ syāt piturvā tatraikasminnāmnāyo
SA01vakobhau:17174: ata evocyate “syāt puruṣaṃ jīvitādvacyaparopayenna pitaraṃ nārhantam /
SA01vakobhau:17180: syāt strīṃ jīvitādvyaparopayenna mātaraṃ nārhantīm ānantaryāvadyena ca spṛśyeta /
SA01vakobhau:17184: anyasyāḥ striyāḥ kalalaṃ prasrutamanyayā yonyā pītam /
SA01vakobhau:17186: katarā tasya mātā yāṃ ghnataḥ syādānantaryam /
SA01vakobhau:17190: yasyāḥ śoṇitādasāvudbhūtaḥ sattvaḥ sā 'sya mātā dvitīyā tu sarvakṛtyeṣvavalokyā /
SA01vakobhau:17194: yadi mātari prayogaṃ kṛtvā 'nyāṃ mārayenna syādānantaryam /
SA01vakobhau:17198: mañcatalāvalīnamātṛmāraṇaṃ cātrodāhārya dhāvakasya ca putreṇa masaka prayogeṇa piturmāraṇaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:17200: ekena prahāreṇa mātaramanyāṃ ca mārayato dve avijñaptī bhavataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:17211: idamavadānaṃ kathaṃ nīyate “gaccha śikhaṇḍinaṃ brūhi dve ānantarye bhavatā kṛte /
SA01vakobhau:17233: kimānantarye prayogaṃ kṛtvā tasminnavyāvartite vairāgyaṃ phalaṃ vā na prāpnuyāt /
SA01vakobhau:17237: anyakarmaphalapathaprayogaṃ tu kṛtvāryamārgotpattau na punaḥ karmapathotpattirāśrayasyātyantaṃ tadviruddhatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:17243: yaḥ saṃghabhedanimittaṃ mṛṣāvādo dharmādharmajñasya viparyayadyotanāt sa sarveṣāṃ duścaritānāṃ mahāvadyatamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:17249_2: vimanaskaṃ vartate yāvat punarna pratisaṃdhito bhavatiyasmāccāvicau kalpaṃ vipākaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:17251: śeṣāṇāmānantaryāṇāṃ yathākramaṃ pañcamatṛtīyaprathamāni gurutarāṇi sarvalaghuḥ pitṛvadhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:17253: yattarhi bhagavatā trayāṇāṃ daṇḍānāṃ manodaṇḍo mahāsāvadya uktaḥ punarmithyādṛṣṭiḥ paramavadyānāmityuktam ānantaryāṇi niyamasya saṃghabhedo mahāsāvadya uktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:17255: trīṇi karmāṇi niyamayya manodaṇdaḥ dṛṣṭīrniyamayya mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:17257: athavā vipākavistaraṃ mahājanavyāpādanaṃ kuśalamūlasamucchedaṃ cādhikṛtya yathākramam /
SA01vakobhau:17263: kuśale punaḥ karmaṇi bhavāgracetanā sarveṣāṃ mahāphalatamā /
SA01vakobhau:17269: visaṃyogaphalaṃ tvadhikṛtya vajropamasamādhicetanā sarveṣāṃ mahāphalā sarvasamyojanaparyādānaphalatvāt /

SA01vakobhau:18242: yastarhi jalāgnipraveśādibhiḥ svargopapattiṃ paśyati śīlavṛtena vā śuddhiṃ so 'pi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavya eva /
SA01vakobhau:18246: “ye caivaṃ dṛṣṭaya evaṃvādino yadayaṃ puruṣapudgalo gośīlaṃ samādāya vartate mṛgaśīlaṃ kukkuraśīlaṃ,
SA01vakobhau:18247: sa tena śudhyati mucyate sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:18249: akāraṇaṃ kāraṇataḥ pratyeti śīlavrataparāmarśo duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ” iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:18263: yasya ca mārgālambanā mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsā vā 'sti sa nāsti mokṣamārga iti paśyan vicikitsan vā kathaṃ tayā śuddhiṃ pratyeṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:18265: athānyaṃ mokṣamārgaṃ parāmṛśya eṣa mokṣamārgo nāstītyāha /
SA01vakobhau:18267: so 'pi tenaivānyena śuddhiṃ pratyeti na tayā mithyādṛṣṭyeti /
SA01vakobhau:18271: yaścāpi samudayanirodhadarśanaprahātavyālambanayā mithyādṛṣṭyā śuddhiṃ pratyeti sa kasmānna taddarśanaheyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:18302: ātmānameva tatra vaśinaṃ paśyennātmīyaṃ paśyatītyātmadṛṣṭirevāsau dvimukhī athāhamityetasmāt mameti dṛṣṭyantaraṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:18322: anye kleśā na santīrakā ato na viparyāsāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:18324: yattarhi sūtre ukta “manitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa” iti /
SA01vakobhau:18336: loke hi viparyastasaṃjño viparyastacitta iti prasiddhaṃ na punarviparyastavedana iti /
SA01vakobhau:18338: ta ete viparyāsāḥ sarve 'pi srota āpannasya prahīṇā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:18349: duḥkhe ca saṃjñā cittaviparyāsāvaśucau ceti nikāyāntarīyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:18351: itarathā hi kathamantareṇa sukhaśucisaṃjñāmavītarāgasyāryasya kāmarāgaḥ saṃbhavediti /
SA01vakobhau:18359: na hi striyāmātmani ca vinā sattvasaṃjñāyā kāmarāgo yukta iti /
SA01vakobhau:18361: sūtre 'pi coktaṃ “yataśca śrutavānāryaśrāvaka idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA01vakobhau:18363: yāvat tasya tasmin samaye yo 'nitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭivīparyāsaḥ sa prahīyata” iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:18365: tasmād dṛṣṭisamutye eva saṃjñācitte viparyāsau nānye tatkāla bhrāntimātratvādalātacakracitra yakṣabhrāntivat /
SA01vakobhau:18372: tasmāt sarva evāṣṭau saṃjñācittaviparyāsāḥ śaikṣasyāprahīṇā ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:18378: atha kiṃ dṛṣṭyanuśayasya eva bhedo nānyasya /
SA01vakobhau:18410: asti me śreyānasti me sadṛśo 'sti me hīnaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:18412: nāsti me śreyānnāsti me sadṛśo nāsti me hīna” iti /
SA01vakobhau:18429: nāsti me hīna ityatra kimunnati sthānam /
SA01vakobhau:18431: asti sadṛśo yo 'bhiprete vare sattvarāśau nihīnamapyātmānaṃ bahu manyate /
SA01vakobhau:18435: prākaraṇaṃ tu nirdeśaṃ parigṛhya śreyānasmītyekeṣu māno 'pi syādati māno 'pi mānātimāno 'pi hīnasamaviśiṣṭāpekṣayā /
SA01vakobhau:18443: etaduktaṃ bhavati sarve darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā iti yadbhāvanāheyamaprahīṇaṃ kimavaśyaṃ tadāryāṇāṃ samudācarati /
SA01vakobhau:18449: yena kleśaparyavasthānena saṃcintya prāṇivadhaṃ kuryādyāvanmṛṣāvādaṃ tad bhāvanāheyaṃ bhāvanāheyadharmālambanatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:18495: vimatiḥ saha tābhiśca yā 'vidyā 'veṇikī ca yā // VAkK_5.12 //
SA01vakobhau:18497: duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyā dṛṣṭayo vicikitsā ca tābhiśca saṃprayuktā avidyā āveṇikī ca duḥkhasamudayaprahātavye cāvidyā /
SA01vakobhau:18501: sapta dṛṣṭayo dve vicikitse dve avidye sakalasvadhātvālambanatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:18506: atha yugapat kaḥ sakalena kāmadhātunā śuddhiṃ pratyetyakāraṇaṃ vā kāraṇataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:18512: evamapi yatrātmadṛṣṭistatrātmatṛṣṇā yatrāgraśuddhidṛṣṭī tatra tatprārthanā tena ca māna iti tṛṣṇāmānayorapi sarvatragatvaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:18534: kāmapratisaṃyuktā ārūpyapratisaṃyuktālambanāḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktā rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktālambanā” iti vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:18536: yadā kāmadhātau sthito brahmaṇi sattvadṛṣṭiṃ nityadṛṣṭiṃ cojtpādayati tadā kathaṃ satkāyānta grāhadṛṣṭī visabhāgadhātvālambane na bhavataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:18544: kuto nu khalvetadanyā tadālambanā dṛṣṭireṣā na dṛṣṭiriti siddhāntastu pramāṇayitayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:18551: sarvatragairanuśayaiḥ sahabhuvo ye 'pyanye dharmāste 'pi sarvatragāḥ prāptayastu naivam /
SA01vakobhau:18555: ata eva syuḥ sarvatragānuśayā na sarvatrahetunā heturiti catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate /
SA01vakobhau:18568: nirodhadarśanaprahātavyāstrayo 'nuśayā mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsā 'vidyā ca tābhyāṃ saṃprayuktā '; 'veṇikī ca /
SA01vakobhau:18580: nirodhālambanānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnāṃ svabhūminirodha evālambanaṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ kāmadhātoreva yāvat bhavāgrabhūmikānāṃ bhavāgrasyaiva /
SA01vakobhau:18582: mārgālambanānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ ṣaḍbhūmiko dharmajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ sarva evālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:18588: yadyapi dharmajñānānvayajñāne apyanyonyahetuke natvanvayajñānaṃ kāmadhātupratipakṣa iti /
SA01vakobhau:18602: varjanīyo hi rāgaḥ yadi cānāsravālambanaḥ syānna varjanīyaḥ syātkuśaladharmacchandavat /
SA01vakobhau:18609: na māno na parāmarśau śāntaśuddhayagrabhāvataḥ // VAkK_5.16 //
SA01vakobhau:18625: ye sarvatragā anuśayāste sakalāṃ pañcaprakārāmapi svāṃ bhūmimālambanato 'nuśerate /
SA01vakobhau:18627: asarvatragāstu svasyāṃ bhūmau svameva nikāyamālambanato 'nuśerate nānyam /
SA01vakobhau:18646: yaddhi vastvātmadṛṣṭitṛṣṇābhyāṃ svīkṛtaṃ bhavati tatrānye 'pyanuśayā anugamayitumutsahante /
SA01vakobhau:18655: kuśalo 'sau dharmmacchandaḥ vipakṣabhūtau ca nirvāṇamārgau tadālambanānāṃ kleśānāmūrdhvā ca bhūmiradharāṇām /
SA01vakobhau:18668: yena yaḥ saṃprayuktastu sa tasmin saṃprayogataḥ // VAkK_5.18 //
SA01vakobhau:18678: te cānuśayāḥ saṃprayogato 'nuśayīrannālambanataḥ na syurvisabhāgabhūmisarvatragā anuśayāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:18700: ahaṃ pretya sukhī bhaviṣyāmīti dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati /
SA01vakobhau:18704: ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā “etadagraṃ bāhyakānāṃ dṛṣṭigatānāṃ yaduta no ca syāṃ no ca me syāt na bhaviṣyāmi na me bhaviṣyatī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:18740: setyavyākṛtatāṃ darśayati yā kācidavyākṛtā tṛṣṇā avidyā prajñā cāntato vipākajā api sarvā 'sāvavyākṛtamūlamiti kāśmīrāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:18749: vividhasmṛtimūlāni hi sthirāṇyadhovṛttīni ca loke dṛṣṭānnīti /
SA01vakobhau:18768: yāni sūtre caturdaśāvyākṛtavastūni kiṃ tāni avyākṛtatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:18784: kiṃ sarve janiṣyanta iti vibhajya vyākarttavyaṃ saṃkleśā janiṣyante na niḥkleśā iti /
SA01vakobhau:18786: kiṃ manuṣyo viśiṣṭo hīna iti paripṛcchayya vyākattevyam /
SA01vakobhau:18807: yastu pṛcchedye mariṣyanti kiṃ te janiṣyanta ityetadvibhajyavyākaraṇīyaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:18809: manuṣyeṣu cobhayamasti hīnatvaṃ viśiṣṭatvaṃ cāpekṣikamityubhayamekāṃśena vyākarttavyam /
SA01vakobhau:18811: tadyathā vijñānaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ceti ekāntena tu pṛcchato naikāntavyākaraṇāt vibhajyavyākaraṇaṃ yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:18823_0: “tathāgato bhagavānarhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svākhyāto 'sya dharmaḥ supratipannaḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ
SA01vakobhau:18825: vibhajjavyākaraṇaṃ nāma yadi kaścid brūyāddharmān vadeti sa vaktavyo bahavo dharmā atītā anāgatāḥ pratyutpannāḥ katamān vadāmīti /
SA01vakobhau:18828: sa vyaktavyo 'tītā api bahavo rūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti /
SA01vakobhau:18831: sa vaktavyo rūpamapi trividhaṃ kuśalamakuśalamavyākṛtaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:18849: na tu vibhaktavyā yāvattūṣṇim vā tiṣṭhati svayaṃ vā vyākarotīti /
SA01vakobhau:18851: yadā tau na kiñcit pṛcchataḥ kevalamadhyeṣayataḥ tayośca na kiñcit vyākriyate kevalaṃ paripraśnyete tat kathamanayoḥ praśno bhavati kathaṃ vā vyākaraṇam /
SA01vakobhau:18853: yo hhi panthānaṃ brūhītyāha kim tena panthā na pṛṣṭo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:18855: paripṛcchayaiva vyākaraṇāt kathaṃ na paripṛcchāvyākaraṇaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:18857: sthāpanīyastu yathā antavān loko 'nantavānityevamādi sūtrāntādeva tu praśnavyākaraṇānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01vakobhau:18870: sarve saṃskārā anityā ityayaṃ bhikṣava ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:18874: saṃcetanīyaṃ karma kṛtvā kiṃ prativedayata ityayam vibhajyavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:18878: saṃjñāsu puruṣasyātmā utāho 'nyāsaṃjñā anya ātmeti pṛṣṭena satā paripraṣṭavyaḥ katamaṃ punarāyuṣmānātmānaṃ pratyeti /
SA01vakobhau:18880: sa cedevaṃ vadedau dārikaṃ khalvahayāyuṣmannātmānaṃ pratyemi /
SA01vakobhau:18882: evaṃ satyanyā saṃjñā anya ātmetyevaṃ vacanīyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:18898: bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇānna bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt yāvadanyo jīvo 'nyaccharīramityayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sthāpanīyaḥ praśna” iti /
SA01vakobhau:18900: yasya pudgalasya yo 'nuśayo yasminnālambane 'nuśete sa tena tasmin saṃprayuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:18902: idaṃ tu vaktavyamatīte na kasmin yāvat pratyupanne na kasminniti /
SA01vakobhau:18913: atītāḥ pratyutpannāśca rāgapratighamānā yasmin vastunyutpannā na ca prahīṇāstasmin vastuni taiḥ saṃyuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:18955: kathaṃ tatra tena vā saṃyukto bhavati visaṃyukto vā /
SA01vakobhau:18957: na saṃskārāṇāṃ śāśvatatvaṃ pratijñāyate vaibhāṣikaiḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇayogāt /
SA01vakobhau:18967: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā '“tītaṃ ced bhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyanna śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tīte rūpe 'napekṣo 'bhaviṣyat /
SA01vakobhau:18971: anāgataṃ cedrūpaṃ nābhaviṣyat na śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'nāgataṃ rūpaṃ nābhyanandiṣyat /
SA01vakobhau:18980: cakṣū rūpāṇi yāvat mano dharmā iti /
SA01vakobhau:18982: asati vā 'tītānāgate tadālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya na syāt /
SA01vakobhau:18990: yadi cātītānāgataṃ na syādasadālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:18996: yadi cātītaṃ na syāt śubhāśubhasya karmaṇaḥ phalamāyatyāṃ kathaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:19007: ye he sarvamastīti vadanti atītamanāmataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca te sarvāstivādāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19009: ye tu kecidasti yat pratyutpannamadattaphalaṃ cātītaṃ karma kiñcinnāsti yaddattaphalamatītamanāgataṃ ceti vibhajya vadanti te vibhajyavādinaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19023: yathā suvarṇabhājanasya bhittvā 'nyathā kriyamāṇasya saṃsthānānyathātvaṃ bhavati na varṇānyathātvam /
SA01vakobhau:19025: yathā ca kṣīraṃ dadhitvena pariṇamadrasavīryavipākān parityajati na varṇam /
SA01vakobhau:19029: evaṃ pratyutpannādatītamadhvānaṃ gacchan pratyutpannabhāvaṃ jahāti na dravyabhāvamiti /
SA01vakobhau:19040: tadyathā puruṣa ekasyāṃ striyāṃ raktaḥ śeṣāsvavirakta iti /
SA01vakobhau:19045: dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamāno 'vasthāmavasthāṃ prāpyānyo 'nyo nidiśyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19047: yathaikā vartikā ekāṅke nikṣiptā ekamityucyate śatāṅke śataṃ sahasrāṅke sahasramiti /
SA01vakobhau:19052: dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamānaḥ pūrvāparamapekṣyānyo 'nya ucyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19054: yathaikā strī mātā vocyate duhitā veti /
SA01vakobhau:19058: eṣāṃ tu prathamaḥ pariṇāmavāditvāt sāṃkhyapakṣe nikṣeptavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19064: puruṣasya tu kasyāñcit striyāṃ rāgaḥ samudācarati kasyāñcit kevalaṃ samanvāgama iti kimatra sāmyam /
SA01vakobhau:19068: atīte 'dhvani pūrvapaścimau kṣaṇāvatītānāgatau madhyamaḥ kṣaṇaḥ pratyutpanna iti /
SA01vakobhau:19080: yadā sa dharmaḥ kāritraṃ na karoti tadā 'nāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19093: yadyevaṃ pratyutpannasya tatsabhāgasya cakṣuṣaḥ kiṃ kāritram /
SA01vakobhau:19097: atītānāmapi tarhi sabhāgahetvādīnāṃ phaladānāt kāritraprasaṅgo 'rdhakāritrasya veti lakṣaṇasaṃkaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19115: atha tannaivātītaṃ nāpyanāgataṃ na pratyutpannamasti ca /
SA01vakobhau:19119: ato na vaktavyaṃ yadā karitraṃ na karoti dharmastadā 'nāgata iti /
SA01vakobhau:19131: yadi dharma eva kāritraṃ kasmātsa eva dharmastenaivātmanā vidyamānaḥ kadācidatīta ityucyate kadācidanāgata ityadhvanāṃ vyavasthā na sidhyati /
SA01vakobhau:19136: yo jāto bhavati na ca vinaṣṭaḥ sa varttamānaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19141: yadi yathā varttamānaṃ dravyato 'sti tathā 'tītamanāgataṃ cāsti /
SA01vakobhau:19149: tenaiva svabhāvena sato dharmasya kathamidaṃ sidhyatyajāta iti yo vinaṣṭaḥ iti veti /
SA01vakobhau:19153: kiṃ ca paścānnāsti yasyābhāvā dvinaṣṭa ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:19157: yadyabhutvā bhavatīti neṣyate bhūtvā ca punarna bhavatīti /
