SA01vakobhau:19163: nityaṃ ca nāmāsti sa dharmo na ca nitya ityapūrvaiṣā vāco yuktiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19177: evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'stītyucyate na tu punardravyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19189: tasmāt bhūtapūrvasya ca hetorbhāvinaśca phalasya bhūtapūratāṃ bhāvitāṃ ca jñāpayituṃ hetuphalāpavādadṛṣṭipratiṣedhārthamuktaṃ bhagavatā “astyatītamastyanāgatami“ti /
SA01vakobhau:19193: yathā 'sti dīpasya prāgabhāvo 'sti paścādabhāva iti vaktāro bhavanti yathā cāsti niruddhaḥ sa dīpo na tu mayā nirodhita iti /
SA01vakobhau:19199: yattarhi laguḍaśikhīyakānparivrājakānadhikṛṭyoktaṃ bhagavatā “yatkarmābhyatītaṃ kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ tadastī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:19201: kiṃ te tasya tasya karmaṇo bhūtapūrvatvaṃ necchanti sma /
SA01vakobhau:19203: tatra punastadāhitaṃ tasyāṃ saṃtatau phaladānasāmarthyaṃ saṃdhāyoktam /
SA01vakobhau:19205: anyathā hi svena bhāvena vidyamānamatītaṃ na sidhyet /
SA01vakobhau:19207: itthaṃ caitadevaṃ yat paramārthaśūnyatayāmuktaṃ bhagavatā “cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacitsaṃnicayaṃ gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:19209: iti hi bhikṣavaścakṣurabhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca pratigacchatī“ti
SA01vakobhau:19211: yadi cānāgataṃ cakṣuḥ syānnoktaṃ syād bhūtvā na bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:19220: yadapyuktaṃ “dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādāditi idaṃ tāvadiha saṃpradhāryam /
SA01vakobhau:19222: yanmanaḥ pratītya dharmaścotpadyate manovijñānaṃ kiṃ tasya yathā manojanakaḥ pratyaya evaṃ dharmā āhosvidālambanamātraṃ dharmā iti /
SA01vakobhau:19224: yadi tāvat janakaḥ pratyayo dharmāḥ kathaṃ yadanāgataṃ kalpasahasreṇa bhaviṣyati vā na vā tadidānīṃ vijñānaṃ janayiṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:19234: yadā tadālambanaṃ tathāsti kathaṃ tadālambanam abhūt bhaviṣyati ceti /
SA01vakobhau:19236: na hi kaścidatītaṃ rūpaṃ vedanāṃ vā smarannastīti paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:19241: yathā khalvapi varttamānaṃ rūpamanubhūtaṃ tathā tadatītaṃ smaryate /
SA01vakobhau:19243: yathā cānāgataṃ varttamānaṃ bhaviṣyati tathā buddhyā gṛhyate /
SA01vakobhau:19254: yadi ca tattadeva rūpaṃ kevalaṃ paramāṇuśo vibhaktam /
SA01vakobhau:19260: na tu kiñcidutpadyate nāpi nirudhyata ityājīvikavāda ālambito bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:19262: sūtraṃ cāpaviddhaṃ bhavati “cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchatī“ti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19268: yadi ca te tathaiva santi nityāḥ prāpnuvanti /
SA01vakobhau:19279: evaṃ tarhi nāma eva nāstīti pratīyeta /
SA01vakobhau:19285: evaṃ tarhi yaḥ śabdābhāvaṃ prārthayate tasya śabda eva kartavyaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:19299: yattarhi bodhisattvenoktam “yattat loke nāstitadahaṃ jñāsyāmi vā drakṣyāmi vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata” iti /
SA01vakobhau:19305: itarathā hi sarvabuddhīnāṃ sadālambanatve kuto 'sya vimarśaḥ syāt ko vā viśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19309: yadanyatra bhagavatoktam “etat bhikṣurmama śrāvako yāvatsa mayā kalpamavoditaḥ sāyaṃ viśeṣāya paraiṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:19313: sacca sato jñāsyati asaccāsataḥ sottarañca sottarataḥ anuttaraṃ cānurattarata” iti /
SA01vakobhau:19320: naiva hi sautrāntikā atītāt karmaṇaḥ phalotpatti varṇayanti /
SA01vakobhau:19325: yasya tvatītānāgataṃ dravyato 'sti tasya phalaṃ nityamevāstīti kiṃ tatra karmaṇaḥ sāmarthyam /
SA01vakobhau:19364: yathā tu tadasti tathoktaṃ athāsatyatītātānāgate kathaṃ tena tasminvā saṃyukto bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:19366: tajjataddhetvanuśayabhāvāt kleśena tadālambane kleśānuśayabhāvādvastuni saṃyukto bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:19393: yatra vā visaṃ yuktaḥ prahīṇaṃ tasya tadvastviti /
SA01vakobhau:19397: syātu prahīṇaṃ na ca tatra visaṃyuktastadyathā
SA01vakobhau:19400: prāk prahīṇe prakāre ca śeṣaistadviṣayairmalaiḥ // VAkK_5.28 //
SA01vakobhau:19402: duḥkhajñāne samutpanne samudayajñāne 'nutpanne duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo nikāyaḥ prahīṇo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:19404: tasmin prahīṇe tadālambanaiḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavyaiḥ sarvatragaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19406: bhāvanāprahātavye 'pi nikāye navānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ yaḥ prakāraḥ prāk prahīṇastasmin prahīṇe 'pi śeṣaistadālambanaiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃyukto veditavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19408: kasminvastuni katyanuśayā anuśerata iti etatpratipadamabhidhīyamānaṃ bahutaraṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:19412: kathamalpenālpena yatnena mahato mahataḥ praśnaughān pratipādyemahīti /
SA01vakobhau:19414: samāsata ime ṣoḍaśa dharmāḥ kāmarūpārupyāvacarāḥ pañcaprakārāḥ anāsravāśca /
SA01vakobhau:19418: tatra katamo dharmaḥ kasya cittasyālambanamiti jñātvā amuṣminniyanto 'nuśayā anuśerata ityetadabhyūhitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:19431: kāmāvacarāstāvad duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśca dharmāḥ pañcānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:19433: svadhātukānāṃ trayāṇāṃ teṣāmeva ūrdhvadhātukasyaikasya bhāvanāheyasyaiva anāsravasya ceti /
SA01vakobhau:19437: rūpāvacarāsta eva triprakārā dharmā aṣṭānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:19449: ārūpyāvacarāsta eva triprakārā dharmā daśānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:19465: kāmāvacarā hi nirodhadarśanaheyā dharmāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:19475: nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyāstasyaiva nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyasyādhikasya cittasyālambanamiti navānāmekādaśānāṃ ca cittānāmālambanaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:19491: evameṣāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ cittānāṃ ṣoḍaśadharmālambanavyavasthāṃ viditvā kathamanuśayakāryāṃ yojayitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:19495: sukhendriyālambane vijñāne katyanuśayāḥ anuśerata iti praśna āgate vicārayitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:19497: sukhendriyaṃ saptavidhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ca pañcaprakāramanāsravaṃ ceti /
SA01vakobhau:19507: tatra yathāsaṃbhavaṃ kāmāvacarāścatvāro nikāyā rūpāvacarāśca saṃskṛtālambanā ārūpyāvacarau ca dvau nikāyau sarvatragāścānuśayā anuśerata iti jñātavyam /
SA01vakobhau:19511: tat punaḥ sukhendriyālambanālambanaṃ dvādaśavidhaṃ vijñānaṃ katamasya vijñānasyālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:19513: tasyaiva dvādaśavidhāsyārūpyāvacarasya ca bhūyo dviprakārasya duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyasya /
SA01vakobhau:19515_0: idaṃ caturdaśavidhaṃ sukhendriyālambanālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ tatrārūpyāvacarau dvau duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyau
SA01vakobhau:19515_1: vardhayitvā kāmāvacarā ārūpyāvacarāścatvāro nikāyā rūpāvacarāḥ saṃskṛtālambanā anuśayā
SA01vakobhau:19589: apare svadṛṣṭāvevānyatra gṛhīte tyaktāyāṃ dveṣamicchanti darśanaheyānāṃ rāgādīnāṃ svāsāntānikadṛṣṭyālambanatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:19600: tadyathā rāgānuśayo 'prahīṇo bhavatyaparijñātaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānīyāśca dharmā ābhāsagatā bhavanti tatra cāyoniśo manaskāra evaṃ kāmarāga utpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:19604: evamanyo 'pi kleśa utpadyata iti veditavyo yaḥ
SA01vakobhau:19613: eta evānuśayāḥ sūtre bhagavatā traya āsravā uktāḥ kāmasravo bhavāsravo 'vidyāsrava iti /
SA01vakobhau:19627: avidyāṃ varjayitvā 'nye kāmāvacarāḥ kleśāḥ saha paryavasthānaiḥ kāmāsravo veditavya ekacatvāriṃśaddravyāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:19640: nanu ca tatrāpyasti paryavasthānadvayaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:19652: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ rūpārūpyāvacarā anuśayāḥ samasyaiko bhavāgra uktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19658: te hyūbhaye 'pyavyākṛtā antarmukhapravṛttāḥ samāhitabhūmikāśceti trividhena sādhamyerṇaikatāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19660: yenaiva ca kāraṇena bhavarāga uktastenaiva bhavāsravaḥ ityavidyedānīṃ traidhātukyavidyāsrava iti siddham /
SA01vakobhau:19676: evaṃ bhavāsrava eva bhavaugho bhavayogaścānyatra dṛṣṭibhyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19684: na ca kila kevalā dṛṣṭya āsyānukūlāḥ paṭutvāt /
SA01vakobhau:19688: miśrīkṛtya sthāpitā iti tadevaṃ kāmaugha ekānnatriṃśaddravyāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:19720: gṛhiṇo 'pyanena vipralabdhā anaśanādibhiḥ svargamārgasaṃjñayā pravrajitā apīṣṭaviṣayaparivarjanena śuddhipratyāgamanāditi /
SA01vakobhau:19726: avidyā tu grāhikā neti miśritā // VAkK_5.38 //
SA01vakobhau:19728: asaṃprakhyānalakṣaṇatayā 'paṭutvādavidyā na grāhikā bhavatyataḥ kila miśritā /
SA01vakobhau:19732_0: vistareṇa yāvadyo 'sya bhavati kāmeṣu kāmarāgaḥ kāmacchandaḥ kāmasnehaḥ kāmaprema
SA01vakobhau:19732_1: kāmecchā kāmamūrcchā kāmagṛddhaḥ kāmaparigarddhaḥ kāmanandī kāmaniyantiḥ kāmādhyavasānaṃ
SA01vakobhau:19738: cchandarāgaścopādānamuktaṃ sutrāntareṣvato vijñāyate kāma hyupādānamapi kāmādiṣu cchandarāga iti /
SA01vakobhau:19759: āsayanti saṃsāre āsravanti bhavāgrādyāvadavīciṃ ṣaṅbhirāyatanavraṇair ityāsravāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19794: ata evocyate syāt dṣṭisaṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣvanunayasaṃyojanena saṃyukto na dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena na ca tatra dṛṣṭyanuśayo nānuśayīta /
SA01vakobhau:19796: āha syāt samudayajñāne utpanne nirodhajñāne 'nutpanne nirodhamārgadarśānaprahātavyeṣu dṛṣṭiśīlavrataparāmarśasaṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣu /
SA01vakobhau:19806: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ saṃyojaneṣu tisro dṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭisaṃprayojanaṃ pṛthaguktaṃ dve punardṛṣṭī parāmarśāsaṃyojanaṃ pṛthak /
SA01vakobhau:19813: ataḥ kila dravya sāmānyādete saṃyojanāntaram kṛte /
SA01vakobhau:19815: ete ca dve parāmarśasvabhāvena śeṣāiti parāmarśanasāmānyādapyete pṛthagvihite grāhyagrāhakabhedāt /
SA01vakobhau:19817: atha kasmādīṣryāmātsarye saṃyojane pṛthaksaṃyojanadvayamuktaṃ nānyat paryavasthānam /
SA01vakobhau:19834: tadyathā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā kāmacchando vyāpāda iti /
SA01vakobhau:19839: avaro hi bhāgaḥ kāmadhāturetāni ca tasyānuguṇāni /
SA01vakobhau:19851: tribhiḥ sattvāvaratāṃ nātikrāmati pṛthagjanatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ dhātvavaratāṃ kāmadhātum /
SA01vakobhau:19855: yadā srota āpannasya paryādāya trisaṃyojanaprahāṇāt ṣaṭkleśāḥ prahīṇāḥ kimarthaṃ tisro dṛṣṭīrapahāya trayamevāha satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ vicikitsāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:19889: eṣāṃ mokṣagamanāntarāyāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ dyotayan bhagavān kleśatrayasyaiva prahāṇaṃ deśitavān /
SA01vakobhau:19906: tadyathā rūparāga ārūpyarāga auddhatyaṃ māno 'vidyā ca /
SA01vakobhau:19914: rāgo bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ dveṣo bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ moho bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19932: tatra ye yāvat kleśā upakleśā api te /
SA01vakobhau:19939: ye 'pyanye kleśebhyaḥ kliṣṭā dharmāḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītāścaitasikāsta upakleśāste punarye kṣudravastuke paṭhitāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19969: kaukṛtyaṃ ca vyāpāda vihiṃsāvarjitaḥ sattvāsattvayorāghātaḥ krodhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19992: pratighasamutthe ityete ca daśa kleśaniḥṣyandā upakleśāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20004: cittakauṭilyaṃ śāṭhyaṃ yena yathābhūtaṃ nāviṣkaroti vikṣipatya parisphuṭaṃ vā pratipadyate /
SA01vakobhau:20008: sāvadyavastudṛḍhagrāhitā pradāśo yena nyāyasaṃjñaptiṃ na gṛhṇāti /
SA01vakobhau:20012: viheṭhnaṃ vihiṃsā yena prahārapāruṣyādibhiḥ parān viheṭhyate /
SA01vakobhau:20031: ete pañca dharmā dvividhā darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā ubhayaprakārakleśasaṃprayogāt /
SA01vakobhau:20067: etau dvau kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne /
SA01vakobhau:20072: sa hi tatra mahābrahmā vitathātmasaṃdarśanatayā āyuṣmantamaśvajitaṃ vañcayituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20091: darśanaprahātavyāḥ sarve manobhūmikāḥ saha mānasiddhābhyāṃ bhāvanāheyābhyāmapi /
SA01vakobhau:20097: ye ca kecidupakleśāḥ svatantrāste bhāvanāheyā api santo manobhūmikā eva draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20110: yānīmāni sukhādīni pañcendriyāṇi eṣāṃ katamenendriyeṇa katamaḥ kleśa upakleśo vā saṃprayuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20131: tābhyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ saṃprayuktā puṇyakarmaṇāṃ pāpakarmaṇāṃ ca yathākramam /
SA01vakobhau:20202: na hi tasyāḥ kvacit pratiṣedho yathā 'vidyāyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20206: āhlīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ caitānicatvāri paryavasthānāni pañcabhirapīndriyaiḥ saṃprayujyante /
SA01vakobhau:20210: yāni sūtre pañca nivaraṇāni uktāni kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca /
SA01vakobhau:20222: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ dve styānamiddhe ekaṃ nivaraṇamuktaṃ dve cauddhatyakaukṛtye ekam /
SA01vakobhau:20242: ubhe api hyete cittaṃ layaṃ codayataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20249: jñātivitarko janapadavitarko 'maravitarkaḥ paurāṇasya ca hasitakriḍitaramitaparibhāvitasyānusmartā bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:20265: styānamiddhena prajñāskandhasyauddhatyakaukṛtyena samādhiskandhasya samādhiprajñayorabhāve satyeṣu vicikitsako bhavatītyataḥ pañcoktāni /
SA01vakobhau:20267: etasyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ samādhiskandhavirodhina auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇasya pūrva grahaṇaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:20277: cāragatasya priyāpriyarūpeṣu viṣayeṣu nimittagrāhādvihāragatasya tatpūrvakau kāmacchandavyāpādau samādhipraveśasyādito 'ntarāyaṃ kurutaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20279: tataḥ samādhipraviṣṭasyāprayogeṇa śamathavipaśyanā sevanāt styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanayorantarāyaṃ kurutaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20287: visabhāgadhātusarvatragāṇāṃ nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyānāṃ ca sāsravālambanānāṃ yadālambanaṃ parijñāyate tadā na prahīyante /
SA01vakobhau:20289: yadā prahīyante tadālambanaṃ na parijñāyate iti kathameṣāṃ prahāṇam /
SA01vakobhau:20320: yasya hi kleśaprakārasya pratipakṣo mārga utpadyate sa prahīyate /
SA01vakobhau:20341: vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣo yena mārgeṇa taṃ dhātum doṣato darśanādvidūṣayati /
SA01vakobhau:20356: na hi saṃprayogāt kleśo vivecayituṃ śakyate ālambanācca śakyate /
SA01vakobhau:20418: kim mārgaviśeṣagamanāt kleśānāṃ punaḥ prahāṇaviśeṣo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:20443: sa eva visaṃyogastāsu tāsvavasthāsu parijñāsaṃjñāṃ labhate /
SA01vakobhau:20445: dve hi parijñe jñānaparijñā prahāṇaparijñā ca /
SA01vakobhau:20472: yathā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tisraḥ parijñāḥ
SA01vakobhau:20476: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tathaiva tisraḥ parijñā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:20478_1: mārgadarśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tṛtīyeti traidhātukānāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ ṣaṭ parijñā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:20489: kasmādrūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ pṛthak parijñā na darśanaheyānām /
SA01vakobhau:20515: vaibhāṣikamatena mauladhyānaphalaṃ pañca parijñā yā rūpārūpyāvacarakleśaprahāṇa svabhāvāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20519: sa hi vītarāgasyāpi kāmāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ darśanamārgaphalamicchanti /
SA01vakobhau:20553: dharmajñānapakṣasya ṣaṭ parijñāḥ phalaṃ yā eva dharmajñāna kṣantijñānānām /
SA01vakobhau:20567: yatraitāni trīṇi kāraṇāni bhavanti tat prahāṇaṃ parijñocyate /
SA01vakobhau:20569: pṛthagjanasya tāvadanāsravā visaṃyogaprāptirnāsti bhavāgravikalīkaraṇaṃ ceti nāsya prahāṇaṃ parijñākhyāṃ labhate /
SA01vakobhau:20573: tatra yāvat duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntāvanāsravā visaṃyogaprāptirasti na tu bhavāgravikalīkṛṭam /
SA01vakobhau:20594: yaḥ prakāraḥ prahīṇo yadi tatrānyena tadālambanena kleśena visaṃyukto bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:20596: sa tu nāsya ubhayahetusamudghātāt dhātusamatikramācceti na brūmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20612: bhavanāsthaḥ punaḥ ṣaṅbhirekayā vā dvayena vā // VAkK_5.69 //
SA01vakobhau:20614: bhāvanāmārgasthaḥ punarāryapudgalo mārgānvayajñāne ṣaḍibhiḥ parijñābhiḥ samanvāgato yāvat kāmavairāgyaṃ na prāptaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20616: parihīṇo vā tataḥ kāmavairāgyaṃ prāptaḥ pūrvaṃ paścād vā ekayā 'varabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñayā /
SA01vakobhau:20626: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamanāgāmyarhatorekaiva parijñā vyavasthāpyate na bhūyasyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20632: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parijñānāṃ saṃkalanaṃ bhavatyekatvena vyavasthāpanaṃ dhātuvairāgyāt phalaprāptitaśca /
SA01vakobhau:20638: atha kaḥ kati parijñāstyajati labhate vā /
SA01vakobhau:20640: ekāṃ dve pañca ṣaṭ kaścijjahātyāpnoti pañca na // VAkK_5.70 //
SA01vakobhau:20642: ekāṃ tyajati arhattvāt kāmavairāgyād vā parihīyamāṇaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20644: dve parijñe tyajatyanāgāmī rūpavītarāgaḥ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20704: “anāsravā mārgasatyami“ti svaśabdena “pratisaṃkhyānirodho yo visaṃyoga” iti nirodhasatyaṃ “duḥkhaṃ samudayo loka” ityatra duḥkhasamudayasatye /
SA01vakobhau:20723: itarathā hi pūrvaṃ hetunirdeśo 'bhaviṣyat paścāt phalanirdeśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20731: na hyeṣa niyamo yat pūrvamutpannānāṃ prahāṇāya cchandaṃ janayati /
SA01vakobhau:20739: yatra hi satto yena ca vādhyate yataśca mokṣaṃ prarthayate tadevādau vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ parīkṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:20741: paścātko 'sya heturiti samudayasatyaṃ ko 'sya nirodha iti nirodhasatyaṃ ko 'sya mārga iti mārgasatyam /
SA01vakobhau:20750: yathā ca vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ satyaparīkṣā tathābhisamayāvasthāyāṃ satyābhisamayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20768: ata eva tayoḥ phalahetubhāvānnāmato bhedo na dravyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20783: ata āryāṇāmetāni satyānyucyante na tvanāryāṇāṃ vīparītadarśanāt /
SA01vakobhau:20789: dve āryāṇāṃ satye dve ārye cāryāṇāṃ ca satye ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:20796: manāṣā amanāpāśca tadanye caiva sāsravāḥ // VAkK_6.3 //
SA01vakobhau:20798: tisro hi duḥkhatā duḥkhaduḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhatā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā ca /
SA01vakobhau:20809: tisro vedanā yathākramaṃ tadvaśena sukhavedanīyādayo 'pi saṃskārā manāpādisaṃjñāṃ labhante /
SA01vakobhau:20813: sūtra uktaṃ “sukhā vedanā utpādamukhā sthitisukhā vipariṇāmaduḥkh“ti /
SA01vakobhau:20835: “ūrṇāpakṣma yathaiva hi karatalasaṃsthaṃ na vedyate pumbhiḥ
SA01vakobhau:20836: akṣigataṃ tu tathaiva hi janayatyaratiṃ ca pīḍaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:20840: na hi bālānāmāvīcikeṣvapi skandheṣu tathā duḥkhabuddhiḥ pravartate yathāryāṇāṃ bhāvāgrikeṣvapīti /
SA01vakobhau:20845: pratikūlaṃ hi duḥkhamiti lakṣaṇānna mārgo duḥkham /
SA01vakobhau:20847: na hi tasyotpāda āryāṇāṃ pratikūlaḥ sarvaduḥkhakṣayāvāhanāt /
SA01vakobhau:20849: yadāpi te nirvāṇaṃ śāntataḥ paśyanti tadāpi yadeva duḥkhato dṛṣṭaṃ tasyaiva nirodhaṃ śāntataḥ paśyantina mārgasya /
SA01vakobhau:20855: ko hi vidvān pariṣekasukhāṇukena gaṇḍasukhamiti vyavasyet /
SA01vakobhau:20860: duḥkhe ca sati tadiṣṭerduḥkhaṃ sukhamiti vyavasyanti” iti //
SA01vakobhau:20862: sahaiva tu sukhena sarvaṃ bhavamāryā duḥkhataḥ paśyanti /
SA01vakobhau:20879: na hi punasteṣāṃ duḥkhavedanāhetuḥ skandhā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:20881: saṃskāraduḥkhatā ca sūtre kimarthaṃ pṛthaguktā bhavet /
SA01vakobhau:20891: anityaṃ tu dṛśyamānaṃ pratikūlaṃ bhavatītyanityākāro duḥkhākāramākarṣati /
SA01vakobhau:20893: nāstyeva sukha vedanetyekīyā duḥkhaiva tu sarvā /
SA01vakobhau:20909: ya eva hi kecitpānabhojanaśītoṣṇādaya iṣyante sukhahetavasta evātyupayuktā akālopayuktāśca punarduḥkhahetavaḥ saṃpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:20911: na ca yuktā sukhahetubṛddhacyā samena vā 'nyasminkāle duḥkhotpattirityādita eva te duḥkhahetavo na sukhasya /
SA01vakobhau:20913: ante tu tadduḥkhaṃ vṛddhimāpannaṃ vyaktimāpadyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:20919: na hi tāvat sukhamiti vedyate kiñcidyāvanna duḥkhāntareṇopadruto bhavati kṣutpipāsāśītoṣṇaśramakāmarāgaprabhaveṇa /
SA01vakobhau:20921: tasmāt pratīkāra evāviduṣāṃ sukhabuddhirnasukhe duḥkhavikalpe ca vālaḥ sukhabuddhimutpādaynti yathāṃśādaṃśaṃ bhāraṃ saṃcārayantaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20948: yā hi vedanā svena lakṣaṇenābhipretā nāsau pouonastenaiva jātvanabhipretā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:20950: tathā hyenāmākārāntareṇa vidūṣayantyāryāḥ pramādapadaṃ caināṃ paśyanti mahābhisaṃskārasādhyāṃ ca vipariṇāminīṃ cānityāṃ cayenānabhipretā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:20954: yadi cāsau svenātmanānabhipretā bhavennaiva tasyāṃ kasyacidrāgo bhavedyato vairāgyārthaṃ prakārāntareṇāpi doṣavatīṃ paśyeyuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:20958_1: “saṃskārānityatāmānanda mayā saṃghāya bhāṣitaṃ saṃskāraviopariṇāmatāṃ ca yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasye“ti /
SA01vakobhau:20960: ato na duḥkha-dukhatāṃ saṃdhāyaitaduktamiti siddhaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:20962: yadica svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ veditavyaṃ duḥkhamabhaviṣyatkimarthamāryānanda evaṃ bhagavantamaprakṣyat /
SA01vakobhau:20964: tisra ime vedanā uktā bhagavatā sukhā duḥkhā 'duḥkhāsukhā ca /
SA01vakobhau:20968: kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhagavatā bhāṣitam yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti /
SA01vakobhau:20970: evaṃ hi so 'prakṣyat kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti /
SA01vakobhau:20974: idaṃ mayā saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti /
SA01vakobhau:20979: idaṃ tu saṃdhāya mayā bhāṣitaṃ yatkimcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyetyābhīprāyikametadvākyaṃ darśayati /
SA01vakobhau:20984: sukhatvaṃ ca svabhāvatomanāpatvād duḥkhatvaṃ ca paryāyato vipariṇāmānityadharmatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:20986: sā tu sukhato dṛśyamānā bandhāya kalpate tadāsvādanāt /
SA01vakobhau:20992: yathā dṛśyamānā mokṣāya kalpate tathaināṃ draṣṭumājñāpayanti buddhāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21003: lokasya hi sukhasaṃjñā vedanāyāṃ kāmaguṇeṣūpapattau ca /
SA01vakobhau:21005: tatra sūkhaṃ vedanāṃ paryāyeṇa duḥkhaṃ satīmekāntasukhāṃ paśyato viparyāsaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21011: yadi tu svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ veditaṃ duḥkhamabhaviṣyat tisro vedanā iti vacane koguṇo 'bhaviṣyat /
SA01vakobhau:21017_0: “yacca sukhendriyaṃ yacca saumanasyendriyaṃ sukhaiṣā vedanā draṣṭavye” ti vistareṇoktvā
SA01vakobhau:21017_1: “yenemāni pañcendriyāṇyevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā dṛṣṭāni trīṇi cāsya saṃyojanāni
SA01vakobhau:21019: loko 'pi ca kathaṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ trividhāṃ vyavasyet /
SA01vakobhau:21024: sukhasyāpi trividhatvāt mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣvadhimātrā disukhabuddhiḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:21026: yadā ca gandharasaspraṣṭavyaviśeṣajaṃ sukhaṃ vedayate tadā katamat duḥkhaṃ mṛdubhūtaṃ yatrāsya sukhabuddhirbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:21028: anutpannavinaṣṭe catasminmṛduni duḥkhe sutarāṃ sukabuddhiḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:21033: kathaṃ ca nāmedaṃ yojyate yanmṛdunivedite suvyaktastīvro 'nubhavo gṛhyate madhye punaravyakta iti /
SA01vakobhau:21035: triṣu ca dhyāneṣu sukhavacanāt mṛdu duḥkhaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:21037: ūrdhvamaduḥkhasukhavacanānmadhyaṃ duḥkhamiti na yujyate mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣu duḥkheṣu sukhādivedanāvyavasthānam /
SA01vakobhau:21039: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā “rūpaṃ cenmahānāmannekāntaduḥkhamabhaviṣyanna sukhaṃ na sukhānugatami“tyevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:21048: āśrayaviśeṣāpekṣo hi viṣayaḥ sukhaheturvā bhavati duḥkhaheturvā /
SA01vakobhau:21051: sa yāṃ kāmavasthāṃ prāpya sukhaheturbhavati na tāṃ punaḥ prāpya kadācinna bhavatīti vyavasthita eva sukhahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21053: tadyathā sa evāgniḥ pākyabhūtaviśeṣāpekṣaḥ svādupākaheturbhavati sa evāsvādapākahetuḥ na tu yāṃ pākyabhūtāvasthāṃ prāpya svadupākahetustāṃ punaḥ prāpya na heturityeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21055: dhyāneṣu ca kathaṃ na vyavasthitaḥ sukhahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21057: yattu punaḥ duḥkhapratikāre sukhabuddhirityuktaṃ tatra vihitaḥ pratīkāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21059: yadā gandhādiviśeṣajaṃ sukhaṃ vedayate tadā kasya pratīkāreṣu sukhabuddhirbhavatyanutpannavinaṣṭe ca tasmin duḥkhe sutarāṃ sukhabuddhiḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:21061: dhyānaje sukhe kaḥ kasya pratīkāra ityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:21091: “karma ca tṛṣṇā ca atho avidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ heturabhisaṃparāya” iti /
SA01vakobhau:21101: upapattyabhinirvṛttihetuṃ sahetukaṃ brūvatā gāthāyāṃ karma ca tṛṣṇā cāvidyoktā /
SA01vakobhau:21113: tayoryathākramaṃ karma ca bhavatṛṣṇā ca hetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21125: satṛṣṇā eva jātā dṛśyante na vītatṛṣṇā iti /
SA01vakobhau:21132: yatra ca satṛṣṇā tatrābhīkṣṇaṃ cittasaṃtatiṃ namantīṃ paśyāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21136: na cātmabhāva evaṃ kenacidāgṛhīto yathā tṛṣṇayā /
SA01vakobhau:21140: na cānyo heturevamanuṣatto yathātmasneha ityeṣā yuktiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21144: dve api satye saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:21148: yatra bhinnena tadbuddhiranyāpohe dhiyā ca tat /
SA01vakobhau:21151: yasminnavayavaśo bhinne na tadbuddhirbhavati tat saṃvṛtisat /
SA01vakobhau:21154: tatra hi kapālaśo bhinne ghaṭabuddhirna bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:21156: tatra cānyānapohya dharmān buddhacyā tadbuddhirna bhavati taccāpi saṃvṛtisadveditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:21162: teṣveva tu saṃvṛtisaṃjñā kṛteti saṃvṛtivaśāt ghaṭaścāmbu cāstīti brūbantaḥ satyamevāhurna mṛṣetyetatsaṃvṛtisatyam /
SA01vakobhau:21172: tatra hi paramāṇuśo bhinne vastuni rasārhānapi ca dharmānapohya buddhacyā rūpasya svabhāvabuddhirbhavatyeva /
SA01vakobhau:21178: yathā lokottarena jñānena gṛhyate tat pṛṣṭhalabdhena vā laukikena tathā paramārthasatyam /
SA01vakobhau:21190: satyāni ha draṣṭukāma ādita eva śīlaṃ pālayati /
SA01vakobhau:21194: śrutvā cintayati aviparītaṃ cintayitvā bhāvanāyāṃ prayujyate /
SA01vakobhau:21196: samādhau tasya śrutamayīṃ prajñāṃ niśritya cintāmayī jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:21217: suśikṣitā plavan nirapekṣastaratītyeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21219: asyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ cintāmayī prajñā na siddhacyatītyapare /
SA01vakobhau:21221: yāhi nāmālambanā śrutamayī prāpnoti yā 'rthālambanā bhāvanāmayīti /
SA01vakobhau:21233: tasya punarevaṃ bhāvanāyāṃ prayuktasya kathaṃ bhāvanā saṃpadyata ityāha /
SA01vakobhau:21254: nanu ca sā 'tibhūyaskāmatā 'labdha eva na labdhe bhavatīti ko 'nayorviśeṣa iti vaktavyametad /
SA01vakobhau:21302: dharmasvāminā hi bhagavatā parityaktasvavṛttikarmāntebhyaḥ śiṣyebhyo mokṣārthamabhyupagatebhyo dvayaṃ prajñaptaṃ vṛttiśca karma ca /
SA01vakobhau:21306: anayā vṛttyedaṃ karma kurvāṇā bhavantī na cirānmokṣaṃ prāpsyantīti /
SA01vakobhau:21336: tasya tvevaṃ pātrobhūtasya katham tasyāṃ bhāvanāyāmavatāro bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:21346: adhiko rāgo vitarkaścaiṣāṃ ta ime adhirāgavitarkāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21362: tatra punaścaturvidho rāgaḥ varṇarāgaḥ saṃsthānarāgaḥ sparśarāga upacārarāgaśca /
SA01vakobhau:21366: dvitiyasya vikhāditakavikṣiptālambanāṃ tṛtīyasya vipaṭumnā pūyanibaddhāsthyālambanāṃ caturthasya niśceṣṭamṛtkāyālambanām /
SA01vakobhau:21372: asthisaṃkaklāyāṃ hi sarvametaccaturvidhaṃ rāgastu nāstīti adhimuktiprādeśikamanaskāratvādaśubhayā na kleśaprahāṇam viṣkambhaṇaṃ tu /
SA01vakobhau:21374: sa punar ayam aśubhāṃ bhāvayan yogācāras trividha ucyate /
SA01vakobhau:21383: svāṅgāvayave cittaṃ nibadhnāti pādāṅguṣṭhe lalāṭe yatra cāsyābhiratiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21385: sa tatra māṃsakledapītā dhimokṣakrameṇāsthiviśodhayan sakalāmasthisaṃkalāṃ paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:21387: tathaiva ca punardvitīyāmadhimucyate yāvadvihārārāmakṣetrakrameṇa samudraparyantām pṛthivīmasthisaṃkalāṃ pūrṇāmadhimucyate 'dhimokṣābhivardhanārtham /
SA01vakobhau:21397: sa punaḥ cittasaṃkṣepaviśeṣārtha tasyāmasthiśaṅkalāyāṃ pādāsthīni hitvā śeṣaṃ manasi karoti /
SA01vakobhau:21399: evaṃ krameṇa yāvat kapālasyārdhaṃ hitvā 'rdhaṃ manasi karoti kṣayakṛtaparijayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21403: so 'rdhamapi kapālasya muktvā brūvormadhye cittaṃ dhārayati /
SA01vakobhau:21407: astyaśubhā ālalmbanaparīttatayā parīttā na vaśitāparīttatayā parītteti catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01vakobhau:21411: atha kiṃsvabhāveyamaśubhā katibhūmikā kimālambanā kva cotpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:21417: alobhasvabhāvā daśabhūmikā sasāmantakadhyānāntareṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣui kāmadhātau ca kāmāvacara dṛṣyālambanā kiṃ poounrdṛśyavastusaṃsthāne /
SA01vakobhau:21451: pañcasu bhūmisu triṣu sāmantakeṣu dhyānāntare kāmadhātau copekṣāsaṃprayogitvāt /
SA01vakobhau:21457: ye tu mauleṣvapi dhyāneṣu samāpannasyopekṣāmicchanti neṣāmaṣṭabhūmikā /
SA01vakobhau:21479: gaṇanayā 'nugamena sthāpanayā upalakṣaṇayā vivarttena pariśūddhacyā ca /
SA01vakobhau:21481: tatra ca gaṇanā nāma āśvāsapraśvāseṣu cittaṃ dattvā 'nabhisamskāreṇa kāyaṃ cittaṃ cādhyupekṣya smṛtimātreṇa gaṇayatyekaṃ dvau yāvaddaśa /
SA01vakobhau:21499: kiyaddūramete praviśanti vā niṣkrāmanti vā kimete sarvaśarīravyāopina ekadeśacāriṇa iti /
SA01vakobhau:21503: niṣkrāmato vitastivyāmāntaraṃ yāvadvāyumaṇḍalaṃ vairambhāśca vāyava ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:21507: sthāpanā nāma nāsikāgre yāvat pādanṅguṣṭhe sthitāṃ paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:21511: kimanugrāhakā ete upadhātakāḥ śītā uṣṇā iti /
SA01vakobhau:21513: upalakṣaṇā nāma naite kevalā vāyava eva /
SA01vakobhau:21515: catvāryetāni mahābhūtāni mahābhūtābhinirvṛttamupādāyarūpaṃ tadāśritāścittacaittā iti pañcaskandhānupalakṣayati /
SA01vakobhau:21517: vivarto nāma vāyvālambanāṃ vṛddhiṃ vivarttyottareṣu kuśalamūleṣu saṃniyojanaṃ yāvadagradharmeṣu /
SA01vakobhau:21538: yadi hi kāyaḥ śuṣiro bhavati āśvāsapraśvāsabhūmikaṃ ca cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtamevaṃ te varttante /
SA01vakobhau:21540: jāyamānasya caturthadhyānādvyuttiṣṭhamānasya ca praviśanti bhiyamāṇasya caturthaṃ ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasya niṣkrāmanti /
SA01vakobhau:21559: nādhareṇa lakṣayete manasā ca tau // VAkK_6.13 //
SA01vakobhau:21579: sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tu anityatā saṃskṛtānāṃ duḥkhatā sāsravāṇāṃ śunyatā 'nātmate sarvadharmāṇām /
SA01vakobhau:21586: sāmāhitasya kila kāyaṃ paramāṇuśaḥ kṣaṇikataśca paśyataḥ kāyasmṛtyupasthāṇaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:21635: tadyathā hyuktamāyuṣmatā aniruddhena “tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharataḥ kāyālalmbanānusmṛtistiṣṭhati saṃtiṣṭhata” iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21637: bhagāvatā 'pi coktaṃ “tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharata upasthitā smṛtirbhavatyasaṃmūḍhe“ti /
SA01vakobhau:21639: yatra tūktaṃ “kathaṃ bhikṣavaścaturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ samudayaśca bhavatyastaṅgamaśca /
SA01vakobhau:21645: yathālambanaṃ caiṣāṃ nāma svaparobhayasaṃtatyālambanatvāt pratyekameṣāṃ traividhyam /
SA01vakobhau:21654: yato vā kāmarāgasya kāyo 'dhaṣṭhānaṃ sa ca vedanā 'bhilāṣātsa ca cittasyādāntatvāt tatkleśāprahāṇāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21658: śucisukhanityātmaviparyāsanāṃ caturṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa catvāri smṛtyupasthā nānyuktāni yathākramaṃ nādhikanyūnāni evaṃ ca trīṇyasaṃbhinnālambanāni caturthamubhayathā /
SA01vakobhau:21662: atha kāyādīnāṃ dve trīṇi catvāri vā samastāni paśyati saṃbhinnālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:21669: saṃbhinnalambane dharmasmṛtyupasthāne sthitastān kāyādīn sarvānabhisamasya caturbhirākāraiḥ paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:21690: nirodhaṃ caturbhiḥ nirodhataḥ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataśca /
SA01vakobhau:21729: yathā mūrdhāna uktāḥ evaṃ mṛdumadhye kṣāntī tathaivākaraṇāt /
SA01vakobhau:21746_1: dvābhyāṃ kṣaṇābhyāṃ manasi karotyeṣā sarvaiva madhyā kṣāntiryadaikameva kṣaṇaṃ tadadhimātreti /
SA01vakobhau:21756: te 'pi hi kāmāvacaraduḥkhālambanāḥ kṣaṇikāśca laukikāścaite 'grāśca dharmāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21762: ta eta ūṣmagatādayaḥ smṛtyupasthānasvabhāvatvāt prajñātmakā ucyante /
SA01vakobhau:21774: tatra trisatyālambanoṣmagatākaraṇe dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratyutpannamanāgatāni catvāri bhāvyante /
SA01vakobhau:21785: mūrdhākaraṇe catuḥsatyālambane 'pi nirodhālambanavardhane cāntyamanāgatāni catvāri ākārāḥ sarve /
SA01vakobhau:21799: ityetāni catvāri nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni yadutoṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaḥ kṣāntayo 'gradharmāśca /
SA01vakobhau:21801: eṣāṃ dve mṛdūnī calatvāt parihāṇitaḥ kṣāntayo madhyamagradharmā adhimātram /
SA01vakobhau:21806: niścito vedhā nirvedhaḥ āryamārgastena vicikitsā prahāṇāt satyānāṃ ca vibhajanādidaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ yāvat mārga iti /
SA01vakobhau:21820: anāgamyaṃ dhyānāntaraṃ catvāri ca dhyānānyasya bhūmistatsaṃgṛhītatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:21837: bhadantaghoṣakasya tu dve prathame nirvedhabhāgīye saptabhūmike kāmāvacare api taḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21861: yadbhūmikānyanena pratilabdhānibhavanti tāṃ bhūmi tyajannāryastānyapi tyajati nānyathā bhūmityāgaḥ punarbhūmisaṃcārāt /
SA01vakobhau:21876: yo mauladhyānabhūmikāni nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayati satatraiva janmāti satyānyavaśyaṃ paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:21882: yadā vihineṣu punarlābhobhavatyapūrvāṇyeva tadā labhyante na pūrvaṃ tyaktāni /
SA01vakobhau:21925: ūṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaṃ ca śrāvakagotrādutpannaṃ vyāvartya punarbuddhaḥ syādityasti saṃbhavaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21940: trīṇyapi nirvedhabhāgīyāni śrāvakagotrādvacyāvartya buddhādibhavaḥ syāt pratyekabuddha ityarthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:21956: kiṃ punaḥ prathama eva janmani kṛtaprayogo nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayet /
SA01vakobhau:22047: tataḥ punarduḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteranantaramatraia kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:22052: yathā ca kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirdharmajñānaṃ cotpadyate
SA01vakobhau:22101: duḥkhe hi dṛśyamāne tasya trividho 'bhisamayaḥ samudayādīnāṃ kāryābhisamayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22110: na tarhi satyānāṃ duḥkhādito darśanaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:22113: “ihāryaśravakasya duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasi kūrvataḥ samudayaṃ vā samudayato yāvat mārga vā mārgato manasi kurvato 'nāsraveṇa manasikāreṇa saṃprayukto yo dharmāṇo pravicaya” iti /
SA01vakobhau:22119: athāpyekasya darśanāccheṣeṣu va4itvalābhādekābhisamayaṃ brūyānna doṣaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:22121: antarā tu vyutthānamasti nāstīti vicāryaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:22123: atha punarbrūyāt duḥkhameva parijānansamudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣāt karoti mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA01vakobhau:22127: evamapi na doṣaḥ syādekasya darśane śeṣāṇāṃ kāryābhisamayavacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:22129: darśanābhisamayaṃ tu prati sūtre satyānāṃ krameṇābhisamaya ukto lakṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:22131: “nahaiva gṛhapate satyānāmekābhisamayo 'pi pūrvābhisayaya” iti vistareṇa sadṛṣṭāntāni trīṇi sūtrāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:22133: “yo duḥkhe niṣkāṅkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe 'pi sa” iti sūtrādekābhisamaya iti cet /
SA01vakobhau:22146: kasmāt punaḥ kṣāntayo jñānāni cavaśyaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:22161: yadi punardvitīyenānantaryamārgeṇaiva saha visaṃyogaprāptirutpadyeta kiṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:22165: kṣāntibhiḥ kleśaprahāṇānnava saṃyojananikāyā jñānavadhyā iti śāstravirodha iti cet /
SA01vakobhau:22178: duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntimārabhya yāvat mārge 'nvayajñāna kṣāntirete pañcadaśa kṣāṇā darśanamārgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22207: na hi sarvaṃ satyadarśanaṃ samāptamiti tadantarālatvāttanyappi darśanamārgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22213: ya ete darśanamārgasvabhāvāḥ pañcādaśa kṣaṇa uktā veditavyau
SA01vakobhau:22234: phalānāmādyaṃ srota āpattiphalaṃ sarvaphalaprāptau tasya prathamatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:22236: tāveva śraddhādharmānusāriṇau yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇāprahīṇabhāvanāheyau bhavataḥ sakalavandhanau to srota āpattiphalapratipannakāvucyete /
SA01vakobhau:22240: yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kāmāvacarāṇaṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ yāvat pañca prakārāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:22248: yadi tayostasmāt pareṇa ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau vā prakārāḥ pūrvaprahīṇā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:22257: yadi punarnavamasyāpi prakārasya prahāṇāt kāmadhātorvītarāgau bhavata ūrdhvaṃ vā yāvadākiñcanyāyatanāt tau tṛtīya pratīpannakāvucyete /
SA01vakobhau:22263: ṣoḍaśe tu phalasthau tau yatra yaḥ pratipannakaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22265: ṣoḍaśe tu citta utpanne tau na punaḥ śraddhādharmānusāriṇāvucyete /
SA01vakobhau:22272: yatra phale yaḥ pratipannako bhūtaḥ sa tadānīṃ tatra phalasthito bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:22274: srota āpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā /
SA01vakobhau:22283: tasminkāle yo mṛdvindriyaḥ śraddhānusāripūrvī sa śraddhādhimukta ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:22289: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prahīṇapañcaprakāro 'pi ṣoḍaśe citte srota āpanna evocyate na sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22296: phale hi labhyamāne phalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na labhyata ityeṣa niyamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22298: ataḥ phalastho yāvanna viśeṣāya prayujyate phalāntaraprāptau tāvat pratipannako nocyate /
SA01vakobhau:22302: yastu tṛtīyadhyānavītarāgo 'dharāṃ bhūmi niśritya niyāmamavakrāmati so 'vaśyaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ mārga saṃmukhīkaroti /
SA01vakobhau:22304: anyathā hi sa tasmādūrdhvopapannaḥ sukhendriyeṇāsamanvāgataḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:22311: yathaite kāmadhātau navaprakārāḥ kleśā upadiṣṭā evaṃ
SA01vakobhau:22320: tatpratipakṣā apyānantaryavimuktimārgākhyā guṇā bhūmau bhūmau navaprakārā eva /
SA01vakobhau:22328: teṣāṃ punaḥ pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātratvena trividhatvāt nava vyavasthāpyante /
SA01vakobhau:22330: tadyathā mṛdumṛduḥ prakāro mṛdumadhyo mṛdvadhimātro madhyamṛdurmadhyamadhyo madhyādhimātro 'dhimātramṛduradhimātramadhyo 'dhimātrādhimātraśceti /
SA01vakobhau:22336: ādita evādhimātramārgasaṃbhavādutpannādhimātramārgasya cādhimātrakleśāsaṃbhavāt audāriko hi malaścelātpūrvaṃ nirdūyate paścāt sūkṣmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22338: audārikaṃ ca tamaḥ sūkṣmeṇālokena hanyate sūkṣmaṃ cādhimātreṇetyeṣa dṛṣṭāntayogaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22340: śuklā hi dharmā valavanto durbalāstu kṛṣṇāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22350: yasya hi phalasthasyaiko 'pi bhāvanāheyaḥ prakāro 'prahīṇaḥ sa srota āpanaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22364: tadasāvāpanna āgataḥ prāpta iti srota āpannaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22374: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sa eva nāṣṭamakaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22387: yattarhhi sūtra uktaṃ “asthānamanavakāśo yaddaṣṭisaṃpannaḥ pudgalo 'ṣṭamaṃ bhavamabhinirvartayiṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:22392: yathārutaṃ vā kalpyamāne 'ntarābhavo 'pi na syāt evamapyūredhvasrotaso bhavāgraparamasyaikasyāṃ gatāvaṣṭama upapattibhāvo na prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:22398: iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakaṃ pratyekaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu saptakṛtvo na pounarubhayeṣveva saptakṛtva iti /
SA01vakobhau:22408: yaśca manuṣyesu srota āpanno bhavati sa tānevāgamya parinirvāti /
SA01vakobhau:22455: yathākāśaṃ kuru maṇḍapaṃ pātayeti bhavanti vaktāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22457: anyo 'pi ca syātsaptakṛtvaḥ paramo na tu niyata iti nocyate /
SA01vakobhau:22459: evaṃ tāvadakṣīṇabhāvanāheyaḥ phalasthaḥ saptakṛtvaḥ paramo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:22471: śloke tu dvayorgrahaṇaṃ srota āpannasya paścātprahīṇe sati tatpratipakṣānāsravendriyasyānuktasiddhatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:22480: tatprahāṇe ṣaṣṭhasyāvaśyaṃ prahāṇāt nahi tasyaikaḥ prakāraḥ phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samarthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22486: devakulaṅkulo yo deveṣa dve trīṇi vā kulāni saṃśritya parinirvāti tatra vā 'nyatra vā devanikāye /
SA01vakobhau:22488: manuṣyakulaṅkulo yo manuṣyeṣu tatra vā 'nyatra va dvīpe parinirvāti /
SA01vakobhau:22494: yasya phalasthasyaikaprakāroyāvatpañcamaḥ prahīṇo bhavati asau dvitīyaphalapratipannako veditavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22522: avasthātraye hi karmāṇi vidhnāyopatiṣṭhanta” ityuktaṃ prāk /
SA01vakobhau:22524: yathā karmāṇyevaṃ kleśā api veditavyā iti /
SA01vakobhau:22528: vīcirnāmāntaraṃ tasya caikajamavyavahitatvāt nirvāṇasya ekakleśaprakāravyavahitatvādvā 'nāgāmiphalasyaiko vīcirasyetyekavīcikaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22532: pūrvaprahīṇaprakārastu phalaprāptau na tāvatkulaṅkulo bhavatyekavīciko vā yāvatphalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na samukhīkṛtaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22542: avaśyaṃ dve trīṇi vā pūrvaṃ prahīṇāni bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:22556: upapadyaparinirvāyī ya upapannamātrī na cirāt parinirvātyabhiyuktavāhimārgatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:22583: ūrdhvasrotā yasyordhvaṃ gatirna tatriva parinirvāṇaṃ yatropapannaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22592: phalato 'kaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvāt tatra yena dhyānaṃ vyavakīrṇaṃ so 'kaniṣṭhān gatvā parinirvāti /
SA01vakobhau:22599_0: tatra pluto nāma ya iha dhyānāni vyayakīrya dhyānacyāt oparihīṇaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamāsvādya
SA01vakobhau:22599_1: brahmakāyikeṣūpapannaḥ pūrvābhyāsavaśāccaturthaṃ dhyānaṃ vyavakīrya tasmāt pracyuto
SA01vakobhau:22603: ardhpluto nāma yastataḥ śuddhāvāseṣūpapadya madhyādekamapi sthānāntaraṃ vilaṅghacyākaniṣṭhān praviśati /
SA01vakobhau:22607: sarvacyuto nāma yaḥ sarvāṇi sthānāntarāṇi saṃcaryākaniṣṭhān praviśati /
SA01vakobhau:22627: sa hi samāpattyantarāṇyāsvādayan sarvasthānāntareṣūpapadyāpraviśyaiva śuddhāvasānārupyakramotpattito bhavāgraṃ gatvā parinirvāti /
SA01vakobhau:22635: akaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvaṃ tu pareṇa gatyabhāvādyathā sapta kṛtvaḥparamatvaṃ srota āpannasyeti /
SA01vakobhau:22677: teṣāmapi navānāṃ prtyekamata eva yathāyogaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22685: kathaṃ tarhi sūtre sapta satpuruṣagatayo deśitāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22693: kasmāt punaretā eva satpuruṣagatayo nānyāḥ śaikṣagatayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22695: etā hi gatayo yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ satyeva karmāṇi vṛttiḥ kuśale asatyavṛttirakuśale /
SA01vakobhau:22721: kāmadhātau parāvṛttajanmāntara āryo na dhātvantaraṃ gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:22723: anāgāmi phalaṃ prāpya tatraiva janmani parinirvāṇāt /
SA01vakobhau:22729: yattarhi śakreṇoktaṃ “ye te devā akaniṣṭhā iti viśrutāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22739: sa ca kāmadhātau parivṛttajanmā ūrdhvadhātūpapannaścāryo naivendriyāṇi saṃcarati nāpi kathañcit parihīyate /
SA01vakobhau:22741: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ parivṛttajanmāntāsyāryasya rūpārupyapraveśendriyasaṃcāraparihāṇayo neṣyante /
SA01vakobhau:22748: atha kasmādvītarāgaḥ śaikṣo nāntarāye parinirvāyī bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:22750: mārgasyājitatvādasaṃmukhībhāvataḥ anuśayānāṃ ca nātimandatvāt duḥsamatikrāmatvātkāmavātoriti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22768: arhannanāgāmī vā pravāhayuktamanāsravaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:22770: tasmādvacyutthāya pravāhayuktaṃ tadeva sāsravaṃ samāpadyate punaścānāsravam /
SA01vakobhau:22772: evaṃ pravāhāprahāsena yadā kila dvau kṣaṇāvanāsravau samāpadyate dvau sāsravau punaścānāsravāvayaṃ vyavakiraṇasya prayogaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22776: yadā tvanāsravasya kṣayasyānantaraṃ sāsravaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti sāsravasyānāsravam /
SA01vakobhau:22778: evaṃ sāsravasya kṣaṇasyānāsravābhyāṃ miśraṇāt vyavakiraṇaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavatīti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22780: dvau hi kṣaṇāvānantaryamārgasadṛśau tṛtī yo vimuktimārgasadṛśa iti /
SA01vakobhau:22782: evaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ vyavakīrya tadvalelnānyānyapi vyavakīryante /
SA01vakobhau:22790: ata icchātaḥ pravāhatrayasamāpattito niṣpannaṃ bhavatīti paśyāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22833: yo hi kaścidanāgāmī nirodhasamāpattilābhī sa kāyasākṣītyucyate /
SA01vakobhau:22842: sa hi tasmādvyutthāyāpratilabdhapūrvā savijñānakāṃ kāyaśāntiṃ pratilabhate /
SA01vakobhau:22844: yato 'syaivaṃ bhavati śāntā vata nirodhasamāpattirnirvāṇasadṛśī vata nirodhasamāpattiriti /
SA01vakobhau:22846: evamanena tasyāḥ śāntatvaṃ kāyena sākṣatkṛtaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:22850: aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā” ityatra sūtre ki kāraṇaṃ kāyasākṣī noktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22880: gotre gotre nava pudgalāḥ sakalabandhano yāvadaṣṭaprakāravītarāgaḥ svasmātsthānāt ṣaṇṇṇavakāni catuṣpañcāśat ṣoḍaśa catuṣpañcāśatkāni catuḥṣaṣṭānyaṣṭau śatāni /
SA01vakobhau:22882: indriyabhedāt punastriguṇā ityevaṃ kṛtvā yo 'dharadhyāne navaprakāravītarāgaḥ sa uttare sakalabandhana uktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22886: yathāntarāparinirvāyiṇa evaṃ yavadūrdhvasrotasa ityabhisamasya sarve catvāriṃśadūnāni trayodaśasahasrāpyanāgāmināṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:22892: sa khalvayamanāgāmī prathamadhyānaikaprakāravairāgyāt prabṛti yāvat bhavāgrāṣṭaprakāraprahāṇādarhattvapratipannako bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:22896: navamasyāpi bhāvāgrikasya prakārasya prahāṇāyānantaryamārge so 'rhattvapratipannaka eva /
SA01vakobhau:22934: yeṣāṃ tu mārgānvayajñānamapyekaikabhūmipratipakṣālambanamiṣṭaṃ teṣāmaṣṭāviṃśatimadhikān prakṣīpyānāgamyasaṃgṛhītā aśītirvajropamā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:22942: yastvasau bhāvāgriko navamaḥ prakāra ukto yasya vajropamena prahāṇaṃ
SA01vakobhau:22946: tasya punarnavamasya prakārasya saha kṣayaprāptyā kṣayajñānamutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:22954: utpanne ca punaḥ kṣayajñāne so 'rhattvapratipannakaḥ aśaikṣo bhavatyarhaścārhattvaphalaprāptaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:22958: ata eva sa paramārtaṃ karaṇārthatvāt sarvasarāgapūjārhattvāccārhanniti siddhaṃ bhavatyanye sapta pūrvoktāḥ pudgalāḥ śaikṣā iti /
SA01vakobhau:22970: ata eva dvirabhidhānaṃ sūtre “śikṣāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣāyāṃ śikṣata iti śivakatasmācchaikṣa ityucyata” iti /
SA01vakobhau:22972: yaḥ śikṣata eva nāpaśikṣate sa śaikṣa ityavadhāraṇaṃ yathā vijñāyeta /
SA01vakobhau:22996: tadyathā srota āpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ srota āpannaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:23008: bhūyaḥkāmavītarāgau tu syātāṃ darśanamārge sakudāgāmyanāgāmiphalapratipannakau na ca srota āpanna sakṛdāgāmināviti /
SA01vakobhau:23010: dvividho hi bhāvanāmārga ukto laukiko lokottaraśceti /
SA01vakobhau:23019: tata ūrdhva laukikābhāvāt svabhūmikasya vā pratipakṣatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:23025: yo hi kleśo yatra vastunyanuśete na tasya tadvastu oprahāṇāya saṃvartate yasya ca yaḥ pratipakṣo na tatra sa kleśo 'nuśete iti /
SA01vakobhau:23034: laukikena mārgeṇāryavairāgyaṃ gacchato dvividhā visaṃyogaprāptaya utpadyante laukikyo lokottarāśca /
SA01vakobhau:23043_0: yadi hyāryamārgeṇa vairāgyaṃ prāpnuvato laukikī visaṃyogaprāpotirnotpadyate evaṃ
SA01vakobhau:23043_1: sati ya āryamārgeṇākiñcanyāyatanādvītarāgo dhyānaṃ niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati sakṛtsnapūrvamārgatyāgātkevalaphalamārgalābhāccordhvabhūmikleśavisaṃyogenāsamanvāgataḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:23045: tyakte ca tasmin taiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgataḥ syāditi /
SA01vakobhau:23049: asatyāmapi tu tasyāṃ laukikyāṃ visaṃyogaprāptau na taiḥ samanvāgamaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:23051: tadyathā bhavāgrādardha prakāravimuktasyāsatyāmapi tu laukikyāṃ tadvisaṃyogaprāptau tyaktāyāmapi cendriyasaṃcāreṇa lokottarāyāṃ na punastaiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgamo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:23053: yathā ca pṛthagjanasya prathamadhyānabhūmerurdhvaṃ jātasya kāmāvacarakleśavisaṃyogaprāptityāgānna punastaiḥ samanvāgamo bhavatītyajñāpakametat /
SA01vakobhau:23061: atha yaḥ sāmantakaṃ niśrityādharabhūmivairāgyaṃ prāpnoti kimasyānantaryamāgavatsarve vimuktimārgāḥ sāmantakādbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:23073: tasmin paścimo vimuktimārgaḥ sāmantakādbhavati dhyānādvā maulāt /
SA01vakobhau:23079: triṣu hi dhyāneṣu sāmantakamaulayorindriyabhedāt kaścinna śaknoti maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praveṣṭum /
SA01vakobhau:23092: tatra lokottarā ānantaryavimuktimārgāḥ satyālambanatvātsatyākārapravṛttā iti siddham /
SA01vakobhau:23104: vimuktimārgā uttarāṃ bhūmiṃ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsarṇataścākārayanti saṃbhavataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:23129: na cedakopyadharmā bhavati kṣayajñānāt kṣavajñānamevotpadyate aśaikṣī vā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:23150: “śamitā anena bhavanti anekavidhāḥ ṣāpakā akuśalā dharmā vistareṇa yāvajjarāmaraṇīyāstasmācchramaṇa ityucyata” iti sūtre vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:23167: darśanaheyaprahāṇāyāṣṭāvānantryamārgā aṣṭau vimuktimārgā bhāvanāheyaprahāṇāya navasu bhūmiṣu pratyekaṃ nava prakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya tāvanta evānantaryamārgā vimuktimārgāśca /
SA01vakobhau:23184: yasyāṃ hi prahāṇamārgāvasthāyāṃ pañca kāraṇāni saṃbhavanti tasyāṃ kia bhagavatā phalaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
SA01vakobhau:23200: imāni hi pañca kāraṇāni phale phale bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:23202: yadyanāsravo mārgaḥ śrāmaṇyaṃ kathaṃ laukikamārgaprāptaṃ phaladvayaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalaṃ yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:23204: laukikāoptaṃ tu miśratvānāsravāptiḥ dhṛteḥ phalalm // VAkK_6.53 //
SA01vakobhau:23206: na hi tatra laukikamārgaphalamev prahāṇaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā bhavatyanāgāmiphalaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:23214: ata eva hi sūtra uktaṃ “sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ katamat /
SA01vakobhau:23216: yattrayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇaṃ rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tatutvamiti /
SA01vakobhau:23238: “eṣa hi bhagavān brahmā ityapi śāntaḥ śītībhūta ityapī“ti sūtrāt /
SA01vakobhau:23255: samyagvākkarmāntājīvā nābhisthānīyāḥ samādhirnemisthānīya iti darśanamārgo dharmacakramiti /
SA01vakobhau:23257: kuta etat āryakauṇḍinyasya tadutpattau “pravarttitaṃ dharmacakrami“ti vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:23263: tat khalu parijñeyaṃ tat khalu parijñātamityete trayaḥ parivartāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:23265: ekaikasmiṃśca parivarte cakṣurudapādi jñānaṃ vidyā buddhirudapādi ityete dvādaśākārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:23273: ebhiśca parivartairdarśanabhāvanāśaikṣamārgā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ darśatā iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:23275: yadyevaṃ na tarhi darśanamārga eva triparivartto dvādaśākāra iti kathamasau dharmacakraṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA01vakobhau:23277: tasmātsa eva dharmaparyāyo dharmacakraṃ triparirtaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ ca yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:23305: antyaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalamarhatvaṃ tasya triṣu dhātuṣu prāptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:23315: na ca tena vinā 'sti vītarāgasyānāgāmi phalaprāptirityetat kāraṇam /
SA01vakobhau:23317: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra darśanamārgo nāsti /
SA01vakobhau:23322: asaṃvegādiha vidhā tatra niṣṭheti cāgamāt // VAkK_6.55 //
SA01vakobhau:23324: rūpāvacarā hi pṛthagjanāḥ samāpattimukhasaṅgā duḥkhavedanābhāvācca na saṃvijante /
SA01vakobhau:23326: na ca vinā saṃgenāryamārgaḥ śakto labdhum /
SA01vakobhau:23330: āgamo 'pyayaṃ “pañcānāṃ pudgalānāmiha vidhā tatra niṣṭhā antarāparinirvāyiṇo yāvadūrdhvaṃsrotasa” iti /
SA01vakobhau:23342: sūtra uktaṃ ṣaḍarhantaḥ parihāṇadharmā cetanādharmā anurakṣaṇā dharmā sthitākampoyaḥ prativedhanābhavyo 'kopyadharmā ceti /
SA01vakobhau:23350: eṣāṃ ca pañcānāṃ sāmayikī kānta cetovimuktirveditavyā /
SA01vakobhau:23372: kālāntarātyantavimuktito vā kopyākopyadharmaṇoḥ samayāsamaye vimuktatvaṃ parihāṇisaṃbhavāsaṃbhavataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:23378: kiṃ punarete ṣaḍarhanta ādita eva tadgotrā bhavantyatha paścāt /
SA01vakobhau:23388: tatra parihāṇadharmā yaḥ parihātuṃ bhavyo na cetanādidharmā /
SA01vakobhau:23393: sthitākampyo yaḥ parihāṇipratyayaṃ balavantamantareṇānurakṣannapi sthātuṃ bhavyo na hātuṃ nāpi vardhayituṃ vinābhiyogena /
SA01vakobhau:23408: nacāvaśyaṃ varihāṇadharmā parihīyate nāpi yāvat prativedhanābhavyaḥ pratividhyati /
SA01vakobhau:23414: yeṣāṃ tvavaśyaṃ parihīyate yāvat pratividhyati teṣāṃ kāmadhātau ṣaṭ rūpārupyadhātvoḥ sthitākampyo 'kopyadharmā ca /
SA01vakobhau:23425: na hi parihāṇadharmā punaḥ svagotrāt parihīyate /
SA01vakobhau:23433: yasya yat prathamagotraṃ sa tasmānna parihīyate /
SA01vakobhau:23436: śaikṣastu laukikalokattarābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvāt na parihīyate svagotrāt /
SA01vakobhau:23440: yasya ca yat prathamaṃ phalaṃ sa tasmānā parihīyate /
SA01vakobhau:23446: evaṃ ca kṛtvā parihāṇadharmaṇastrayaḥ prakārā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:23455: evamanyeṣāṃ trayāṇāmekaikaprakāravṛddhacyā yathākramaṃ pañca ṣaṭ sapta prakārā veditavyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:23457: yasya ca yat prathamaṃ gotraṃ sa parihāya śaikṣobhūtastatraivāvatiṣṭhate nānyasmin /
SA01vakobhau:23459: anyathā hi tadgotraviśeṣa labhād vṛddhirevāsya syānna parihāṇiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:23461: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prathamānām nāsti parihāṇiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:23478: bhāvanāheyāstu rāgapratighamānāvidyā rūpādike vastuni kevalaṃ saktyāghātonnatyasaṃprakhyānabhāvena vartanta iti savastukā ucyante /
SA01vakobhau:23480: asti ca tacdhrātādimātraṃ yatra teṣāṃ pravṛttayaḥ na tvātmādileśo 'pi /
SA01vakobhau:23482: tathā hi bhāvanāheyānāmasti pratiniyataṃ vastumanāpāmanāpalakṣaṇaṃ na tu darśanaheyānāmātmādilakṣaṇam /
SA01vakobhau:23486: api khalvāryasyānupanidhyāyataḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣāt kleśa utpadyate nopanidhyāyato rajjvāmiva sarpasaṃjñā /
SA01vakobhau:23488: na cānupanidhyāyata ātmadṛṣṭacyādīnāmupapattiryujyate santīrakatvāditi nāsti darśanaheyakleśa prahāṇātparihāṇiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:23508: tato 'haṃ na kenacit paryāyeṇa parihāṇaṃ vadāmī“ti coktam /
SA01vakobhau:23516: maulo hi dhyānasamādhiḥ samaye saṃmukhībhāvātsāmayikī cimuktirityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:23525: yadi cārhattvāt parihaṇisaṃbhavo 'bhaviṣyat kimarthaṃ bhagavānādhicetasikebhya eva dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇimavakṣyat /
SA01vakobhau:23544: tau hi yaṃ yameva samāpattiviśeṣamutpādayatastasmānna parihīyete /
SA01vakobhau:23546: sthitākampyastu yasminneva guṇe sthitastasmātkevalaṃ na parihīyate na tvanyamutpādayati /
SA01vakobhau:23548: utpādayati vā tasmāttu kampata ityeva viśeṣo lakṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:23550_1: parihīyamāṇo nirviṇnaḥ śastramādhārayan kāyajīvitanirapekṣatvānmaraṇakāla evārhattvaprāptaḥ parinirvṛttaśca /
SA01vakobhau:23560: yadi cārhattvaṃ sāmayikī kāntā cetovimuktirabhaviṣyat kimarthaṃ tatraiva daśake 'rhattvasya dvigrahaṇamakariṣyāt /
SA01vakobhau:23586: kāmarāgānuśayio 'prahīṇo bhavatyaparijñātaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānīyāśca dharmā ābhāsagatā bhavanti tatra cāyoniśo manaskāra” iti /
SA01vakobhau:23594: yadi tāvadarhatastadrūpaḥ pratipakṣa utpanno yena kleśā atyantamanutpattidharmatāmāpannāḥ kathaṃ punaḥ parihīyate /
SA01vakobhau:23599: atyantamanayoddhratāyāṃ tadbījadharmatāyāmakṣīṇāsravo vā punaḥ kathamarhanbhavatītyevaṃ yuktiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:23603: yatredamuktaṃ “tasya khalu śrutavata āryaśrāvakasyaivaṃ carata evaṃ viharataḥ kadācitkarhicit smṛtisaṃpramoṣādutpadyante pāpakā akuśalā vitarkā” iti /
SA01vakobhau:23613: yāvattu cāro na supratibaddhastāvadevaṃ carato 'pi śaikṣasyāsti saṃbhavaḥ kleśotpattāviti śaikṣāvasthāmadhikṛtyaivaṃ vacanādadoṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:23619: kiṃ punarime 'rhanta eva ṣaḍgotrā bhavanti athānye 'pi ṣaḍgotrā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:23636_0: yadidaṃ sūtra uktaṃ “ye tvanena catvāra ādhicaitasikā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārā adhigatāstato
SA01vakobhau:23636_1: 'hamasyānyatamānyatamasmāt parihāṇiṃ vadāmi yā tvanenaikākinā yāvadakopyā cetovimuktiḥ
SA01vakobhau:23636_2: kāyena sākṣātkṛtā tato 'haṃ na kenacit paryāyeṇa parihāṇiṃ vadāmī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:23650: antyā śāsturakopyasya madhyā cānyasya tu tridhā // VAkK_6.59 //
SA01vakobhau:23671: naiva hi kaścitphalāt parihīṇaḥ kālaṃ karoti /
SA01vakobhau:23673: “dhandhā bhikṣava āryaśrāvakasya smṛtisaṃpramoṣā atha ca punaḥ kṣipramevāntaṃ parikṣayaṃ sapadi saṃgacchanīti sūtre vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:23688: akopyagotre pratividhyamāne pritivedhabhāvanābhavyasya navānantaryamārgā vimuktimārgāśca bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:23695: tasya mṛdvindriyagotraṃ bhavatīti nālpena vyāvarttayituṃ śakyate /
SA01vakobhau:23716: kaḥ punaḥ katamāṃ bhūmi niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati /
SA01vakobhau:23731: indriyāṇi hi saṃcaran phalaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ ca mṛdvindriyamārgaṃ tyaktvā tīkṣṇendriyagotrakaṃ phalamārgameva pratilabhate /
SA01vakobhau:23739: dvau buddhau śrāvakāḥ sapta navaite navadhendriyāḥ // VAkK_6.62 //
SA01vakobhau:23744: akopyadharmā ca dvividha uttāpanāgata āditaśca tadgotraḥ akopyabheda eva /
SA01vakobhau:23752: śraddhānusārī dharmānusārī śraddhādhimukto dṛṣṭioprāptaḥ kāyasākṣī prajñāvimukta ubhayatovimuktaśca /
SA01vakobhau:23801: indriyagotramārgavairāgyāśrayataḥ paṇḍitāḥ śatasahasraṃ saṃpadyante sahasrāṇi ca saptacatvāriṃśacchatāni cāṣṭau pañcaviśatiśca /
SA01vakobhau:23817: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā “kleśān prahāyeha hi yastu pañca ahāryadharmā paripūrṇaḥ śaikṣa” iti /
SA01vakobhau:23836: samāpattita eva samāpattīndriyaśca paripūrṇatvaṃ nāsti vina phalena /
SA01vakobhau:23842: phalena tvaparipūrṇasyāśaikṣatvameva nāstīti nāsya punaḥ phalena paripūrṇaparipūrṇatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA01vakobhau:23850: vahava ime mārgabhedā uktā laukikalokokttaradarśanabhāvanā 'śaikṣamārgāḥ prayogānantaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgā iti /
SA01vakobhau:23867: eṣa hi nirvāṇasya panthā etena tadgamanāt /
SA01vakobhau:23887: caturdhyāneṣu mārgaḥ sukhā pratipadaṅgaparigraha śamathavipaśyanā samatābhyāmayiatnavāhitvāt /
SA01vakobhau:23891: anyāsvanāgamyadhyānāntarārupyabhūmiṣu mārgo duḥkhā pratidaṅgāparigrahācchamathavipaśyanānyūnatvācca yatnavāhitvāt śamathanyūne hyanāgamyadhyānāntare vipaśyanānyūnā ārupyā iti /
SA01vakobhau:23897: mṛdvindriyasya sukhā duḥkhā vā pratipaddhandhābhijñā tīkṣṇendriyasya kṣiprābhijñā dhandhābhijñā asyāṃ pratipadi /
SA01vakobhau:23942: śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā samādhiḥ prītyupekṣaṇe /
SA01vakobhau:23953_1: tāvadvalāni ca nāmagrāhikayā śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñādravyāṇi ca smṛtyupasthānāni
SA01vakobhau:23965: tānyetāni pañca dravyāṇi evamete bodhipakṣyā daśa dravyāṇi bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:23975: pradhānagrahaṇaṃ sarve gunāḥ prāyogikāstu te // VAkK_6.69 //
SA01vakobhau:23994: “ṛddhim ca vo bhikṣavo darśayiṣyāmi ṛddhipādāṃśaca yāvadṛddhiḥ katamā /
SA01vakobhau:24015: bhāvane darśane caiva sapta vargā yathākramam // VAkK_6.70 //
SA01vakobhau:24034: tatra dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bodhirvodhyaṅgaṃ ca samyagdṛṣṭirmārgo mārgāṅgaṃ ceti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:24038_1: cetasa upanibaddhāni bhavanti yāvadeva gardhāśritānāṃ smarasaṃkalpānāṃ prativinodanāye“ti sūtre vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:24051: tathā hyuktam “āryāṣṭāṅge khalu mārge bhāvanāparipūri gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:24053: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti yāvat sapta bodhyaṅgānī“ti /
SA01vakobhau:24055: punaścoktaṃ “yathābhūtavacanārocanamiti bhikṣavaścaturṇāmāryasatyānāmetadadhivacanaṃ yathāgatena mārgeṇa prakramaṇamiti bhikṣo āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasyaitadadhivacanami“ti /
SA01vakobhau:24063: kati bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ sāsravā iti katyanāsravā iti /
SA01vakobhau:24105: ārupyesu samyagvākkarmāntājīvaiḥ prītisaṃkalpābhyāṃ ca varjitā dvātriṃśat /
SA01vakobhau:24117: duḥkhasamudayanirodhasatyānyabhisamayan dharme cāvetyaprasādamāryakāntāni ca śīlāni pratilabhate /
SA01vakobhau:24119: mārgasatyamabhisamayan buddhe tasya ca śrāvakasaṃghe 'vetyaprasādaṃ pratilabhete /
SA01vakobhau:24121: yo hi tayoḥ prasādaḥ so 'śaikṣyeṣu buddhakarakeṣu dharmeṣu śaikṣāyāśaikṣeṣu ca saṃghakarakeṣu prasādaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:24137: buddhadharmasaṃghāvetyaprasādāḥ śraddhāsvabhāvāḥ āryakāntāni ca śīlāni śīlamiti dve dravye bhavataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:24150: samyaksaṃbuddho vata bhagavān svākhyāto 'sya dharmavinayaḥ supratipanno 'sya śrāvakasaṃgha iti vaidyabhaiṣajyopasthāpakabhūtatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:24158: sūtra ukta“maṣṭābhiraṅgai samanvāgataḥ śaikṣo darśabhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato 'śaikṣa” iti /
SA01vakobhau:24160: kasmācchaikṣasya samyak vimuktiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca noktam /
SA01vakobhau:24170: binā ca vimuktacyā kathaṃ vimuktijñānam vyavasthāpyate /
SA01vakobhau:24172: aśaikṣastu sarvakleśabandhanātyantanirmokṣādvimuktitatpratyātmajñānābhyāṃ prabhāvita iti tasyaiva tadvacanaṃ nyāyyam /
SA01vakobhau:24193: saiva saṃskṛtā vimuktirdve vimuktī sūtra ukte /
SA01vakobhau:24201_0: iha bhikṣavo rāgāccittaṃ viraktaṃ bhavati vimuktaṃ dveṣānmohāccittaṃ viraktaṃ bhavati
SA01vakobhau:24201_1: vimuktamityaparipūrṇasya vā vimuktiskandhasya paripūraye paripūrṇasya cānugrahāya
SA01vakobhau:24215: yaiva hi pūrvaṃ bodhiruktā saiveha samyagjñānaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:24228: vajropame hi samādho sa ca prahīyate /
SA01vakobhau:24244: nanu cāmuktasyāpi śaikṣasya laukikamutpadyate na tattādṛśam /
SA01vakobhau:24255: yā cāsaṃskṛtā vimuktiruktā ye ca trayodhātava ucyante prahāṇadhāturviṃrāgadhātunirodhadhāturiti /
SA01vakobhau:24278: yena vastu nirvidyate virajyate 'pi tena vastunā /
SA01vakobhau:24309: tatra vītarāgaḥ satyāni paśyandharmajñānakṣāntibhiḥ kleśānna prajahāti /
SA01vakobhau:24314: abhidharmakośabhāṣye mārgapudgalanirdeśo nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti
SA01vakobhau:24322: kṣāntayaścocyante jñānāni ca samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:24324: kiṃ punaḥ kṣāntayo na jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ ca na dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:24330: dṛṣṭayastu tā santiraṇātmakattvāt yathā ca kṣāntayo dṛṣṭirna jñānamevaṃ punaḥ
SA01vakobhau:24348: eṣā ṣaḍvidhā laukikī prajñādṛṣṭiḥ anyā na dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:24393: te eva dharmajñānānvayajñāne satyabhedena punaścatvāri jñānāni bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:24403: ete eva dharmajñānānvayajñāne caturvidhe adṛṣṭisvabhāve kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ cocyate /
SA01vakobhau:24425: bhūmyakṣapudgalotkrāntam naṣṭājātaṃ na veti tat // VAkK_7.5 //
SA01vakobhau:24451: tatra paracittajñānena darjñanamārga jñātukāmaḥ prayogaṃ kṛtvā prathamau
SA01vakobhau:24456: śrāvako darśanamārgāt paracittajñānena dvau kṣaṇau jānāti /
SA01vakobhau:24462: yāvacca sa tatra prayogamāra mate tāvadayaṃ ṣoḍaśacittamanuprāpto bhavatītyantarā na jānāti /
SA01vakobhau:24466: prathamau ca dvāvaṣṭamaṃ ca samudayānvayajñānaṃ mṛduprayogatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:24480: samudayaḥ prahīṇo nirodhaḥ sākṣātakṛto mārgo bhāvita iti jānāti /
SA01vakobhau:24482: tadupādāya yat jñānaṃ darśanaṃ vidyā buddhirbodhiḥ prajñā āloko 'bhisamayamidamucyate kṣayajñānam /
SA01vakobhau:24486: duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na pounaḥ parijñeyamiti jānāti yāvat mārgo bhāvito na punarbhāvayitavya iti /
SA01vakobhau:24504: ityetāni daśa jñānāni bhavanti yaduta dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayañṇyānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānaṃ paracittajñānaṃ kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:24530: kasmāt punaretāni vīṇi santi daśa vyavasthāpyante /
SA01vakobhau:24549: na hi tena caittā na jñāyate /
SA01vakobhau:24585: duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārga jñānāni svaiḥ svaiḥ satyākāraiḥ pravartanta ityekaikaṃ caturākāraṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:24596: sāsravaṃ paracittajñānaṃ jñeyānāṃ cittacaittānāṃ yat svalakṣaṇam tadākārayati /
SA01vakobhau:24603: yadā cittaṃ gṛhlāti na tadā cittānāṃ yadā vedanāṃ na tadā saṃjñāmityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:24605: yattarhi bhagavatīktam “sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātī“tyevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:24614: tatra sarāgaṃ saṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ dvābhyāṃ sarāgaṃ tato 'nyatsāsravaṃ saṃyogasarāgatayā sarāgam /
SA01vakobhau:24616: atra tu sūtre rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ sarāgaṃ rāgapratipakṣī vigatarāgamityeke /
SA01vakobhau:24618: yadi hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgaṃ syādanyakleśasamprayuktamapi syāt /
SA01vakobhau:24620: evaṃ tarhi tadapratipakṣaḥ sāsravaṃ cittamakliṣṭaṃ naiva sarāgaṃ na vigatarāgaṃ syādityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:24633: tadeva hi cittaṃ saṃkṣiptavikṣiptaṃ syāt kliṣṭamiddhasaṃprayīgāt /
SA01vakobhau:24638: tajjñānaṃ catvāri jñānāni dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ mārgajñānami“ti /
SA01vakobhau:24656: kliṣṭaṃ tajjātīyānāgatabhāvanā 'bhāvānna mahāparivāraṃ tribhiśca skandhaiḥ sānuparivartam /
SA01vakobhau:24658: kuśalaṃ tu mahāparivāraṃ caturbhiśca skandhaiḥ sānuparivartam /
SA01vakobhau:24662: ekayā hi duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyā daśānuśayātyantasamudghātaḥ kriyate /
SA01vakobhau:24676: bhāvitaṃ kuśalaṃ tābhyāṃ bhāvitatvāt vimuktaṃ kliṣṭaṃ svabhāvasaṃtānavimuktibhyāmavimuktatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:24681: eṣāṃ ca padānāṃ nārthaviśeṣa ukto bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:24685: yaccittam styānamiddhasahagatamadhyātmaṃ saṃnirodhasahagataṃ no tu vipaśyanayā samanvāgatam /
SA01vakobhau:24691: nanu coktaṃ tadeva cittaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ syādvikṣiptaṃ ceti /
SA01vakobhau:24707: ityapyetat kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ līnamiti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:24713: yadi ca sūtre tadeva līnaṃ cittaṃ tadevoddhatamityabhipretaṃ syāt idaṃ noktaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:24715: “yasminsamaye līnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati layābhirśaṅka vā akālastasminsamaye prasrabdhisamādhyupekṣāsaṃvodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:24717: yasminsagaye uddhātaṃ cittaṃ bhavati auddhatyābhiśaṅki vā akālastasminsamaye dharmavicayavīryaprītisaṃvodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyā” iti /
SA01vakobhau:24721: manasikaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ bhāvaneṣṭā na saṃmukhībhāva ityadoṣa eṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:24727: tayostu sahabhāvāttadeva cittaṃ līnaṃ tadevoddhatamiti brūmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:24750: na ca paracittajñānaṃ prāptyālambanaṃ nāpi taccittālambanaṃ rāgālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:24756: rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgamasaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgamiti sūtrābhigrāyo dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:24758: yat tūktaṃ “vigatarāgamasya taccittaṃ bhavati vigatadveṣaṃ vigatamohamanāvarttikadharmi kāmabhave rūpabhave ārupyabhave” iti /
SA01vakobhau:24762: nanu coktam anyakleśasaṃprayuktamapi cittaṃ rāgaviprayuktatvādvigatarāgaṃ syādi“ti /
SA01vakobhau:24775: na gṛhlāti ākāralambananirapekṣaṃṃ hi tadraktamidaṃ cittamiti jānāti natvamuṣmin rupe raktamiti jānāti /
SA01vakobhau:24777: anyathā hi tadrūpālambanamapi syāt tadālambanaṃ ca paracittaṃ gṛhlataḥ svabhāvagrahaṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /
SA01vakobhau:24779: sarvaṃ ca paracittajñānaṃ dravyasvalakṣaṇacittacaittapratyutpannaparasaṃtatikāmarūpapratisaṃyuktāpratisaṃyuktaviṣayaṃ darśanamārgapratiṣiddhaṃ bhāvanāmārga upalabhyate /
SA01vakobhau:24781: śūnyatā 'nimittasamādhi viprayuktaṃ kṣayānutpādajñānāsaṃgṛhītamānantaryamārga pratiṣiddhaṃ ca vedittavyam /
SA01vakobhau:24787: kṣayānutpādajñāne śeṣe te caturdaśākāre śūnyānātmakārau varjayitvā /
SA01vakobhau:24789: pāramārthikayorapi saṃvṛtibhajanāt śīṇā me jātirnāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti tadvalānuvyavahārataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:24808: anityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ hetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:24814: nāsyāyamartho yadastyetatsthānamastyetadvastvityevaṃ vijānīyāditi api tvastyetat sthānamastyetadvastu yadanityādito vijānīyāditi cet /
SA01vakobhau:24826: ātmata ātmīyata ucchedataḥ śāśvatataḥ ahetuto 'kriyāto 'pavādato 'grataḥ śreṣṭhato viśiṣṭataḥ paramataḥ śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikataḥ kāṅkṣāto vimatito vicikitsātaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:24837: kiṃ punarime ṣoḍaśākārā nāmata āhosvit dravyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:24939: kṣetrādivaśena hi phalasya gandharasavīryavipākaprabhāvabhedā bhavanti caturthaḥ prabhavastataḥ eva tatsaṃbhavāt phalasyeva puṣpāvasānamiti /
SA01vakobhau:24943: tṛṣṇāvicaritānāṃ dvau pañcakau dvau catuṣkau catvāraśchandāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:24945: “asmīti bhikṣavaḥ sāti itthamasmīti bhavati evamasmīti bhavati anyathā 'smīti sadasmīti asadasmīti /
SA01vakobhau:24947: bhaviṣyāmītyasya bhavati na bhaviṣyāmi itthaṃ bhaviṣyāmi evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi śranyathā bhaviṣyāmi /
SA01vakobhau:24949: syāmityasya bhavati itthaṃ syām evaṃ syām anyathā syām apitu syām apītthaṃ syām apyevaṃ syām apyanyathā syāmityasya bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:24954: “iti hi bhikṣavo duḥkhāḥ saṃskārāḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇami“ti vacanāta /
SA01vakobhau:24967: “eṣa mārgo hi nāstyanyo darśanasya viśuddhaya” iti
SA01vakobhau:24981: punaḥ punaḥ parihāṇito nātyantiko mokṣa iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ niḥsaraṇākāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:24983: nāsti mārgaḥ kumārgo 'yamanyo mārgaḥ punarāvartī mārga iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ mārganyāyapratipannairyāṇikākārā iti /
SA01vakobhau:24989: evaṃ tarhi prajñā sākārā na bhaviṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:25002: prajñā cānye ca sarve sālambanā dharmā ākārayanti /
SA01vakobhau:25008: tadevaṃ kṛtvā siddhaṃ bhavati prajñā ākāraścākārayati cākāryante ca /
SA01vakobhau:25033: anvayajñānaṃ tāsveva ca ṣaṭsu bhūmiṣvārupyatraye ca /
SA01vakobhau:25039: bhedena punrdharmajñānasaṃgṛhītāni ṣaṭsu anvayajñāna saṃgṛhītāni navasu /
SA01vakobhau:25106: traidhātu kāmalā dharmā akṛtāśca dvidhā dvidhā /
SA01vakobhau:25115: ime daśa dharmāḥ kathaṃ yojyāḥ kasya jñānasya katyālambanamiti /
SA01vakobhau:25117: tatra saṃvṛtijñānasya sarve daśa dharmā ālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:25144: saṃvṛtijñānaṃ svasmātkalāpādanyān sarvadharmānanātvato jānīyāt sarvadharmā anātmāna iti /
SA01vakobhau:25152: tacca kāmāvacaraṃ śrutacintāmayaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ śrutamayam bhāvanāmayam /
SA01vakobhau:25178: ataḥ paraṃ caturṣu kṣaṇeṣu ekaikajñānavṛddhirasya jñātavyā /
SA01vakobhau:25182: samudayanirodhamārgadharmajñāneṣu samudayanirodhamārgajñānāni vardhanta iti mārgadharmajñāne saptabhirjñānaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:25192: darśanamārge yadyadevotpadyate kṣāntirjñānaṃ vā tajjātīyamanāgataṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati tadākārā eva catvāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:25198: tatraiva darśanamārge saṃvṛtijñānaṃ cāpi bhāvyate triṣu duḥkhasamudayanirodhānvayajñāneṣu /
SA01vakobhau:25212: kṛtsnaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ śakyate parijñātuṃ samudayaḥ prahātuṃ nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartu na tu mārgaḥ śakyate kṛtsno bhāvayitum ityabhisamayāntābhāvānna tasminnābhisamayāntikaṃ bhāvyate /
SA01vakobhau:25214: samudayo 'pi na tadā sarvaḥ prahīṇo bhavatīti na syādābhisamayāntikam /
SA01vakobhau:25220: mārgastaddarśanaheyapratipakṣo na sarvaḥ śakyate bhāvayituṃ vahugotratvāt ityasti mahānviśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:25234: alabdhalābhāt kathamidānīṃ tatpratilabdhaṃ yadi naiva saṃmukhīkartu śakyate /
SA01vakobhau:25242: evaṃ tu sidhyati yad āhuḥ pūrvācāryāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:25246: lokottaramārga-sāmarthyāt saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate yad vyutthitaḥ satyālambanam viśiṣṭataraṃ laukikaṃ jñānaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti /
SA01vakobhau:25248: eṣa eva ca tasya lābho yat-tat-saṃmukhībhāva-samarthāśrayalābhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:25250: gotre hi labdhe labdhaṃ gautrikaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:25258: yadbhūmiko darśanamārgo bhavati tadbhūmikam cāvarabhūmikaṃ ca saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate /
SA01vakobhau:25263: evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmike darśanamārge saptabhūmikaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:25269: nirodhe 'bhisamite yat saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tadantyaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānam /
SA01vakobhau:25271: ekasya parisaṃkhyānātsiddhaṃ bhavati śeṣaṃ catvāri smṛtyupasthānānīti /
SA01vakobhau:25293: avītarāgasya ṣoḍaśe mārgānvayajñānakṣaṇe dve jñāne pratyutpanne /
SA01vakobhau:25306: ṣoḍaśāt kṣaṇādurdhvaṃ bhāvanāmārge yāvanna vītarāgo bhavati tāvat sarveṣu prayogāntaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgeṣu sapta jñānāni bhāvyante /
SA01vakobhau:25321_0: tāsāṃ jayaḥ vairāgyaṃ tasmin saptabhūmike vairāgye pañcasu cābhijñāsu akopyaprativedhe
SA01vakobhau:25321_1: ca vyavakīrṇabhāvite ca dhyāne śaikṣasya yāvantaḥ ānantaryamārgāsteṣvapi sarveṣu
SA01vakobhau:25333: saptabhūmivairāgyādapi cordhvaṃbhavāgravairāgye vimuktimārgeṣvaṣṭāsu saptaiva jñānāni bhāvyante /
SA01vakobhau:25344: śaikṣasyendriyottāpanāyāṃ vimuktimārge sarāgasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānānāṃ vitarāgasya saptānāṃ paracittajñānaṃ prakṣipya /
SA01vakobhau:25353: vītarāgasyāvītarāgasya vā śaikṣasyendriyottāpanāyāmānantaryamārge ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā pūrvavat /
SA01vakobhau:25376: yastvakopyadharmā bhavati tasya daśānāṃ jñānānāṃ bhāvanā /
SA01vakobhau:25382: yo 'pyakopyatāṃ saṃcarati tasyāpyantye vimuktimārge daśānāṃ bhāvanā /
SA01vakobhau:25388: kāmavairāgye navamo vimuktimārgaḥ saptabhūmivairāgyābhijñāvyavakīrṇabhāviteṣu vimuktimārgaḥ akopyaprativedho 'ṣṭau vimuktimārgāḥ sarve ca vītarāgasya prayogaviśeṣamārgāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:25395: aśaikṣasya punarabhijñādiprayogavimuktaviśeṣamārgeṣu nava jñānāni daśa vā /
SA01vakobhau:25408: saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tāvadyadbhūmiko mārgo yāṃ ca prathamato bhūmi labhate tadbhūmikamanāgataṃ bhāvyate /
SA01vakobhau:25410: anāsravaṃ tu na kevalaṃ yadbhūmiko mārgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:25416: yadbhūmivairāgyāyāpi hi dvividho 'pi mārgo bhavati prayogamārgādiḥ yāṃ ca bhūmi labhate vairāgyatastdbhūmikānyadhobhūmikāni cānāsravāṇi jñānāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti /
SA01vakobhau:25420: kṣayajñāne tu sarvabhūmikāḥ sāsravā api guṇāḥ kṣayajñānalābhikā bhāvanāṃ gacchanti a4ubhānāpānasmṛtismṛtyupasthānāpramāṇavimokṣādayaḥ rajjucchedāducchvasantīva peḍāsādharmyeṇa /
SA01vakobhau:25432: kiṃ khalu pratilambha eva bhāvanā netyucyate /
SA01vakobhau:25455: “ṣaḍigānīndriyāṇi sudāntāni yāvatsubhāvitāni tathā santyasminkāye kleśā” iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:25463: ye buddhasyaiva bhagavataḥ kṣayajñāne bhāvanāṃ gacchanti nānyasya /
SA01vakobhau:25466: daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni mahākaruṇā ca /
SA01vakobhau:25512: atha kṣīṇasravasaṃtāne jñānamāsravakṣayajñānaṃ tato daśa jñānāni /
SA01vakobhau:25540: yasmādasya sarvatra jñeye jñānabhavyāhataṃ vartate tasmādvalam /
SA01vakobhau:25546: sthaviraśāriputreṇa pravrajyāpekṣapuruṣapratyākhyānaṃ śyenopadrutasya pakṣiṇa upapattyādīparyantājñānaṃ cātrodāharaṇam /
SA01vakobhau:25574: prākṛtagandhahastimahānagnapraskandināṃ daśāttaravṛddhacyārdhanārāyaṇaṃ balaṃ tat dviguṇaṃ nārāyaṇa mityapare /
SA01vakobhau:25580: taccatatkāyikaṃ balaṃ sarvasyaiva spraṣṭavyāyatanasvabhāvaṃ mahābhūtaviśeṣa eva /
SA01vakobhau:25594: yathā sthānāsthānajñānabalamevaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhasya vata me sate ityetadvaiśāradyaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:25596: yathāsravakṣayajñānabalamevaṃ kṣīṇāsravasya vata me sata ityetadvaiśāradyam /
SA01vakobhau:25598: yathā karmasvakajñānavalamevaṃ ye vā punarmayā śrāvakāṇāmantarāyikā dharmā ādhyātā ityetadvaiśāradyam /
SA01vakobhau:25600: yathā sarvatragāminī pratipajjñānaṃ valamevaṃ yo va punarmayā śrāvakāṇāṃ niryāṇāya mārga ādhyāta ityetadvaiśāradyaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:25618: yadā śrāvakasyāpi śuśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūpamāṇobhayeṣvānandī na bhavatyāghāto vā /
SA01vakobhau:25623: athavā yasya śrāvakāstasya cacchūśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūṣamāṇobhayeṣu saumanasyādyavakāśaḥ sutarāṃ na tathā 'nyasyeti tasyaiva tānutpādādāścarya vyavasthāpyate nānyasyeti /
SA01vakobhau:25632: anyathā hi na sarvasattvālambanā sidhyet na ca triduḥkhatākārā /
SA01vakobhau:25669: kiṃ punaḥ sarve buddhāḥ sarvaprakārasāmānyā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:25683: etāmeva ca trividhāṃ saṃpadaṃ manasikurvāṇena viduṣā śakyaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike tīvraprema gauravaṃ cotpādayituṃ yaduta hetusaṃpadaṃ phalasaṃpadamupakārasaṃpadaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:25702: sarvakleśaprahāṇam atyantaprahāṇaṃ savāsanaprahāṇaṃ sarvasamādhisamāpattyāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ ca caturvidhā prabhāvasaṃpat /
SA01vakobhau:25713: tacca punarbuddhā eva sakalaṃ jñātuṃ baktuṃ ca samarthāḥ yadyanekāsaṃkhyeyaṃ kalpaṃ jīvitamadhitiṣṭheyuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:25717: atha capunarbālāḥ svaguṇadāridracyahatādhimokṣāḥ śruṇvanto 'pi tāṃ tādṛśīṃ guṇasamṛddhiṃ buddhaṃ ca nādriyante tasya ca dharmam /
SA01vakobhau:25719: paṇḍitāstu punarmajjābhirapi taṃ bhagavantamabhiprapadyante tasya ca dharmam /
SA01vakobhau:25721: te he śraddhāmātrakeṇāpyekāntikenābhiprasannā aniyatavipākānāṃ pāpānāṃ rāśīnabhibhūya daivīṃ mānuṣīṃ ca śriyamabhibhūya nirvāṇaparāyaṇāḥ saṃvartante /
SA01vakobhau:25745_0: tatrāraṇā nāma kaścidevārhan kleśaprabhavaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ viditvātmānaṃ ca dakṣiṇīyaviśeṣaṃ
SA01vakobhau:25745_1: pareṣāṃ tadālambanaṃ kleśotpādaṃ parihartukāmastādṛśaṃ jñānamutpādayati bhena pareṣāṃ
SA01vakobhau:25747: na kasyacittadālambano rāga utpadyate dveṣo māno vā /
SA01vakobhau:25764: anyo hi svasaṃtānādapi kadācit kleśaraṇaṃ parihartu na śaknoti /
SA01vakobhau:25772: anāgatāḥ kāmāvacarāḥ savastukāḥ kleśāḥ asyā ālambanaṃ nāpareṣāṃ kleśa udapādītyevaṃ pravṛttatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:25774: avastukāstu kleśā na śakyāḥ parihartuṃ sarvatragāṇāṃ sakalasvabhūmyālambanatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:25780: tadapi hi saṃvṛtijñānaṃ dhyāne 'ntye 'kopyadharmaṇaḥ manuṣyāśrayaṃ ca
SA01vakobhau:25793: praṇidhipūrvakaṃ jñānaṃ praṇidhijñānaṃ yaddhi praṇidhāya prāntakoṭikaṃ caturtha dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:25799: dharmārthayorniruktau ca pratibhāne ca saṃvidaḥ // VAkK_7.37 //
SA01vakobhau:25831: sarvabhūmikā cāsau kāmadhātau yāvat bhavāgre vāṅmārgayoranyatarālambanāt /
SA01vakobhau:25847: anye tu dve dharmaniruktipratisavidau saṃvṛtijñānasvabhāve nāmakāyādivāgālambanasvabhāvatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:25861: “padavyañjane tasyaivarthe tasyaikadvivahustrīpuruṣādyadhivacane tasyāsaktatāyāmavivartyajñānaṃ dharmāvipratisaṃvida” ityata evāsāṃ kramasiddhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:25869: āsāṃ ca kila pratisaṃvidāṃ gaṇitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ śabdavaidyā hetuvidyā ca pūrvaprayogo yathākramam /
SA01vakobhau:25875: yasya caikā tasyāvaśyaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidī bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:25895: niruktipratisaṃvidastadvalena lābho na tu sā caturthadhyānabhūmikā /
SA01vakobhau:25910: pratilomaṃ punaryāvatkāmāvacaraṃ cittaṃ tataḥ punaranulomaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānamevaṃ sarvabhūmyanulomitam /
SA01vakobhau:25990: kīdṛśe 'pi me kāye kīdṛśaṃ cittam bhavaty evaṃ pareṣāmapyābhujataścittajñānādabhiniṣpannā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:25994: pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmartukāmaḥ samanantaraniruddhamanovijñāno nimittamudgṛhya tatsamanantaraprātilomyenāvasthāntarāṇi manasikaroti /
SA01vakobhau:26019: yadbhūmikā ṛddhacyabhhijñā bhavati tāṃ bhūmi tayā gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:26023: evaṃ divyaśrotrābhijñayā svabhūmikameva śabdaṃ śṛṇotyadharabhūmikaṃ vā nordhvabhūmikam /
SA01vakobhau:26031: ata evārupyabhumikaṃ cittaṃ cetaḥparyāyapūrvanivāsabhijñābhyāṃ na gṛhlātyurdhvabhūmikatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:26038: janmāntarābhyastā abhijñā vairāgyato labhyante vaiśeṣikyaḥ prayogataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:26059: kathaṃ tarhi “cyutopapādajñānenaiva jānāti amī bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ” ityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:26112: iṣṭe śaikṣsya nokte tu vidye sāvidyasaṃtateḥ // VAkK_7.46 //
SA01vakobhau:26139: asti hi ca gāndhārī nāma vidyā yayāphāśena gacchati īkṣaṇikā ca nāma vidyā yayā paracittaṃ jānāti /
SA01vakobhau:26141: na tu yathābhūtānuśāsanam anyathā śakyaṃ kartumavybhicāritvāt /
SA01vakobhau:26143: pradhānamāvarjanamātraṃ ca tābhyāmanuśāsanaprātihāryeṇa tu hitena iṣṭenaphalena yogo bhavatyupāyopadeśādityevāvaśyam ṛddhirityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:26159: śarīravāhinī ādhimokṣikī manojavā ca tatra gatiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:26163: manasa ivāsyā rava iti manojavā gatirbuddhasyaiva nānyasya /
SA01vakobhau:26167: ata e“vācintyo buddhānāṃ buddhaviṣaya” ityuktaṃ bhagavatā /
SA01vakobhau:26198: kāmadhātāvidaṃ caturvidhaṃ nirmāṇamevaṃ rūpadhātau-ityaṣṭavidhaṃ samāsato nirmāṇam /
SA01vakobhau:26200: kathaṃ rūpadhātūpapannasya kāmāvacaranirmāṇe gandharasābhyāṃ na samanvāgamo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:26222: evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri pañca ca yojyāni /
SA01vakobhau:26247: nirmāṇacittādapi śuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ cotpadyate nānyat /
SA01vakobhau:26249: na hi samādhiphalasthitasvāpraviśya punaḥ samādhiṃ tasmāt vyutthānamasti /
SA01vakobhau:26261: kāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmiko hi nirmitaḥ svabhūmikenaiva cittena bhāṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:26273: yadā ca vahavo nirmitā bhavanti tadā yugapat bhāṣante /
SA01vakobhau:26277: ekasya tūṣṇīṃbhūtasya sarvetūṣṇīṃ bhavanti ta” iti gāthā /
SA01vakobhau:26279: buddhasya pūrva paścādvā yathecchaṃ nirmitā bhāṣante /
SA01vakobhau:26281: yadā bhāṣaṇacittaṃ tadā nirmāṇacittābhāvo nirmāṇacittābhāvānnirmitābhāva iti kathamenaṃ bhāṣayanti /
SA01vakobhau:26311: jitāyāṃ tvabhijñāyāmekena cittenānekaṃ nirmiṇoti yāvannirmātumiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:26321: upapattipratilambhikaṃ tu nirmāṇacittaṃ kuśalākuśalamavyākṛtaṃ bhavati devanāgapiśācādīnām /
SA01vakobhau:26331: ṛddhirmantrauṣadhābhyāṃ ca karmajā ceti pañcadhā // VAkK_7.53 //
SA01vakobhau:26341: kimete divye eva āhosvit divye eva divye /
SA01vakobhau:26357: nāsti divyaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca tatsabhāgaṃ nityaṃ vijñānasahitatvāt nāpi vikalaṃ kāṇavibrāntābhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:26377: sarvābhhisaṃskāreṇa saha śrāvako 'pi dvisāhasra lokadhātuṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:26406: yaccāpi tārkikaṃ paracittajñānaṃ naimittikānāṃ yacca vidyākṛtaṃ tadapi trividhaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:26438: asya svabhāvānāṃ tu kartavya ityādita eva dhyānānyārabhyante sarvaguṇāśrayatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:26474: evaṃ tarhi cittānyevaikālambanāni samādhirna caitasikaṃ dharmāntaramiti prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:26477: yena tu tānyekāgrāṇi vartante sa dharmaḥ samādhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:26481: nanu ca kṣaṇikatvātsarvaṃ cittamekāgraṃ dvitīyasya tasmādavikṣepa iti cet /
SA01vakobhau:26485: yata eva ca smādhistata eva cittānāmekālambanatvaṃ kiṃ neṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:26492: tathā hyadhicittaṃ śikṣā cittapariśuddhipradhānaṃ ca sūtre catvāri dhyānānyuktānītyapare /
SA01vakobhau:26512: sa hi śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ yuganddhavāhitvāddṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāra uktaḥ sukhā ca pratipaditi /
SA01vakobhau:26524: kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kuśalamaikāgyraṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ kīdṛśaṃ yāvaccaturtham /
SA01vakobhau:26544: vicāravivarjitaṃ prītisukhavat dvitīyaṃ vicāraprītivarjitaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vicāraprītisukhavarjitaṃ caturthamiti /
SA01vakobhau:26582: na hi tatra rūpasaṃjñā vibhūtā na vigatetyarthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:26584: yaduktaṃ “catuskandhā” iti sādhyaṃ tāvadetadārupyeṣu rūpaṃ nāstīti /
SA01vakobhau:26592: yadi kāyavāk saṃvaramātraṃ kathaṃ tadabhāve tatsaṃvarau bhaviṣyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:26628: yacca nāmarūpayoranyonyāśritatvamuktaṃ kimidaṃ kāmarūpāvacaraṃ nāma saṃdhāyoktamāhosvitsarvamiti /
SA01vakobhau:26630: yacca vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamuktaṃ kimatra sarva vijñānaṃ nāmarūpasya pratyayamuktamāhosvitsarve nāmarūpaṃ vijñānapratyayamiti /
SA01vakobhau:26634: kimatra sarvaireva tairvinā tatpratiṣedha āhosvit ekenāpīti /
SA01vakobhau:26640: bāhyasyāpi hyaṣmaṇa āyuṣā binā bhāvo na prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:26646: “atikramya devān kavaḍīkārā hārabhakṣāni“ti vacanāt prītyāhāravacanāccāprasaṅga iti cet /
SA01vakobhau:26654: “arupiṇaḥ santi sattvāḥ sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramādi“ti vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:26656: sati hi rupe svaṃ rūpamavaśyaṃ saṃjānīranniti /
SA01vakobhau:26671: bhavena bhavasyāniḥsaraṇavacanaṃ tu tenaiva tasyāniḥsaraṇādasarvānatyanta niḥsaraṇācca /
SA01vakobhau:26673: dhyānesu coktaṃ bhagavatā “yattatra bhavati rūpagataṃ vā yāvadvijñānagataṃ veti /
SA01vakobhau:26675: ārupyeṣu tūktaṃ “yattatra bhavati vedanāgataṃ vā yāvadvijñānagataṃ ve“ti /
SA01vakobhau:26677: satyāṃ tesu rūpajātau kasmādrūpagataṃ veti nāvakṣyat /
SA01vakobhau:26713: anantamākāśamanantaṃ vijñānaṃ nāsti kiñcidityeva manasikurvāṇasteṣu prayujyante yathāsaṃkhyam /
SA01vakobhau:26721: na hi sā paṭvī saṃjñā na ca punarnaiva saṃjñeti /
SA01vakobhau:26723: “yadyapi tatrāpyevaṃ prayujyante saṃjñārogaḥ saṃjñāgaṇdaḥ saṃjñāśalyaḥ āsaṃjñikasaṃmohaḥ etacchāntametatpraṇītaṃ yaduta naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamiti /
SA01vakobhau:26725: kasmāttu taistadevaṃ gṛhyata ityavaśyamidaṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:26730: ityetānyaṣṭau maulāni samāpattidravyāṇi yaduta catvāri dhyānāni catvāra ārupyā iti /
SA01vakobhau:26772: eṣāṃ ca samāpattidravyāṇāṃ dhyānānyeva bhavanti nārupyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:26782: vitarko vicāraḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā cetyetāni pañcāṅgāni samādhiḥ kilāṅgaṃ dhyānaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:26786: yathā caturaṅgā senā evaṃ pañcāṅgaṃ dhyānam /
SA01vakobhau:26794: tṛtīye pañca tūpekṣā smṛtiḥ prajñā sukhaṃ sthitiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:26828: ata evocyate yānyaṅgāni prathame dhyāne dvitīye 'pi tānīti catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01vakobhau:26849: iha prasrabdhisukhaṃ tatra vedanāsukhamiti kuta etat /
SA01vakobhau:26862: na cāpi tayoḥ paryāyeṇa dhyāne vṛttiryuktā pañcāṅgavacanāditi /
SA01vakobhau:26866: nāstyeva caitasikaṃ sukhendriyaṃ triṣvapi hi dhyāneṣu /
SA01vakobhau:26872: yatsukhavedanīyena sparśena spṛṣṭasyotpadyate kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatamidamucyate sukhendriyami“ti /
SA01vakobhau:26878: “sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata” iti svaśabdena vacanācca /
SA01vakobhau:26894: “yasminsamaye āryaśrāvakaḥ pravivekajāṃ prītiṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatī“tyatra sūtre prasrabdhisukhayoḥ pṛthagvacanānna prasrabdhireva sukham /
SA01vakobhau:26931: na cānāsrave kiñcidaṅgaṃ sāsravaṃ kicidanāsravaṃ syāditi cet /
SA01vakobhau:26933: ayaugapadyātko doṣaḥ sukhaprītyasamavadhānānna pañcāṅgaṃ syāditi cet /
SA01vakobhau:26941: tasmādyānyeva prathamadhyāne pañcāṅgāni teṣāṃ dvitricaturaṅgāpakarṣeṇa dvitīyādidhyānavyavasthānam /
SA01vakobhau:26943: ata eva ca prathame dhyāne pañcānāmaṅgatvamuktam /
SA01vakobhau:26956: naiva tu pūrvācāryā evaṃ nirdiśanti sma yāvantaḥ prajñāntam /
SA01vakobhau:26964: sormikeva hi nadī vitarkavicārakṣobhitā saṃtatir aprasannā vartate iti /
SA01vakobhau:26966: na tarhi sa dravyāntaram iti kathaṃ dravyata ekādaśāṅgāni bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:26993: yathecchanti nikāyāntarīyāḥ dharmāntarameva caitasikaṃ prītiḥ saumanasyaṃ tu triṣvapi dhyānesu sukhamiti /
SA01vakobhau:26995: na vai sukhaṃ dhyāneṣu saumanasyaṃ yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:26999: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā aviparītakasūtre tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamuktvā “atrāsyotpannaṃ saumanasyendriyamapariśeṣaṃ nirudhyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:27001: caturthe ca dhyāne sukhendriyaṃ nirudhyata” ityuktam /
SA01vakobhau:27003: punaścoktaṃ “sukhasya ca prahāṇāt duḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṅgamādi“tyato 'pi na tṛtīye dhyāne saumanasyendriyamasti /
SA01vakobhau:27007: kiṃ punaḥ kliṣṭeṣvapi dhyāneṣu yathāvihitānyaṅgāni bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:27009: na hi kiṃ teṣu na vidyate /
SA01vakobhau:27037: trīṇi ca dhyānāni señjitāni uktāni bhagavatā /
SA01vakobhau:27045: vitarkacārau śvāsau ca sukhādi ca catuṣṭayam // VAkK_8.11 //
SA01vakobhau:27056: taskiṃ yā dhyānasamāpattiṣu vedanāstā eva dhyānopapattiṣu /
SA01vakobhau:27079: yadi dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu trayo vijñānakāyā na saṃvidyante vitarkavicārau ca katham te paśyanti yāvatspṛśanti katham cāvijñapti samutthāpayanti /
SA01vakobhau:27090: prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrakāyavijñānaṃ vijñaptisamutthāpakaṃ ca dvitīyādiṣu ca dhyāneṣu saṃmukhīkurvanti /
