SA01vakobhau:27096: anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca tat prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ vijñānaṃ veditavyaṃ yatte saṃmukhīkurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:27115: śuddhakena prayogato 'pi nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ śuddhakaṃ pratilabhate parihāṇito vā hānabhāgīyam /
SA01vakobhau:27117: ata evocyate “syācchuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ vairāgyeṇa pratilabheta vairāgyeṇa vijahyāt /
SA01vakobhau:27139: nanu ca niyāmā vakrāntito 'pyanāsravaṃ prathamato labhate /
SA01vakobhau:27169: svabhūmike dve ākāśānantyāyatanacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri ākiñcanyāyatanabhavāgrabhūmikāni trīṇīti /
SA01vakobhau:27179: śubhagrahaṇena śuddhamanāsravaṃ ca gṛhyate kuśalatvāt anāsravasya samāpatti dravyasyānantaraṃ svabhūmike ca śuddhānāsrave utpadyete /
SA01vakobhau:27183: vyutkrāntakasamāpattāro hi tṛtīyāt pareṇa laṅghayituṃ notsahante /
SA01vakobhau:27191: tathā śuddhāt kliṭaṃ cāpi svabhūmikam // VAkK_8.15 //
SA01vakobhau:27204: kleśotpīḍito hyadharamapi samāpattiṃ śuddhakaṃ bahu manyate /
SA01vakobhau:27211: pūrvāvedhāt pūrvaṃ hi sa evaṅkāmo bhavati varamadhastāt śuddhakaṃ nopariṣṭāt kliṣṭamiti /
SA01vakobhau:27221: śuddhakāt kliṣṭācca samanantaraṃ svabhūmikameva kliṣṭamutpadyate nānyabhūmikamiti /
SA01vakobhau:27239: hānabhāgīyaṃ viśeṣabhāgīyaṃ sthitibhāgīyaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyamiti caturvidhaṃ śuddhakam /
SA01vakobhau:27247: kleśotpattyanuguṇaṃ hānabhāgīyaṃ svabhūmyanuguṇaṃ sthitibhāgīyamūrdhvabhūmyanuguṇaṃ viśeṣabhāgīyamanāsravānuguṇaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyam /
SA01vakobhau:27253: dve trīṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca hāna bhāgādyanantaram /
SA01vakobhau:27279: sāsravā aṣṭau bhūmiranulomapratilomasamāpattito nirjitya anāsravāśca sapta /
SA01vakobhau:27285: evaṃ punaḥ pratilomaṃ nirjitya anāsravā apyekalaṅghitā anulomapratilomaṃ ca samāpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:27289: yadā tu prathamātsāsravāt tṛtīyamanāsravaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tasmātsāsravamākāśānantyāyatanaṃ tasmādanāsravamākiñcanyāyatanam /
SA01vakobhau:27296: tāṃ ca triṣu dvīpeṣu asamayavimukta evārhannutpādayati /
SA01vakobhau:27300: dṛṣṭiprāptasya yadyapi tīkṣṇendriyatvāt samādhau vaśitvaṃ na tu niṣkleśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:27302: samayavimukto yadyapi niḥkleśo natvasya samādhau vaśitvamiti /
SA01vakobhau:27312: bhavāgraṃ bhavāgre ca saṃmukhīkriyate adhaśca yāvatkāmadhātau /
SA01vakobhau:27322: nahi tasyādhareṇa samāpattidravyeṇa kiñcit prayojanaṃ vidhīyate /
SA01vakobhau:27354: maulānāṃ kuśalārūpyāṇāmadhobhūmikaṃ sāsravaṃ vastu nālambanaṃ svordhvabhūmyālambanatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:27384: kiṃ tānyapi trividhāni tathaiva ca teṣu vedanā /
SA01vakobhau:27390: śuddhakāni ca tānyupekṣendriyasaṃprayuktāni ca yantabāhyatvādadhobhūmyudvegānapagamāt vairāgyapathatvācca nāsvādanāsaṃprayuktāni /
SA01vakobhau:27394: ādyaṃ sāmantakamanāgamyaṃ tacchuddhakaṃ cānāsravaṃ ca yadyapi sāmantakacittena pratisaṃdhibandhaḥ kliṣṭo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:27411: ata eva dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu na vyayasthāpyate viśeṣābhāvāditi /
SA01vakobhau:27433: tāṃ hi dhyānāntarikāṃ bhāvayitvā mahābrahmā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:27435: punaḥ sarvasamādhīn saṃkalayya trayaḥ samādhayaḥ uktāḥ sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:27442: tatra dhyānāntaraṃ tāvadavitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhhiriti jñāpitam /
SA01vakobhau:27483: paraiḥ śeṣaiḥ satyākāraiḥ saṃprayuktaḥ samādhipraṇihito daśākāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:27485: anityaduḥkhataddhetubhya udvegāt mārgasya ca kolopamatayā 'vaśyatyājyatvāttadākāraḥ samādhirapraṇihitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:27524: na duḥkhato na hetvādito 'nāsravasyātallakṣaṇatvānna mārgākāraiḥ dūṣaṇīyatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:27561: asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā vahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya saṃvartate” iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:27565: samādhibhāvanā dhyānaṃ śubhamādyaṃ sukhāya hi // VAkK_8.27 //
SA01vakobhau:27567: kuśalaṃ prathamaṃ śuddhakamanāsravaṃ vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya samādhibhāvanā /
SA01vakobhau:27579: prayogajāḥ sarve guṇāstraidhātukā anāsravāḥ prajñāprabhedāya samādhibhāvanā /
SA01vakobhau:27583: yaścaturthadhyāne vajropamaḥ samādhiḥ sa āsravakṣayāya samādhibhāvanā /
SA01vakobhau:27591: idānīṃ samādhisaṃniśritānāṃ guṇānāṃ nirdeśakāla iti vyākhyāyante
SA01vakobhau:27639: sukhitā vata sattvā iti manasikurvan maitrīṃ samāpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:27641: duḥkhitā vata sattvā iti karuṇāṃ modantāṃ vata sattvā iti muditāṃ sattvā ityeva manasi kurvannupekṣāṃ samāpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:27644: atadvatāṃ sukhādhimokṣatvāt kathaṃ na viparītatvaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:27706: yathā sukhitamātmānaṃ manyate parānvā śṛṇoti buddhabodhisattvāryaśrāvakāṃstathā sattvānāṃ tatsukhamadhimucyate evaṃ sukhitā vata santu sattvā iti /
SA01vakobhau:27708: na cecchaknoti kleśasyodbhatavṛttitvāt sa mitrapakṣaṃ tridhā bhittvā 'dhimātre tatsukhamadhimucyate /
SA01vakobhau:27712: teṣu cetsamāṃ maitrīṃ labhate tata udāsīnapakṣe /
SA01vakobhau:27714: tataḥ śatrūpakṣaṃ tridhā bhittvā mṛdau tat sukhamadhimucyate /
SA01vakobhau:27718: tataścedadhimātra iva mitrapakṣe sukhādhimokṣo na vyāvartate /
SA01vakobhau:27720: tataḥ krameṇa grāmarāṣṭrasukhādhimokṣo yāvadekāṃ diśaṃ yāvatsarva lokaṃ maitryā sphurati /
SA01vakobhau:27724: śakyaṃ hi samucchinna kuśalamūle 'pi guṇagrāhiṇā bhavituṃ pratyekabuddhe ca doṣa grāhiṇā pūrvaṃ puṇyāpuṇyaphalasaṃdarśanāt /
SA01vakobhau:27726: evaṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyāṃ ca prayujyate amī sattvā bahuvidhavyasanīdhanimagnā apyevaṃ duḥkhādvimucyeran apyevātipramoderannityadhimucyamāna upekṣāṃ tūdāsīnapakṣādārabhate /
SA01vakobhau:27735: kiṃ punarya ekenāpramāṇena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ sarvaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:27750: śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatīti tṛtīyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:27786: kuśalāḥ samāhitā eva cārūpyavimokṣākhyāṃ labhante na kliṣṭā nāpyasamāhitāstadyathāmaraṇabhave /
SA01vakobhau:27808: bhavāgraṃ hi saṃjñā sūkṣmaṃ tat punaḥ sūkṣmataraṃ kṛtvā nirodhaṃ samāpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:27813: bhāvāgrikeṇa vā śuddhakena cetasā tato vyutthānaṃ bhavatyākiñcanyāyatana bhūmikena vā sāsraveṇa /
SA01vakobhau:27815: tadevaṃ tasyāḥ sāsravaṃ samāpatticittaṃ bhavati sāsravānāntarya tu vyutthānacittamiti /
SA01vakobhau:27826: ārūpyavimokṣāṇāṃ svabhūmikordhvabhūmikaṃ duḥkhaṃ taddhetunirodhau cālambanaṃ sarvaścānvayajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:27836: aśubhayā līnaṃ saṃtatiṃ pramodayituṃ jijñāsanārthaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:27840: evaṃ ca punastau niṣpannau bhavato yadi śubhato 'pi manasi kurvataḥ kleśo notpadyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:27856: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī vahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇāni durvarṇāni tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūyajānātyabhibhūya paśyatītyevaṃsaṃjñī bhavatīdaṃ prathamamabhibhvāyatanam /
SA01vakobhau:27868: yathā prathamo vimokṣa evaṃ dve abhibhvāyatane prathamadvitīye /
SA01vakobhau:27872: yathā dvitīyo vimokṣa evaṃ dve abhibhvāyatane tṛtīyacaturthe /
SA01vakobhau:27918: sarvāṇi caitāni vimokṣādīni pṛthagjanāryasāṃtānikāni sthāpayitvā nirodhavimokṣam /
SA01vakobhau:27932: ārupyavimokṣā ārupyakṛtsne ca traidhātukāśrayāṇi śeṣaṃ manuṣyāśrayameva /
SA01vakobhau:27948: dhyānānāṃ rūpadhātau tu tābhyāṃ dharmatayāpi ca // VAkK_8.38 //
SA01vakobhau:27950: rūpadhātau dhyānotpādanametābhyāṃ hetukarmabalābhyāṃ dharmatayā ca saṃvartanīkāle /
SA01vakobhau:27962: tatrāgamaḥ sūtravinayābhidharmā adhigamo bodhipakṣyā ityeṣa dvividhaḥ saddharmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:27964: dhātārastasya vaktāraḥ pratipattāra eva ca // VAkK_8.39 //
SA01vakobhau:27969: ato yāvadete sthāsyanti tāvatsaddharma iti veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:27976: yo 'yamiha śāstre 'bhidharma uktaḥ kimeṣa eva śāstrābhidharmo deśitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:27979: yaddurgṛhītaṃ tadihāsmadāgaḥ saddharmanītau manayaḥ pramāṇam // VAkK_8.40 //
SA01vakobhau:27981: prāyeṇa hi kāśmīravaibhāṣikāṇāṃ nītyādisiddha eṣo 'smābhirabidharma ākhyātaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:27985: saddharmanītau tu punarbuddhā eva pramāṇaṃ buddhaputrāśca /
SA01vakobhau:27987: nimīlite śāstari lokacakṣuṣi kṣayaṃ gate sākṣijane ca bhūyasā /
SA01vakobhau:27990: gate 'tha śāntiṃ paramāṃ svayaṃbhuvi svayaṃbhuvaḥ śāsanadhurdhareṣu ca /
SA01vakobhau:27991: jagatyanāthe gunaghātibhirmataiḥ niraṅkuśaiḥ svairamihādya caryate // VAkK_8.42 //
SA01vakobhau:27994: balakālaṃ malānāṃ ca na pramādyaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ // VAkK_8.43 //
SA01vakobhau:28016: kathaṃ punaridaṃ gamyate skandhasaṃtāna evedamātmābhidhānaṃ vartate nānyasminnabhidheya iti /
SA01vakobhau:28020: ye hi dharmāḥ santi teṣāṃ pratyakṣamupalabdhirbhavatyasatyantarāye /
SA01vakobhau:28028: sati kāraṇe kāraṇāntarasyābhāve kāryasyābhāvo dṛṣṭo bhāve ca punarbhāvistadyathāṅkurasya /
SA01vakobhau:28030: satyeva cābhāsaprāpte viṣaye manaskāre ca kāraṇe viṣayagrahaṇasyābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ punaśca bhāvo 'ndhavadhirādīnāmanandhāvadhirādīnāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:28043: kiṃ cedaṃ dravyata iti kiṃ vā prajñaptitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28070: yadyayamarhtaḥ skandhānāṃ lakṣyate teṣveva pudgalaprajñaptiḥ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:28085: na hi vinendhanenāgniḥ prajñapyate na cānya indhanādagniḥ śakyate prajñapayituṃ nāpyananyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28091: evaṃ na ca vinā skanvaiḥ pudgalaḥ prajñapyate /
SA01vakobhau:28093: na cānyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ śakyate pratijñātuṃ śāśvataprasaṅgāt /
SA01vakobhau:28103: etadevātra vaktavyaṃ kiṃ dāhyaṃ kok dāhaka iti /
SA01vakobhau:28105: loke hi tāvadapradīptaṃ kāṣṭḥādikamindhanamucyate dāhyaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:28109: yacca bhasvaraṃ coṣṇaṃ ca bhṛśaṃ ca tena hi tadidhyate dhyate ca /
SA01vakobhau:28115: yathā kṣīraṃ pratītya dadhi madhu pratītyaśuktam /
SA01vakobhau:28120: yadi caiyaṃ pudgalaḥ skandhān pratītyotpadyate sa tebhyo 'nyaścānityaśca prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:28122: atha punastatraiva kāṣṭhādau pradīpte yadīṣṇyaṃ tadagnistatsahajātāni trīṇi bhūtānīndhanamiṣyante /
SA01vakobhau:28129: na hi tattasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi tat prajñapteḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28134: skandhā apyevaṃ pudgalasyāśrayasahabhūtāḥ prāpnuvantīti vispaṣṭamanyatvaṃ pratijñāyate /
SA01vakobhau:28152: atha punaḥ sarvameva tat pradīptaṃ kāṣṭhādikamindhanaṃ cāgniśceṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:28155: skandhā eva ca pudgalā ityananyatvamanivāryaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:28159: yathendhanamupādāyāgniḥ prajñapyate evaṃ skadhānupādāya pudgalaḥ iti /
SA01vakobhau:28161: yadi cāyamanyaḥ skandhebhyo na vaktavyaḥ “pañcavidhaṃ jñeyamatītānāgataṃ pratyupannamasaṃskṛtamavaktavyami“ti na vaktavyaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:28163: naiva hi tadatītādibhyaḥ pañcamaṃ nāpañcamaṃ vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:28165: yadā ca pudgalaḥ prajñapyate ki tāvatskandhānupalabhya prajñapyate āhosvit pudgalam /
SA01vakobhau:28173: pudgala eva hi tasyā upādānaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:28175: atha mataṃ satsu skandheṣu pudgala upalabhyate tataḥ skandhānupādāyāsya prajñaptirucyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:28177: tadevaṃ rūpasyāpi cakṣurmanaskārālokeṣu satsūpalambhāt tānupādāya prajñaptirbaktavyā /
SA01vakobhau:28188: cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītyapudgalaṃ pratibhāvayati cakṣurvijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyaḥ no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vāno vā /
SA01vakobhau:28190: evaṃ yāvat manovijñeyān ceddharmān pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayati manovijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyo no tu vaktavyo dharmā vā no vā /
SA01vakobhau:28194: cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītya kṣīraṃ vibhāvayatyudakaṃ vā cakṣurvijñeyaṃ kṣīramudakaṃ ceti vaktavyaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no vā /
SA01vakobhau:28196: evaṃ ghrāṇajihvākāyavijñeyaṃ vaktavyaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ spraṣṭavyāni vā no vā /
SA01vakobhau:28200: ato yathā rūpādīnyeva kṣīramudakaṃ vā prajñapyate samastānyevaṃ skandhāḥ pudgala iti siddham /
SA01vakobhau:28202: yaccocyate cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayatīti /
SA01vakobhau:28206: kiṃ tāvadrūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavatiti āhosvidrūpāṇyupalabhamānaḥ pudgalamupalabhata iti /
SA01vakobhau:28208: yadi rūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavanti sa ca tebhyo 'nyo na vaktavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28220: rūpādabhinnasvabhāvaḥ pudgalaḥ prāpnoti rūpa eva vā tatprajñāptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28222: idaṃ ca rūpamayaṃ pudgalaḥ kathamidaṃ gamyate /
SA01vakobhau:28241: yadi cāyamasti no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vā to vā /
SA01vakobhau:28247: kiṃ tadrūpāṇi pratītyotpadyate āhosvit pudgalamubhayaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:28253: yameva hi viṣayaṃ cakṣurvijñāneṣu pratītyotpadyate vijñānaṃ sa eva tasyālambanapratyayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28259: sūtre hi nirdhāritaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādo bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:28265: yatkiñcit bhikṣo cakṣurvijñānaṃ sarvaṃ taccakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ceti /
SA01vakobhau:28269: “ye hi hetayo ye pratyayā vijñānasyotpādāya te 'pyanityā” iti sūtre vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:28271: atha pudgalo na tasyālambanaṃ na tarhi tena vijñeyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28282: “yānīmāni brāhmaṇa pañcendriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣyaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:28286: tadyathā cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyam /
SA01vakobhau:28288: mana eṣaṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ gocaraviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavati manaścaiṣāṃ pratisaraṇami“ti /
SA01vakobhau:28296: ṣaḍimānīndriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣayamākāṅkṣantī tyuktaṃ ṣaṭprāṇakopame /
SA01vakobhau:28304: yacca tatkevalaṃ mana ādhipatyādhyākṛtaṃ manovijñānaṃ naivaṃ tadanyeṣāṃ viṣayamākāṅkṣatyato nāstyeṣa doṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28306_0: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā “sarvābhijñeyaṃ vo bhikṣavo dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayiṣyāmī“tyuktvā
SA01vakobhau:28306_2: veditaṃ suḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā yāvat manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayam /
SA01vakobhau:28310: ata etāvadevābhijñeyaṃ pratijñeyaṃ cetyavardhāryate na pudgalaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28316: cakṣuṣa ca pudgalaṃ paśyām iti paśyanta paudgalikā anātmanā ātmānaṃ paśyāma iti dṛṣṭisthānamāpannā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:28321_0: “cakṣuḥpratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśasahajātā
SA01vakobhau:28321_1: vedanā saṃjñā cetanā itīme catvāro rupiṇaḥ skandhāśvakṣurindriyaṃ ca rūpametāvanmanuṣyatvamucyate /
SA01vakobhau:28323: atreyaṃ saṃjñā sattvo naro manuṣyo mānavaśca poṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalo jīvo janturiti /
SA01vakobhau:28325: atreyaṃ pratijñā ahaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyāmīti /
SA01vakobhau:28327: atrāyaṃ vyavahāra ityapi sa āyuṣmānevaṃnāmā evañjātya evaṅgotra evamāhāra evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evandīrghāyurevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:28331: sarva ime dharmāḥ anityāḥ saṃskṛtāśceti tāḥ pratītyasamutpannā iti /
SA01vakobhau:28339: yadi cāyaṃ pudgalo nāyatanaṃ na sostīti siddham /
SA01vakobhau:28343: teṣāmapi caivaṃ paśyato “yāvatā bhikṣo cakṣuryāvatā rūpāṇi vistareṇa etāvatā bhikṣo tathāgataḥ sarvaṃ ca prajñāpayati sarvaprajñaptiṃ ce“ti /
SA01vakobhau:28345: bimbisārasūtre coktam “ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito na tvātrā tmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā duḥkhamidamutpadya mānamutpadyate” iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28349: “manyase ki nu sattveti māradṛṣṭigataṃ hi te /
SA01vakobhau:28352: evaṃ skandhānupādāya saṃvṛtyā sattva ucyate” // iti /
SA01vakobhau:28357: yathā saṃkliśyate cittaṃ yathā cittaṃ viśudhyati //
SA01vakobhau:28360: nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ //
SA01vakobhau:28366: na labhyate so 'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatāmi“ti /
SA01vakobhau:28374: śūnyatāyāmasya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate na vimucyate /
SA01vakobhau:28378: na vaita evaṃ grandhaṃ pramāṇaṃ kurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:28385: yadi nikāya eva pramāṇaṃ na tarhi teṣāṃ budhaḥ śāstā /
SA01vakobhau:28399: yo hi granthaḥ sarveṣu nikāyāntareṣvāmnāyate na ca sūtraṃ dharmatāṃ vā bādhate so 'smābhirapāṭhānna buddhavacanamiti vacanaṃ kevalaṃ sāhasamātram /
SA01vakobhau:28401: kiṃ cedamapi teṣāṃ sūtraṃ nāsti “sarvadharmā anātāna” iti /
SA01vakobhau:28404: naiva hi pudgalo dharma ucyate nāpyanyo dharmāditi /
SA01vakobhau:28410: iha caivaṃ vikalpyate “anātmanyāteti saṃjñāviparyāsa ścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa” iti /
SA01vakobhau:28412: anātmanyātmeti viparyāso na tvātmani kiṃ ca punaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28414: “nātmā skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ” yattāvaduktaṃ prāk “no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no ve“ti tattāvadaśocam /
SA01vakobhau:28416: uktaṃ ca sūtrāntare “ye kecit bhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti sarve ta imāneva pañcopādānaskandhāni“ti /
SA01vakobhau:28420: tathoktaṃ “ye kecidanekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmarantaḥ samanusmārṣuḥ samanusmaranti samanusmariṣyanti vā punaḥ sarve ta imāneva opañcopādanaskandhāni“ti /
SA01vakobhau:28426: yadi tu rūpavantaṃ pudgalaṃ paśyetsatkāyadṛṣṭiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:28432: yadyevaṃ tarhi na buddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ prapnoti /
SA01vakobhau:28434: na hi kiñcictrittamasti caittā vā yatsarvaṃ jānīyāt /
SA01vakobhau:28439: evaṃ tarhi cittavināśe pudgalasyāvināśābhyupagamāt nityatvamasyābhyupetaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:28441: naiva ca vayaṃ sarvatra jñānasaṃmukhībhāvād buddhaṃ sarvajñamācakṣmahe /
SA01vakobhau:28446: yā hyasau buddhākhyā saṃtatistasyā idamasti sāmarthyaṃ yadābhogamātreṇāviparītaṃ jñānamutpadyate yatreṣṭam /
SA01vakobhau:28456: “ye cābhyatītāḥ saṃbuddhā ye ca buddhā anāgatāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28457: yaśca etarhhi saṃbuddho bahūnāṃ śokanāśana” iti /
SA01vakobhau:28459: skandhā eva ca traiyadhvikā iṣyante na pudgalā yuṣmābhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28463: “bhāraṃ ca vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi bhārādānaṃ ca bhāranikṣepaṇaṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ce“ti /
SA01vakobhau:28467: na hi bhāra eva bhārahāro yuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28479: “yo 'sāvāyupmānevaṃnāmā yāvadevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyantaḥ” sa eṣa yathā vijñāyeta /
SA01vakobhau:28481: mānyathā vijñāyi nityo vā avaktavyaṃ veti /
SA01vakobhau:28483: skandhā eva ca skandhānāmupadhātāya saṃvartante pūrvakā uttareṣāmiti bhāraṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ca kṛtvoktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28487: asty eva pudgalo yasmād uktaṃ “nāsti sattva upapāduka iti mithyādṛṣṭiḥ” /
SA01vakobhau:28489: kaścaivam āha nāsti sattva upapāduka iti /
SA01vakobhau:28491: sattvastu yathā 'sti tathā vibhakto bhagavateti brūmo mānuṣyakasūtre /
SA01vakobhau:28493: tasmād yaḥ paratropapādukasattvākhyaskandhasaṃtānāpavādaṃ karoti tasyaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭir nāsti sattva upapāduka iti /
SA01vakobhau:28497: athaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ pudgalāpavādikā satī kiṃprahātavyā bhavet /
SA01vakobhau:28502: “ekaḥ pudgalo loka utpadyamāna utpadyate” iti vacanāt na skandhā iti cet /
SA01vakobhau:28507: saṃskṛta iti vā pudgalo vaktavya utpatīmattvābhyupagamāt /
SA01vakobhau:28509: na sa evamutpadyate yathā skandhā apūrvaprādurbhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:28514: yathā yājñiko jāto vaiyākaraṇo jāta ityucyate vidyopādānāt /
SA01vakobhau:28520: na pratikṣepāt sūtra eva hi pratikṣiptaṃ bhagavatā paramārthaśūnyatāyām /
SA01vakobhau:28524: ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhān pratisaṃdadhātyanyatra dharmasaṃketāditi /
SA01vakobhau:28526: phalgusūtre coktam “upādatta iti phalgu na vadāmīti /
SA01vakobhau:28530: kaṃ ca tāvadbhavānyājñikaṃ yāvadvacyā dhita madhimucyate /
SA01vakobhau:28549: yadi ca skandhānāmapūrvotpādo na pudgalasyeṣyate so 'nyaśca tebhyo nityaśca sphuṭaṃ dīpito bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:28551: pañca skandhā ekaḥ pudgala iti brūvatā kathamanyatvaṃ nocyate /
SA01vakobhau:28553: kathaṃ tāvat bhūtāni catvāri rūpaṃ tvekaṃ na ca bhūtebhyyo 'nyadrūpam /
SA01vakobhau:28559: tathāpi tu yathā bhūtamātraṃ rūpamevaṃ skandhamātraṃ pudgala ityabhyupetaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:28561: yadi skandhamātraṃ pudgalaḥ kasmāt bhagavatā sa jīvastaccharīrakanyo veti navyākṛtam /
SA01vakobhau:28567: sa ca kasmiścinnāstīti kathamasyānyatvamananyatvaṃ vā vyākriyatām /
SA01vakobhau:28577: yadi yadeva pṛccheyaṃ tadeva vyākuryā iti /
SA01vakobhau:28585: nanu bhadantaḥ pūrvameva pratijñāṃ kārito nā 'nyadvacyākartavyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:28591: ahamapi mahārājaṃ pṛccheyaṃ bahuvollakāśca rājāno bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:28593: yadi yadeva pṛccheyaṃ tadeva vyākuryā iti /
SA01vakobhau:28597: yaste 'ntaḥpure ābhravṛkṣastasya kimamlāni phalāni āhosvit madhurāṇīti /
SA01vakobhau:28601: nanu mayā pūrvameva mahārājaḥ pratijñāṃ kārito nānyadvacyākartavyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:28605: sa āha kathamasato vṛkṣasya phalānāmamlatāṃ madhuratāṃ vā vyākaromīti /
SA01vakobhau:28607: evameva mahārāja sa eva jīvo nāsti kuto 'sya śarīrādanyatāmananyatāṃ vā vyākaromīti /
SA01vakobhau:28612: sa hi yasyāpi skandhasaṃtānasya jīva ityākhyā tasyāpyabhāvaṃ pratīyāditi mithyādṛṣṭiṃ pātitaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:28620: yat bhagavatoktam “astyātmetyānanda vatsasagotrāya parivrājakāya praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ nanvakalpaṃ syādvacanāya sarvadharmā anātmāna iti /
SA01vakobhau:28622_0: nāstyātmetyānanda vatsasagotrāya parivrājakāya praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ nanu vatsasagotraḥ
SA01vakobhau:28622_1: parivrājakaḥ pūrvameva saṃmūḍho bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃmohamāpadyeta abhūt me ātmāsa me etarhi nāstīti /
SA01vakobhau:28640: jīvākhyā tatra sā na syāt jīvanāstitvadeśanāt //
SA01vakobhau:28643: abhavyaḥ śūnyatāṃ boddhuṃ tadānīṃ tādṛśo janaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:28645: tathā hyātmāsti nāstīti pṛṣṭo vāstyeva nāvadat /
SA01vakobhau:28646: āśayāpekṣāyā praṣṭuḥ sati tvastīti nāha kim //
SA01vakobhau:28650: yadi hi tāvadātmā loka iṣṭaḥ syāttasyābhāvādayuktaṃ caturdhā vyākaraṇam /
SA01vakobhau:28654: śāśvate loke na kasyacit parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /
SA01vakobhau:28655: śāśvate loke na kasyacit parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /
SA01vakobhau:28659: ubhayathātve niyamata ekeṣāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt ekeṣāṃ na /
SA01vakobhau:28663: ato mārgadhīnatvāt parinirvāṇasya caturdhāpi niyamo na vyākriyate nirgrantha4rāvakacaṭakavat /
SA01vakobhau:28668: tathāhi muktikaḥ parivrājaka eva catuṣkaṃ pṛṣṭvā punaḥ pṛṣṭavān kiṃ nu sarvo loko 'nena mārgeṇa niryātyāhosvidekadeśo lokasye“ti /
SA01vakobhau:28670: sthavira ānanda āha “yameva tvaṃ muktika tatprathamato bhagavantaṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭavāṃstame vaitarhi pṛcchasyanena paryāyeṇe“ti sarvam /
SA01vakobhau:28672: bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maranādityapi catuṣkaḥ praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā na vyākṛtaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28674: sa hi muktvāmānaṃ tathāgataṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭavān /
SA01vakobhau:28676: paudgalikastu paryanuyojyaḥ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavān jīvantaṃ pudgalamastīti vyākaroti paraṃ maraṇānna vyākarotīti /
SA01vakobhau:28680: idaṃ tarhi kasmādvacyākaroti “bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ maitreyānāgate 'dhvani tathāgato 'rhan saṃyaksaṃbuddha” iti /
SA01vakobhau:28686: yadi ca bhagavān pūrvaṃ pudgalaṃ dṛṣṭvā parinirvṛtaṃ punaḥ na paśyatyajñānānna vyakarotīti sarvajñatvaṃ śāsturutpāditaṃ bhavati na vā so 'stītyabhyupagantavyam /
SA01vakobhau:28690: arthatadapi na vaktavyaṃ paśyati vā naveti /
SA01vakobhau:28692: evaṃ tarhi idamapi śanaiḥ śanairavaktavyaṃ kriyatāṃ sarvajño vā na vā bhagavānna veti /
SA01vakobhau:28694: astyeva pudgalo yasmātsatyataḥ sthitito nāsti me ātmeti dṛṣṭisthānamuktam /
SA01vakobhau:28704: “astyātmetyānanda śāśvatāya paraiti nāstyātmetyānandocchedāya paraitī“ti vātsyasūtre vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:28706: yadi tarhi pudgalo nāsti ka eṣa saṃsarati /
SA01vakobhau:28710: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā “avidyānivaraṇānāṃ sattvanāṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ saṃsaratāmi“ti /
SA01vakobhau:28718: yathātu kṣaṇiko 'gniḥ saṃtatyā saṃsaratītyucyate tathā sattvākhyaḥ skndhasamudāyastṛṣṇopādānaḥ saṃsaratītyucyate /
SA01vakobhau:28720: yadi skandhāmātramidaṃ kasmādāha bhagavān “grahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena sunetro nāma śāstā 'bhūvami“ti /
SA01vakobhau:28734: yadi cātmā bhavettthāgatā eva suvyaktaṃ paśyeyuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28738: “ātmani ca satyātmīyaṃ bhavatī“ti sūtre vacanādātmagrāho 'pyeṣāṃ skandheṣvadhikaṃ pravarteta /
SA01vakobhau:28746: atha mataṃ naivātmani pravartate sneha iti /
SA01vakobhau:28748: tat ka idānīmeṣa yogo yadanātmanyātmadhimokṣāt sneha utpadyate ātmanyeva tu notpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:28750: tasmāt dṛṣṭacyarvudametasmin śāsane utpannaṃ ya eṣa ekeṣāṃ pudgalagrāha ekeṣāṃ sarvanāstitāgrāhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28752: ye 'pi ca dravyāntaramevātmānaṃ manyante tīrthakārāstepāmeva mokṣābhāvadoṣo niṣkampaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28754: yadi tarhi sarvathāpi nāstyātmā kathaṃ kṣaṇikeṣu citteṣu cirānubhūtasyārthasya smaraṇaṃ bhavati pratyabhijñānaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:28762: tādṛśo 'pi hyatadanvayaścittaviśeṣo na samarthaḥ tāṃ smṛtiṃ bhavayituṃ tadanvayo 'pi cānyādṛśo na samarthastāṃ smṛtiṃ bhavayitum /
SA01vakobhau:28764: labhayathā tu samartha ityevaṃ smṛtirbhavatyanyasyāṃ sāmarthyādarśanāt /
SA01vakobhau:28768: evaṃ hi devadattacetasā dṛṣṭaṃ yajñadattacetaḥ smaret /
SA01vakobhau:28772: na hi tayoḥ saṃbandho 'sti akārya kāraṇabhāvādyathaikasaṃtānikayoḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28778: saṃtatipariṇatyā yathoktamiti ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28793: tato caitrākhyātsaṃtānāttāṃ bhavantīṃ dṛṣṭvocyate caitraḥ smaratīti /
SA01vakobhau:28805: kva ca punaḥ smṛtirviniyoktavyā va evaṃ tasyāḥ svāmī mṛgyate /
SA01vakobhau:28820: hetureva tarhi svāmī prāpnoti phalameva ca svam /
SA01vakobhau:28822: yasmāddhetorādhipatyaṃ phale phalena ca tadvān heturiti /
SA01vakobhau:28826_0: yaścāpi sa caitrābhidhānaḥ saṃskārasamūhasaṃtāna ekato gṛhītvā gavākhyasvāmītyucyate
SA01vakobhau:28826_1: sa cāpi tasya deśāntaravikārotpattau kāraṇabhāvaṃ cetasi kṛtvā na tu khalu kaścidekaścaitro
SA01vakobhau:28830: evaṃ ko vijānāti kasya vijñānamityevamādiṣu vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:28834: yo 'pyāha bhāvasya bhavitrapekṣatvāt sarvo hi bhāvo bhavitāramapekṣate /
SA01vakobhau:28836: yathā devadatto gacchatītyatra gatirbhāvo gantāraṃ devadattamapekṣate /
SA01vakobhau:28847: so 'pi na kaścidekaḥ saṃskārā hi ta evaṃnāmānaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28849: tatra yathā devadatto gacchati yathā vijānāti /
SA01vakobhau:28853: kṣaṇikā hisaṃskārā abhinnasaṃtānā devadatta iti bālairekasattvapiṇḍagraheṇādhimuktāḥ svasya saṃtānasya deśāntare kāraṇaṃ bhavanta ucyante gacchati devadatta iti /
SA01vakobhau:28859: ta eva ca punarvijñānasya kāraṇaṃ bhavanta ucyante jānāti devadatta iti /
SA01vakobhau:28863: yattarhi “vijñānaṃ vijānātī“ti sūtra uktaṃ kiṃ tatra vijñānaṃ karoti /
SA01vakobhau:28878: ata eva tadindriyādapyutpannaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātītyucyate nendriyam /
SA01vakobhau:28880: athavā tathā 'trāpi vijñānasaṃtānasya vijñāne kāraṇabhāvādvijñānaṃ vijānātīti vacanānnirdoṣaṃ kāraṇe dartṛśabdanirdeśāt /
SA01vakobhau:28884: api khalu yathā pradīpo gacchati tathā vijñānaṃ vijānātīti /
SA01vakobhau:28896: yathā cābhijāyate tiṣṭhati rūpamityatra bhaviturbhāvādanarthantaratvamevaṃ vijñānasyāpi syāt /
SA01vakobhau:28898: yadi vijñānādvijñānamutpadyate nātmānaḥ kasmānna nityaṃ tādṛśamevotpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṅkurakāṇḍapatradivat /
SA01vakobhau:28902: eṣa hi saṃskṛtasya svabhāvo yadavaśyaṃ prabandhasyānyathātvaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:28904: anyathā hi nikāmadhyānasamāhitānāṃ sadṛśakāyacittotpattau prathamakṣaṇaniṃrviśeṣatvāt paścādapi na syāt svayaṃ vyutthānam /
SA01vakobhau:28914_0: yadyathā strīcittānantaraṃ yadi tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittamutpannaṃ bhavati tatpatiputrādicittaṃ
SA01vakobhau:28914_1: vā punaśca paścātsaṃtatipariṇatyā strīcittamutpadyate tat samartha bhavati tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittotpādane
SA01vakobhau:28920: atha punaḥ paryāyeṇa strīcittādvahuvidhaṃ cittamutpannaṃ vahutara māsannataraṃ vā tadevotpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:28926: saiva balīyasī bhāvanā kasmānnityaṃ na phalati /
SA01vakobhau:28941: ya eva tvayamekīyastīrthika ātmaprabhavāṃ cittotpattiṃ manyate tasyaivedaṃ sphuṭaṃ codyamāpadyate kasmānna nityaṃ tādṛśamevotpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṅkurakāṇḍapatrādivaditi /
SA01vakobhau:28947: saṃyoginostu paricchinnatvādaprāptipūrvikā prāptiḥ samyoga iti lakṣaṇavyākhyānāccātmānaḥ paricchedaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28955: astu vā saṃyogastathāpi nityamaviśiṣṭe manasi kathaṃ saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28959: sa eva paricodyate kathaṃ buddhiviśeṣa iti /
SA01vakobhau:28965: nahi kiñcidātmanaḥ upalabhyate sāmarthmauṣadha kāryasiddhāviva kuhakavaidyaphuḥsvāhānām /
SA01vakobhau:28973: na hi te citravadarādivadādhārye nāpi sa kuḍacyakuṇḍādivadādhāro yuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28986: ko hi sa gandhādibhyo 'nyāṃ pṛthivīṃ nirdhārayati /
SA01vakobhau:28990: te hyeva tadākhyā gandhādayo yathā pratīyerannānya iti /
SA01vakobhau:28998: sa eva valiṣṭhaḥ kasmānnityaṃ na phalati /
SA01vakobhau:29005: smṛtyādīnāṃ guṇapadārthatvāt tasya cārthādavaśyaṃ dravyāśritatvāt teṣāṃ cānyāśrayāyogāditi cet /
SA01vakobhau:29021: ahaṃ sukhī syāmahaṃ duḥkhī na syāmityevamarthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:29030: gauro 'hamahaṃ śyāmaḥ sthūlo 'hamahaṃ kṛśaḥ jīrṇo 'hamahaṃ yuveti gaurādibuddhibhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇo 'yamahaṅkāro dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:29035: ātmana upakārake 'pi śarīra ātmopacāro yathā ya evāyaṃ sa evāhaṃ sa evāyaṃ me bṛtya iti bhavatyupakārake 'pi ātmopacāro natvahaṅkāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:29041: yenaiva hi sahāsya saṃvandhaḥ kāyena cittena vā yatraivāyamahaṅkāra utpadyate nānvatra /
SA01vakobhau:29058: asatyātmani ka eṣa sukhito duḥkhito vā /
SA01vakobhau:29069: asatyātmani ka eṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ kartā kaśca phalānāṃ bhoktā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:29079: asti punaḥ kvacideva kārye kasyacit svātantryam /
SA01vakobhau:29090: tatra kāyakarmaṇi tāvat kāyasya cittaparatantrā vṛttiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:29092: cittasyāpi kāye svakāraṇaparatantrā vṛttistasyāpyevamiti nāsti kasyacit svātantryam /
SA01vakobhau:29100: yattu yasya pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tattsya kartetyucyate /
SA01vakobhau:29102: na ca ātmanaḥ kvacidapi kāraṇatvaṃ dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:29106: smṛtijo hi cchandaḥ cchandajo vitarko vitarkātprayatnaḥ prayatnādvāyustataḥ karmeti kimatrātmā kurute /
SA01vakobhau:29108: phalasyāpica ka upabhogo yamayamātmā kurvannupabhoktā kalpyate /
SA01vakobhau:29115: vedanādyanāśrayatvāt tadāśrayaśca ṣaḍāyatanaṃ nātmā yathā tathoktam /
SA01vakobhau:29119: ātmanyapi sati kathaṃ vinaṣṭāt karmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:29127: naiva tu vayaṃ vinaṣṭāt karmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiṃ brūmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:29142: tat punaḥ puṣpānniṣpannaṃ kasmāttasya vījasya phalamityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:29146: yadi hi tatpūrvikānnabhaviṣyat tattādṛśasya phalasyotopattau na samarthamabhaviṣyat /
SA01vakobhau:29155: kā punaḥ saṃtatiḥ kaḥ pariṇāmaḥ ko viśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:29157: yaḥ karmapūrva uttarottaracittapravasaḥ sā saṃtatistasyā anyathotpattiḥ pariṇāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:29163: trividhakarmapūrvakatve 'pi yatkarma guru vā bhavatyāsannamabhyastaṃ vā yatkṛtaṃ sāmarthyaṃ dyotyate natvanyasya /
SA01vakobhau:29167: “yat guru yaccāsannaṃ yaccābhyastaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat /
SA01vakobhau:29170: tatra vipākahetvāhitaṃ tu vipākaphaladānasāmarthyaṃ vipākaṃ dattvā vinivartate /
SA01vakobhau:29178: na tāvat dṛṣṭāntena sarvaṃ samānaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:29180: tatrāpi tu na phalādeva punaḥ phalāntaramutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:29186: yo hi tatra bhūtaprakārāṅkuraṃ nirvartayati sa tasya vījaṃ nānyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:29188: bhāvinyā tu saṃjñāyā sādṛśyādvā pūrvako 'pi saṃtāno bījamityākhyāyate /
SA01vakobhau:29190: evamihāpi tasmādvipākādyadi sadasaddharmaśravaṇā dipratyayaviśeṣajaḥ kuśalasāsravo 'kuśalo vā cittavikāra utpadyate tasmātpunarvikārāntaramutpadyate nānyatheti samānametat /
SA01vakobhau:29194: yathā lākṣārasarañjitāt mātuluṅgapuṣpātsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣajaḥ phale raktaḥ keśara upajāyate na ca tasmāt punaranyaḥ evaṃ karmajādvipākāt na punarvipākāntaramiti /
SA01vakobhau:29198: nānāvidhaśaktibhinnaistu karmabhiradhivāsitāḥ saṃtataya etāmavasthāṃ gatā īdṛśaṃ phalamabhinivartayantīti buddhānāmeva viṣayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:29221: ye dharmahetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
SA01vakobhau:29222: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
